28a8(rgyud): pa'i sku ston par 'gyur ro// rtsa ba la brten pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par 'gyur ro// rtsa ba'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir ni
28b1(rgyud): chos kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsum dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku dang po'i dbang gis sangs rgyas/ 
28b2(rgyud): rnams dang mdzad pa mtshungs pa dang / sku gnyis pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang dgongs pa mtshungs pa dang / sku gsum pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams dang sku mtshungs par gyur pa
28b3(rgyud): yin no// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dang po gang yin pa de ni/ sems can gyi mos pa'i rjes su rnam pa mang po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs ston par mdzad
28b4(rgyud): nas de'i phyir mang por bstan pa yin no// sangs rgyas dkyi sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni/ slob ma rnams yid gcig tu gyur pa'i phyir/ mtshan nyid gcig kho na ston par
28b5(rgyud): mdzad pas de'i phyir gcig tu bstan pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtshan ma gnyis/ kyis rnam pa thams cad kun tu khyab cing / mtshan nyid
28b6(rgyud): du 'dzin pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na/ de'i phyir gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang po gang yin pa de ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten
28b7(rgyud): nas/ rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// sku gnyis pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi sku la brten nas snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par yod pa ma yin pas/ 
28b8(rgyud): rten pa'i gnas ci yang mi mnga' 'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag ni rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni rtag pa zhes bstan la/ mi rtag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ni mi rtag pa zhes
29a1(rgyud): bstan te/ sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / de dang de dag tu rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pa ston pa la rgyun chad med pa'i
29a2(rgyud): phyir/ de lta bas na rtag pa zhes bstan to// rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po sngon du mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// 
29a3(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos rnams yong su sdud cing 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / sems
29a4(rgyud): can zad pa med pa bzhin du mdzad pa la yang zad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyi dar rtag pa zhes bstan to// rtsa ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang // phun sum tshogs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mngon du mi 'byung ba'i
29a5(rgyud): phyir mi rtag pa zhes bstan to// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i chos kyang ma yin la tha ngad pa'i mtshan nyid mi mnga' zhing rtsa ba yin par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 
29a6(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir/ rtag pa zhes bstan to// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na/ mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes med la/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid
29a7(rgyud): las gud na yang mchog tu gyur pa'i spyod yul med pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dang / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa gnyis po gang yin pa de ni
29a8(rgyud): de bzhin nyid gcig pa yang mi yin zang da pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir chos kyi skuni shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'dog pa rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ gnyis
29b1(rgyud): rnam par dag par gyur pa yin pas/ des chos kyi su rnam par dag pa dran su tshogs par gyur pas nan// gzhan yang gas chu/ sku gsum bdag tu rnam par byed/ dang pa rnam padzad
29b2(rgyud): sgyur te/ sprul pa'i mu'i na la/ yangs sno rdzogs pa'i skyes yin pa yang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgrayin la/ swA ba ba'i m+bu ma yin pa yang meng/ sprum pa'i spyanan yo chung rtags pa sku
29b3(rgyud): yin pa yang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgyum yin pa yang 'dod// sbrul pa'i sgra yin / spyod rdzogs pa'i sum yin pa shing nan/ 
29b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i'o ga tu/ smon lam la mnga' brnas pa'i phyir/ na ji lta ba bzhin du na 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i
29b5(rgyud): zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sa yin la/ pa'i su ma yin pa gang zhen/ sa'i mdun rab gyi skrag yin pa'o// sbrul pa'i sku yang min la/ 'angs sung
29b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sku yang yin pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lhag sa dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa
29b7(rgyud): sing ma yin pa gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ chos se sku gang len pa'o// rigs sa chos kyi sgra gang 'on bden/ gnyis du med pas rang ba 'byoraro// gnyis su med panas byab yang ga
29b8(rgyud): zhen chos su de la mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba gnyig med pas yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ ma dad pa yang ma yin
30a1(rgyud): grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma yin pa yang ma yin/ snang ba yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin te/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes des ni mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid/ 
30a2(rgyud): kyi gnas kyang ma gzigs/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa yang mi gzigs/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa yang mi gzigs/ grangs kyang ma yin/ grangs ma
30a3(rgyud): yin pa yang mi gzigs/ snang ba yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin pa yang mi gzigs pas/ de'i phyir spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa la/ rnam par brtag
30a4(rgyud): tu yang mi rung la/ bar zhes bya ba med kyang 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhi byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi sku 'di la de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur bar rig
30a5(rgyud): par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sku 'di'i rgyu dang rkyen dang / spyod/ yul dang / gnas dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dpag par dka' ba'i phyir gang gis khong du chud par gyur na
30a6(rgyud): sku de ni theg pa chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o// sku 'di nyid la ba rten nas/ dang po bskyed pa'i sems kyang thob par 'gyur ro// 
30a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rtse gcig gis thogs pa'i sems dang / rdo rje'i sems dang / 
30a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di
30b1(rgyud): la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas/ ye shes chen po thams cad rab tu snang bar 'gyur bas/ 
30b2(rgyud): de'i phyir sku gnyis po ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab la brten nas mngon du snang bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi sku 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi ngo nyid la gnas pas/ brtag pa zhes kyang bstan to// nga zhes
30b3(rgyud): kyang bstan to// ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas pa'i phyir skyid pa zhes kyang bstan to// ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i yongs su gtsang ba zhes kyang bstan te/ de lta bas na de bzhin
30b4(rgyud): gshegs pa ni rtag par bzhugs pa dang / mnga' dbang brnyes pa dang / bde skyid pa dang / yongs su gtsang ba ra gyur pa yin no// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas/ 
30b5(rgyud): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin tham/ sa cad dang / chos dran pa chen po la sogs pa dran pa/ nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
30b6(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang / gzungs thams cad dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams cad dang / chos mnyam pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing / de lta bu'i sangs rgyas
30b7(rgyud): kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ye shes chen po 'di la brten nas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
30b8(rgyud): ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
31a1(rgyud): chel brten nas/ rin po che chad red cing mtha' med pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin chen po'i 'din pa che dang / shes rab chen/ 
31a2(rgyud): po'i rin po che la brten nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gya nom pa tshad med cing mtha' med pa sna tshogs mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi sku'i ting nge
31a3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing / mtshan ma la mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur bas/ rnam par brtag tu mi rung la/ rtag
31a4(rgyud): pa yang ma yin la/ chad pa yang ma yin pas/ dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o// rnam par rtog pa mnga' la dang ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'a'o// gsum
31a5(rgyud): du bgrang ba yod kyang ngo bo nyid la gsum du 'gyur ba med pa/ sa 'phel ba yang med/ 'grib pa yang med de/ rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur gzung ba med/ 'dzin pa yang
31a6(rgyud): med pas/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par grol ba'i gnas 'chi ba dag gi rgyal po'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ skye shi mun pa las mngon par 'phags pa sems can
31a7(rgyud): thams cad kyis sgrub par mi nus shing / bgrod par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 
31a8(rgyud): dper na mi zhig gser 'dod pa de dag tu gser gyi rdo yongs su btsal ba las/ gser gyi rdo de rnyed nas zhing mor btags te/ snying po gang yin pa blangs nas/ so mal du bzhus
31b1(rgyud): btul nas gser yongs su dag pa rnyed par gyur na/ yid bzhin du bsgyur te/ gdu bu la sogs pa rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su byas nas/ spyod pa mang po dang ldan par gyur kyang
31b2(rgyud): gser gyi rang bzhin la ni 'gyur ba ci yang med do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i mchog yongs su gnyer ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i
31b3(rgyud): dge ba mngon par bsgrubs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de'i slob ma'i 'khor mthong nas nye bar bsnyen te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni
31b4(rgyud): gang lags mi dge ba ni gang lags/ yang dag dpa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pas/ rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba ni gang lags zhes gsol pa dang / 
31b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / slo ba ma'i 'khor rnams de skad du zhu ba gsol ba gzigs par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di
31b6(rgyud): ni rnam par dag pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ yang dag po'i chos yongasu nyan par 'dod pa yin no// snyam du dgongs nas/ de la rnam par phye ste bstan pa nyid kyis go bar mdzad
31b7(rgyud): par 'gyur bas/ des thos nas kyang yang dag pa'i dran pas mi brjed par bzung ste/ rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs thob nas/ le
31b8(rgyud): lo'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal te/ sgrib pa thams cad yongasu sbyong bar byed pas/ bslab pa'i gnas rnams la ma gus pa spangs nas/ rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar bya ste/ 
32a1(rgyud): sa dang po la 'jug par 'gyur bas/ sa dang po'i sems la brten nas/ sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa gnyis par 'jug pa/ 
32a2(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// sa der yang rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa gsum par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang sems mnyen zhing rnam par byang ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal
32a3(rgyud): nas/ sa bzhi par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa lnga par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang don dam pa dang / kun rdzob tu
32a4(rgyud): mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas sa drug par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mtshan ma la spyod pa de'i mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas/ sa bdun par
32a5(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mtshan ma nye bar zhi bar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas so brgya/ nga bar 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang skye ba'i mtshan
32a6(rgyud): mar mi mthong ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa dgu par 'jug par 'gyur ro// sa der yang mngon par shes pa drug gi sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ sa bcu par 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
32a7(rgyud): sa der yang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang rtsa ba'i sems yongasu bsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa
32a8(rgyud): gsum yong su dag par gyur pa'i phyir/ shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par
32b1(rgyud): dag pa gang yin pa'o// 'dis ste/ gser yang dag par gzhus sbyangs brdungs te/ drim med par bya ba yang gser gyi rang bzhin bshong ma nyid nas/ rnam par dag pa gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ 
32b2(rgyud): gser cing ba nyid grongasu dag pa'i dbang gis gser med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar ma rung ngo // 'di sa ste dper na/ chu rnyog ma can mong su dngas te/ dri med par bya ba sang chu bang bzhin gdong po
32b3(rgyud): nyid das yong su dag legasal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir/ chu med par 'gyur roshes byar mi rung bde bzhin du/ chos kyi skus na mongs pa dang dres par gyur bas/ sdug bsngal bdang / 
32b4(rgyud): kun 'byung ba yongasu bsal nas bag chags lhag ma med par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gzod ma nyid nas rnam par dag par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i
32b5(rgyud): phyirango bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // / 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la du ba dang sprin dang / rdul dang / khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs pa dag
32b6(rgyud): las gal te yongs su dang bar gyur na/ na mkha'i khams yong su dag par 'gyur bas/ nam mkha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi sku yang sdug bsngal mang po
32b7(rgyud): thams cad yongasu zad pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang ngo bo nyid med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na
32b8(rgyud): chu chen pos khyer ba las rkang lag bskyod de/ lus dang sems le lo ma byas pa'i phyir/ chu bo thad kar bcad de pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mthong ba las/ rmi lam sad nas chu bo dang chu
33a1(rgyud): rol dang / pha rol gyi 'gram tha dad par 'gyur ba mi mthong yang / sems med do zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin
33a2(rgyud): pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongasasu zad nas/ blo rnam par dag par gyur kyang / blo med do zhes bya bar mi rung ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i
33a3(rgyud): phyir rnam par dag pa zhes brjod kyang / sangs rgyas rnams kyang yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med zhes bya bar mi rung ngo // gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam
33a4(rgyud): par dag par gyur pas ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston brar mdzad do// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur pas nri/ sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// shes bya'i sgrib pa
33a5(rgyud): rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha' la brten nas ni glog 'byung / glog la brten nas ni 'od 'byung ba de bzhin
33a6(rgyud): du/ chos kyi sku la rten pa'i phyir ni/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten na sa ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// rang bzhin
33a7(rgyud): yongasu dag par gyur pa'i phyir ni/ chos kyi sku ston par mdzad do// shes rab rnam par dag par gyur pas na/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag
33a8(rgyud): par gyur pas ni sprul pa'i sku ston par mdzad do// de gsum rnam par dag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang tha mi dad de// de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
33b1(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthar thug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pas/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku la tha dad par gyur pa med do// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
33b2(rgyud): bu mo gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po yin no// zhes de ltar nges par mngon par yid ches pa'i gang zag des ni/ shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas de bzhin
33b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa mi mnga' bar khong du chud par gyur pas/ rigs kyi bu de na de'i phyir spyod yul rnams la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams yongasu bsal bar gyur na/ chos
33b4(rgyud): de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis med par khong du chud cing / rnam dpar rtog pa yang med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa la/ de bzhin nyid de mtshan nyid gnyis
33b5(rgyud): su gyur pa med cing yang dag par rnal 'byor sgom pa'iphyir/ 'di ltar de bzhin du/ sgrib pa thams cad yongasu bsal bas nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
33b6(rgyud): nyid sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pasa'adi ltar de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang / chos
33b7(rgyud): kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par gyur pas 'di ltar de bzhin du rang dbang du phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yong su sdud par 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar
33b8(rgyud): yang yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// 
34a1(rgyud): de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lta ba zhes bya bas/ de ni yang dag par nyid du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ji lta/ 
34a2(rgyud): ba bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid mthong ba'i phyir/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
34a3(rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas khams gsum las nges par byung nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod yul yongasu tshol bas kyang / khong du mi chud cing mthong bar mi nus pas so// de lta bu'i 'phags/ 
34a4(rgyud): pa'i gang zag gang gis kyang mi rig cing mi mthong bas/ so so'i skye bo thams cad the tsom dang / som nyi bskyed nas phyin ci log tu rnam par rtog par byed pas yongasu 'da' bar mi 'gyuraro// 
34a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste dper na/ ri bong rgya mtsho la rgyal bar byed kyang / gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyam stobs shin tu chung ba'i phyir ro// 
34a6(rgyud): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang / de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyod mngon par ma rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar chos thams cad la mnga' chen
34a7(rgyud): brnyes shing shes rab shin tu zab cing rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa'i phyir dang rang gi spyod yul du gyur cig/ gzhan dang yang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir/ 
34a8(rgyud): lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa nas/ nyid kyi sku srog la phangs po mi mnga' bar dka' ba spyad pas/ dpe zla med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
34b1(rgyud): tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rab tu dben pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba'i sku mchog dam pa 'di brnyes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid rig cing mthong ba
34b2(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba med pa/ tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med/ gnyid kyang med/ bkres pa dang skom pa yang med de/ rtag par ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ sems rnam
34b3(rgyud): par g.yeng zhing g.yo ba med do// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa des ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang
34b4(rgyud): gsung yang rung ste/ thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyuradabs/ gang gis mnyan cing thos pa de dag rnam par mi dgrol ba yang med do// gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / 
34b5(rgyud): ma rungs pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa dag dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'bras bu na ma par smin pa yang zad par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
34b6(rgyud): pa rnams la lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po mi mnga' yang spyod yul thams cad la mkhyen par bya'o// snyam pa'i dgongs pa yang mi mnga'/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha dad pa'i 'du shes
34b7(rgyud): kyang mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang ci gsung yang rung ste/ ma nges pa mi mnga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du/ ye shes kyis yongasu ma
34b8(rgyud): bzung ba mi mnga' 'o// chos thams cad la byams pa dang / thugs rjes yongasu ma zin pa mi mnga' bas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bas phan mi 'dogs pa gang
35a1(rgyud): yang med do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos nas/ mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de dag ni
35a2(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / mi ma yin gyi 'gro ba dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par lha dang mi'i nang du skye bar 'gyur bas/ ma rab
35a3(rgyud): dag tu skye bar yang mi 'gyur la/ rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas nas yang dag pa'i chos nyan cing len par 'gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyi
35a4(rgyud): zhing yongasu dag pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe/ na/ chos zab mo 'di thos par gyur pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin
35a5(rgyud): gshegs pas mkhyen cing lung bstan par 'gyur bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
35a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shin tu zab pa'i chos gya nom pa 'di/ lan cig rna bas thos par gyur na/ gang zag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang
35a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i chos la mi spong ba dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs la mi brnyes pa dang / sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni 'phel
35a8(rgyud): zhing yangs pa dang / yong su smin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ sems can ji snyed pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams mngon par sgrub par bskul bar 'gyur bar
35b1(rgyud): rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i 'khor mang po rnams 'dug pa'i bstan las langs te/ 
35b2(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
35b3(rgyud): 'das gang yang rung bdag tu/ 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/ yul der phan yon rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur lag so// 
35b4(rgyud): bzhi gang zhe na/ dang po ni rgyal po'i dmag tshogs rnams btsun zhing dang bas/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams ma mchi das pa dang / blo nang dang bral zhing tshe ring ba dang / bkra sh+ma
35b5(rgyud): dang ldan zhing bde skyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos dar zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni pho brang nang gi bcu/ na mo dang / sras dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams
35b6(rgyud): 'dum zhing rtsod pa ma mchis g.yo sgyu dang phra ma spangs pas/ rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / yul gyi mi rnams yang dag pa'i chos
35b7(rgyud): spyod pas/ bro nad ma mchis shing bde skyid pa dang / glo bur du 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / bsod nams mang po mngon par sgrub pa'o// bzhi pa ni dus gsum po dag tu 'byung ba chen po dag
35b8(rgyud): 'phrod cing rtag par lha rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ yongasu srung bar 'gyur ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje mnyam par gyur pas/ gnod pa mi bgyid cing / rnam par 'chi ba'i bsam
36a1(rgyud): pa ma mchis pa dang / skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi zhing / thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba te/ 'di dag ni phan yon/ 
36a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'dra rgya cher spel ba'i slad du/ 'di ltar mdo sde yong su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rje su 'brang zhing gang na gnas
36a3(rgyud): pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis mdo
36a4(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa nga'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i
36a5(rgyud): rgyal po las sku gsum rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog/ bcom ldan 'das
36a6(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar ma ngon sum du gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas/ rang gi gnasu phyin pa dang / mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ 
36a7(rgyud): gsor gyi rnga bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/ 'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i shing drung na bai DUR+Ya'i gdan
36a8(rgyud): la bzhugs nas/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor ba las chos 'chad pa yang mthong ngo // bram ze zhig gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshegs pa'i
36b1(rgyud): chos kyi tshig su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa yang / mdzes pa'i tog gis thos pas thams cad ma lus par yid la bzung ste/ dran pa rtse gcig tu yid la gnas par gyur to// nam
36b2(rgyud): langs pa dang / 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongasu bskor te/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ bya rgod phung po'i rig la bder
36b3(rgyud): dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ me tog dang spos dag bkram ste/ g.yas phyogasu lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
36b4(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar te/ gus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom lnga na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
36b5(rgyud): bdag gi g.yar lam na/ bram ze zhig gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/ sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshig su bcad pa shin tu gya nom
36b6(rgyud): pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongasu bzung ste/ dran lags na bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
36b7(rgyud): sngar tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag gis mdangs gsum g.yar lam na// gser gyi rnga bo chen po dag/ dbyibs ni shin tu khyad par 'phags// kun nas gser 'od khyad par ldan// nyi ma'i
36b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtshungs pas na// snang bas kun tu khyab par bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong // sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun// rin chen ljon shing drung dag tu// bai DUR+Ya'i gdan bzhug/ 
37a1(rgyud): te// 'khor na brgya stong tshad med snyed// gus pas yongasu bskor bar mthong // de nas bram ze zhig gis ni// gser gyi rnga chen brdungs pas ni// rnga chen de yi sgra las ni// tshigs
37a2(rgyud): bcad gya nom 'di skad smras// gser 'od rnga las gya nom sgra byung bas// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas// ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzang dang // mi yi sdug bsngal mang po gang yin
37a3(rgyud): pa// gser gyi rnga sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni// nyon mongs sgrib pa thams cad gtan zhi nas// dper na thub dbang bcom ldan ji bzhin du// 'jigs pa bsal nas bde ba nyid du shog/ bcom ldan
37a4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni// spyod bsags thams cadad mkhyen ni bsgrubs pas na// sems can byang chub yan la ngag ldan mdzad nas// mthar ni yon tan rgya mtsho phyogs par
37a5(rgyud): mdzad// gser 'od dam pa'i rnga sgra 'di yis ni// thosapa kun ni tshangs dbyangs 'thob par shog/ bla med byachub 'bras bu thob gyur nas// chos kyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag
37a6(rgyud): bskor shog/ tshe ni bskal pa bsam mi khyab gnas na// ji bzhin thos bshad skye dgu phan byed shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcad nas// 'dod chags gti mug la sogs zhi
37a7(rgyud): bar shog/ sems can gang zhig ngan 'gro gnas gyur nas// mi chen rab 'bar lus kun khyab pa dag/ rnga sgra dam pa 'od ni thos gyur nas// sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro shog/ 
37a8(rgyud): thams cad sngon gnas shes pa grub gyur nas// 'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong dran par shog/ thub pa'i gtso bo yang dag dran gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thos par shog
37b1(rgyud): gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos pa'i dbang // rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas// thams cad sdig pa'i las ni yongs spangs te// rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' shig spyod par shog
37b2(rgyud): lha dang mi yi srog chags thams cad kun// gus pas smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag/ gser gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur nas// bsam pa rnams ni yongasu rdzogs par gyur// sems can
37b3(rgyud): gang zhig mnar med lhung gyur nas// dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te// mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar gang gnas pa// thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur// lha mi yi
37b4(rgyud): dgas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su// sdug bsngal bgegs ma dang mngon du myong gyur pa// gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam patho/ sa gyur na// sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par gyur// 
37b5(rgyud): da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nas// rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang gnyis gtso// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni / brtse bas bdag la dgongs su gsol// sems can
37b6(rgyud): gang zhig skyabs ma mchis// mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa// de lta bu yi rnam pa la// skyabs chen dag ni bgyid par shog/ bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig/ las ngan shin tu lji ba
37b7(rgyud): rnams// deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni// thams cad rtse gcig rab tu bshags// bdag gis sangs rgyas yid ma che// bla ma nye bshes ma gus dang // dge ba mang po ma spyad pas// 
37b8(rgyud): rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am// bdag gis mtho btsun rus rigs dang // longs spyod dag gi snyems pa dang // dar la bab pas dregs gyur nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am/ 
38a1(rgyud): rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed nas// ngag gis tshig ngan smras pa dang // kha na ma tho ma mthong nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am// rtag tu byis pa'i blo spyad pas// ma
38a2(rgyud): rig mun pa'i sems g.yogs dang // mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas// rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am// rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus// mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags
38a3(rgyud): zhe sdang dkris pas na// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// mi dge grogs po brten pa dang // phrag dog ser sna bsams pa dang // dbul phongs gya gyu spyad pas na// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa
38a4(rgyud): 'am// sdig mang dag la mi mos kyang // 'jigs skrag dag dang bcas pa 'am// rang dbang dag ni ma mchis pas// de sla du sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// rnam par g.yeng ba'i bsam pa
38a5(rgyud): dang // khong khro khon du 'dzin pa dang // bkres skom dag gis ga/ dungs pa'i rgyus// de slang sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// / gza' dang btung dang gos dag dang // bud med dag la chags
38a6(rgyud): sred pa'i// nyon mongs mes ni bsregs pas na// de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// gus pa'i sems ni ma skyes pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/ 
38a7(rgyud): deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la// gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags/ 
38a8(rgyud): mi shes dam chos skur pa dang // pa ma sri zhu ma bgyis pa'i// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags// gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang
38b1(rgyud): mthu yis ni// de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas grangs med gang dag mchod// sems can
38b2(rgyud): rnams ni rab drangs nas// sdug bsngal bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog/ sems can dag ni thams cad kun// sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs nas// 
38b3(rgyud): mngon sangs skye dgu 'dren par shog/ bdag gis sems can kun gyi slad// bskal pa brgya stong dka' spyad nas// shes rab chen po'i stobs kyis ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid shog
38b4(rgyud): bdag gis srog chags kun gyi slad// gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal// zab mo'i mdo sde bshad nas ni// las ngan rnams ni bsal bar shog/ gang zhig bskal pa
38b5(rgyud): brgya stong du// sdig lci dag ni bgyis pa rnams// skad cig gcig tsam mthol bshags na// sdig pa mang po ma lus 'byang // gser 'od dam pa 'di bzhin du// de ltar
38b6(rgyud): bshags pa bgyis 'gyur na// sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun// 'di yis dbang gis myur du 'byang // ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya stong dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs rnams dang // 
38b7(rgyud): dbang mchog byang chub lam yan lag/ rtag tu sgom yang skyo mi 'gyur// bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs gnas// sa bcu la ni phyin gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te// 
38b8(rgyud): 'khor bar 'bab pa sgrol bar shog/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni// shin tu zab mo yon tan brjod// gya nom ye shes bsam dka' ba// phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog/ phyogs
39a1(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas// thugs rje chen po'i thugs kyis ni// bdag gi bshags pa bzhes su gsol/ 
39a2(rgyud): bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni// las ngan mang po bgyis pas na// de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong // thugs rjes byang bar mdzad par smon// bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// 
39a3(rgyud): rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes// spyod lam bzhi po kun tu yang // dga' ba'i 'du shes yong ma mchis// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan// sems can 'jigs pa sel
39a4(rgyud): mdzad na// bdag gi bshags pa bzhes nas ni// mya nga dan sdug bsngal 'bral bar smon// bdag la nyon mong / des sgrib pa dang // rnam smin las ni ci mchis pa// thugs rje
39a5(rgyud): chen po'i chab kyis ni// rab dkrus byang bar mdzad par smon/ bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang // da ltar las ngan pa gyis pa rnams// rtse gcig sems kyis mthol bshags na/ 
39a6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu byang bar shog/ ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams// bsdams te slong bar yong mi bgyid// gal te 'gal ba mchis na yang // nams kyang 'chab par yongs mi bgyid// lus
39a7(rgyud): gsum ngag gi rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// sems can rnams ni 'ching bgyid pas// thog ma med nas rgyun mi 'chad// spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na// mi dge las bcu
39a8(rgyud): bgyir gyur pas// de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams// de dag thams cad so sor bshags// bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas// sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan
39b1(rgyud): sngar ni// bsam pa zag pas so sor bshags// 'jam+bu gling ni 'di dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag na// dge ba'i las mang ci bgyis pa// deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo // mi dge las bcu
39b2(rgyud): rab spangs nas// dge bcu lam ni sngon bsgrubs te// sa bcu dag la rab tu gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon// bdag gi lus dang ngag yid kyis// bsod nams ye shes las
39b3(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus// bla med ye shes myur grub shog/ deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du// sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthol shing bshags// byis/ 
39b4(rgyud): pa srid gsum rmongs pa'i bgegs dag dang // rtag par la sa ngan lcib bgyis pa'i bgegs// bdag gis log pa'o de 'dod pa bsags pa'i bgegs// rtag tu sred skyed 'khor bar
39b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i bgegs// 'jig rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs// byis pa thams ca kyi ni nyon mongs bge/ gas// sems myos rnams g.yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs
39b6(rgyud): mi dge grogs po dag la rten pa'i bgegs// 'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs// zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs// mi khom brgyad skye mi dge'i grogs po'i bgegs/ 
39b7(rgyud): bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs// deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni// sdig pa'i las ni mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags// deng bdag bde gshegs kun la skyabasu mchi// 
39b8(rgyud): bla med yon tan mtsho la bdag phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcur gsal mdzad pa// byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol// sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'// 
40a1(rgyud): spyan na rnam dag be nan dpa dra// dang la dang gci rjid grags dang ldan pa'ags// thugs rje shes rab nyi mas rkun selab// sangs rgyas nyims 'ad kyis kun gas
40a2(rgyud): mdzad / shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral// thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba// sems can nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar mdzad// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan cing / 
40a3(rgyud): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongasu rdzogs// yon tan bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas// nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad// kha dog bai DUR+Ya 'dra dri mi mnga'// zla ba nya ltar na mkha'
40a4(rgyud): ngag la bzhugs// shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser skub sgribs// 'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu rgyan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang dag tu// rga dang mya ngan
40a5(rgyud): chu yis ded pas na// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka kha// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bskams// deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmang byung gtso// thams
40a6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i spyi btung phyag 'tshal lo// 'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku// dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis rgyan// ji ltar rgya mtsho chu tshad shes dka' zhing // sa chen rdul ni
40a7(rgyud): bgrang du ma mchis dang // ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing // nam mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te// sems can thams cad kun
40a8(rgyud): gyis rig mi 'gyur// bskal pa tshad med snyed du rab bsams kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho ba mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur// sa chen 'di 'dra'i ri brag ji snyed pa// rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang btsir rung
40b1(rgyud): gi/ rgya mtsho'i cha ba ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs// sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni// bcom ldan grags pa'i yon tan thams cad dang / 
40b2(rgyud): mtshan bzang rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang // de yi pha mtha' dpag par yong mi 'gyur// bdag gis dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas// myur du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas// yang / 
40b3(rgyud): ngag chos bshang skye dgu phan btags te// thams cad sdug bsngal mang las thar bgyid shog/ bdud kyi dmag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas// bla med dam chos 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ 
40b4(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med bsam mi khyab gnas nas// bdud rtsi ro da yis sems can tshim bgyid shog/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji ltar zhin// pha rol phyin drug yongasu rdzogs
40b5(rgyud): bgyid shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas/ nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal bsal bar shog/ bdag gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas// 'das pa'i skye ba brgya
40b6(rgyud): stong dran pa dang // rtag par thub pa'i gtso ni dran gyur te// sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis// rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur
40b7(rgyud): nas// mi dge ba yi rgyu kun yongs spangs te// yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog/ 'jig rten thams cad sems can ji snyed pa// sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog/ 
40b8(rgyud): dbang po ma tshang ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog/ sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis// lus ni nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa// thams
41a1(rgyud): cad nad kyi sdug bsngal rab zhi nas// dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog/ gang gis rgyal chos 'gal bgyis bsad la thug/ sdug bsngal mang gces mya ngan rab skyes/ 
41a2(rgyud): nas// de yi sdug bsngal mi bzang myong ba'i tshe// mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang // gang dag gzhu rdeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang // gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs// 
41a3(rgyud): mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na// lus sems rab gzer bde ba cung zad med// de dag thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang // sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog/ bsad/ 
41a4(rgyud): la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas// sdug bsngal mang po tham ngas cad gtan zad shog/ sems can gang gis bkres skom gdungs gyur pa// ro mchog dam pa sna tshogs thob par
41a5(rgyud): shog/ long bas gzugs mthong 'on pas thos pa dang / theng pos 'gro nus skugs pas smra nus shog/ dbu la 'phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas// bang
41a6(rgyud): mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te// thams cad bde mchog dam pa rab rnyed nas// sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog/ lha mi thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi// byad
41a7(rgyud): bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas// bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur te// longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog/ sems can de dag rol mo bsams pa bzhin// 
41a8(rgyud): sgra mchog mang ba mngon du 'byung bar shog/ chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba// rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog/ sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// bza'
41b1(rgyud): btung gos dang khri dang stan rnams dang // gser dngul dang ni rin chen bai DUR+Ya// rgyan phreng thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog/ sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing // mi sdug phan/ 
41b2(rgyud): tshun mthong bar ma gyur cig/ lus kyi byad bzhin thams cad rab mdzes shing // so sor byams pa'i yid kyis rtse bgyid shog/ 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams// yid la
41b3(rgyud): bsams te thams cad 'byor par shog/ nor rnams rnyed pa phongs pa ma mchis pa// bgo ba shar bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog/ bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang // me tog/ 
41b4(rgyud): sna tshogs kha dog gcig min la// nyin re dus gsum shing las lhung gyur nas// yid bzhin longs spyod nga dga' ba skye bar shog/ sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i
41b5(rgyud): rgyal gtso dang // theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sgo / byang chub sems dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog/ rtag tu ma
41b6(rgyud): rabs dag tu mi skye zhing // mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang // dal 'byor mi yi gtso bor skyes gyur te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog/ rtag par phyug po
41b7(rgyud): dag gi khyim skyes te// nor dang rin chen bang mdzod rgyas pa dang // byang bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te// tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad kun ni phor/ 
41b8(rgyud): gyur nas// dpa' zhing sems rno blo gros shin tu che// thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas// pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog/ rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs
42a1(rgyud): rgyas tshad med snyed// rin chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas ni// bai DUR+Ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar shog/ gal
42a2(rgyud): te 'das pa dang ni da ltar tshe// srid gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis pas na// yid du mi mching na 'gro thob gyur pa// thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog/ sems can thams cad
42a3(rgyud): srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni// 'khor ba'i zhugs pas dam du bcings pas na// shes rab ral gri dag gis bcang stsal to// sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog/ sems can gang gis
42a4(rgyud): 'jam gling 'di dag dang // yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung // bsod nams rgyun mchog sna tshogs ci ba/ sgrubs pa// de dag thams cad kun la yi rang ngo // bsod
42a5(rgyud): nams dngos po dag la yi rang nas// lus dang ngag yid da ge ba mang bgyis des// las mchog dam pa 'di dag rta ga 'phel nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon// 
42a6(rgyud): phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa dang // bsam pa dang zhing rnyog ma ma mchis pas// bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams des// bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon// 
42a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang // bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams// thal sbyar rtse gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod dang // skye ba rtag par kun tu tshe rabs dran// dbang po
42a8(rgyud): tshang zhing lus ni yongs rdzogs te// yon tan dam pa thams cad pun tshogs gyur// ma 'ongs pa yi skye ba thams cad du// rtag par lha mo rnams kyis lta bar shog/ sangs rgyas gcig dang
42b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcu dag las// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thos pa min// sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na// 'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos par gyur pa yin// de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis de
42b2(rgyud): skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du/ gser gyi rnga bo che las byung
42b3(rgyud): ba'i sgras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa// gang la la zhig gis thos par gyur na/ bsod nams shin tu mang po thob par
42b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// khyod dkyi las mchog 'di dag thams cad ni/ 'das pa'i dus su
42b5(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod cing / smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag ma gas kyi rgyu rkyen dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bya na gyis brlabs pa'i mthus/ rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan
42b6(rgyud): pa yin par rig par bya'o// de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal po thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mngon par yid ches nas/ dga' bzhin du sbyong par gyur to// 
42b7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mchog gi rgyal po las/ rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par
42b8(rgyud): rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhugs te/ shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
43a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa dang / sku'i spu'i bu gnas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur bkye bas/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
43a2(rgyud): ngag gi tshad dang / dpe byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi nang du snang bar gyur to// snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten dag tu/ 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas/ sems can gang dag mi dge/ 
43a3(rgyud): ba bcu'i las dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / bla ma dang nye ba dag la sri zhu ma byas pa dang / mkhan po dang bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga
43a4(rgyud): rgyal byas pas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye dgan su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag so so nas/ 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag mi'i gnas su phyin par gyur pas/ sems
43a5(rgyud): can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od zer gyi mthus tham sa cad kyis bde ba dang / shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i ma tshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyis
43a6(rgyud): rgyan nas/ sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to// de'i tshe brgya byin dang lha'i 'khor thams cad dang / gang ga'i lha mo dang / 'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang / thams cad bcom
43a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ g.yas phyogasu lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus
43a8(rgyud): sta las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
43b1(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhig theg pa chen po mngon par sgrub pas/ ji ltar phyin ci/ 
43b2(rgyud): log tu sems can thams cad yongasu gzung bar bgyi ba lags/ mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na/ yongasu 'byang bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan
43b3(rgyud): 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu deng khyod kyis tshad dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgoms nas/ rnam par dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde
43b4(rgyud): ba thob par bya ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod pa legs so// sems can gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis/ sdig pa rnams
43b5(rgyud): mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'gru/ sa bskyed de/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu/ bla gos phragapa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
43b6(rgyud): btsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas/ ngag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis 'di skad du/ phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
43b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/ chos
43b8(rgyud): kyi char chen po phab pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po brdungs pa/ chos kyi dung chen po bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po gtsugs pa/ chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/ thams cad sems can rnams
44a1(rgyud): la smin cing bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba/ skye dgu rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de/ rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du
44a2(rgyud): mdzad par bzhed pa/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyabasu mchis te mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang
44a3(rgyud): dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa thams cad la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi
44a4(rgyud): bos btud de/ gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis tho/ dag ma mchis pa'i dus na/ sdig pa'i rje su 'brang te/ sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma
44a5(rgyud): tho ba bgyis pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris shing bcings pas/ sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / 
44a6(rgyud): dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang / dge sdig ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas/ mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshal phyung
44a7(rgyud): ba dang / yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / dge 'dun 'thun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang / dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang / pha ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang / ngag
44a8(rgyud): gi rnam pa bzhi dang / yid kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis/ mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba dang / dge
44b1(rgyud): ba'i gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa btab pa dang / bre srang gis bslus pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par gzung ba dang / mi btsang ba'i bza' ba dang / btung ba gzhan dag la
44b2(rgyud): stsal pa dang / 'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang / mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang / mngon sum
44b3(rgyud): gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te/ yongasu spyad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang / 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang / mkhan po dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gi
44b4(rgyud): rje su mi 'brang ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smra/ dad par dga' bas rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams 'gyod
44b5(rgyud): bskyed pa dang / bdag pas khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mthong na/ phrag dog skyed pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa dang / nga zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang / phangs pa'i
44b6(rgyud): sems bskyed pa dang / ma rig pas bsgribs shing / log par lta bas sems rmongs par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i sgyu ma skyed pas sdig pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
44b7(rgyud): smod pa'i bsam pa skyed pa dang / chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang / chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das yang
44b8(rgyud): dag pa'i shes rab dang / yang dag pa'i spyan dang / yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang / yang dag pa'i mnyam pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing / thams cad gzigs pa dag la deng bdag srog
45a1(rgyud): phyogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol shing bshags so// thams cad mngon du phyung nas/ 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sngar ma bgyis
45a2(rgyud): pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i kha na mo tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshagaso// ngan 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas
45a3(rgyud): kyi 'gro ba dang / lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang mi khom pa brgyad po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa dang / bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad nu byung nas/ sdig pa'i
45a4(rgyud): rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong ba smon to// de ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa
45a5(rgyud): thams cad mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa yang mthol zhing bshag so// thams cad mngon du phyung ste// 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// 
45a6(rgyud): sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo// ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
45a7(rgyud): pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang deng mthol zhing bshag so// thams cad mngon du byung nas/ 'chab cing sbed par mi
45a8(rgyud): bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyi ba'i thugs mi thub bo// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
45b1(rgyud): chen po rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa yang de dag las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang mthol zhing bshag so// thams cad mngon du phyung
45b2(rgyud): nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do// sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to// ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen
45b3(rgyud): de'i phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yod na/ skad cig tsam du yang 'chab cing sbar mi rung na/ nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig nas/ dus ring po'i bar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang la la zhig gis/ 
45b4(rgyud): sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongasu tshogs par 'dod cing sem sa la ngo tsha dang bcas pas/ ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi zab ngar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid ches
45b5(rgyud): nas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig me sa mgo thod bsregs sam/ gos bsregs par gyur na
45b6(rgyud): myur ba kho nar mes gsod par byed do// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/ sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro// gang gis sdig pa byas na yang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas/ myur ba kho nar
45b7(rgyud): yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas/ nor dang rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang / gzhan yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po skom par 'dod na yang 'gyod
45b8(rgyud): tshangs byas nas/ las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// cho rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'dod na yang
46a1(rgyud): 'gyod na tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / 'thab bral gyi lha
46a2(rgyud): dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gal te tshangs ris dang tshangs
46a3(rgyud): pa mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal gyi lha dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 
46a4(rgyud): 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom sna dang ba dang / shin tu mthong dang 'og min gyi lhar skye bar 'ad dad na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang
46a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// gal te rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yongasu gnyer bar 'dod na
46a6(rgyud): yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// gal te rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub yongs
46a7(rgyud): su gnyer ba dang / mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / yongasu dag pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / mi g.yo ba'i ye shes dang / 
46a8(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yongasu gnyer bar 'dod na yang / 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad
46b1(rgyud): na rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ rgyu dang rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas// 
46b2(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed ma lus par 'gyur ba yang 'du byed kyi chos rnams mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dag deng gdong skye bar 'gyur bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci
46b3(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad stong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'du
46b4(rgyud): byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so// rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma thams cad las
46b5(rgyud): yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas/ mngon par yid ches pas gus
46b6(rgyud): pa'i sems skyes par gyur par gang yin pa de ni/ sems can med cing ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste/ don de'i phyir 'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no// / 
46b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi par gyur na/ las kyi sgrib pa yongasu bsal nas/ gtan du yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang dag pa'i dran pa phun
46b8(rgyud): sum tshogs par gyur pa dang / shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang / spyod pa dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang / 
47a1(rgyud): sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa bskyed pa ste/ 'di dag ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtse gcig
47a2(rgyud): sems kyis theg gsum srung / zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes bskyed// byams sems las kyi sgrib pa sbyong // rigs kyi bu shin tu bsal bar dka' ba'i
47a3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa las shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyi skur pa btab pa dang // 
47a4(rgyud): rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar mi byed pa dang / srid pa ga sum la mngon par zhen nas/ nges par 'byung ba'i sem ngas med pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa'i
47a5(rgyud): gnyen por 'gyur ba rnam pa bzhi yod de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad la bsam pa thag pa nas/ nye bar bsnyen
47a6(rgyud): nas kha na ma tho ba thams cad bshags par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang / 
47a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rje su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba
47a8(rgyud): gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na skyes pa dang / bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las theg pa
47b1(rgyud): chen po spyod pa spyod rdo thog pa yang mchis/ spyod rngo mi thogs pa yang mchis na/ ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rje su yi rang bar bgyi lags/ bcom
47b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyin mtshan dus drug tu/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ 
47b3(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ rje su yi rang bar byed na/ bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob
47b4(rgyud): par 'gyur bas/ 'di skad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sems kyi shes rab mngon par sgrub pa
47b5(rgyud): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rje/ su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par gyur na/ de ltar rjesu yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu
47b6(rgyud): btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa/ bla na med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mchog tu gya nom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can
47b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la yang rje su yi rang bar bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod
47b8(rgyud): nams ji snyed pa dag dang / bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas/ 
48a1(rgyud): phyir mi ldog pa dang / tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i ngag las byung ba'i/ bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang 'di ltar
48a2(rgyud): bsam pa thag pa nas rje su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la yang rje su yi
48a3(rgyud): rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// gzhan yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
48a4(rgyud): cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongasu bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/ chos kyi rnga brdungs
48a5(rgyud): pa chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa chos kyi char phab pa dag gis thugs brtse bas/ sems can thams cad bskul zhing yongasu btul bas
48a6(rgyud): thams cad mngon par yid ches par gyur nas/ chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis/ zad mi shes pa'i bde ba 'thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub
48a7(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / sems can gang gis de 'dra ba'i bsod nams nga dung phun sum tshogs/ 
48a8(rgyud): par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rje su yi rang ngo // de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang
48b1(rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la yang bsam pa zag pa nas/ rjesu yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rje su yi rang ba gang yin pa des/ 
48b2(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyeng 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
48b3(rgyud): nyon mongs pa spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon par grub par gyur la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du/ rtag par gos dang / gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 
48b4(rgyud): mal cha dang / gsos sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rim gro byas pas/ 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des/ ji ltar snga ma lta bu rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams
48b5(rgyud): de dang skrun na/ stong gi cha gcig tsam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang / yin pa de ni grangs dang bcas shing tshad dang bcas pas
48b6(rgyud): bsod nams thams cad yongasu sdud par mi 'gyur la rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de la ni/ tshad med grangs med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongasu sdud par byed pas/ 
48b7(rgyud): de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongasu sgyur
48b8(rgyud): nas/ skyes pa'i lus yongasu 'grub par 'dod na yang / rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par byed na/ gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus
49a1(rgyud): mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rje su yi rang ba'i bsodanams
49a2(rgyud): gang lags pa ni 'tshal bar gyur na/ slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rnal 'byor
49a3(rgyud): sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rigs kyi
49a4(rgyud): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer ba gang yin pa de sra/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / theg pa chen
49a5(rgyud): bo'i lam sgom par 'dod na/ gang zag des nyin mtshan du/ sa drug tu/ snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/ sems/ rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/ 'di skad du deng
49a6(rgyud): bdag phyogs bcu na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang / blo na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma bskor ba dang / rnam
49a7(rgyud): par smin pa'i sku spangs nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la/ bdag bsam pa thag pa nas/ spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ sems
49a8(rgyud): can thams cad yongasu bsgral zhing / bde bar bgyi ba dang / sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongasu bskor ba dang / 
49b1(rgyud): chos kyi char chen po dbab pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma chen po sbar ba dang / don gyi tshul gsal bar mdzad pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'
49b2(rgyud): zhing / 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs par bskul zhing gsol ba 'tshal lo// deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
49b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bsod
49b4(rgyud): nams de dag la byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang / gsol ba btab pa'i bso/ dad nams gang lags pa de dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par
49b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna
49b6(rgyud): bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas/ gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas/ 
49b7(rgyud): 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de/ snga ma pas ches khyad par du 'phags te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin la/ 'di chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so// rigs kyi bu stong
49b8(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sbyin pa btang ba lta re shig zhog gi/ gal te gang la la zhig gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
50a1(rgyud): gyi khams rin po chen bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byas pa bas/ bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de de
50a2(rgyud): bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags so// chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dang po chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dog
50a3(rgyud): par byed la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin pas so// gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams
50a4(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las mi 'da' bsaso// gsum pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi sku yongasasu dag par byed pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin
50a5(rgyud): pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed pas so// bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni mthar thug pa me da pa yin la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bso so// 
50a6(rgyud): lnga pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la/ zang zing gi sbyin pa de ni 'dod pa'i sred pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu bskul ba dang / 
50a7(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no// nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo
50a8(rgyud): chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas ngal chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab pa
50b1(rgyud): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// nga sngon byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na/ de bzhin gshes
50b2(rgyud): pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing / yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brten nas/ ngas stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga'
50b3(rgyud): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos grangs med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ nga lhag ma med pa'i mya
50b4(rgyud): ngan las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur la dang / nga'i yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring ba dar gnas par 'gyur ba yin no// nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa
50b5(rgyud): de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas mtshan mchog/ dam pa sna tshogs dang / mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang / yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad
50b6(rgyud): med pa dang ldan zhing / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ skal pa bye ba brgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad
50b7(rgyud): yongasu sdug par mdzad la/ chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyi sku yongasu sdud par mi byed do// chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur
50b8(rgyud): yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas sems can gyi tha dad po'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas/ sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs skyed par mdzad// 
51a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'ching ba dgrol bar mdzad kyang / dgrol bar bya ba ci'ang mi mnga'o// sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas/ yongasu
51a2(rgyud): ma smin pa yin pa de ni/ yongasu smin par mdzad la/ yongasu smin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad kyang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga' g.yo ba yang mi mnga' bas// 
51a3(rgyud): 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pas/ rab tu dben zhing mdzad pa mi mdzad pa mi mnga' bas/ rang dbang du gyur cing bde bar gyur la/ dus gsum las yang dag par 'das kyang / 
51a4(rgyud): dus gsum ston par mdzad pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas da kyi spyod yul las nges par byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
51a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / sku tha dad par gyur pa med par yin te/ 'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i
51a6(rgyud): chos sku ngas deng brnyes pa yin te/ de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer bar 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig gam/ tshigs su
51a7(rgyud): bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de yang tshad med par gyur pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongasu bskor bar bskul
51a8(rgyud): zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs nas/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad
51b1(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi gang la la zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing / theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom 'tshal
51b2(rgyud): bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can
51b3(rgyud): gang dag byang chub yongasu gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam sgom pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa des nyin mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu
51b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas/ dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thang du rnal 'byor bsgoms de nas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci
51b5(rgyud): yod pa dang / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags da ga la kha zas tshangs gcig tsam byin pa dang / dge ba/ 'i tshig gis rtsod pa dag gi ldums byas pa dang / dkon mchog
51b6(rgyud): gsum la skyabasu song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang / 'gyod tshangs byas pa dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / rje su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag
51b7(rgyud): dang bdag gis thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ 'gyod cing phangs pa med par sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ngo // rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
51b8(rgyud): gang yin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang / thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par dag pas/ 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
52a1(rgyud): ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing / mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la yongasu btang ba de bzhin du/ bdag
52a2(rgyud): gis bsod nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongasu gtong ste/ thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas/ nam mkha' las rin po che
52a3(rgyud): byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskang bar gyur cig/ longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / shes rab mthar thug pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas/ 
52a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo'agus pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i
52a5(rgyud): rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de/ dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs/ su bsngo'o// gzhan yang 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
52a6(rgyud): chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu bsngos pa dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa dag gis ji ltar yongasu bsngo ba de bzhin du/ 
52a7(rgyud): bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gi dbang gis/ sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu
52a8(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te/ bsam gyis mi khyab
52b1(rgyud): pa'i thogs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ bdud sdig can gyi dmag tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par
52b2(rgyud): byas te/ mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa mngon par rtogs nas/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad skad cig ma gcig la gsal bar rtogs te/ nam gyi smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas/ zil mngan
52b3(rgyud): gyi don mngon sum du gyur te/ bdag dang sems can thams cad tshe dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / 
52b4(rgyud): sangs yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas seng ge'i'o// dad dang / sangs rgyas 'od brgya pa dang / sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang / sangs
52b5(rgyud): rgyas rin chen 'bar dang / sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang / sangs rgyasas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas dam pa'i
52b6(rgyud): sgra dang / sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang / sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas bla ma 'phags pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang / sangs rgyas
52b7(rgyud): 'od zer kun tu snang mdzad dang / sangs rgyas tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang / sangs rgyas bla ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di
52b8(rgyud): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
53a1(rgyud): chub brnyes nas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor te/ sems can yongs su bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces rgya cher gong du
53a2(rgyud): bstan pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu shin tu dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las
53a3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton tu 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par
53a4(rgyud): byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems
53a5(rgyud): can ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig tu mi'i lus mngon pa/ grub par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon par 'grub par gyur te/ 
53a6(rgyud): skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti dang / bla mar byas te/ yo byas rnam pa sna tshogs bzhi po dag gi mchod pa byas te/ rang sangs rgyas re re la yang so so
53a7(rgyud): nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang rin po che las mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa
53a8(rgyud): byas te/ mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs mang po dag gis rtag par mchod
53b1(rgyud): pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba yin snyam mam/ lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
53b2(rgyud): shin tu yang mang lags so// rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa yongasu sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len
53b3(rgyud): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / dran pas mi brjed par byas/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pas/ 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga
53b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang skrun na/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ brgya stong dang / bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ tshad dang / 
53b5(rgyud): dpe dang / rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de da/ ga yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i
53b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas/ 
53b7(rgyud): bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur bas so// rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu gyur pa yin pas/ de'i phyir
53b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas pas kyang dper byar mi nus so// gsum la skyabasu 'gro zhing bslabs pa thams cad srung ba bskul zhing / nyams par ma byas pa
54a1(rgyud): dang / las gsum stongs par ma gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthu dang / nus pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa
54a2(rgyud): gsum po dag tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad thogs pa med pa thob
54a3(rgyud): nas/ bsod nams tshad med par myur du yongasu rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po dag
54a4(rgyud): thob par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum dgyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe
