54a5(rgyud): byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sem sa can thams cad mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa shin tu lci ba ngag yongasu sbyang bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// 
54a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing / nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas kyang / 
54a7(rgyud): dpe byar mi nus so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams nam ji snyed dag la rje su yi rang bar bskul nas/ byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas
54a8(rgyud): kyang dpe byar mi nus so// sdig pa'i spyod pa dang / gshe zhing spyod pa'i las yongasu bsal bar bskul ba dang / yon tan thams cad yongasu rdzogs par smon pa dang / skye ba thams cad du dkon
54b1(rgyud): mchog gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod par bskul ba dang / sems can rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yongasu dag pa mngon par sgrub par bskul nas/ 
54b2(rgyud): byang chub yongasasu rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so// de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / pha rol tu
54b3(rgyud): phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par bya bar bskul ba dang / bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongasu bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang / bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na bzhugs
54b4(rgyud): nas/ chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu zab pas gang gis dpe byar mi nus par rig par bya'o// 
54b5(rgyud): de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gang ga'i lha mo dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
54b6(rgyud): tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang
54b7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas/ thams cad yongasu bzung ste/ klog pa dang / g.yar ston du 'don pa dang / kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan
54b8(rgyud): dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas chos 'di la brten te rab tu gnas par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
55a1(rgyud): yong su gnyer bar 'tshal bas/ don 'di mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjesu 'brangs nas/ chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshangs pa dang brgya/ 
55a2(rgyud): byin la sogs pas/ chos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du/ me tog man da ra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor bas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
55a3(rgyud): khams kyis chen po thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha'i rnga bo che dang / rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar rang sgra byung ste/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od zer bkye nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
55a4(rgyud): kun tu khyab par bkang ste/ sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang po/ sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag
55a5(rgyud): thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu lags pas/ byams pa dang / thugs rjes rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongasu skyobs cing phan 'dogs pa
55a6(rgyud): dang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu sbyong bar mdzad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de
55a7(rgyud): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par dran te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe
55a8(rgyud): de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya brgyad cu'i/ 
55b1(rgyud): bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'ong chen snang mdzad kyis lha dang / mi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems/ 
55b2(rgyud): can thams cad yongasu bzlas nas/ bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na/ 'dus pa dang po la chos bstan pas/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongasu bzlas nas
55b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas/ zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to// 'dus
55b4(rgyud): pa gnyis pa'i tshe yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag pa rgya stong dgu bcu yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ tham sa cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ zag pa
55b5(rgyud): rnams zad nas/ rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan pa/ ra gyur to// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe na yang srog chags
55b6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongasu bzlas nas/ thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zhes bya ba yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga de'i tshe bud med kyi
55b7(rgyud): lus su gyur te/ ming ni bsod nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o// 'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la nye bar bsnyen nas/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongasu bzung ste/ 
55b8(rgyud): bklags/ kha ton du bton nas/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu gnyer ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des nga la bu mo
56a1(rgyud): / bsod nams rin pa che'i 'od 'dim 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar
56a2(rgyud): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te// 
56a3(rgyud): bud med kyi lus spangs nas/ de tshun chad ngan 'gro bzhi las yang dag par 'das te/ lha dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// tshe rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyad
56a4(rgyud): cu'i bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te/ deng ya dang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gang zhing / 
56a5(rgyud): rgyas par gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che/ 'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
56a6(rgyud): yongasu bskor nas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas/ shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed
56a7(rgyud): 'das nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar de na bzhugs te/ yongasu mya ngan
56a8(rgyud): las 'das pas/ chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas/ khyod kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
56b1(rgyud): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen
56b2(rgyud): po thob par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na/ 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thang du gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
56b3(rgyud): gshegs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis nams kyang bud med kyi lus len par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing / 
56b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phe dal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu sbyong bar byed/ do// rigs kyi bu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
56b5(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gang na gnasaba'i gnas der/ gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa 'i mdo sde 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na/ 
56b6(rgyud): yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i rgyal po nad med de bgeg rnaM dang bral ba dang / tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par gyur pa dang / 
56b7(rgyud): phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing / dmag tshogs dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang / bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
56b8(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor
57a1(rgyud): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag dngos po 'di dag bden nam/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams
57a2(rgyud): kyis skad 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton
57a3(rgyud): du 'don par bgyid na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rtag par mchis nas/ yongs su srung bar bgyid par mchi ba dang / gnas pa na yang lhan cig gnas
57a4(rgyud): par bgyid do// rgyal po de la gdon bgegs dang / rgolaba'i dgra zhig mchis na yang / de dag thams cad bdag ga rgyal po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// 
57a5(rgyud): ngan dang rims nad la sogs pa yang bsal zhing sos par bgyi/ sa nas/ tshe 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtags 'byung ba/ dang / smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin 'grub pa dang / 
57a6(rgyud): rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis yul de na dmag tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing brtsan par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
57a7(rgyud): kyi bu dag leg so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du khyed kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus na/ 'bangs thams
57a8(rgyud): cad kyang rgyal po'i rjesu mngon par sgrub cing chos bzhin du spyod par byed pas/ khyed la sogs pa yang gzugs dang / stobs dang / phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzhal med khang 'od dang / 
57b1(rgyud): ldan pa dang / 'khor rnams kyang brtsan zhing rgyas par gyur pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol to// bcom/ 
57b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' ba/ gnas gang du mdo sde dam pa yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang / spel ba'i yul de'i blon po chen po dang / nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi
57b3(rgyud): gang zhe na/ dang po ni phan tshun 'dus zhing nye bar sems dpa' dang / bla mar byed cing sdug par sems dpa' 'o// gnyis pa ni rtag par mi'i rgyal po'i snying du sdug cing bkur ba dang / dge sbyong dang / 
57b4(rgyud): bram ze dang / yul chen po dang / yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o// gsum pa ni nor la yang dam par 'dzin cing / chos la btsun par byed pa dang / 'jig rten
57b5(rgyud): pa'i khe mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun tu grags nas mang po ku/ na gyis bkur bar 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni tshe ring bde skying bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes
57b6(rgyud): bya'o// gal te yul gyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis mdo sde yang dag par ston par byed na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang
57b7(rgyud): zhe na/ dang po ni gos dang / gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman rnams kyis 'phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o// gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde bar yid la
57b8(rgyud): sems shin klog pa dang / kha ton 'don par 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni ri dang nags tshal dag na gnas pa na/ bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin
58a1(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o// gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston
58a2(rgyud): par byed na/ mi thams cad dar zhing skying pa dang / rims nang rnams med pa dang / tshong ba dang / 'dron po phan tshun 'gro ba nor dang / rin po che mang du thob pa dang / bsod nams khyad par du
58a3(rgyud): 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs shes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 
58a4(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// pabacom ldan 'das mdo sde don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gan sa par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs
58a5(rgyud): kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na gnas shing / nub par mi 'gyur la/ nam mdo sde 'di lta bu nub par/ gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par
58a6(rgyud): bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam/ 
58a7(rgyud): sde gcig kyang rung ste/ thams cad sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bklag par bya/ yang dag par kha ton du gdon par bya'o// yang dag par mnyan par bya/ yang dag par gzung bar bya/ 
58a8(rgyud): yang dag par yid la bsam par bya zhing / yang dag par bsgoms nas/ sems can mang po'i ched du rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/ yongasu spel bar byed na/ yun ring por bde skyid cing // 
58b1(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' med do// de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par
58b2(rgyud): gyur pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ las kyis sgrib pa rnam par
58b3(rgyud): sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
58b4(rgyud): seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa snyed dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas
58b5(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / 
58b6(rgyud): ba dan dang / gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen du zhig gis ni byang chub kyi sems 'thob
58b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de la ni/ da ltar gyi sems kyang dmigasu ma mchis/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang
58b8(rgyud): dmigs su ma mchis/ 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems dmigs su ma mchis lagaso// byang chub ces bgyi ba
59a1(rgyud): ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis pas/ sems kyang gzugs ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ dngos po dang las ma mchis pa/ mngon par 'du bgyi/ 
59a2(rgyud): ba ma lags pa/ sems can yang dmigs su ma mchis shing / khong du chud par yang mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos zab mo'i don gang lags par rig par 'gyur lags/ 
59a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi dngos po dang / las ni shin tu gya nom pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba yang dmigs par mi
59a4(rgyud): 'gyur lags byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sem sa dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/ byang chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa/ sems kyang brjod du med pa/ gzugs
59a5(rgyud): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / dngos po dang las med pa/ sems can thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub dang sems gnyis ka yang de
59a6(rgyud): bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir dang / mngon du byed pa dang / mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang chos rnams shes par bya ba med par ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
59a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos rnams mngon par rtogs pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa
59a8(rgyud): zhes bya'o// byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// sems can kyang
59b1(rgyud): de bzhin te/ 'di la mtshan nyid gnyis yang dag par dmig su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyi
59b2(rgyud): ming yang dmigs su med// sems can dang sems can gyi ming dmig su med nyan thos dang / nyan thos kyi ming yang dmig su med/ rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang dmigasu
59b3(rgyud): med byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmig su med// sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmigs su med/ spyod pa dang / spyod pa ma yin pa yang
59b4(rgyud): dmigs su med/ spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmigs su med de/ 'di ltar dmig su med pa'i phyir// rab tu dben pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin
59b5(rgyud): 'di yang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtan nas/ skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper zha rin po che'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la phan 'dogs
59b6(rgyud): par byed pa de bzhin du / byang chub kyi sems 'di yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po
59b7(rgyud): bzhin du dngos po mang po yongasu 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa gcig pu/ 
59b8(rgyud): 'gro ba la 'jigs pa med pa de bzhin du/ skrag cing sdang ba dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir/ 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na rlung gi dkyil 'khor stobs
60a1(rgyud): po che shugs drag cing myur ba bzhin du/ sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ rin po/ 
60a2(rgyud): sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtseg ma them skas bzhi dang ldan pas/ sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis bus shin tu bde ba myong ba bzhin du/ bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongasu btsal nas/ 
60a3(rgyud): gang zhig rgyas par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis
60a4(rgyud): kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms par bye dad pa'i phyir/ 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon gyis thams cad
60a5(rgyud): kyi sems la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongasu 'das nas/ yon tan gyi rin po che thob pa'i phyir/ 'di ni
60a6(rgyud): bdun pa thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yongasu dag cing / shin tu rgyas pa la rab rib med pa bzhin du/ sems 'dis
60a7(rgyud): kyang spyod yul thams cad las rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni brgyad pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
60a8(rgyud): po'i dmag la dbang ba blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang byed pa bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa shin tu rgyan pa dang / yon tan tshad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan
60b1(rgyud): 'dags par byed pa'i phyir/ 'don dgu ba stobs kyi pa rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o// 'dis ste dper na/ namakha' la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/ sems 'dis kyang spyod sul
60b2(rgyud): thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob nas/ dbang bskur ba'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir/ 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste/ 'di lta bu'i rgyu
60b3(rgyud): bcul khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lngal brten nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
60b4(rgyud): rdzogs par byed do// lngagang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / da snying rje dang / 'dod pa yongasu tshal ba med pa'i sems da dang / sems can thams cad yongasu sdud ba dang / thams
60b5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu tshol ba gang yin pa ste/ gas kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen bos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa
60b6(rgyud): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang ste
60b7(rgyud): na/ las rnam pa gsum yongasu dag par gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ngan 'gror sgo rnams gcod cing / bde bgro'i sgo
60b8(rgyud): ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bsod nams thams cad mongasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'din byang chub sems dpa' sengs
61a1(rgyud): dpa' chen po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam
61a2(rgyud): pabalnga la brten nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa 'dul bar nub pa dang / lus dang srog la phangs pa med par
61a3(rgyud): bde ba yongasu mi tshol zhing / 'du shes nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang / sngon gyi las la bsams nas/ sdug bsngal dang phrad par 'gyur na yang dang du len par nus pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje'i
61a4(rgyud): bsam pa bskyed nas/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yodas su smin par byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
61a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
61a6(rgyud): rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi mos pa dang / 
61a7(rgyud): bsod nams yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bde ba nyam su len par mi byed pa dang / bka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongasu skyo ba'i bsam pa mi skyed pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje chen po
61a8(rgyud): yongasu bsdus nas/ phan 'dogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongasu gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi
61b1(rgyud): bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
61b2(rgyud): po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bsdus nas/ rnam par 'thor bar mi
61b3(rgyud): byed pa'i phyir dang / rtag par rnam par grol bar smon cing / mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
61b4(rgyud): yongasu smin par byed pa smon pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings/ yongasu sbyangs nas/ sems kyi dri ma sel bar byed pa de'i phyir dang / sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongs su
61b5(rgyud): gcod par byed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes
61b6(rgyud): bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rna ba lnga la brten nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ 
61b7(rgyud): rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gsal zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad la mchod cing / nye bar brten nas yongs su skyo ba mi bskyed cing / rgyab kyis phyogs
61b8(rgyud): par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing / yongasu mi skyo ba dang / chog pa'i bsam pa med pa dang / 
62a1(rgyud): don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi shes rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong ba dang / 
62a2(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i mkhyud dpyad dang / rig pa'i gnas lnga'i chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab
62a3(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha
62a4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na// sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang / nyon mong rnas pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtags
62a5(rgyud): par khong du chud pa dang / chos tshad med pa rnams kyi gnye na po'i sgo thams cad sems kyis gsal bar rtogs pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las
62a6(rgyud): 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la rang dbang thob pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms nas yongasu smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
62a7(rgyud): ma lus par yongasu bsdus nas/ mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam
62a8(rgyud): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ smon lam gyi pha rol/ 
62b1(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par byed do// lnga ga zhen/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas mi skye mi 'gag yod pa ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / chos
62b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags nas/ sems bde bar gnas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das
62b3(rgyud): pa'i sems kyi/ de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa tha dad ma yin// mi g.yo ba dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob
62b4(rgyud): kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang / zhi gnas/ dedang / lhag mthong dus gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag/ la/ sems bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
62b5(rgyud): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya/ nga ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
62b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
62b7(rgyud): kyi spyod pa dang / legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos la gzung bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor bdag gis las kyi rkyen rnams
62b8(rgyud): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang / rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud par byed pa dang
63a1(rgyud): sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ yongs su smin par byas nas/ ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongasu sgrol ba gang yin pa
63a2(rgyud): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 
63a3(rgyud): chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do// lnga gang zhe na/ chos rnams kyi legs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i chos
63a4(rgyud): yongasu mi spong zhing yang dag par sdud par byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongs su mi skyo zhing / mdo nu pa mi dga' ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang
63a5(rgyud): ldan pas/ mthar thug pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa dang / dbang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/ 'dres pa la sogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
63a6(rgyud): thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin
63a7(rgyud): pa'i don gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan 'dogs pa'i mchog tu mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin/ 
63a8(rgyud): bde ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa don to// spyod pa dang / spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la sems kyis mngon par rten pa med pa gang yin pa den/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba nyis dpags
63b1(rgyud): dang dmya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing / yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang / shes pa
63b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gang zag thams cad yong su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i
63b3(rgyud): don to// thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi khams dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag par
63b4(rgyud): rnam par bye nas/ shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rol tu phyin da'i don to// sbyin pa la sogs pa nas so/ shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi bar dag phyir ma
63b5(rgyud): ldog pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// sems can thams cad kyi bsod
63b6(rgyud): nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par byang chub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga'ar ba bzhi dang ma 'dres
63b7(rgyud): pa'i chos la sogs pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa las mtshan nyid gnyis med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni
63b8(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongasu zlos pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mu stegs can thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas gal te dri ba dag la legs
64a1(rgyud): par rnam par bshad nas 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yong su bskor
64a2(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang skyon dang 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
64a3(rgyud): dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu gang ba dag byang
64a4(rgyud): chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la snga rtag des kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
64a5(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa bzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa kha dog shin tu gya nom pa tshad med pa dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / yong su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan gyi
64a6(rgyud): rnam pa dag/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi
64a7(rgyud): lus shin tu dpa' ba go chas rab tu rgyan pas/ phyir rgol ba thams cad pham par byas pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
64a8(rgyud): dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ me tog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor bas sa bzhi kun tu khyab par/ 
64b1(rgyud): par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs
64b2(rgyud): kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan pa/ mgo me tog gi cod pan gyis rgyan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la// 
64b3(rgyud): snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rdzing bu them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa/ gser gyi bye ma kun tu bdal ba/ yongasu dang zhing dri ma med pa/ yon tan
64b4(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba/ me tog ud pa la dadang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rikas kun tu bkram pa/ dme tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa dag shin tu bde skying pa
64b5(rgyud): dang yongasu dag cing dpe zla med pa dag/ byang chub sem sa dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la snga rtags kyi
64b6(rgyud): mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus ltung bar mi 'gyur la/ smras pa
64b7(rgyud): yang med/ 'jigs shing skrag pa yang med par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma
64b8(rgyud): snang ba 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g.yas g.yon na/ seng ge'i rgyal pos yongasu bsrungs pas/ gcan zan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag/ byang chub sems/ 
65a1(rgyud): dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor los bsgyur
65a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag tshad med pas yongasu bskor nas/ mchod pa byed pa dang / spyi bo'i gdugs dkar po rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pa dag gis rab tu rgyan pa dag/ byang chub sems
65a3(rgyud): dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu
65a4(rgyud): 'phro ba/ 'od zer yongasu dag pa tshad med pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal dpo 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis/ sku gser gyi kha dog
65a5(rgyud): kun tu 'pho ba/ yongasu bskor nas/ bkur sti dang mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongasu bskor ba dag/ byang chub sems dpas
65a6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa dang po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar thogs ma kho nar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa dang
65a7(rgyud): gdod thob nas/ sgrub pa chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par grub par gyur pas/ rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// dri ma shin
65a8(rgyud): tu phra mo dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad yongasu dag par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i
65b1(rgyud): 'od zer snang ba sgrub par mi nus shing / thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang / thos pas 'dzin pa'i gzungs tsam par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa'i sa zhes bya'o// shes
65b2(rgyud): rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa rnams bsregs nas/ 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs sgom par byed pas/ de'i phyir sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o// thabs mkhas
65b3(rgyud): pas bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang / mthong ba dang / sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gdul bar dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir/ 
65b4(rgyud): sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' zhes bya'o// spyod pa'i tshe// sa rgyun chad med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mngon sum du
65b5(rgyud): gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o// zag pa med pa bar chad med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa dang / rnam par grol
65b6(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i phyir dang / sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir/ sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma med pa yid la
65b7(rgyud): bsgoms pas/ rang dbang du gyur nas/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis skul bar mi nus pas/ de'i phyir sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o// tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thams
65b8(rgyud): cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas/ nyes pa med cing 'brel pa med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbang du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur pas/ de'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo
66a1(rgyud): gros zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku na mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / shes rab sprin chen po lta bur gyur nas/ thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs par byed pa'i phyir/ de
66a2(rgyud): lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu bdag dang chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang / 'gro ba'i ngan 'gro la skrag cing 'jigs pa'i ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni
66a3(rgyud): sa dang po la sgrib par byed do// bslab pa'i gnas phra mo dag la shes bzhin med pas/ nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang / las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/ 
66a4(rgyud): ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib par byed do//  / ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing / mngon par zhen ba'i ma rig pa dang / gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la
66a5(rgyud): sgrib par byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gsum pa la sgrib par byed do// snyom sa par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa
66a6(rgyud): dang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par dag pa sred cing mos pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par byed do// 'a khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang
66a7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par byed do// rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma rags pa
66a8(rgyud): mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par byed do// mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid
66b1(rgyud): la byed pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par byed do// mtshan ma med par sgom par mngon par rtsol ba'i ma rig pa dang / mtshan ma la
66b2(rgyud): dbang thob pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa brgyad pa la sgrib par byed do// bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang / ming dang tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa gnyis po 'di dag
66b3(rgyud): la mi mkhas pa'i ma rig pa dang / tshig gi spobs pa yid bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dgu pa la sgrib par byed do// rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pa la rang dbang
66b4(rgyud): ma thob pa'i ma rig pa dang / shin tu phra ba'i gsang brilas kyi ngo / das po khong du ma chud pa'i ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bcu pa la sgrib par byed do// spyod yul
66b5(rgyud): thams cad la shes bya phra mos bsgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par byed do// 
66b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// 
66b7(rgyud): sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa lnga pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ 
66b8(rgyud): sa drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa bdun pa la thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa brgyad pa la spyod
67a1(rgyud): lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do// sa dgu pa la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byed do// sa bcu pa la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do// 
67a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ sems bskyed pa dang pos rin chen mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa gnyis
67a3(rgyud): pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu bsdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa gsum pas shin tu bskul bar dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa
67a4(rgyud): bzhi pas phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu sdud ci dang skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa lnga pas/ ri na po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par byed do// 
67a5(rgyud): sems bskyed pa drug pas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin yong su sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa bdun pas/ smon lam thams cad
67a6(rgyud): yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa brgyad pas/ mngon sum du gnas par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yong su sdud cing bskyed par byed do// 
67a7(rgyud): sems bskyed pa dgu pas ye shes kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin yongasu sdud cing skyed par byed do// sems bskyed pa bcu pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sdud cing skyed par byed do// 
67a8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa dang po las
67b1(rgyud): thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ yon tan bslabs pa'i stobs zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ pUr+Na ma nor te do ho ho// yA pa sUd+yo/ 
67b2(rgyud): ba b+hA sa te/ yA bad tsan+de/ da~M dAn+te pad tra rAk+Sha mAn/ dAn+te pa ri hA raM ku ru swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems
67b3(rgyud): dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang / spyang ki dang / seng ge dang / 
67b4(rgyud): gcan zan ma rungs pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa dang / yi dgas dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang 8/ gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs
67b5(rgyud): pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las/ rnam par grol nas/ sa dang po mi brjed cing rjesu dran pa/ ra 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
67b6(rgyud): dpa' chen pos sa gnyis pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ shin tu bde ba'i gnas shes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ut+to li tsi ri tsi ri/ Ad+ho ra/ tor NAm/ shAn+to shAn+tiM
67b7(rgyud): ut+to li/ hu ru hu ru swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
67b8(rgyud): srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi
68a1(rgyud): dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las
68a2(rgyud): rnam par grol nas/ sa gnyis pa ni mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa gsum pa las thob gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ shin
68a3(rgyud): tu rgyal bar dka' ba'i stobs zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dan+d+ha tse ke/ ban dzi ke/ kar thi/ ko'u ra dzi/ ke sU re/ dAn+ti ri swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las/ 
68a4(rgyud): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsum pa'i byang chub sems da dpa' yongasu srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la ral zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par
68a5(rgyud): byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa/ dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i
68a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa gsum pa mi brjed cing dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa bzhi
68a7(rgyud): ba las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni rgya cher phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha mi ni/ d+ha ri d+hA ri Ni/ shi ri shi ri Ni/ bi shA la/ bi shA la/ pA sha/ ba
68a8(rgyud): shA ni ban+d+ha mi te swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su srung ba'i phyir
68b1(rgyud): gsungs te/ gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing / yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs/ 
68b2(rgyud): pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bzhi pa mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyur/ 
68b3(rgyud): ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa lnga pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ yon tan sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ri ha ri Ni/ 
68b4(rgyud): kyi tsar Ni/ ka ri ma Ni/ saM ka ri ma Ni/ sa ma shan+ti/ dzaH/ nri/ swan+ta ni/ mo ha ni/ swa ya~M b+hu be swAhA// rigs kyi bug/ rdungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i
68b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsung / sa pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gi gzungs sngags 'di kha
68b6(rgyud): ton du 'don cing yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug
68b7(rgyud): bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa lnga pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
68b8(rgyud): dpa' chen pos sa drug pa la thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ yongasu rdzogs pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi to ri bi to ri/ ma ri Ni/ ma ri Ni/ ki ri ki ri/ bi to han+tu/ ru ru
69a1(rgyud): ru ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ du rub du rub/ sha sha shan+tu/ ba ri sa sha sid+d+hi/ sarba satwA nAn/ sid d+ha tu ma ma/ man+ta pa dA ni swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni ga ng+gA
69a2(rgyud): klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig
69a3(rgyud): gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug
69a4(rgyud): bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa drug pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub
69a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ sa bdun pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi spyod pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dza ha dza ha ru dza
69a6(rgyud): ru be du ke be du ke/ a mr-i ta/ g+ha ne pu ru Sha Ni/ bai du Sha Ni/ bai du ti ke ba ru bat+te/ bi d+hi hi ki/ b+hin+da ba raM ni/ a mr-i ti ke/ ba hu dzu yu swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang+gA'i klung / 
69a7(rgyud): bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs
69a8(rgyud): sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / me dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon
69b1(rgyud): bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bdun pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
69b2(rgyud): / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa brgyas pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa'i gter zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri/ shi ri Ni/ mi te mi te/ ka ri
69b3(rgyud): ka ri/ he ru he ru he ru tsu ru tsu ru/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa brkyang ba'i byang chub sems
69b4(rgyud): dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton tu 'don ci nga 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi
69b5(rgyud): dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas/ phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug/ bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur
69b6(rgyud): zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa brgyad pa mi brjod cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa dgu pa las
69b7(rgyud): thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ri tsaN+DA li ke/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra si/ ba ta pa tA si/ shi ri shi ri/ ka shi ri/ ka bi shi ri/ sid+d+hi/ sarba
69b8(rgyud): satwA nAn swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa
70a1(rgyud): yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
70a2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa dgu pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran pa/ 
70a3(rgyud): / 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa bcu pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni/ rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ sid+d+he su sid+d+he
70a4(rgyud): mo tsa ni/ mok+Sha ni/ bi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma le/ dmAng+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ rat+na gar+b+he/ sa man+ta/ sarba adan+ta sA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ ma hA ma na si/ ad b+hU te/ a t+yang b+hu te/ 
70a5(rgyud): a ts+yu te/ a mr-i te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ brah+me/ brah+ma swa re pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ ma no ra the swA hA// rigs kyi bu dbang bskuraba'i bkra shis tshig gi gzungs 'di ni/ gang+gA'i klung bcu pa'i
70a6(rgyud): grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su srung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha tin du 'don cing / 
70a7(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin par byed na gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang / gdon bgegs kyi 'jigs pa rnams las thar par
70a8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / gdug pa'i gdon thams cad yongs su bsal nas/ rab tu zhi ba dang / sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/ sa bcu pa mi brjed cing rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems
70b1(rgyud): dpa' seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs 'di dag bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig
70b2(rgyud): la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
70b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// zab mo mtshan ma med pa'i chos// dpe med de la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can yang dag shes stong la// bcom ldan tag cig sgrol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs
70b4(rgyud): pa mkhyen gsal spyan// chos gcig mtshan nyid mi gzigs kyang // yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni// thams cad kun gzig sa bsam mi khyab// chos gcig bskyed par mi mdzad la/ 
70b5(rgyud): chos gcig 'gog par mi mdzad pas// mnyam gzigs 'di yi/ dbang gis na// bla med gnas su byon pa lags// 2khor ba dag kyang mi 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la mi gnas shing // 
70b6(rgyud): mtha' gnyis dag la ma chags pas// de slad mya ngan 'das pa brnyes// ngag dang ma dag pa yi phyogs// bcom ldan ro gcig nyid mkhyen nas// rnam par rtog par mi mdzad slang // mchog tu rnam par dag pa
70b7(rgyud): brnyes// bcom ldan mtha' yas sku dag gis// yi ge 'bru gcig ma gsungs kyang // slob ma mang po kun la ni// chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad// bcom ldan sems can thams cad la// mtshan
70b8(rgyud): nyid rnam pa med gzigs kyang // sdug bsngal dag gis gzir ba la// rtag par yongs su skyob par mdzad// sdug bsngal bde dang rtag mi rtag/ bdag dang bdag med pa la sogs dang // gcig
71a1(rgyud): min tha dad min pa dang // skye med 'gag pa med pa yi// de 'dra'i don ni mang po rnams// bshang phyir bye brag mchis kyang ni// dper na lung stong
71a2(rgyud): brag cha ltar// bcom ldan nyag gcig rab tu mkhyen// chos dbyings rtog pa ma mchis pas// theg pa tha dad ma mchis kyang // sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i slad// rnam par phye nas
71a3(rgyud): gsum du gsungs// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po// bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom
71a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a dus gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po
71a5(rgyud): 'di ni/ shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba thogamar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ tshig 'bru/ dang don yongasu rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
71a6(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags pas/ gang gis yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i gang zag de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi drin bsab par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
71a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gang gis mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
71a8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
71b1(rgyud): smin par byed cing / chos kyi phyag rgya mchog dang / mdo sde mang po'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir/ mnyan par bya/ song su gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kha ton du 'don par bya'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
71b2(rgyud): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa de dag thams cad kyis ni
71b3(rgyud): shin tu gya nom pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhigs mnyan nas yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang nas/ 
71b4(rgyud): mchog tu rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ rtag parasangs rgyas mthong zhing / sangs rgyas dang / dge ba'i dab shes gnyen dang / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i gang zag
71b5(rgyud): rnams dang / yongasu 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ rtag bar chos gya nom pa thos shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo mchog dam pa zad pa med
71b6(rgyud): cing 'grib pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i phyag yon tan mchog 'byung ba'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod ba dang / tshig mngon
71b7(rgyud): bapar rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing / 'grib pa med pa dang / zla ba yongs
71b8(rgyud): su rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od zer gyi gzungs zad pa med cing / 'grib pa med pa dang / rmongs pa rnams yongs su brtul nas/ yon tan gyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing
72a1(rgyud): 'grib pa med pa dang / rdo rje'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa'i don gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi mdzod yang dag par ston pa'i/ 
72a2(rgyud): gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi cho ga'i sgra dbyangs mngon par rtogs pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa'i
72a3(rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' med pa rnams yang dag par ston pa'i gzungs zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa de lta bu thams cad kyang rab tu
72a4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de lta bu la sogs pa zad pa med cing 'grib pa med pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
72a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas yang dag pa 'i chos bla na med pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi de
72a6(rgyud): bzhin nyid las g.yo ba yang med/ gnas pa yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med do// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par yongs su smin par byas kyang / yong su
72a7(rgyud): smin par byas pa'i sems can gcig tsam yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang / tshig las g.yos pa yang med/ gnas pa yang
72a8(rgyud): med 'gro ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med cing / skye 'gag med cing mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir/ 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med
72b1(rgyud): par bstan ce na/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid tha dad med pa'i phyir ro// chos 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri ni mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par
72b2(rgyud): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed ni/ byang chub kyi sa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong dang dge slong ma tshad med dpag tu med pa snyed ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa
72b3(rgyud): thob par gyur to// srog chags tshad med pa snyed ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mos mchog 'khor
72b4(rgyud): ba'i rgyun las bzlog mdzad pa// shin tu zab cing gya nom ma/ thong bar dka'// sems can dmus long 'dod pas rab g.yogs nas// ma mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong
72b5(rgyud): de nas 'khor mang po rnams cig char stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'dal 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan
72b6(rgyud): 'das bdag gang du gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/ klog cing 'don pa'i gnas der bdag cag 'khor mang po rnams der mchis te/ nyan pa'i 'khor bgyis nas/ 
72b7(rgyud): 'di ston pa'i mkhan po de la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis shing lus dang sems bag yang su 'gyur ba 'thob par bgyid do// bdag cag bsam pa thag pa nas mchod cing rim gro
72b8(rgyud): bgyid ngo do// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang rab tu bde zhing skying bar bgyid do// de dag gnas pa'i yul der yang phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / mu
73a1(rgyud): ge'i sdug bsngal rnams ma mchis par bgyis nas/ mi rnams rab tu ngar zhing rgyas par bgyid do// chos 'di ston pa'i dkyil 'khor der lha dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa
73a2(rgyud): la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis rtsog par mi bgyid cing / mi gtsang bas skrag par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos bshad pa'i gnas gang lags pa de ni mchod rten lags pas/ 
73a3(rgyud): rtag par me tog dang / spos dang / lnga ldi dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag cag rnams kyang rtag par yongs su srung zhing / rgud pa rnams yongs su spong bar bgyis te/ 
73a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ darigs kyi bu khyed kyis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di la yongs su sgom par byed na/ de nyid yang dag pa'i
73a5(rgyud): chos 'jig rten du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa yin no// gse ra 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i sa'i gzungs kyi le'u
73a6(rgyud): ste drug pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po lnga pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi
73a7(rgyud): lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ mdzes pa'i tog gi mtshan mo rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga dam pa las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
73a8(rgyud): gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'gyod tshangs kyi chos bstan pa'i sgra chen po byung ba'i sgra dang rkyen gang yin pa de dag ngas khyed la rgya cher yang dag par bshad kyis sems rtse gcig tu legs par yid
73b1(rgyud): la zung shig/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po gser gyi klu'i bdag po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rtag par pad+ma'i dpes phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mngon par bstod cing bsngags pa
73b2(rgyud): brjod par gyur to// de nas 'khor mang po rnams la des mngon par bstod pa'i tshigs su bcang ba gang yin pa bka' stsal pa/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i
73b3(rgyud): 'jig rten dag na bzhugs pa la// deng bdag rtse gcig spyi bdud phyag bgyis te// rgyal ba rnams la rtse gcig bsngags par bgyi// bla med rnam par dag par thub pa'i gtso// sku yi 'od kyis gsal/ 
73b4(rgyud): mdzad gser mdog 'dra// sgra kun nang na mchog tu gyur pas na// tshangs chen dbyangs ltar 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad// dbu skra bung ba'i rgyab ltar rab gnag cing // g.yas su
73b5(rgyud): 'khyil ba'i ri mo sngon por gnas// tshems dkar gtams pa kha dog dung 'dra zhing // rab mnyam kun gsal 'od zer ngag dang ldan// rnam dag dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i spyan/ 
73b6(rgyud): ud pal sngon po mdab ma yangs pa 'dra// ljags kyi mtshan ni yangs shing shin tu mnyen// dper na pad+ma leb rgan chab chung 'dra// smin mtshams rtag par 'od ni dkar po mnga'// g.yas
73b7(rgyud): su 'khyil ba chu shel kha dog mtshungs// shangs kyi dbyibs mtho gser gyi gar bu 'dra// 'od gnyen rnam dag mtshan nyid nyams mi mnga'// 'jig rten dri mchog dam pa thams cad kun// 
73b8(rgyud): sngon tshe gar gnas thams cad rab tu mkhyen// bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// spu rtse re re mtshan ni rab mtshungs shing // sngo la rab mnyen g.yas su 'khyil bas na/ 
74a1(rgyud): kha dog rab gnyen dpe bgyir shin tu dka'// lhams ma thag tu 'ong mchog mnga' bas na// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gsal mdzad cing // srid gsum
74a2(rgyud): sems can sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pas// de dag thams cad bde ba 'thob par mdzad// sems can dud 'gro yi dgas 'gro ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi yi 'gro ba kun// de dag sdug bsngal mang po ni
74a3(rgyud): mdzad pas// rtag tu rang byung bde ba myong bar 'gyur// sku yi 'od kyis rtag tu gsal mdzad pas// rab sbyangs gser 'dra gya nom zla ma mchis// zhal mdog rgyas gsal zla ba nya ba 'dra// 
74a4(rgyud): sgros dmar mdog mdzes bung ba'i 'bras bu mtshungs// gshe dgas stobs spyod lam seng ge rgyal po bzhin// sku mdog rab gsal gdugs ni 'char ba 'dra// phyag dar
74a5(rgyud): ring ba dbus mo 'das pas ni// dbyibs ni sa la'i lcug ma 'phyang dang mtshungs// 'od ni 'dom gang mtha' yas/ gsal mdzad pas// rab gsal gdugs ni brgya stong ji/ 
74a6(rgyud): lta bzhin// sangs rgyas zhing ni kun tu khyab pas na// rkyen ni ji bzhin skye dgu sad par mdzad// rnam dag 'od zer dra bas zla ma mchis// 'od kyi 'jig rten brgya stong rgyas mdzad pas/ 
74a7(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun gsal mdzad la thogs mi mnga'// mun nag thams cad rab tu sel mdzad pa// bde gshegs byams 'od bde ba rab stsol bas// kha dog gya nom gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'od
74a8(rgyud): kyi zhing ni brgya stong khyab mdzad pas// sems can gang reg thams cad nges par 'byung // bcom ldan sku ni bsod nams tshad med ldan// yon tan thams cad kun gyis rab tu rgyan// khams
74b1(rgyud): gsum ldan pas nyag cig gtsor gsungs pas// 'jig rten khyad 'phags dpe zla yong ma mchis// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ji snyed pa// grangs ni sa chen rdul phran dag dang mtshungs// 
74b2(rgyud): ma byon da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i gtso// sa chen rdul phran ji bzhin mang po la// bdag ni rtse gcig lus dang ngag yid kyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas spyi btung skyabs su mchi/ 
74b3(rgyud): yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas rab bsngags nas// spos dang me tog sna tshogs kun gyis mchod// bdag ni lce ni brgya stong mchis 'gyur te// bskal pa tshad med rab tu bsngags brjod kyang // 
74b4(rgyud): bcom ldan yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing // mchog tu zab pas shin tu brjod par dka'// bdag gi lce da ni brgya stong mchis pa yis// sangs rgyas cig gi yon tan
74b5(rgyud): kun bsngags kyang // de la cha shas tsam yang rtogs da ka' na// sangs rgyas mtha' dag yon tan smos kyi 'tshal// gal te sa chen dang ni lha rnams nas// srid
74b6(rgyud): rtse'i bar dag rgya mtsho'i chab gyur kyang // spu yis rtse mos grangs ni rtogs rung gi/ sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad gzhal bar dka'// bdag gis lus dang ngag yid rtse gcig tu/ 
74b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas bsngags brjod pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu bsam dka' ci mchis pa// sems can yongs bsngo sangs rgyas myur 'grub smon// rgyal po de
74b8(rgyud): yis sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// gzhan yang rang sems smon lam cher btab pa// bdag ni ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe// tshe rabs bskal pa tshad med grangs med snyed// 
75a1(rgyud): rmi lam rtag par gser rnga cher mthong nas// 'gyod tshangs bstan pa'i sgra ni thos par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan pad+ma'i dpes sngags pas// skye med rtogs nas
75a2(rgyud): yang dag sangs rgyas shog/ sangs rgyas brgya lam lan cig 'jig rten 'byung // bskal pa brgya stong shin tu phrad par dka'// rmi lam rtag par gser rnga sgra mchog thob// nyin mtshan ci rigs
75a3(rgyud): 'gyod tshangs bgyid par shog/ bdag gis pha rol phyin drug tshogs bsgoms nas// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las rab drangs te// de 'og bla med mngon par sangs rgyas nas// zhing ni
75a4(rgyud): rnam dag bsam gyis mi khyab shog/ gser gyi rnga mchog sangs rgyas phul ba dang // sangs rgyas yang dag yon te/ den bsngags pa'i rgyus// bcom ldan shAkya thub pa mthong gyur
75a5(rgyud): nas/ bdag la mi mchog 'gyur bar lung bstan sho ga/ bdag gi bu ni gser klu gser gyi 'od// 'ang sa pa'i dus tshe dge ba shes bgyis pas na// tshe rabs kun tu bdag
75a6(rgyud): gi khyim skyes te// lhan cig bla med byang chub lung nod shog/ sems can gang zhig mgon dang skyabs ma mchis// yun ring 'khor bar sdug bsngal mang myong ba// bdag gis ma 'ongs mgon
75a7(rgyud): dang skyabs bgyis na// de dag rtag tu bde ba thob par shog/ srid gsum sdug bsngal mang po nyer zhi nas// thams cad yid bzhin bde gnas thob gyur te// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ji lta
75a8(rgyud): bzhin// ma 'ongs byang chub mngon par sgrub par shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i bsod nams 'dis// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gtan bskams sdig bral nas// las kyi sgrib dang / 
75b1(rgyud): nyon mongs nyer ni ste// bdag gis rnam dag 'bras bu myur thob shog/ bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho chang med cing // rnam dag dri bral zab pas gting ma mchis// bdag gis yon tan
75b2(rgyud): rgya mtsho 'di thob nas// bla med byang chub chen po myur 'grub shog/ gser 'od 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa 'di yi mthus// bsod nams rnam ngag 'od zer 'thob par shog/ rnam dag 'od zer ngam
75b3(rgyud): pa thob nas kyang // shes rab 'od kyis thams cad gsal bgyid shog/ bdag gi lus 'od sangs rgyas mtshungs 'gyur zhing // bsod nams ye shes dag kyang de bzhin shog/ 'jig rten
75b4(rgyud): kun tu gcig pu gtsor brjod cing // gzi brjid mthu stobs rang dbang zla med shog/ zag bcas sdug bsnga ngal rgya mtsho 'das par shog/ 'dus ma byas kyi bde mtsho rtag
75b5(rgyud): bgrong shog/ da ltar bsod nams mtsho ni rtag 'phe la shog/ ma 'ongs ye shes rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shog/ bdag gi zhing na khams gsum yongs 'das nas/ 
75b6(rgyud): khyad 'phags yon tan tshad med mtha' med shog/ rkyen dang ldan rnams lhan cig skyes gyur nas// thams cad rnam dag ye shes myur grub shog/ mdzes pa'i tog khyod shes par byos/ 
75b7(rgyud): rgyal po gser klu bdag po yis// smon lam de 'dra gang btab pa// de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no// gser klu gser 'od zhes bya ba// sngon gyi khye'u gnyis po ni// dngul tog dngul
75b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin te// nga las lung bstan thob pa yin// 'khor mang de skad thos pa na// thams cad byang chub sems bskyed de// da ltar ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// 'gyod tshangs 'di spyong smon
76a1(rgyud): lam btag/ gser 'ong dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po wa/ pad+ma lta bu'i dpes bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
76a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gser rgyal zhes bya'i gzungs yod
76a3(rgyud): de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing / bkur sti dang / mchod pa
76a4(rgyud): byed 'dod pas gzungs 'di yongasu gzung bar bya'o// dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon rab dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum
76a5(rgyud): yin pas so// de lta bas na gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin/ par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams chen po ldan zhing / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams
76a6(rgyud): las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin pas deng yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang / gdon mi za
76a7(rgyud): bar chos zab mo'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/ sngar sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
76a8(rgyud): kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sngags gdon par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
76b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
76b2(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// byang phyogs
76b3(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// steng phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'og phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// 
76b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas su dan tu 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang rab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spos brtsegs rgyal po/ 
76b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
76b6(rgyud): bud la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
76b7(rgyud): rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// 
76b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rtog pa 'jigs med dbang phyug la 'tshal lo// 
77a1(rgyud): sangs rnam snyengs pam ma pa grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ sa sa rgyas mchog tu rnam par gyul pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo byang chu
77a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
77a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po namakha' snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
77a4(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sem das dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'a tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
77a5(rgyud): gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
77a6(rgyud): byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ kun+te
77a7(rgyud): kun+te na ku tsa ku tsa le/ in+d+ri mi tre swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la bka' stsal pa gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams
77a8(rgyud): kyi yum yin pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa rab
77b1(rgyud): tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas grangs med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / gus pas bla mar byed pa dang / bsngags pa brjod par byed pa yin pas/ 'di ltar
77b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas mang po rnams kyis kyang gang zag de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// rab gnas gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed
77b3(rgyud): na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du gos dang / zas dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / nad med cing tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams mang po thob par
77b4(rgyud): 'gyur bsaji ltar mos pa rnams yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro// rab gnas ga zungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni
77b5(rgyud): bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer gyi ring dang byang chu/ ba sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya
77b6(rgyud): mtsho dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma hA bing ga la la sogs pa dang / lhan
77b7(rgyud): cig gnas par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu srung zhing yongasu srung bar 'gyur ro// rab gnas 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshe// 
77b8(rgyud): cho ga 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o// sngags lan khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan nas/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes
78a1(rgyud): gcig la khrus yongs su dag par byas te/ gos sar pa bgos nas spos bsregs me tog gtor te/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa
78a2(rgyud): byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te/ thog ma kho nar sngar gong du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ sems rtse gcig tu gus pas/ 
78a3(rgyud): phyag byas nas sngar byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ sngar bstan pa'i gzungs sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lus drang por bsrang
78a4(rgyud): nas yid la bya zhing smon lam rjes su dran par bya'o// nyi ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zas gtsang ma nag po bza' bar bya zhing / nyin gcig la zas gcig gza' bar
78a5(rgyud): bya'o// zhag bco lnga tshang nas dkyil 'khor nas 'byung ba/ ra byed na/ gang zag de bsod nams dang / gzi byin mthu stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur
78a6(rgyud): bas/  ci dang ci smon pa mi 'grub pa gang yang med par 'gyur ro// gal te yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur na/ yang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par bya zhing / bsam pa bzhin du 'grub nas
78a7(rgyud): kyang rtag par yid la bya zhing brjed par mi bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / 
78a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang mi dang / 'khor mang po rnams la phan gdags shing / 
78b1(rgyud): kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chud par mdzad par bzhed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan
78b2(rgyud): dag las// yang dag stong pa nyid dam chos bshad kyang // deng 'dir mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las kyang // stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad// zab mo'i chos ni rgya cher mang po la// 
78b3(rgyud): sems can shes med rig par mi nus pas// de'i phyir ngas 'dir bzlas te bstan pas na// stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir// shin
78b4(rgyud): tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen mchog dag gis// ngas deng 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du// bstan pas de dag stong don ga sul rtogs 'gyur// lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas
78b5(rgyud): te/ rkun po drug gnas phan tshun yong mi shes// yul drug rkun po tha dang dbang po gnas// so sor phan tshun/ mi shes de bzhin no// mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs
78b6(rgyud): la lta/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra nyan rgyun mi 'chad// sna yi dbang pos rgyun tu dri yul snom// lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong // lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len// yid kyi/ 
78b7(rgyud): dbang pos chos rig skyon mi shes// dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang bas// so so'i rang yul dag la rtog pa skyed// rnam shes smra sprul 'dra bas yang dag min// dbang pos gnas/ 
78b8(rgyud): nas mi dben 'dod pas tshol// dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar// rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no// sems ni kun tshol gnas kyi rjes su 'jug/ dbang rten yul dmigs
79a1(rgyud): dngos pos rnam rig pa// rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred// chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas// rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug
79a2(rgyud): bas// mkha' la bya 'phrur thogs pa med pa 'dra// dbang po rten byed de la bltos nas ni// phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus// lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med// rang
79a3(rgyud): bzhin mi rten rkyen la ltos nas grub// yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas// 'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jug/ sa chu me rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas// rgyu rkyen
79a4(rgyud): ji bzhin tha dad 'bras bu 'thob// lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byed pas// sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb ga/ cig gnas pa 'dra// 'byung chen sbrul bzhi rang bzhin
79a5(rgyud): tha dad pas// lhan cig gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yod/ steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun tu khyab// 'di dag mthar ni zad pa'i chos su 'gro// sbrul gdug rnam pa bzhi po
79a6(rgyud): de dag las// sa chu sbrul gnyis phan cher thur du 'bying // me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas na// mi mthun 'di dbang nang mang skye bar 'gyur// sems dang rnam shes lus 'di
79a7(rgyud): gnas nas ni// dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na// lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni// lus stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed// nad dang phrad nas lus ni shi ba'i 'og/ bshad
79a8(rgyud): gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu snang // rul myags 'bus brtsegs blta bar yong mi mos// dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur// khyod kyis chos rnams de ltar blta bar byos/ 
79b1(rgyud): ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 'dzin// chos rnams thams cad zad par mi rtag ste// thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung // 'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na// yang dag
79b2(rgyud): yod min rang bzhin skye med pas// de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad// 'di dag stong zhing yang dag min rig byos// ma rig rang bzhin bzod pa nyid kyis med// rkyen mang mthu ltos
79b3(rgyud): tshogs las yod pa min// dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas// de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad// 'du byed rnams shes rkyen byas ming gzugs yod// skye mched
79b4(rgyud): drug dang reg tshor rjes su skye// sred len srid skye rga shi bskye/ dad pas na// mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang // / sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzir/ 
79b5(rgyud): 'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshad dus med// rang bzhin yo da min ngo bo nyid stong yang // tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed// nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab
79b6(rgyud): spangs nas// rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas// lnga phung khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas// byang chub yang dag gnas ni btsal ba yin// nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye
79b7(rgyud): nas/ gya nom bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin// yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang // rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang // ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni
