105a5(rgyud): bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ dbus mo ga yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar/ 
105a6(rgyud): te/ tshig su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan la mngon par bstod pa// bcom ldan zhal ni zla gtsang nya 'dra zhing // nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bkye nas mtshungs// spyan ni
105a7(rgyud): dag yangs pad+ma sngon po 'dra// tshems dkar gtams pa dper na dung dang mtshungs// bcom ldan yon tan mtha' med rgya mtsho 'dra// rin chen gya nom tshad med bden pa bsags// mkhyen pa'i yon
105a8(rgyud): tan chab kyis rtag rgyas shig/ ting 'dzin dam pa brgya stong rab tu gang // zhabs mthil 'kho lo mtshan ni thams cad mdzes// lte ba mu khyud rtsibs stong kun rab mnyam// phyag dang zhabs kyi dra ba
105b1(rgyud): kun rgyan pa// ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin ni phun sum tshogs// bcom ldan sku 'od gser gyi ri bo 'dra// rnam dag khyad 'phags dpe zla yong ma mchis// ri rab bzhin du yon tan kun rgyan pas// bcom ldan
105b2(rgyud): ri rgyal khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// mtshan dang dpe byad mkha' bzhin dpag mi rig/ zla ba stong pas lhag par 'od zer bkye// smig rgyu sgyu ltar bsam gyi mi khyab pas// thugs zhen mi mnga' khyod la
105b3(rgyud): bdag phyag 'tshal// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo
105b4(rgyud): sde mchog 'di ni/ bla med stobs bcu dag gis rab tu gsungs// khyed cag rgyal po bzhi yis rab bsrungs la// rab dpa' nur med pa yi sems bskyed cig/ mdo sde rin chen
105b5(rgyud): gya nom zab mo 'di// sems can thams cad bde ba sbyin par byed/ nga // sems can de dag bde bar gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'dzam gling rab tu spel bar 'gyur// stong chen 'jig
105b6(rgyud): rten khams ni 'di dag tu// sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa// yi dgas dud 'gro'i sems can dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed// 'dzam gling 'di gnas pa
105b7(rgyud): yi rgyal po dang // gzhan yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun// mdo sde mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing // nad mang sdug bsngal bsal bas chom rkun med// yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel/ 
105b8(rgyud): pa'i phyir// rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas// cho rigs btsun zhing nor ni gnyer ba dang // yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na/ 
106a1(rgyud): sems la bsams bzhin thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni bzlog byed cing // rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur// mdo sde'i rgyal
106a2(rgyud): bopo dam pa 'di yi mthus// sdug bsngal mang po mya ngan 'jigs pa med// rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang
106a3(rgyud): skyed pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// rgyal po dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed// dper na rab dang chu ni grang mo yis// skom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar// mdo sde'i
106a4(rgyud): rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te// bsod nams mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed// mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb bdog na// longs spyod sems la bsams bzhin
106a5(rgyud): 'byor pa ltar// mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/ bsod nams bsam bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med// lha yi bdag po khyod dang lha tshogs kyis// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di
106a6(rgyud): la mchod par gyis// gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na// shes rab gzi byin phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// mdo sde'i rgyal po
106a7(rgyud): 'di ni srung dgongs pa// klog 'don 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na// leg so ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na// lus dang sems ni dga' rangs mgu
106a8(rgyud): ba skye// rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis// gang du gnas pa der ni der srung byed// 'jig rten khams 'di'i lha ni mang po nams// de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab// thams
106b1(rgyud): cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di mnyan pas// rab dga' srung byed nur pa ci yang med// gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na// mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan// mi yi 'khor mang thams cad
106b2(rgyud): phan 'dogs pas// gnod pa rab spong snang ba 'phel bar byed// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
106b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni// sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma blags te/ 
106b4(rgyud): ngus nas/ lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmangon du gyur pas/ lha yi me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar
106b5(rgyud): ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
106b6(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas/ rtag par gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang / chos smra ba de dag yongasu bsrung zhing yongs
106b7(rgyud): su skyob par byed pas/ ye shes kyi snang bas yongasu skyob par bgyi do// gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang don bskyed pa zhig mchis na yang bdag cag gis de dag rjesu dran zhing mi bskyed par bgyid pa'i
106b8(rgyud): slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa stsal nas/ yongasu rtogs par bgyid do// gzhan yang mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya
107a1(rgyud): cher 'phel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lag so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med pa snyed shes
107a2(rgyud): rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongasu bsdus te/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par gyur pas/ bstan bcos sna
107a3(rgyud): tshogs la rab tu mkhas pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas/ phyir mi ldog par gyur pas/ myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par
107a4(rgyud): rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul srung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba
107a5(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// // bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par
107a6(rgyud): zhen pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yong su gzung ba byang chub
107a7(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yi no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba
107a8(rgyud): gang gi tshig dang don gang zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba ni/ phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa/ phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa yang ma lag so// zhes de skad
107b1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing / theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas/ 
107b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po la bla mar byas pa leg so legaso// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gnas yod pa yang ma yin/ phyogs dang gnas med pa yang ma yin// chos kyang ma yin/ 
107b3(rgyud): ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin rkyen yang ma yin/ rkyen ma
107b4(rgyud): yin pa yang ma yin/ 'du byed kyang ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa yang ma yin/ chos skye bar 'gyur ba yang med/ chos 'gag par 'gyur ba yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang
107b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams la gdags pa'i phyir/ de skang du bstan pa yin te/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang / yang dag par lam gyi tshul dang / mthu stobs rnam
107b6(rgyud): par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa
107b7(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
107b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol// gal
108a1(rgyud): te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na/ bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag pa'i smon lam yongasu rdzogs nas/ gnas
108a2(rgyud): pa ma mchis pa dang / rang bzhin gyis spobs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po thob nas/ 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di
108a3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu leg so leg so// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la la
108a4(rgyud): zhig gis gzungs 'di thob par gyur na/ gang zag de ni sad sa rgyas dang tha dad pa med par rig par bya'o// gang la la ni/ dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing / bkur sti
108a5(rgyud): byed pa dang / bla mar byed cing yo byad sbyin par byed na/ de ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya 'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos
108a6(rgyud): nas/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / mngon par yid ches par bgyid pa de la 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang / tha dad pa med par bkur sti byas nas/ mchod cing rim
108a7(rgyud): / gro byas nas/ rgyu dang rkyen des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ san d+hA ra Ni/ a ba d+hA ra Ni/ su saM pra tiSh+Tha te/ 
108a8(rgyud): su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Tha ta/ bi dza ya ba la/ sat+ya pra ti rnA/ pa ri ti shin+na/ su a ro ha/ dz+nyA na pra ti/ u ba d+ha ne/ a ba nA ma ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi byA ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ suM ni shri tA ba hU/ gu b+ha/ a
108b1(rgyud): b+hi bA da swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu gnas nas/ yang dag par
108b2(rgyud): 'dzin par byed na/ gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing / ral gri
108b3(rgyud): dang / dbyig dang / dug dang / chu dang / me dang / gcan zan ma rungs pa rnams kyis de'i lus la gnod pa byed mi nus par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzung
108b4(rgyud): 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so//  shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsu
108b5(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phu/ la nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang
108b6(rgyud): zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byed pa bas/ gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di la ni tha na tshig gcig tsam yang dag par gzung ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de
108b7(rgyud): ches mang du mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// de'i
108b8(rgyud): che tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/ thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ thams cad kyis yongasu 'dzin par gyur to// gser 'ong ngam
109a1(rgyud): pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
109a2(rgyud): kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod pa thams cad ring du spong ba/ 
109a3(rgyud): 'brug dang / glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing / 'jil bar byed pa yod de/ de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
109a4(rgyud): pa yin pas/ ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'dir lha dang / mi rnamades la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams ca/ du yongasu bsrungs nas/ bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor
109a5(rgyud): mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas 'khorar mang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa tho ba dang / so so nas sems rtse/ 
109a6(rgyud): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ rig sngags mnyan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod cag legs par nyon cig/ 'di nas shar phyogs nas/ 
109a7(rgyud): glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu ta kwang zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs/ 
109a8(rgyud): na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po su ta mi ni zhes bya ba so so nas yod de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming thos shing phyogs shes par gyur na/ 
109b1(rgyud): gang zag de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / glo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te gang du gnas pa'i gnas der phyogs
109b2(rgyud): bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par gyur na/ gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang / glog gis 'jigs pa med cing / gdon bgegs dang / gnod pa'i sgrib
109b3(rgyud): pa med par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/ tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi ni mi/ 
109b4(rgyud): ni mi wen dra trai lo kya/ lo ki sha ni ro sha la ni/ ha rak+Sha ha/ rak+Sha/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe
109b5(rgyud): ba dang / 'brug dang / glog dang / thog 'bab pa dang / zla bur 'chi bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
109b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ dbus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom
109b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng lha dang / mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongasu bsrungs nas/ 
109b8(rgyud): bde 'thob par bgyi ba dang / mthu chen po'i stobs dang / ldan pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
110a1(rgyud): tshe'i gzungs gang lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+yar+thi ke/ pra ti mai tri/ 
110a2(rgyud): shud d+he muk+te bi ma le/ pra b+hA swa re/ aN+Da ri/ paN+Da ri/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra/ bA si ni/ ha ri/ kaN+Da ri/ ka bi ri/ bing ga la a k+Shi/ da d+hi mu khi/ rak+Sha rak+Sha// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'di
110a3(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'tshe ba nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad bral bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong
110a4(rgyud): zhing / rtag par byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs kyis dgongs shing yongasu bsrungs par gyur
110a5(rgyud): cig swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las langs te/ gus pa/ sa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
110a6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba dang / 'jig rten la brtse ba dang / thams cad yongasu bsrungs nas/ gzi byin
110a7(rgyud): chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du mi 'pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o// de ni gzungs sngags smras pa/ 
110a8(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni mu nin/ d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ ma b+ha/ na ti/ ti pA pa/ badz+ra pA Ni/ a haM tsi ri tsa swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs sngags
110b1(rgyud): 'di ni/ mi 'pham par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par gzung ste/ yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / mi bskyad
110b2(rgyud): cing rjesu dran par bgyid na/ bdag gdugs mtshon du de la yongasu srung bar bgyid pas/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas/ glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar
110b3(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
110b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag la yang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam gra/ ngas kyi gzugs lha dang / mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'ad dgas pa 'jig rten la rab tu rtse ba/ thams cad yongs su
110b5(rgyud): srung bar bgyid pa dang / gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li
110b6(rgyud): d+hi li swA hA/ brah+ma pu re swA hA/ prah+ma sA re swA hA/ brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa sad sid d+ha re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gzungs sngags 'di ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste/ gzungs
110b7(rgyud): 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongasu srung bar bgyid pas/ mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang / sdig pa'i las rnams thag ring du spong zhing / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad kyang yongasu spong bar bgyid do// 
110b8(rgyud): de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang badz+ra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs rig
111a1(rgyud): sngags chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel ba dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ sdug bsngal dang / 
111a2(rgyud): bral nas/ bde ba stsol ba dang mi rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs de bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra Ni ban d+ha ma da Na De/ ma ni ne ti ni gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma tang gi/ 
111a3(rgyud): puk+ka si/ sa ra pra b+he/ hi na ma t+yota ta ma/ uta ta ra Ni/ mo ha ra Ni/ d+hA ra Ni ke/ tsakra bA ke/ sha ba ni/ sha ba ri swA hA// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos dang / lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor dang / lha'i rgyal
111a4(rgyud): po 'phags skyes po dang / lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gcig de car stan las langs te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
111a5(rgyud): 'das bdag cag la yang / sems can thams cad la mi 'dzi gas pa sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongasu bskyabs nas/ bde ba
111a6(rgyud): thob par bgyid pa/ tshe 'phel bar bgyid cing // nad kyi sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te/ gzungs sngags de brjod
111a7(rgyud): par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe/ su puSh+pe/ du ma/ pa ri ha ri/ Ar+ya ba ri sha sid d+he/ shAn+te/ nir muk+te/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ su ru te/ sid d+ha bi te swA hA// de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang
111a8(rgyud): po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po nA ga si dang / klu'i rgyal po klog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa stan las langs te/ gus pas
111b1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs/ glog ma rungs pa'i 'gog par bgyid pa/ 
111b2(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/ lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba thams cad yongasu skyob pa/ gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/ smon pa
111b3(rgyud): rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa/  bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du spong ba/ dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ byang snyoms dang sngags dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po tham
111b4(rgyud): cad yongasu sel bar bgyid pa mchis te/ bdag cag gzu ngas sngags 'di/ bcom ldan 'das la 'bul na/ dgas rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag cag klu'i
111b5(rgyud): ba 'di dang bral nas/ ser sna'i 'dod pa gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhe su gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ser sna'i 'dod/ ba 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar
111b6(rgyud): gyur pas/ bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yongasu bcad par 'tshal lagaso// de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a mr-i te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+ha ye/ pu N+ye bi
111b7(rgyud): d+ya ba te/ sarba pA pa/ pa sha ma na ye swA hA/ a li ye/ ban du/ su baR+Shi ye swA hA// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di g.yar kha nas brjod par bgyid
111b8(rgyud): dam/ yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas/ 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/ klog cing 'don par bgyid dam/ gus par mchod par bgyid na/ 'brug dang / glog dang / thog thog mi
112a1(rgyud): 'bab cing / skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa dang / mya ngan dang / nad dang / glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar chad thams cad thag ring du/ 
112a2(rgyud): spong bar 'gyur/ byang stems dang / mi la gnod bgyid pa'i stag dang / seng ge dang / sbyang ki dang / sbrul gdug pa rnams dang / sbrang ma dang / sbrang ma mchu rings la sogs pas kyang gnos kyi
112a3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ leg so legs so// gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems
112a4(rgyud): can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems la bsams pa'i dngo / sa po rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed/ rgya cher phan 'jos/ nges par byed do// sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma
112a5(rgyud): gtogs te/ khyed cag the tsom ma za cig/ de nas 'khor/ mang po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pa/ ka' stsal pa thos pa dang / rab tu dga' bas mngon par
112a6(rgyud): yid ches par gyur nas/ bka' yang dag par gzung bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le
112a7(rgyud): ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo 'khor mang po stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ 
112a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhig/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par
112b1(rgyud): ston par bgyid na/ bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas/ rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di las// 
112b2(rgyud): tshig 'bru dang / yi ge dang / tshig gi don bskyed pa bzhin mchis na yang / thams cad dran bzhin legs par khong du chud bar bgyis nas/ gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal
112b3(rgyud): bar bgyid do// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas/ yongasu 'dzin par
112b4(rgyud): bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher sbrel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma ma chis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad
112b5(rgyud): shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang / bsam ma ma mchis pa'i shes rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob nas/ bstan bcos sna tshogs sgyu rtsal rnams la rab tu mkhas
112b6(rgyud): pa dang / 'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do// tshe 'di nyid la yang tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i
112b7(rgyud): yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang / sems can gzhan yang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag
112b8(rgyud): gi ched du sman rna sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad par 'tshal te/ des de dag la gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa ci mchis pa dang / dang po btsas pa'i skar
113a1(rgyud): ma dang / phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs/ 
113a2(rgyud): dang 'byang stems dang / dug dang / ngan du bgyis pa dang / sngags dang / ro langs dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang / bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su
113a3(rgyud): bsal nas/ rab tu zhi bar bgyid pas blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ste/ des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ shu dag gi bang dang / 
113a4(rgyud): ni spri ka spos/ gla rtsib bla dag dang shi ri sha/ in+d+ra ha ta da sha ma ka sha mi// thang chu dang ni shing tsha gla sgang dang // a ga ru dang tsan dan ta kar// sa la ki dang gur gum ha la
113a5(rgyud): las/ na tra smig bcud su ki me lha dang // thang shing ba tra dang ni on shi la// sa la kye dang pra ba shu kul dang yungs kar go stong na ga ge sar// sar tsa ra sa ru ta cha
113a6(rgyud): mnyam bgyi// skar ma rgyal la gcig tu btags nas ni// spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te// sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi// sngags pa 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ su
113a7(rgyud): tritre/ kri ke kA mA ta le/ dza na ka ra te/ u ka ra te in+d+ra dza li ni/ shaM ka ra na te/ pA sha tsi li/ a baR+Sha ka/ ka si ke na/ ku du ku du/ kha ka bIr+ye/ kha ka bi le/ ka pa le/ ka pi la ma te/ 
113a8(rgyud): shI la ma ti san d+hi du ra ma tre/ ba bad ka/ b+hai tsi li/ shi ri shi le sa t+ya s+thi te swA hA// gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgyid 'tshal na// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas// 8
113b1(rgyud): tu dben zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi// ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni// steng du me tog kun tu dgram par bgyid// gser
113b2(rgyud): dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag/ ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi sgo bzhi dag tu yang // skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin srung du sprul// gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus
113b3(rgyud): ni rab rgyan nas// so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs// der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs nas ni// dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi// dkyil 'khor de yi ngos bzhi dag tu yang // 
113b4(rgyud): ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi mdzes par bgyi// dkyil la dar nang du mo long gsal ba dang // ral gri rnon po mnga' ba zhi bzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gnong gung
113b5(rgyud): stsal nas// 'dzeg pa'i shing leg 'di yi steng du bzhagasnga ma'i phye ma chab dang sbyar nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi/ nang du bzhag par bgyi// de ltar bkram zhing rnam par bzhag
113b6(rgyud): nas ni// de nas sngags bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi// mtshams bcad pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ a na ra ke na ya ni/ hi li mi li/ khe le/ khi khi le swA hA// de ltar
113b7(rgyud): mtshams ni rab bcad nas// dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig chab sngags te// phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi// de nas spos chab dag la ni// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang
113b8(rgyud): sngags btab ste// ngos bzhir yol bas bskor nas ni// de 'og lus ni bkrus par bgyi// chab dang spos chab la gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa ga tsi bi ga tsi/ bi ga tsa/ ba de swA hA/ 
114a1(rgyud): khrus bgyis lags nas// khrus bgyis pa'i chab dang // dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod pa bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang // btung ba ci mchis pa rtsang po 'am// rdzing gi nang du
114a2(rgyud): dor bar bgyi zhing / gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o// de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te/ sngags mkhan
114a3(rgyud): gyis de dag yid dam rgya chen po slang du stsal nas/ sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing / dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste/ rgyu dang rkyen
114a4(rgyud): des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lags so// yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ sems can gang zhig nad gyi sdug bsngal
114a5(rgyud): nyen// sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa// khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te// gzhan yang mdo sde la di ni klog bton nas// gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mi
114a6(rgyud): g.yeng bar// rtse gcig gus pas dang sems bskyed bgyis nas// nad kyi sdug bsngal bA bA zhi bar 'gyur// dbul 'phongs nor dang ldan par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i gza' skar nyi zla'i lha// mthu
114a7(rgyud): yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// bkra shis rab bde bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ltas ngan gdon bgegs thams cad sel ba bgyi// de'i 'og tu lus bsrung ba'i sngag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
114a8(rgyud): bzla bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sa me/ bi sa me swA hA/ sa ga te/ bi ga te swA hA// bi ga tsa ba te swA hA// sA ga ra/ saM bud d+hA ya swA hA/ skan d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+Da ya swAhA/ a pa
114b1(rgyud): ridzi ta/ bid+ya ya swA hA/ hi ma ban d+hA ya swAhA/ a ni mi la bA ka trA ya swA hA// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma Ne swA hA/ na ma sa ra swa stAM/ mahA de bye swAhA/ sid d+hAn+tu mAM/ man+ta pA da swAhA/ d+ha ra to/ btsi taM/ brah+ma nu ma nor/ 
114b2(rgyud): bi to swA hA// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom/ 
114b3(rgyud): ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig/ mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger bris
114b4(rgyud): nas spel ba dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyi dad na/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 'brog dgon pa la dam/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong
114b5(rgyud): ma'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/ bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i rol mo bgyis/ nas/ de'i thad du mchis te yongasu skyob pa dang / srung bar
114b6(rgyud): bgyis nas/ nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / ltas ngan dang / rims nad dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyid/ rgyal po'i khrims kyis bzung ba dang / rmi lam ngan/ 
114b7(rgyud): pa dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod pa dang / byad stem thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang / nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du
114b8(rgyud): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongasu bzlas nas/ byang chub las bzlog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang / 
115a1(rgyud): lha mo spobs pa chen po la/ lha mo khyod kyis sems can tshad med cing mtha' med pa dag la phan pa dang / bde ba bya ba'i phyir ched du rig sngags de dag dang / spos chus
115a2(rgyud): khrus bya ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad pa leg so legs so// zhes sngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis mdo/ 
115a3(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di bsrungs nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig/ de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das
115a4(rgyud): kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze ke'u di n+ya chos kyi slob dpon gyi sa lung bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs
115a5(rgyud): kyi mthus/ 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa che/ na mo la mngon par bstod pa// shes gsal rab dang / 'a spobs pa'i lha mo khyod// lha mi'i mchod pa dag gis
115a6(rgyud): mchod par 'os// grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas pas na// sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed// ri rtse mthon po gnas mchog dag tu ni// rtsa bsdus khyim byas de na rab tu
115a7(rgyud): gnas// rgyun tu rtsa 'jam 'dud nas gos byas te// rtag par rkang ya cig bkun ste 'greng // lha 'khor mang po thams cad 'dus lhags nas// thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la
115a8(rgyud): bsngags// shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod// tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin par gyis// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen po des gsol ba btab pa mnyan nas/ gzungs sngags
115b1(rgyud): smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ mi rI ts+yai re/ a badze/ u ba dza ba ti/ hing gu le/ ming gu le/ bing ga la ba ti/ ang gu she/ mA ri ts+yai/ sa ma ni/ da sha ma ti/ a gra ti/ ma gri ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa ba tad
115b2(rgyud): r-irishi ri mi ri/ ma nan d+hi/ dam khi/ mA rI ts+yai/ pra NA bIr+ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+Te/ lo ka sheSh+To/ lo kA bI re/ sid d+ha ba ra te/ b+hI ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ na mu tsa
115b3(rgyud): mahA na mu tsi/ ma hA de bye/ pra ti gri ha na ma skA raM/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi/ dra shi hi bud d+hI/ a pra ti ha ta/ b+ha ba tu/ si b+ha me/ bi shu d+ha tsi to/ sha sh+ma sh+le ka/ ma na tra/ bi d+yA ka ka pi/ 
115b4(rgyud): ya di sho/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ hi li mi li/ hi ma hi/ bi tsa to/ bi bud d+hi/ bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+hi bi shud d+hi/ b+ha ga ba t+yaim/ de be yam/ sa ra swa sti/ 
115b5(rgyud): ka ra ti/ kaM yu ra ma ti/ hi mi li mi li/ a b+ha ya mi/ ma hA de be/ bud d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ sang g+ha sats+tshan/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ ba ru Na sa t+ye na/ ye lo kye/ sa t+yas
115b6(rgyud): t+ye na/ de shaM sa t+ye na/ sad d+he bA di tsi na na/ a b+ha ha ma mi/ ma hA de bi/ hi li mi li bi tsa ra to// bdag gi ming brjod/ ma ma bud d+he/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA de be/ sa ra swa t+ya/ sid d+hAn+ta
115b7(rgyud): man+ta pa daM swA hA// de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas/ bram ze de la 'di skad ces kye skyes bu chen po sems can rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang / 
115b8(rgyud): rin po che dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / shes rab yongasu gnyer nas/ thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te/ myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 'dod pa leg so legs so// de ltar shes pa
116a1(rgyud): byas nas/ cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ yang tshig su bcad de smras pa/ thog ma kho nar gzungs 'di kha ton du/ byang zhing nor ba med par
116a2(rgyud): bklags nas ni// byin gyis rlob cing smon pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal
116a3(rgyud): nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag bya// de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhi// rtag par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la// rtse gcig gus pas
116a4(rgyud): gus par phyag byas nas// dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i ga/ nas dag tu// skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga 'ad na// sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu// 
116a5(rgyud): ji tsam 'byor pas mchod pa bsgrub par bya// sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la// byams dang snying rjes pa rtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed// bcom ldan gser sku
116a6(rgyud): shin tu gya nom mtshan// g.yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya// bcom ldan yang dag chos don dgongs mdzad pas// dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god// de yi tshig
116a7(rgyud): gi don ni legs soms la// stong pa nyid bstan rab tu sgom par gyi// bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni// rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na// gya nom ye shes
116a8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dag dang // gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas// gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad// 
116b1(rgyud): ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas// yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par mdzad// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba// rtse gcig dran na sems
116b2(rgyud): la 'jigs med 'thob// bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang // ljags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas// chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsungs mdzad pas// 
116b3(rgyud): dper na na mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra// bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams// dran pa nyer gzhag gzhan med smon rdzogs 'gyur// gal te lha mo spobs chen
116b4(rgyud): mchod mthong ngam// slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthonganas ni// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di blangs sgom byed dam// bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub// gang zhig
116b5(rgyud): ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na// rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya// bsod nams ye shes yon ta na 'phel byed pas// nges par 'grub 'gyur the tsom
116b6(rgyud): yongs ma skyed// nor tshel dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// grags pa gnyer ba grags chen thob par 'gyur// nges 'byung tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas// nges par 'grub 'gyur
116b7(rgyud): the tshom yongs ma skyed// yon tan chad med mtha' yas ji snyed pa// sems la bsams bzhin yong su sdud par byed// gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod nus na// nges par 'grub 'gyur
116b8(rgyud): chom yongs ma bskyed// gtsang ma'i gnas su gos gsar bgos nas ni// dkyil 'khor che chung ji tsam nus par bya// bum pa gtsang ma bzhir ni ro zhim dgang bar bya// me tog pog spos kyi/ 
117a1(rgyud): 'byor mchod par bya// lnga ldi ba ngan dag dang gdugs bres te// byug spos phye ma kun tu khyab rgyan nas// sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na// lha lus mthong
117a2(rgyud): bar 'dod na smon bzhin 'grub// lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags// zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya// gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na// rtse gcig sems kyis zhag dgu dran
117a3(rgyud): par bya// nam gyi cha byad 'on kyang ma mthong na// gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan dag btsal nas ni// lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te// mchod gnas bzlas brjod sems kyis mi btang
117a4(rgyud): zhing // nyin mtshan le lo sems ni mi skyed na// bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs mthar thug med// rnam smin gang 'thob skye dgu sbyin byed na// smon pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
117a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum// yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig par// rab brtson gso la 'debs sems ni mi g.yon// lha yi mig dang gzhan
117a6(rgyud): sems shes thob 'gyur// de nas bram ze ke'u di n+yas de skad ces bstan pa thos pa dang // dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces kye khyed cag lha
117a7(rgyud): dang mi yi 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la/ sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas/ lha mo spobs pa mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa
117a8(rgyud): brjod pa nyon cig ces smras nas tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten dag la dbang phyug thob gyur pa// lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal// deng bdag gtso mo de la bsngags pa yang / 
117b1(rgyud): sngon gyi drang srong ji skad bstan pa bzhin// bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas// sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yod grags dang ldan// ma ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed// rab dpa'
117b2(rgyud): rtag par brtson 'grus chen po spyod// 'thab mo'i g.yul du rtag par rgyun tu rgyal// rab dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed// da ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur// gosu rtag par
117b3(rgyud): ngar tshon sngon po gyon// sdug dang mi sdug byad bzhin kun dang ldan// mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu sdang // spyod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 'das// phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun
117b4(rgyud): yongasu sdud// res 'ga' ri brag zab mo dag na gnas// res 'ga' brag phug rtsang po'i 'gram na gnas// res 'a dga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas// lha mo
117b5(rgyud): phal cher 'di dag kun tu gnas// ri dang nags tshal mi rge da ji snyed pa// rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed// rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan pa ngan byed// dus su mchog tu
117b6(rgyud): rtag par 'jig rten skyong // rtag dang seng ge spyang kis rgyun tu bskor// gnag lug bya la sogs pas rten yang 'cha'// dril chen bsgrags nas sgra ni phyung bas na// byi ta'i ri la sgra ni kun
117b7(rgyud): tu bsgrags// res 'ga' rtse gsum tri shUl thogs byed cing // g.yas g.yon rgyun tu nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin// zla ba nag po'i tshes dgu bcu gcig la// de yi dus su rtag par mchod par
117b8(rgyud): bya// re dga' ba su lha chen sring mor ston// g.yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par snying yang brtse// sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la// lha mo mchog tu gyur pas bzlas pa med// res
118a1(rgyud): 'ga' ba rdzi bu mo dga' mor ston// lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thob// 'jig rten dag na yun ring gnas par byed// rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston pa
118a2(rgyud): byed// bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang // sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs// drang srong nang na rang dbang dag dang ldan// sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nus// lha yi bu
118a3(rgyud): mo la sogs 'dus pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges par der yang 'du// klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshogs kun gyi// gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed// bud med nang na tshangs spyod
118a4(rgyud): mchog dang ldan// tshig byung dper na 'jig rten bdag po 'dra// rgyal po'i gnas na pad+ma dang yang mtshungs// chu po'i 'gram nas gnas tshe gru zab bzhin// byang bzhin sdug
118a5(rgyud): mdzes zla ba nya ba 'dra// mang thos phun tshogs gnas dang ste/ na yang byed// spobs pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra// dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed// lha ma yin la
118a6(rgyud): sogs te lha tshogs rnams// thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed// mig stong brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang // gus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog/ sems can gang zhig
118a7(rgyud): re zhing tshol ba yod// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed// yid myur spobs dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas// sa chen steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni
118a8(rgyud): 'di dag tu// mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed// tha na lha 'dre gcan zan dag la yang // de bas bsams bzhin thams cad rdzogs byed 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra// 
118b1(rgyud): sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas// lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags spangs// 'jig rten bdag po che bzhin bden tshig smra// 'jig rten yum gyi khyad par rgyan rnams dang // 'dod
118b2(rgyud): khams lha yi khang pa kun bltas nas// lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na// sems can mchog tu gyur pa yongs mi snang // gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa gnas dag dang // me dong/ 
118b3(rgyud): lhung ba dag ni mthong gyur tam// chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe// 'jigs pa de dag thams cad sel bar nus// gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings sgrogs sam// gal te sha chags
118b4(rgyud): gsod par byed pa'i tshe// sems ni rtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na// nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar// dge sdig mi kun yongasu skyob pa na// byams dang snying rje'i
118b5(rgyud): brtse ba rtag sngon snang // de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtse gcig/ tu// lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabasu mchi// de nas bram ze des sngags dang // bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshig
118b6(rgyud): gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa// 'jig rten gtso la gus phyag 'tshal// mi rnams nang na kun gyi mchog gyur pas// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod// byang bzhin rab
118b7(rgyud): mdzes kun gyis lta bA mos// yon tan dam pa sna tshogs lus rab rgyan// mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i grags pas rgyas// dper na rin thang / 
118b8(rgyud): med pa'i nor bu mtshungs// deng bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na// sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa// pad+ma lta bur
119a1(rgyud): shin tu rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos// mtshan mar ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed
119a2(rgyud): pas// dran pa kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge gcan zan mchog gyur ltar// rtag par lag pa brgyad kyis bdag nyid rgyan// so sor mnga' gzhu ral gri sta ri dang // tho rings
119a3(rgyud): lcags kyi 'khor lo zhag pa thogs// rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nya ba 'dra// tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed// sems can gang zhig sems la smon yod na// skyes bu dam
119a4(rgyud): pas bsams bzhin rdzogs par byed// brgya byin lha ma dang kun gyis khyod mchod nas// thams cad bsngags pa rjod skyabasu 'gro bar byed// bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan
119a5(rgyud): skyed byed pas// dus rnams kun tu gus pas bskyed par byed/ swA hA/ gal te spobs chen lha mo gsol 'dod na// sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba bzhin/ 
119a6(rgyud): nang par rnam dag sems kyis rtse gcig 'don// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsams bzhin 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze la/ khyod kyis sems can rnams la
119a7(rgyud): phan gdags shing bde ba sbyin pa'i ched du/ lha mo de la sngags pa brjod nas/ byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab pas/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ba legs so// 
119a8(rgyud): zhes bka' stsal to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po brgyad pa// de nas bram ze ko'u de n+yas
119b1(rgyud): gong du bstan pa lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang / sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas/ 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed
119b2(rgyud): cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ snying brtse ba'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba dang / ye shes chen po dang / tshig la shin
119b3(rgyud): tu mkhas pa dang / shes pa rgya chen po 'thob pa dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyi phan tshun lan 'debs pa dang / tshig 'bru'i rgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na/ sems
119b4(rgyud): rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol ba gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i chogs
119b5(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / 'phags pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden tshig mngon
119b6(rgyud): par grub pa/ dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba/ mi slu ba'i tshig gsung ba/ bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung
119b7(rgyud): zhing yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rje su yi rang nas phyag 'tshalo// mi bden pa'i tshig ma gsungs pa'i phyir/ yangs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nyid kyi zhal dang / 'jam
119b8(rgyud): bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi dang / stong dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par
120a1(rgyud): gsogs nas/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung bathams cad rab tu sel bar mdzad ba lus gus pas phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de la bu dang ldan pa thams
120a2(rgyud): cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par smon nas/ sems rtse gcig tu srog phyog so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa
120a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang / zhugs bzhi'i 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshig gis spobs
120a4(rgyud): pa mchog dang / drang srong lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / tsha das 'khor drang srong spobs pa dang / lha chen dbu ma'i spob das pa dam pa dang / skal ldan lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / 
120a5(rgyud): rgyal po mi na sa'i spobs pa mchog dang / yid bzhin lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rab gnas lha'i bu'i spobs pa dam pa dang / rdo rje
120a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po'i spobs pa mchog dang / khyab 'jug lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo b+hi ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang / biSh+Nu lha'i spobs pa dam pa dang / lha mo bzang mo'i spobs pa dam pa
120a7(rgyud): dang / shi ri ma ti'i spobs pa dam pa dang / he ri tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang / ma dang ma chen spobs pa dam pa dang / ha ri ta'i spobs pa dam pa dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dang / 
120a8(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spobs pa gus phyag 'tshal// las mchog ci mnga' thams cad bdag stangs nas// spobs mchog dam pa mtha' med thob par shog/ slub med la gus phyag 'tshal/ 
120b1(rgyud): rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal// 'dod chags spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// 'ching sgrib spangs la gus phyag 'tshal// rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal// 'od dang ldan la gus phyag
120b2(rgyud): 'tshal// bden tshig sgra la gus phyag 'tshal// rdul chags med la gus phyag 'tshal// don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal// 'khor mang bdag la gus phyag 'tshal// spobs pa'i lha la
120b3(rgyud): gus phyag 'tshal// bdag ni tshig la thogs med shog/ bdag gis smos cing gnyer ba'i dngos// thams cad myur du grub par shog/ nad med rtag tu rab bde zhing // tshe ring lo nur 'thob/ 
120b4(rgyud): par shog/ rig sngags kun la rab mkhas shing // nan tan byang chub lam bsgoms nas// skye dgu rgya cher phan btags te// bsam pa myur du 'grub par smon// bdag
120b5(rgyud): gis bden tshig smras pa dang // bdag gi slu ba med smras pa// lha mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa// bdag la gru kha par mdzad du gsol// lha mo khyod ni 'dir gshegs te/ 
120b6(rgyud): tshig thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du// bdag lus khar ni myur zhugs nas// yid myur spobs dang ldan par mdzod// bdag gi lce yi dbang po yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs thob
120b7(rgyud): pas// tshig de'i mthu stobs dbang gis ni// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar shog/ bdag ni tshig dag smras pa'i tshe// don ni ci bzhin grub gyur cing // thos pa dag ni gus bskyed nas// / 
120b8(rgyud): byas pa chud gson ma gyur cig/ bdag gis spobs pa gnyer ba yi// dngos po gal te ma grub na// lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa// thams cad rdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// bdag gis mtshan
121a1(rgyud): med sdig byas pa// sangs rgyas gdung gis 'dul bar 'gyur// de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang // drin pazo'i tshig ni ji snyed dang // sha ri'i bu dang mo'as
121a2(rgyud): bu// bcom ldan 'khor mang mchog gyur pa// 'di la sogs pa'i bden tshig rnams// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor// thams cad 'dir
121a3(rgyud): ni spyan 'dren na// thams cad myur du 'dir gshegs te// bdag gi smon pa rdzogs mdzad smon// yang dag bden tshig gang gnyer ba// thams cad bdag la 'grub par shog/ gong du
121a4(rgyud): 'og min lha man chad// gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha dag/ dang // tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang // tshangs dpa'i rgyal po 'khor rnams dang // stong gsum 'jig rten
121a5(rgyud): kun khyab dang // mi mjed 'jig rten bdag po dang / 'khor ni mang po thams cad kun// deng bdag thams cad spyan 'dren na// byams dang thugs rje rab bskyed de/ 
121a6(rgyud): thams cad brtse bas gzung du gsol// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga'i lha ni de dag dang // dga' ldan pa yi lha tshogs dang // byams pa mngon par rdzogs
121a7(rgyud): 'gyur dang // 'thab bral ba yi lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha dag dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha tshogs dang // lha mang 'khor ni thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha rnams dang // ri
121a8(rgyud): rab brten nas gnas pa dang // mtsho bdun ri yi lha tshogs rnams// 'khor ni mang po bcas pa dang // nor rgyas dang ni mgo lnga dang // nyi zla gza' skar lha dag dang // 'di la sogs
121b1(rgyud): pa'i lha mang po// 'jig rten bde bar byed pas na// 'di las sogs pa'i lha mang po// sdig pa'i las ni byed mi mos// sangs rgyas gus pa 'phrog ma dang // de yi bu sdug tha chungs dang / 
121b2(rgyud): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang ni lha ma yin// mi 'am ci'i 'khor rnams dang // lto phye chen po la sogs pa// bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stobs kyis// de dag thams cad spyan
121b3(rgyud): 'dren na// byams dang snying rje'i sems bskyed nas// bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol// lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams las// gzhan gyi sems ni rig gyur pa// thams cad byin
121b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs pas ni// bdag la dam pa dam pa stso// / na mkha'i khams ni mthar thug dang // chos kyi da dbyings kyis klas pa na// sems can rnam pa ji snyed pas// 
121b5(rgyud): bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol// de nas lha mo spob sa pa chen mos de skad gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang bram ze de la 'di skad ces smraso// kye skyes bu chen po
121b6(rgyud): legs so// skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la zhig sngags de dang / sngags kyi mngon par bstod pa de dag la brten nas/ sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du chos yang dag par blangs te/ 
121b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gus pas skyabasu 'gro zhing // sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed na/ ci dang ci bsgrubs pa thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gser 'od dam
121b8(rgyud): pa'i shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par bzung ste/ klog cing 'don par byed na/ smon pa thams cad 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems/ 
122a1(rgyud): rtse gcig tu ma byas pa de ma gtog so// de'i tshe bram ze de shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ thal mo sbyar spyi bos yang dag par blangs par
122a2(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di rgya cher spel nas/ mdo sde yang dag par 'dzin pa
122a3(rgyud): dag la yongasu skyob pa dang / yongasu srung bar byas pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i ched du chos de lta bu bstan na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa
122a4(rgyud): byin te/ bsod nams tshad med pa thob par gyur pa dang / sems bskyed pa rnams myur du byang chub las gzhol dbar byas pa leg so leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu
122a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/ bcom
122a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
122a7(rgyud): bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par
122a8(rgyud): bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas bkur sti dang / mchod par bgyid do// chos smra ba de dag la 'di lta ste/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos
122b1(rgyud): dang / mal cha dang / gsos sman dang / g.yo byad ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te/ brel zhing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i
122b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te/ yid la bsams shing yongasu btsal nas/ bde bar gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du brgya stong tshad ma
122b3(rgyud): mchis pa snyed pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag tu thos par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed du lha dang
122b4(rgyud): mi'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur lags so// rtag par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa gta na du sel bar gyur pas/ skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong
122b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'jal bar 'gyur/ slang ma'i dus kyi tshe myur du byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur bas/ ngan 'gro
122b6(rgyud): gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon dran lags te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
122b7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba/ mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ bdag
122b8(rgyud): de las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang / thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyi mthus brtse bar dgongs par gyur pa'i slad du deng bdag gang du bsams pa'i gnas de
123a1(rgyud): dang / gang du ltas pa'i phyogs de dang / gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang / de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chang ma mchis pa snyed shin tu bde ba'i longs
123a2(rgyud): spyod myong zhing / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byi ru dang / 'gron bu dang / mu ti
123a3(rgyud): lo sogs pa rin po che ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur lagaso// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po
123a4(rgyud): 'di 'don pa 'dis gdugs re bzhin du spos sna tshogs pa sregs nas/ me tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
123a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho de/ la mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gdugs cig
123a6(rgyud): bzhin du dus gsum du bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjesu dran par bgyis nas/ logs shig tu spos dang / me tog dang / zas mchog rnams kyis bdag mchod cing // rtag par mdo
123a7(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lag so// de nas tshig su bcad de gsol ba// 'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad// bdag
123a8(rgyud): dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun dang bral// gos zas ci 'tshal 'phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur// gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'// sa yi ro yang rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// 
123b1(rgyud): rnams dus bzhin char ni rab tu 'bebs// lha 'khor de dag rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis// nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing / 
123b2(rgyud): 'bru rnams thams cad yongasu smin par bgyid// rin chen nor tshol bsam pa rdzogs 'gyur zhing // ci dang ci smon bsam bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha/ 
123b3(rgyud): mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'di ltar mngon gyi rgyud rjesu dran nas/ drin rjesu gsang ba'i phyir/ mchod pa byas pa dang / mtha' yas sems can rnams la phan gdags shing / bde/ 
123b4(rgyud): par bya ba'i ched du mdo sde 'di yongasu spel nas/ yon tan tha dang mi shes par byas pa legaso leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las
123b5(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la dpal gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
123b6(rgyud): byang phyogs na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ grong khyer de las mi ring ba na/ me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga' ra ba
123b7(rgyud): mchis pa de na/ gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin po che sna bdun las mngon par 'grub pa zhig mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas/ gang la la zhig
123b8(rgyud): 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du 'phel ba dang / bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing 'tshal bas/ gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed de/ khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis nas/ ba lang gi lci/ 
124a1(rgyud): pas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te/ bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas/ khrus legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos
124a2(rgyud): nas/ byug pa dam pas byugs te/ khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs nas/ bdag gi ched du gdugs re dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang mdo sde 'di'i mtshan brjod par sems bskyed de/ 
124a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo chen po che me tog snang ba dpal gyi ri yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshalo zhes brjod nas me tog dang spos rnams thogs te/ zhal zas bda' ba sna
124a4(rgyud): chogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o// gzhan ya dang spos dang / me tog dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o// 
124a5(rgyud): gzhan yang bza' ba dang / btung ba dag thogs te/ phyo/ sa gzhan du gtor nas/ 'dre srin rnams la stsal pa/ ra bgyi'o// yang dag pa'i bden pa'i bden tshig gis dpal
124a6(rgyud): gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas/ ci dang ci gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du brdzun ma lags na/ gsol ba btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad
124a7(rgyud): du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas/ brtse ba'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur bas/ de'i khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// 
124a8(rgyud): de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar bgyis te/ sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de/ sem rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o// 
124b1(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud can la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal/ 
124b2(rgyud): zug gas yu gse brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la/ 
124b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
124b4(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas che dpag med la phyag 'an lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra la phyag
124b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la/ phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod
124b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa shums la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la
124b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// de ltar sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pas phyag bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sngags bzlas te/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid
124b8(rgyud): nas sngags 'di'iri ma thus yong su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ dpal gyi lha ma chen mo la phyag 'tsha'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ ta thA/ 
125a1(rgyud): prA ti prad+hA Na re/ sa man+ta/ dan+da ni/ ma hA bi tA ra gA ti/ sa man+te/ pi ta ma ma ni/ mahAkA ra ma/ pa ti/ bi sh+ma ba ni/ sarba ar+tha sa man+ta ru/ pra b+hU re/ a yan/ 
125a2(rgyud): d+haR+Sha ta/ ma hA b+ho ge na/ ma hA mai tri/ u pa sing ha te/ mahAkle sha/ su sang gri hi te/ sa mAR+Sha/ a nu pA la ni swAhA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs
125a3(rgyud): su bzung nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ bdag g.yar 'dren pa thos nas de'i thad du mchis te/ smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dbang bskur
125a4(rgyud): ba'i cho ga'i tshig/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i dag/ yang dag pa'i tshig bslub ma mchis pa'i tshe dag/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa sems can rnams kyi yang dag
125a5(rgyud): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas gang la la zhig sdugs 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing / klog pa dang / 'don pa des gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag brgyad
125a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sngar so shing bcas te/ dag par bkrus nas/ slad snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ spos dang / me tog dag gis sangs rgyas
125a7(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te bdag nyid kyi dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yongasu bsngo zhing smon lam gdab
125a8(rgyud): par bya'o// khang pa cig gtsang mar bgyis pa 'am/ yang na dben pa'i gnas sam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas/ tsan dan
125b1(rgyud): bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o// stan mchog gcig bting ste/ ba dan dang gdugs brdzun par bgyi'o// me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste/ sems rtse gci/ 
125b2(rgyud): tu sngags snga ma bzlas nas/ bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o// bdag de'i tshe de la rjesu sems shing lta bar bgyis pas/ de'i khang par zhugs te sman la mchis nas/ 
125b3(rgyud): mchod pa yin par bgyis te/ de slan chad mi nges g.yar lam bdag mthong bar 'gyur bas/ ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gi sgo nas go bar bgyid do// 
125b4(rgyud): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ 'brog dgon pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang rung ste/ ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pas/ gser
125b5(rgyud): dang / dngul dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / ba glang dang / lug dang / 'bru rnams dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos rnams yid bzhin du 'thob par
125b6(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / bde ba'i longs spyod mchog la yongasu longs spyod par 'gyur lag so// de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang / skal pa mchog gang lags
125b7(rgyud): pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la yang stsal bar bgyi'o// chos kyi 'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas/ bza' ba dang / btung ba rnams sbyar te/ spos dang / 
125b8(rgyud): me tog gcal du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o// mchod par bgyis nas/ mchod par bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa btsongs te/ rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyis na
126a1(rgyud): bdag nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu der gnas nas/ gang zag de la bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang / smon pa rnams yid bzhin
126a2(rgyud): du 'grub par bgyid do// dus dus su dbul phongs pa rnams la yang stsal bar bgyi zhing bdag gcig pu'i ched du ser snas phangs par mi bgyi'o// rtag par mdo sde'i 'di lhags nas rgyun
126a3(rgyud): chad pa ma mchis par mchod par bgyi ste/ bsod nams ci mchis pa de yang thams cad la yang btang zhing / byang chub tu yongasu bsngos nas/ 'khor ba la nges par 'byung zhing / myur du
126a4(rgyud): rnam par grol ba 'thob par 'gyur bar smon par bgyi'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo khyod kyi ngas de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas/ bdag dang gzhan
126a5(rgyud): gnyis ka la phan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas pa leg/ so leg so// zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal
126a6(rgyud): po las/ dpal gyi lha mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas sa'i lha mo bstan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ 
126a7(rgyud): gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/ 
126a8(rgyud): slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ gal te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ ri 'am phug gam/ nags tshal dag na yang rung ste/ 
126b1(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / yongasu srung ba dang / yongasu sgrub par bgyis te/ rgya cher sbrel bar bgyid
126b2(rgyud): ngos phyogs gang yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i mkhan po'i ched du khri mthon po btsugs te/ mdo sde 'di 'chang bar byed na/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas/ 
126b3(rgyud): der mchis te de'i rkang pa nas spyi bos 'debs par bgyid de/ bdag chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu dga' bar bgyid do// chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin
126b4(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur bas/ mgu ba tshad ma mchis pa thob pa dar 'gyur te/ bdag de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyi das/ sa chen po 'di yang dpag tshad brgya phrag brgya brgyad cu rdo
126b5(rgyud): rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i bcud thams cadang rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do// rgya mtsho bzhi tshun cha da kyis chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing rab tu
126b6(rgyud): gshin pas sngon kyang lhag pa dang / ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyid do// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / ljon shing dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / me tog
126b7(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchi ba de dag kyang dbyibs mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang / mang po kun gyis lta bar mos pa dang / 
126b8(rgyud): kha dog dang / dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod du rung bar bgyid de/ sems can gang gis bza' ba dang / btung ba mchog de lta bu de dag la longs spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang / 
127a1(rgyud): stobs dang ldan pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang / bro nang rnams mchis pa dang / sems kyi shes rab dpa' ning ci yang rtsol rngo thogs par
127a2(rgyud): 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongasu spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya stong ji snyed pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des
127a3(rgyud): na 'dzam+bu'i gling rnams rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang / mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa dang / gnod pa rnams ma mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur
127a4(rgyud): lags so// de ltar lus dang sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang / mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus dpa bskyed nas/ gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ thams cad
127a5(rgyud): kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi zhing sngags brjod par smon par bgyi'o// gzhan yang chos 'chad pa'i 'khan po chen po de dag gang du
127a6(rgyud): chos 'chad pa'i gnas der yang mchis te/ sems can rnams kyi ched du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di'i 'chad par gsol ba gdab par bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
127a7(rgyud): mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing / 'od dang / kha dog dang / mthu stobs dang / dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / 
127a8(rgyud): byang bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon pas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo brtan ma yang chos kyi ros tshim par gyur pa'i dbang gis 'dzam+bu'i gling / 
127b1(rgyud): dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang / sngags bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar bgyid lag so// de lta bas na/ bcom ldan
127b2(rgyud): 'das de'i tshe sems can de dag gis kyang bdag gi drin gsab pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gdon mi za bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas/ bkur sti dang / rim gro dang / mchod pa dang / bla mar
127b3(rgyud): bgyis nas/ sngags pa brjod par bgyi'o snyam du bsam par bgyi'o// de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khang khyim dang / 
127b4(rgyud): dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchi das te/ chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas/ mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// mdo sde
127b5(rgyud): 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi gan su mchis te/ ra ba tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du bdag cag deng shin tu zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa
127b6(rgyud): thos nas/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed yongasu bsdus par gyur to// mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad
127b7(rgyud): ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa'i snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to// ma 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar du yang
127b8(rgyud): rtag par mtho ris dang / mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba mchog myong bar 'gyu ro zhes brjod par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang gi gan su mchis nas skye bo mang po rnams la
128a1(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe cig tsam mamaka le'u cig tsam mam/ sngon gyi gtam rgyung gcig tsam mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig gi mtshan/ 
128a2(rgyud): tsam byang chub sems dpa' cig gi ming tsam/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam/ yang na tshig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par bgyid dam/ tha na mdo sde
128a3(rgyud): 'dodi'i mtshan tsam zhig brjod par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing / gzhan pas lhag par 'gyur ba dang
128a4(rgyud): sa chen po las skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cheru rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro// 
128a5(rgyud): rin po che dang nor mang bar 'gyur/ sbyin pa legs par ga/ tong bar 'gyur/ rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon ma cho ga gsum la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur
128a6(rgyud): lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal
128a7(rgyud): ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na yang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang / lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang la la zhig/ 
128a8(rgyud): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// khang khyim dag rab tu rgyan nas bla re gcig 'dre bar byed dam/ ba dan rim gcig tsam sbyor bar byed na/ rgyu de dang rkyen des lha'i ris drug po dag
128b1(rgyud): tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/ so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun
128b2(rgyud): lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
128b3(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas/ chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na/ 
128b4(rgyud): bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongasu srung zhing bskyab dpar bgyid na/ rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis na das/ chos kyi stan drung du mchis te/ de'i rkang pa nas
128b5(rgyud): 'degs par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ni/ sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pas na/ 'dzam+bu'i gling
128b6(rgyud): 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lag so// sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid de dag slang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed
128b7(rgyud): kyi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba chog la longs spyod par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
128b8(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
129a1(rgyud): 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / 'khor bzhi pa
129a2(rgyud): ngag las gang la la zhig bdag gi lus yang dag par mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/ sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongasu 'dzin par byed na/ ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du
129a3(rgyud): 'grub par bgyid do// nor dang rin po che'i gter dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring ba'i sman dam pa gnyer ba dang / sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par
129a4(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// / lus bkrus te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas
129a5(rgyud): bting ba'i steng du mchis te/ ring bsrel dang / sku gzug sa kyi spyan sngar ram/ yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa/ 'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dug pa bsregs te/ me tog
129a6(rgyud): gtor nas bza' ba dang / btung ba dag gis mchod pa bgyis te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na/ g.yar 'dren pa'i sngags 'di bzla bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ 
129a7(rgyud): tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ku Tu ku Tu to Tu to Tu bA ha bA ha/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa
129a8(rgyud): brgyad bzlas nas/ bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyis na/ bdag gis de'i ched du g.yar 'dren pa der mchi bar 'gyur lag so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig
129b1(rgyud): bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyi bar 'tshal na yang snga ma bzhin du cho ga bshams nas/ gzungs 'di bzlas par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ aM tsa ne/ 
129b2(rgyud): lig k+Shan ti/ shi ra shi d+ha ri/ ha ha hi hi/ ku ru b+ha re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags snga ma yang 'don par bgyid na/ 
129b3(rgyud): bdag gdon mi 'tshal bar lus mngon du bstan nas/ des ji ltar smon pa thams cad/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pas/ nams kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid do// gal te sngags 'di 'don
129b4(rgyud): par 'tshal na/ sngar lus srung ba'i sngags 'di gdon pa/ ra bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ni shi ri/ ma sha ka ni/ na ti ku ti/ bud d+hi bud d+hi ri/ bi ti bi ti/ ku ku ti/ ba tsi ri swA hA/ 
129b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs nas/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings nas/ sman
129b6(rgyud): chad lus srung bar bgyis pas/ 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par byed na/ bsams pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par
129b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bdag sho ba mi mchi ste/ bdag gi dbang du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog bzhugs pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur lag so// de nas bcom ldan
129b8(rgyud): 'das kyis sa'i lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang / chos smra ba dag la yongasu srung bar byas pa legaso leg so// rgyu dang / 
130a1(rgyud): rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyeng thob par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ sa'i
130a2(rgyud): lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu
130a3(rgyud): 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo
130a4(rgyud): sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam pa dar rgyal ba/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/ slang
130a5(rgyud): ma'i dus kyi che grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ nags tshal lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dge 'dun
130a6(rgyud): gnas pa'i gnas dag tu yang rung ste/ yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi
130a7(rgyud): shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis nas/ so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang / chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag la yongasu bsrungs
130a8(rgyud): nas gnod pa rnams spangs te/ rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa
130b1(rgyud): gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid par bgyid dam/ tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid ngam/ mdo sde 'di
130b2(rgyud): las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/ byang chub sems dpa' cig ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas/ gus par rim gro dang / mchod par bgyid na/ 
130b3(rgyud): bdag gis yongasu srung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas/ gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te/ sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag gi ming yang
130b4(rgyud): ngag shes zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lag ngas te/ bdag gi chos rig pa dang / bdag gi chos thams
130b5(rgyud): cad kyi ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad rnam pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / bye bra ga ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags te/ 
130b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par
130b7(rgyud): dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang / bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs
130b8(rgyud): par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig/ yang dag par gsal bar rtogs/ yang dag por khong du chud/ yang dag par so/ 
131a1(rgyud): sor rtogs par bgying bas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te/ don de'i slad du
131a2(rgyud): bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang mdangs spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug dang / lus kyi mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi byin dang / 
131a3(rgyud): ldan zhing dpa' ba dang / dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thad phun sum tshogs pa dang / yang dag par dran pa thob nas dpa' gong ma mchis pa dang / de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing /
