131a4(rgyud): nyams pa ma mchis pa dang / dbang po rnams bde zhing rtag pa dar dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o// rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i
131a5(rgyud): rtsa ba bskyed nas/ bsod nams kyi las mngon par sgrub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam+bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas/ myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ sems can de
131a6(rgyud): ngag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur zhing / slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ yang
131a7(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i lha dang / mi'i bde ba myong ba dang / rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
131a8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// 
131b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs mchis te/ sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse
131b2(rgyud): ba'i slad du deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis bshad par bgyi'o// de nas sngags smras pa/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ na mo brah+mA ya/ na ma sh+tsa turma hA
131b3(rgyud): dz+nyA nA/ tad+ya b+hU/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi l-i/ gau ri ma hA go ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma hA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi Shi/ mahA dr-i mi ra~M/ daN+Da khu gun+te ha ha he ha ha/ hi ha hi hi hi/ ho ha haha ho/ ha lo d+ha mai/ gu d+ha me/ #
131b4(rgyud): rtsi tsa tsi tsi/ tsu tsu tsu tsu/ daN+De shwa ra/ shi kha ra shi kha8/ at+tiSh+TAM he b+ha gA bAn/ saM bid dz+nyA ya swA hA// ga la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag gis
131b5(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rin po/ che ngo mtshar ba dag gi rim gro bgyid do// gal te skyes pa
131b6(rgyud): dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / rgyan phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongasu gnyer bar bgyid na yang / bdag gi thams cad sbyar nas/ ji ltar
131b7(rgyud): smon pa bzhin du rgud cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do// rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe/ bdag myur du de'i thad du mchis nas/ thogs pa ma mchis
131b8(rgyud): par/ yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do// sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe/ cho ga rig par bgyis nas/ thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzugs 'phang du chag bzhi lnga tsam
132a1(rgyud): mchis pa/ sug par dgra sta thogs pa ri mor bri bar bya'o// gzugs brnyan de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ bum pa bzhi sbrang
132a2(rgyud): rtsi'i chab bam bu ram gyi chab kyis bkang ste bzhag nas/ byug spos dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor
132a3(rgyud): gyi mdun du thab gcig bgyis te/ de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas/ mar dang yungs kar bsregs te/ snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sngags lan re zhing
132a4(rgyud): lan cig bsregs na/ bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon na po rang nyid drung du mchis nas/ lus mngon du bstan te/ sngags 'don pa'i mi de la khyed ci dang ci dgos
132a5(rgyud): pa dang / yid la ci 'dod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa smos shig ces 'dri bar bgyid do// bdag gis ji skad ma/ chi ba bzhin yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams
132a6(rgyud): cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// gal te gser dang / dngul dang / gter 'tshal bar gyur tam/ yang na lha'i drang srong du gyur pas/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/ lha'i
132a7(rgyud): mig gis mngon par shes pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'tshal ba dang / sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du rang dbang thob nas/ nyon mongs pa bcad de/ myur du rnam par grol ba
132a8(rgyud): thob pa la dgod par 'tshal na sang / thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsal pa/ khyod
132b1(rgyud): kyis 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ rig sngags 'di bshad de/ yang dag pa'i chos yongasu bsrungs nas/ bsod nams kyis mtha' yas pa rnams la phan
132b2(rgyud): btags pa leg so leg so// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// 
132b3(rgyud): de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ gus par thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das
132b4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yul na/ dmas su mi'i rgyal po bgyid pa la gal te yang dag pa'i da chos ma mchis par gyur na/ yul skyong zhing skye bo mang po
132b5(rgyud): rnams kyang gso ba'i rngo mi thog la/ bdag nyid kyang yun ri/ nga du khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal ba thams cad la ga/ nas par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa dang / 
132b6(rgyud): thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bdag la rgyal chos yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa'i don gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas mi'i rgyal po rnams
132b7(rgyud): chos 'di thos pa'i dbang gis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang / khyad par 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs gtan du bde zhing zhi ba dang / 
132b8(rgyud): yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la yang sman par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du sa'i lha mo brtan ma la bka' stsal pa/ khyod legs
133a1(rgyud): par nyon cig/ sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ngo // rgyal po de la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod do// 
133a2(rgyud): spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon par de nas rgyal po yab kyis mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lha'i bdag po rten
133a3(rgyud): ngag ces bya ba yo da de/ ngas sngon spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas/ yul gyi bdag po byas pa'i che/ nga'i yab shes pa'i tog gi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas nga la rgyal po'i chos
133a4(rgyud): lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas ngas bstan bcos 'di la brten nas/ lo nyi khri'i bar du yu ral legs par bskyangs te/ ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi
133a5(rgyud): bar du yang chos ma yin pa spyad par bya'o// snyam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo // deng khyod kyang de bzhin du tsho// sa ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig/ ci'i phyir
133a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos shes bya zhe na/ khyed deng legs par nyon cig dang / khyod la deng legs par bstan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso
133a7(rgyud): bo'i tog gis rgyal bu de la tshig su bcad bgya nom pa dag gis yang dag pa'i bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa/ ngas ni sems can bde bya dang // 'jig rten the tsom bcad pa dang // nyes
133a8(rgyud): dmigs mang po gsal ba'i phyir// rgyal khrims bstan bcos bshad par bya// lha yi bdag po thams cad dang // mi yi rgyal po gang yin pa// dga' ba'i sems ni rab bskyed la/ 
133b1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas ngas bshad nyon// sngon byung lha 'khor mang po rnams// rdo rje ril 'dus pa na// rgyal bzhi stan las langs nas ni// tshangs chen la ni 'di skad nus// tshangs bdag mchog tu/ 
133b2(rgyud): gtser gyur cing // lha yi nang na dbang phyug che// bdag cag la ni brtser dgongs nas// the tsom rnams ni bcang du gsol// ji ltar mi yi 'jig rten skyes// rgyal po zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// 
133b3(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyu rkyen gang gi slad// lha yi bu zhes bgyi bar gyur// ji ltar mir ni skyes pa la// gcig pu mi yi bdag po 'thob// ji ltar mtho ris gnas dag tu// lha yi rgyal po bgyid par
133b4(rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten skyong dag gis// tshangs rgya dal de la zhus pa dang // de tshe tshangs pa'i bdag po yis// de dag la ni 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong khyod shes
133b5(rgyud): bar byos// sems can la ni phan bya'i phyir// nga la wu la skyong chos dris pas// ngas bshang khyed kyis legs bar nyon// sngon gyi las kyi mthu yis ni// lhar skyes rgyas
133b6(rgyud): por gyur pa yin// gal te mi nang gnas gyur nas// dbang sdud mi yi bdag po byed// lha rnams lhan cig byin rlabs nas// de 'og ma yi mngal du 'jug/ ma yi mngal na gnas
133b7(rgyud): pa na// lha rnams kyis ni srung bar byed// mi yi 'jig rten skyes gyur kyang // gtso mchog gyur phyir lha zhes bya// lha rnams kyis ni bsrungs pas nas// lha yi bu zhes brjod pa yin// 
133b8(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po yis// stobs dgos mi'i rgyal gtong bar byed// lha ni mang po thams cad kyis// rang dbang stobs ni rab bstangs nas// chos min kun ni rab bsal te// 
134a1(rgyud): sdig pa'i las ni bskyed mi byed// sems can dge ba sgrub bskul nas// mtho ris gnas su skye bar byed// mi dang lha min 'khor dag dang // dri za dang ni srin
134a2(rgyud): po dang // gdol pa la sogs thams cad kyis// stobs kyi phyed ni gtong bar byed// pha mas stobs phyed bstangs nas ni// sdig spong dge ba sgrub la 'dzud// lha rnams lhan cig rab
134a3(rgyud): bsrungs nas// dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed// dge sdig las ni byas gyur na// da ltar tshe 'di nyid la ni// lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas// dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed// 
134a4(rgyud): yul mis sdig pa'i las byas la// rgyal spangs nan thur mi byed na// 'di ni yang dag rigs pa min// cho sa bzhin chad pas bcad par bya// gal te nyes mthong mi
134a5(rgyud): 'gog na// chos min rab tu 'phel 'gyur bas// rgyal po de yi yul khams su// g.yo sgyu mang du 'a/ phel bar 'gyur// rgyal pos nyes byed mthong gyur la/ 
134a6(rgyud): gal te bzlog par mi byed na// sum cu rtsa gsum lha 'khor rnams// thams cad khong khro'i sems skye 'gyur// rgyu des rgyal khrims nyams 'gyur zhing // g.yo sgyu 'jig rten 'phel
134a7(rgyud): 'gyur bas// pha rol dgra 'khor dag gis ni// yul de bcom nas 'jig par byed// gnas pa'i khyim dang yo byad dang // nor bsags thams cad stong par 'gyur// g.yo sgyus
134a8(rgyud): tshogs skyes pa na// phan tshun cig la cig kyang 'phrog/ yang dag chos kyis rgyal thob kyang // chos bzhin du ni mi spyod pas// yul mi thams cad mthor 'gyur te// glang pos pad+ma'i/ 
134b1(rgyud): rdzing rdzis 'dra// rlung drag ldang la dus kyang med// mi 'phrod char ni dus min 'bab// rgyu skar ltas ngan mang po ston// nyi zla gcan zan 'od kyang med// rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs
134b2(rgyud): pas// 'bru rnams me tog 'bras bu dang // lo thog thams cad mi smin cing // yul na mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal po yang dag chos spangs nas// sdig chos mi ni sten byed na// gzhal
134b3(rgyud): med khang gnas lha rnams kyis// mthong nas mya ngan skye bar 'gyur// lha rgyal 'khor bcas de dag gis// 'di skad du ni smra bar 'gyur// rgyal 'dis chos min rab spyad nas// sdig
134b4(rgyud): pa'i grogs po bsten pas na// rgyal srid yun ring brtan mi 'gyur// lha rnams thams cad rab mi dga'// de dag khros par gyur pa'i phyir// yul de 'jig par 'gyur
134b5(rgyud): zhes zer// chos min mi ni rab brten nas// 'thab rtso/ da g.yo sgyu mang por 'gyur// rims nang sdug bsngal mang po skye// lha yi bdag po srung mi byed// lha gzhan tham
134b6(rgyud): cad spong bar byed// de yi yul ni rang zhig nas// rgyal po sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// pha ma chung ma bu rnams dang // phu nu dang ni sring mo rnams// cig char sdug dang bral 'gyur zhing // 
134b7(rgyud): tha mar bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// ltas ngan skar mda' dag kyang ltung // nyi ma gnyis ni cig char 'char// pha rol dgra ni nyer 'ongs nas// yul mi 'chi dang 'khrug phrad 'gyur// 
134b8(rgyud): yul bkur blon po chen po rnams// nyes med glo bur 'chi bar 'gyur// glang po rta sogs gces pa rnams// thams cad 'thor zhing stor bar 'gyur// yul yul kun tu dgra yod
135a1(rgyud): bas mi ni phal cher dus min 'chi// 'dre srin ma rungs yul zhugs pas// rims nang kun tu 'phel bar 'gyur// yul gyi blon po chen po dang / 
135a2(rgyud): phan mang po thams cad kun// sems ni g.yo rgyu bcas pas na// thams cad chos min spyod par 'gyur// chos min spyod pa mthong gyur na// snying du sdug cing bkur bar byed// dge chos
135a3(rgyud): spyod pa'i mi dag la// sdug bsngal nyon mongs chad pas gcod// ma rungs byams shing bkur ba dang // dge ba chang pa bcad pa'i phyir// gza' skar rlung dang char pa rnams// thams cad
135a4(rgyud): dus su rgyu mi 'gyur// nyes dmigs rnams gsum skye 'gyur bas// yang dag chos ni nub 'gyur zhing // sems can kha dog 'od mi ldan// sa yi bcud ni thur du
135a5(rgyud): 'bab// sdig bkur dge la brnyas pas na// gzhan ya/ nga nyes dmigs rnam gsum 'byung // dus minas/ da dang ser ba 'bab// mu ge'i sdug bsngal kun tu khyab// 
135a6(rgyud): lo thog 'bras bu mang po rnams// thams cad ro zhim nyams par 'gyur// de dag gi ni yul khams na// sems ca na phal cher na bar 'gyur// de yi yul na ljon shing rnams// 
135a7(rgyud): sngon chad 'bras bu zhim chags pa// de yi dbang gis nyams 'gyur bas// kha rtsub ro mchog med par 'gyur// sngon gyi kun dga' nags tshal mchog/ snying du sdug cing brtse ba'i
135a8(rgyud): gnas// thams cad bskams shing rnyis par 'gyur// mthong ba kun gyis mya ngan skye// sa lu nas dang lo tog rnams// ro nim khad kyis med 'gyur bas// gza' che sems
135b1(rgyud): kyang mi dga' na// 'byung chen 'phel byed ga la nus// sems can kha dog 'od nyams shing // mthu stobs zad cing nyams par 'gyur// kha zas mang du zos kyang ni// 'drangs pa nyid
135b2(rgyud): du yong mi 'gyur// yul khams de na yod pa yi// sems can rnams la ji snyed pa// stobs chung dpa' shor med pas na// bya ba dag ni byed mi nus// yul mi phal cher nad thebs
135b3(rgyud): pas// sdug bsngal sna tshogs lus gzir 'gyur// 'dre srin kun tu khyab pas na// thams cad kun tu srin por skye// rgyal pos chos min rab spyad pas// mi dge 'a grogs po
135b4(rgyud): rten pas na// 'jig rten rnam pa gsum po kun// de das na gnod pa sna tshogs myong // de 'dra'i nyes da dmigs mtha' med pas// yul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba
135b5(rgyud): yang // sdig can mi ni mthong gyur kyang // yal bor ma bskrad pa las gyur// lha rnams kun gyis byin rlabs nas// yul gyi rgyal po byas gyur kyang / 
135b6(rgyud): yang dag dam pa'i chos dag gis// yul khams yongasu srung mi byed// gang zhig dge sbyong 'grub byed na// rtag tu mtho ris gnas su skye// gal te sdig pa'i las byas pa/ 
135b7(rgyud): tshe 'phos nges par ngan 'gror ltung // gal te rgyal pos yul mi rnams// thal rangs nyes pa byed 'jug na// sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs rnams// thams cad rab gdungs
135b8(rgyud): sems skye 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni pha ma yi// bstan dag bzhin du mi byed pa// 'di ni chos min mi yin pas// rgyal po'i sri zhu'i bu ma yin// gal te rang gi yul kham
136a1(rgyud): su// chos min spyod pa mthong ba'i tshe// chos bzhin chad pas gcod byed cing // yal 'dor sems ni mi bskyed na// de phyir lha tshogs mang po
136a2(rgyud): kun// rgyal po de la skyob par byed// byang chub spyod pa sgrub pa'i phyir// sdig pa'i chos rnams zhi byed na// rgyal po tshe 'di nyid la ni// mthong ba'i rlom smin nges par myong // dge dang mi
136a3(rgyud): dge las dag la// spyod spong sems can bskul nas ni// dge sdig rnam smin ltas pas na// de phyir mi rgyal thob nas kyang // lha rnams lhan cig byin rlabs nas// thams cad yi rangs
136a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir// yang dag chos kyis yul bskyang bya// g.yo sgyu byed pa mthong gyur na// chos bzhin chad pas bcad par bya// gal// 
136a5(rgyud): te rgyal thabs gtor ba dang // srog 'bab rkyen zhig byung na ya/ nga // nams kyang sdig chos mi spyod cing // sdig pa/ mthong na spang bar bya// gnod pa'i nang na mchog lji ba/ 
136a6(rgyud): rgyal srid gtor las lhag pa med// 'di kun g.yo sgyu mi las byung // de na chad pa bcad par bya// g.yo sgyu byed pa yod gyur na// rgyal srid dag kyang gtor 'gyur zhing // rgyal khrims
136a7(rgyud): dag kyang nyams 'gyur bas// glang chen me tog tshal zhugs 'dra// de yis mi rgyal byas kyang ni// chos kyis yul ni ma bskyangs pas// lha dbang thams cad mi dga' zhing // lha ma yin yang de
136a8(rgyud): bzhin no// de lta bas na chos bzhin du// sdig pa byed pa chad pas bcang // dge bas sems can gdul bya zhing // chos min rjesu 'brang mi bya// lus dang srog ni spang sna yi// mi dge grogs
136b1(rgyud): rjes 'brang mi bya// nye ba dang ni nye min pa// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du blta// yang dag chos kyis rgyal byed na// yul mi mi 'drangs med pa'i phyir// chos rgyal grags dang ldan gyur pas// 
136b2(rgyud): khams gsum kun tu grags par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum lnga tshogs rnams// dga' nas 'di skad smra bar 'gyur// 'jam gling chos rgyal gang yin pa// de ni bdag gi bu yin te// dge
136b3(rgyud): bas sems can 'dul byed cing // yang dag chos kyis yul bskyangs na// yang dag chos spyod bskul bas na// bdag cag gnas su skye 'gyur zer// lha dang mi yi bu rnams dang // lha ma
136b4(rgyud): yin gyi 'khor rnams kyang // rgyal po yang dag chos 'dul rgyus// rtag tu sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// lha dgas thams cad rab dga' nas// mi rgyal de la srung bar byed// 
136b5(rgyud): gza' skar rang gi lam rgyu zhing // nyi zla tshad las 'da' mi byed// rlung gi rtag par dus bzhin ldang // bdud rtsi char ni dus bzhin 'bab// lo tog thams cad smin legs pas// 
136b6(rgyud): mi rnams mu ge med par 'gyur// lha tshogs mang po thams cad kun// rang gi pho brang gang 'gyur bas// de phyir mi rje khyod kyis ni// lus spangs yang dag chos spel byos// rin chen chos la
136b7(rgyud): bkur byed na// des na thams cad bde 'gyur bas// rtag par yang dag chos brten nas// yon tan bdag nyid brgyan par bya// 'khor rnams rtag par rab dga' zhing // sdig pa rnams ni
136b8(rgyud): spong bar byed// chos kyis sems can 'du byed pas// rgyun tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// ni rnams de dag thams cad kun// dge babatsun skyong byed na// yul khams rtag par lo lamra
137a1(rgyud): shing // yul ni zhi ba nyid du gyur// rgyal po chos kyis mi 'dul zhing // dge bas sdig spyod 'dul byed na// snyan pa'i grags pa 'thob 'gyur zhing // sems
137a2(rgyud): can rnams ni bde bar byed// de nas de'i tshe sa chen po la gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po thams cad dang // 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi rgyal pos yul bskyang ba'i chos kyis don
137a3(rgyud): bkas bshad pa thos pa dang / thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa dang / rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur pas/ shin tu dang ba'i mngon par yid ches pa dag gis bka' yang dag par blangs
137a4(rgyud): te spyod par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam pa dar rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i las/ rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi
137a5(rgyud): shu pa'o// // gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// / bam po dgu pa// de nas bcom ldan
137a6(rgyud): 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos bkas bshad nas/ yang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la sogs pa legs
137a7(rgyud): par nyon cig dang / ngas deng khyed la sngon chos yang dag par spyod pa'i rgyu dang rkyen bshad par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas sngon 'khor los bsgyur
137a8(rgyud): rgyal byas pa na// sa chen 'di dang rgya mtshor bcas pa dang // gling bzhi rin chen gyis ni rab bkang ba// thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod// ngas sngon bskal pa de gni
137b1(rgyud): tshad med snyed// rnam dag chos sku gnyer ba'i phyir// phongs pa'i nor dang lus srog kyang // ser sna med pa'i sems kyis yongasu btang // gzhan yang 'das pa'i bskal pa bsam dka' na/ 
137b2(rgyud): yang dag mkhyen pa rin chen gtsug pud byung // de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og/ rgyal po legs skyes zhes bya 'jig rten byung // 'khor los bsgyur rgyal byas nas gli bzhi btul// 
137b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho mthar thug tshun chad skyabasu dong // grong khyer ming ni gya nom sgra zhes bya// de tshe 'khor los bsgyur rgyal de na gnas// rmi lam sangs rgyas bsod nams ye shes thos// chos smra rin
137b4(rgyud): chen brtsegs pa zhes bya ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar ma dzes stan 'dug nas// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde 'cha radra pa'ang mthong // de'i tshe rgyal po rmi lam sad pa dang // rab
137b5(rgyud): tu dga' ba skyes nas lus kun khyab// nam langs rgyal bo'i pho brang phyir byung nas// dge slong dge 'dun rnam/ sa kyi thad du song // 'phags pa'i tshogs la gus par rab
137b6(rgyud): mchod nas// tshogs chen mang po de la 'di skad dris// chos smra rin chen brtsegs pa zhes bgyi ba// yon tan phun tshogs gzi brjid rab 'bar zhing // gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde
137b7(rgyud): 'chad pa'ang mthong // de'i tshe chos sgra chen po rin chen brtsegs// gnas khang gcig pu yang dag gnas nas ni// dran pa nyer gzhag mdo sde 'di 'don pas// drang 'dug mi g.yo
137b8(rgyud): lus dang sems kyang bde// de tshe dge slong zhig gis rgyal khrid nas// rin chen brtsegs pa de yi gnas su phyin// gnas khang nang du de yi lus ni drang bsrang ste// 'od dang mchog
138a1(rgyud): mchog lus kun khyab pa mthong // rgyal po de la 'di ni rin chen brtsegs// mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mchog gyur 'di lta ste// gser 'ong dam pa shin tu rgya
138a2(rgyud): nom mchog/ sangs rgyas spyod yul zab mo 'dzin ces smras// rgyal pos rin chen brtsegs la phyag byas nas// gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smra// zla ba nya ltar zhal mdog mdzes gyur/ 
138a3(rgyud): pa// gser 'od dam pa'i chos 'di bshad du gsol// rin chen brtsegs kyis rgyal po'i tshig mnyan nas// gser 'od dam pa 'di ni bshang snang bas// stong gsum 'jig rten khams
138a4(rgyud): ni kun khyab pa'i// lha mi thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// rgyal po sa phyogs yangs shing gtsang ba'i gnas/ rin chen gya nom mchog gis rab rgyan te// spos chu dam
138a5(rgyud): pa mchog gis chag chag btab// me tog sna tshogs mchog ni gcal du bkram// gnas mchog der ni stan ma/ tho rab bting ste// ba dan bla re bres nas mdzes par
138a6(rgyud): byas// phye ma byug spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bdug pa dag gis kun tu khyab par byas// lha klu lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po dang ni gnod sbyin dang // lha rnams man
138a7(rgyud): da ra yi char phab nas// thams cad nyer 'ongs ston mchog de la mchod// gzhan yang lha ni 'bum phrag brgya stong rnams// dam chos nyan mos thams cad de na 'dus// chos smra dang
138a8(rgyud): po stan las langs pa'i tshe// thams cad lha yi me tog dag gis mchod// de tshe chos sgra chen po rin chen brtsegs// shin tu lus bkrus gos gtsang rab bgos te// tshogs chen
138b1(rgyud): chos bstan de drung song nas ni// thal sbyar rtse gcig sems kyis gus phyag byas// lha dbang lha tshogs lnga yi bu mo rnams// thams cad me tog man ngar yang gtor// lha yi rol mo ba
138b2(rgyud): stong bsam mi khyab// mkha' la gnas nas sgra dbyangs snyan pa phyung // de tshe chos sgra chen po rin chen brtsegs// stan la 'dug ste skyil mo krung bcas pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing na
138b3(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i byams chen gtso// bye ba brgya stong de dag yid la bsams// sdug bsngal sems can thams cad ji snyed pa// thams cad byams sems mnyam pa nyer gzhag nas// 
138b4(rgyud): gsol 'debs bdag po rgyal po legs skyes phyir// gse dar 'od dam pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad// rgyal pos de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas// thal sbyar rtse gcig rjesu
138b5(rgyud): yi rang smras// ya mtshan chos thos mchi ma bklags te du sa// lus dang sems ni dga' chen kum khyab gyur// de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis// mdo sde
138b6(rgyud): 'di ni mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir// lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs nas ni// sems can kun phyir smon lam 'di skad btab// 'dzam gling 'di ni kun tu khyab par yang // rin
138b7(rgyud): chen rgyan phreng dag gi char phab nas// nor dang yo byad rgud phongs ji snyed pa// thams cad yid bzhin bde ba myong bar shog/ de nas rin chen sna bdun char phab nas// gling bzhi kun
138b8(rgyud): tu chog cing tshim byas pas// lus kyi rgyan phreng gos dang zas skom dang // ci dang ci 'dod phongs pa med par gyur// de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis// gling bzhi rin chen
139a1(rgyud): char phab mthong ba dang // sems can sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud kyi// bstan pa bzhag pa'i dge slong dge 'dun mchod// 'das pa'i rgyal po
139a2(rgyud): legs skyes gang yin pa// shAkya thub pa nga yin shes par byos// sngon yang sa chen mang po rab btang ste// rin chen dag gis gling bzhi yongasu bskang // sngon tshe chos mkhan chen
139a3(rgyud): bopo rin chen brtsegs// legs skyes de la gya nom chos bshad de// mdo sde'i rgyal po rnam phye bshad pa'i phyir// shar phyogs sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs grub pa yin// ngas ni mdo
139a4(rgyud): sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan nas// thal sbyar rtse gcig yi rang badz+ra dad pa dang // rin chen sna bdun btang ba'i bsod nam das kyis// rdo rje sku mchog 'di ni brnyes pa yin// gser
139a5(rgyud): 'ong bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rgyan pas// mthong ba thams cang kun ni rab dga' zhing // sems can thams cang kun gyi snying du sdug/ lha tshogs mang po bye ba kun de
139a6(rgyud): bzhin// 'das che bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dgu// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dag kyang byas// yul khams chung ngur mi yi rgyal po byas// gzhan yang bskal pa brgya stong tshad med snyed// 
139a7(rgyud): brgya byin lha yi dbang po dag kyang byas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po dag byas te// phyogs bcu'i byams chen gtso la mchod pa yi// de yi grangs tshad shin tu mtha' thug dka'// ngas
139a8(rgyud): sngon mdo thos rje su yi rang dge/ bsod nams phung po ci yod tshad shes dka'// bsod nams de dbang byang chub mngon rtogs nas// chos sku yang dag ye shes dam pa brnyes// de nas
139b1(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa zos pa dang / ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas// thams cad kyis mdo sde gser 'od dam pa spel zhing rgyun mi 'chang bar spyad par mos par gyur to/ 
139b2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las rgyal po legs skyes kyi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal
139b3(rgyud): gyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shin tu dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs
139b4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nga dang yangs shing rgya che ba dag gis mchod par byed bar 'dod pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
139b5(rgyud): zab mo shes shing / rtogs par 'dod pa gang yin pa des ga/ don mi za bar sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ri 'am/ nags
139b6(rgyud): tshal gang yang rung ste/ gnas de dang de dag tu sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas/ yongs su spel bar bya'o// chos nyan pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par 'du shes
139b7(rgyud): spangs nas rna ba bklags te sems rtse gcig tu gzhag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo de dang / 'khor mang po rnams la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 
139b8(rgyud): gang zhig sangs rgyas mang po la// bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// spyod yul zab mo shes 'dod na// gal te gser 'od dam pa 'di// yang
140a1(rgyud): dag bye ba shang mthong gyur na// dzam phyogasu zer song nas// de 'i drung du 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pas// yon tan mang po spring / 
140a2(rgyud): byed cing // sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mtha' med pas// sems can rnams ni thar bar byed// nga yis mdo 'di rnam bltas nas// thog ma bar dang tha mar dge/ shin tu zab pas dpag
140a3(rgyud): par dka'// depe dag gis ni zla byar med// gang ga'i bye mas chen rdul// rgya mtsho chu dang namakha' dang // ri brag thams cad gang gis kyang // cha shas tsam yang dpe byar med/ 
140a4(rgyud): chos dbyings zab mo 'jug 'dod na// mdo sde sngar ni maHdran par byed// chos nyid mchod rten gang na bar// za dab mo shin tu bde bar gnas// mchod rten 'di yi nang
140a5(rgyud): dag tu// shAkya thub pa nga yis ni// yid 'ong sgra dbyangs dam pa yis// mdo sde bshad pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas grangs tshad bsam dka' ba'i// bskal pa bye ba
140a6(rgyud): steng du ni// lha dang mi yi nang skyes nas// rtag tu bde ba mchog myong 'gyur// mdo sde 'di ni nyan pa yis// bdag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsod nams phung po 'thob 'gyur zhes/ 
140a7(rgyud): de snyam du ni bsam par bya// gal te me chen phung po dag/ dpag tshad brgya ni gang gyur kyang // mdo sde rgyal po 'di nyan phyir// dka' ba med par 'gro bar bya// de yi gnas su phyin
140a8(rgyud): nas ni// 'di 'dra'i mdo 'di thos gyur na// sdig pa'i las rnams 'byang 'gyur zhing // rmi lam ngan pa sel bar 'gyur// gza' skar ma rungs ltas ngan dang // byang stems log
140b1(rgyud): pa'i gdon la sogs// mdo sde 'dzin thos pa'i cha// sdig pa mang po spang bar byed// spyan mtho mchog ni rab rgyan nas// rab gtsang pad+ma 'dra ba la// chos sgra steng du phyin nas na/ 
140b2(rgyud): klu chen lta bur 'dug par bya// de la bde bar 'dug nas ni// zab mo'i mdo 'di bshad par bya// yi ger bris nas glog 'dzin dang // de yi don ni bshad par bya// chos smra stan ni spangs
140b3(rgyud): nas ni// phyogs gzhan dag tu song gyur kyang // khri stan mthon po de las ni// cho 'phrul mtshan ma mang byung bas// res 'ga' chos smra mkhan po'i gzugs// stan mtho steng na
140b4(rgyud): 'dug par mthong // res 'ga' sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mthong // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po'i gzugs// res
140b5(rgyud): 'ga' 'jam dpal lta bu dang // res 'ga' byams pa gtso bo'i gzugs// stan mtho steng na 'dug par mthong // res 'ga' ya mtshan mtshan ma dang // lha
140b6(rgyud): ni mang po rnams kyi gzugs// yud tsam du ni mthong gyur kyang // de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// bkra shis mang po rdzogs byed pas// byas pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// 
140b7(rgyud): yon tan rnams ni yongs rdzogs par// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// mchog tu rnam rgyal grags ldan dang // nyon mongs mang po zhi bar byed// pha rol dgra rnam
140b8(rgyud): rab tu sel// g.yul 'gyed chen rtag par rgyal// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad med// dug dang gnod pa mang ba zhi// lan gsum sdig pa ci byas pa// mdo sde'i mthu yis 'bye
141a1(rgyud): bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu// grags pa kun tu rgyas par 'gyur// 'khor 'dzin dgra ni ji snyed pa// phan tshun 'khon ni gtong bar 'gyur/ 
141a2(rgyud): gal te dgra ni phyin gyur kyang // ming thos tsam gyis ldog 'gyur bas// mtshon cha g.yo bar mi ltos par// dgra gnyis dga' ba skyes par 'gyur// tshangs rgyal dang ni brgya byin dbang // 
141a3(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po bzhi// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // sde dpon chen po yang dag shes// klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am ci dang rol mo
141a4(rgyud): lha// lha ma yin dang gser 'dab bdag/ lha mo ste bus pa chen mo dang // dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang / 'di la sogs pa lha yi gtso// so sor lha tshogs khrid nas ni// 
141a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byed// dkon mchog cho/ sa ni bsam mi khyab// rtag par dga' ba'i sems/ kyis ni// mdo sde la ni bkur sti byed// 'di la sogs
141a6(rgyud): pa'i lha mang po// thams cad lhan cig 'grogs nas ni// bsod nams sgrub pa rnams bltas nas// lhan cig 'di skad smra bar byed// sems can 'di dag rab tu ltos// bsod
141a7(rgyud): nams yon tan che ldan zhing // dge rtsa brtson 'grus stobs kyis ni// bdag cag lha gnas skye 'gyur zhes// mdo sde zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir// gus pa'i sems kyis der 'ongs
141a8(rgyud): nas/ yang dag chos ni bkur ba'i phyir// chos kyi mchod rten mchod par byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// phan pa chen po byed pas na// mdo sde zab mo 'di dag gi
141b1(rgyud): chos kyi rin chen snod kyang byed// chos kyi sgo 'dir gang bzhugs pa// chos nyid la ni 'jug 'gyur bas// mdo sde gser 'od dam pa 'di// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya// 
141b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas brgya stong tshad med la// gang zag de dag mchod pas na// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dbang gis// mdo sde 'di ni thos pa yin// 'di ltar lha yi bdag po dang // lha mo spobs pa
141b3(rgyud): chen po dang // dpal gyi lha mo de dang ni// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin 'khor ni grangs med pa// dpa' zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams// so sor phyogs bzhi
141b4(rgyud): dag nas ni// rtag tu 'ongs nas skyob par byed// nyi zla brgya byin lha dbang dang // rlung dang chu dang me yi lha// khyab 'jug dang ni phrag chen dang // gshin rje stobs po'i lha
141b5(rgyud): mo dang // 'jig rten mgon po la sogs pa// rab dpa' gzi ldan thams cad kun// mdo sde 'dzin pas srung byed pas// nyin mtshan rtag par yongs mi
141b6(rgyud): 'bral// gnod sbyin rgyal po stobs po che// mthu chen dang ni dbang phyug dang // gtso bo yang dag shes la sogs// gnod sbyin nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gzhan yang gnod
141b7(rgyud): sbyin brgya stong rnams// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan pa dag/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i gnas rnamasu// nyer 'ong gang zag de srung byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin rgyal/ 
141b8(rgyud): 'khor ni lnga brgya bcas pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// rtag par nyer 'ong de srung byed// rin chen rgyal po gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rdzogs sangs/ 
142a1(rgyud): rgyas po dang // 'brog dgon dang ni kum b+hi ra// zas sbyin kha dog ser po dang // 'di la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang // so sor g.yog 'khor lnga
142a2(rgyud): brgya bcas// thams cad nyer 'od srung bar byed// sna tshogs sde dang dri za dang // 'dam bu rgyal po rtag yul rgyal// nor bu tsug dang ne ga ta// tshor ba'i dbang po de dag dang // rtag tu
142a3(rgyud): rgyal ba nag po che// su pa na dang kye sha dang // pan tsi ka dang ra rkang dang // de bzhin bskal pa chen po dang // pra na li cung chos skyong dang // spre'u rnams kyi ni rgyal po dang // khab pu dang ni nyi
142a4(rgyud): ma'i gnyen// rin chen gtsug bud srung bar byed// pra na li chen na kun la// bdun pa dang ni 'dod mchog dang // / mthu bo che dang gangs ri dang // bde ba'i ri yang de bzhin te/ 
142a5(rgyud): thams cad rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing // rab dpa' mthu stobs ldan pa yang // mdo sde 'di 'dzin mthong 'gyur na/ thams cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed// ma dros klu yi rgyal po/ 
142a6(rgyud): dang // klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang // btang bzung dang ni e la'i mdab// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' bo// klu ni brgya stong mang po'i nang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni gzi byin ldan// mdo sde 'dzin bsrung
142a7(rgyud): byed pas// nyin mtshan rtag par yongs mi 'bral// ba lang dang ni sgra gcan dang // thag bzangs ris dang sdob pa ba// bong bu dpung dang phrag chen dang // de bzhin du ni rab dga' dang // lha
142a8(rgyud): min mang po gzhan rnams dang // lha yi tshogs ni grangs med pa// stobs che rab tu dpa' ba rnams// thams cad 'ongs nas der srung byed// 'phrog ma 'byung po rnams kyi ma// gnod sbyin/ 
142b1(rgyud): 'khor ni lnga brgya rnams// mi de gnyid log sad kyang rung // rtag par 'ongs nas srung bar byed// ma rungs pa dang gdugs pa dang // gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs dang // rung chen dang ni
142b2(rgyud): so brtsegs ma// sems can kun gyi mdangs 'phrog pa// de 'dra'i lha tshogs mang po rnams// mthu chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa kun// mdo sde 'dzin pa rtag bsrungs pas// nyin mtshan rtag par
142b3(rgyud): yong mi 'bral// lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang // lha yi bu mo tshad med dang // dpal gyi lha mo gtso mo dang // de yi 'khor ni mang po dang // sa chen 'di yi lha mo dang // lo tog kun dga'
142b4(rgyud): nags tshal lha// shing gi lha dang rlung lha dang // mchod rten lha la sogs pa dang // de la sogs pa'i lha mang po// da gra' chen sems ni rab bskyed nas// mdo sde 'di ni 'don pa la
142b5(rgyud): thams cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed// mdo sde 'dzin pa mtho/ nga gyur na// tshe dang kha dog stobs 'phel byed// gzi byin dang ni yon tan dang // mtshan mchog gis ni rgyan
142b6(rgyud): par gyur// gza' skar ltas ngan ston pa dang // de la nyam thag byung byung dang // rmi lam ltas ngan mthong ba yang // thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed// sa chen 'di yi lha mo dang // rab brtan
142b7(rgyud): gzi byin mthu stobs ldan// mdo sde 'di yi mthu yis ni// chos kyi ra yis rtag tshim pa// sa bcung thur du song ba dang // dpag tshad brgya ni yan chad du// sa bcud gyen du 'phags byas
142b8(rgyud): nas/ dam chen 'din sdum par byed// sa ni rdzam su dag cad ni// 'brum phrag dru sun brgya nas// ji rjeg ni 'thug pa'i bang// sa bcu thams cad rkyen du 'phags// ma
143a1(rgyud): rgyal po 'di thos dbang // bsod nams phung po tsho thos pas// lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams// thams cad phan yon thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang
143a2(rgyud): tshogs mang po rnams// mthu slobs 'od dang ldan 'gyur zhing // rab dga' rtag tu bde byed pas// nyams pa'i mtshan ma spong bar 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni 'di nang gi/ nags tshal 'bras
143a3(rgyud): bu lo tog la// mdo sde 'di yi byin rlabs kyis// sems ni rtag tu dga' thob pas// lo tog thams cad legs 'gyur zhing // kun tu me tog dam pa dang // 'bru rnams thams cad
143a4(rgyud): 'phel 'gyur bas// sa chen kun tu rgyas par 'gyur/ da'abras bu'i ljon shing mang po dang // kun dga' nas/ sa tshal mang po kun// thams cad lo tog mchog skyes nas// 
143a5(rgyud): dri zhim rtag par kun tu 'thul// rtsa mang ljon shing rnams la/ sa kyang // me tog dam pa skye 'gyur zhing // 'bra/ sa bu zhim po skye 'gyur bas// thams cad kun tu gang
143a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu// klu yi bu mo tshad med snyed// rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas// thams cad kun tu zhugs nas ni// me tog pa du ma dag dang // de bzhin
143a7(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po dang // pad+ma sngon po dkar po gnyis// bskyed nas rdzing kun gang bar 'gyur// mdo sde 'di'i byin rlabs kyis// na mkha' gang zhig sgrib pa med// sprin dang khug rna yongasu sel
143a8(rgyud): mun nag thams cad snang bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'gyed pas// dri med 'od ni rnam par dag/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus// gling bzhi yongs bskor gsal bar byed// mdo
143b1(rgyud): sde 'di mi byin rlabs kyis// lha mi bu rnams bstangs pas na// thams cad 'dzam+bu'i gser dag gis// gzhal med khang ni byed par 'gyur// nyi zla dang po 'char ba'i che// gling 'di mthong
143b2(rgyud): na rab dga' bas// rtag par snang ba chen po yis// thams cad kun tu gsal bar byed// sa chen 'di la yod pa yi// pad+ma rdzing ni ji snyed pa// nyi mas dus bzhin gsal byed pas/ 
143b3(rgyud): kha ni mi 'bye gang yang med// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu// me tog 'bras bu sman rnams kun// thams cad legs shing smin 'gyur bas// sa chen kun tu gang bar 'gyur// mdo sde 'di
143b4(rgyud): yi byin rlabs kyis// nyi zla snang bar byed pa'i gnas// skar tshad las mi 'da' zhing // rlung char dus bzhin ldang 'bab pas// 'jam gling 'di dag kun tu yang / 
143b5(rgyud): yul rnams lo legs skyid par 'gyur// gang na mdo sde lnga de bzhugs pa// phyogs gzhan dag las khyad para'aphags// gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang du
143b6(rgyud): spel zhing 'don pa dang // rnam phye 'chad par byed pa'i gnas// bsod nams gong du thob par 'gyur// de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang // lha la sogs pa mang po de dag/ bcom ldan
143b7(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang // thams cad rab tu dga' bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dag yongasu 'dzin par byed pa de dag sems rtse gcig tu yongasu bsrungs nas/ mya
143b8(rgyud): ngan gyis gnod pa med cing rtag tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur bar mos par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lha dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi
144a1(rgyud): yongs sra zhing 'dzin par byed pa'i la sa nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po'im
144a2(rgyud): cher yang dag par bshad na sa/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog dang / de yi bu gnyis po dngul gyi tog dang / dngul 'od ces bya ba gnyis po bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs
144a3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu mchog tu rgyal ba 'od ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa dang / lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas
144a4(rgyud): babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
144a5(rgyud): kyi bkas chos bshad pa mnyan par gyur to// de nas pa/ com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ma
144a6(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med kyang med pa snyed 'das pa na gser 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
144a7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
144a8(rgyud): 'jig rten mkhyen pa dang / bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i ri bo'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur
144b1(rgyud): nas/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'di'i bu chen po dngul gyi
144b2(rgyud): tog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal chab du gyur te/ de'i tshe de'i ming bsgyur nas/ rnam dag tog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
144b3(rgyud): rgya bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med
144b4(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser tog 'od ces bya ba ra 'gyuraro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongasu mya
144b5(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang / 'di'i bu chung ngu dngul gyi 'od / bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bas/ 'jig
144b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar
144b7(rgyud): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od ces bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung
144b8(rgyud): bstan to// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/ skyes bu chen po gsum po de dag las/ lung bstan pa yang thos/ 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di
145a1(rgyud): yang thos pas/ sems rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ rnam par dag cing dri ma med par gyur pas/ dper na na mkha' lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin
145a2(rgyud): gshegs pas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu smin pa thugs kyi mkhyen pas/ byang chub chen por lung bstan nas/ 'di skad du lha'i bu khyed cag ma 'ongs pa'i
145a3(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i tog mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
145a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rus rigs kyang 'thun/ ming 'thun par 'gyur bas/ thams cad zhal dang / spyan rnam par dag cing / ut+pa
145a5(rgyud): la'i dri'i ro bo zhes bya ba/ mtshan rnam pa bcu phun sum chog sa par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar rims bzhin du sangs rgya sa stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro zhes lung
145a6(rgyud): bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas
145a7(rgyud): chos nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad
145a8(rgyud): lags/ bdag gis ni lha'i bu 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas/ bka' ba spyad de/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mgo dang / mig dang / rkang dang / 
145b1(rgyud): klang rgyas dang / g.yog 'khor dang / bu dang / mchis brang dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / mngag gzhug bgyid pa dang / khang khyim dang / kun dag
145b2(rgyud): ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / sdug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byi ru dang / man shel dang / dung dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / mal cha dang
145b3(rgyud): gsos sman dag sbyin pa yongasu btang ba yang ma thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa gzhan dag ni/ mchod pa'i yo byad mang pos 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bru phrag khrag khrig
145b4(rgyud): brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa snyed la mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed lon
145b5(rgyud): nas/ gdong de'i rjes la byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'di ngag rgyu rkyen ni gang spyod pa mchog ni ji lta bu mngon par

151b5(rgyud): nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin du 'brang nas/ 'gram/ du rgyu bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'di snyam du nya mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang / 
151b6(rgyud): gdon mi za bar bkres pa'i mes gdungs nas/ bdag la zas spong ba yin pas/ bdag gis sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bul 'di skad smras so// 
151b7(rgyud): khyod kyis glang po che mchog tu stobs dang ldan pa gcig blangs te myur du khyim du deng la yab tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs khyim na bza' rung ba'i dngos poci yod pa dang / ngam za ba'i skal ba
151b8(rgyud): dong bu dang / chung ma dang / bran mo dang ldan po'i skal ba ci yong ba thams cad kyang bsdus te khyer la shig shig/ de nas bu gnyis pas bstan pa mnyan nas/ glang po che mchog la zhon / 
152a1(rgyud): rings par khyim du song nas/ mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang / dngos po gong ma rgyas par smras nas/ khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa blangs te/ glang po
152a2(rgyud): che la bkal nas/ myur zhing rings par 'dug pa'i rdzing drung du phyin pa dang / de nas chu 'bebs bu 'ongs pa mthong nas/ lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ zas rnams
152a3(rgyud): blangs nas/ rdzing kun tu khyab par gtor ba dang / nya rnams zas thob pas/ thams cad 'drang shing tshim par gyur to// yang 'di snyam du deng bdag gis zas yongasu btang nas/ nya rnams
152a4(rgyud): srog thob par gyur pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe yang / chos kyi zas yongasu btang nas/ sems can mtha' yas pa rna mas tshim par byed par gyur cig snyam mo// gzhan yang
152a5(rgyud): 'di snyam du bdag gis/ dgon pa'i nags tshal na dge slong cig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa las// na cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i
152a6(rgyud): chos zab mo'i don gces pa ston pa yang mthong zhing thos/ gzhan yang mdo sde las sems can gang la la zhig 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug bud kyi
152a7(rgyud): mtshan thos par gyur na/ mtho ris su skye bar gyur na/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyuraro zhes gsungs pas/ deng bdag gis nya stong phrag bcu po de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan
152a8(rgyud): lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo yang bstan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug pud kyi mtshan yang brjod par bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can rnam pa gnyis yod de/ 
152b1(rgyud): theg pa chen po la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa dang / yid mi ches shing smod par byed pa ste/ de dag kyang mngon par yid ches pa'i sems 'phel bar bya'o snyam mo// de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu/ 
152b2(rgyud): 'di snyam du bdag rdzing gi nang du zhugs te/ nya mang po de dag la chos zab mo shin tu gya nom pa/ bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ chu'i nang du zhugs te/ 'di skad ces 'das pa'i de
152b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/ 
152b4(rgyud): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ sa rin chen gtsug pud la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa 'di sngon byang chub sems ngo ba'i spyad pa spyod pa
152b5(rgyud): na/ 'di ltar thugs dam bzhes te/ phyogs bcu'i 'dzi/ ga rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa gang dag la/ tshi ka'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos par gyur na shi 'phos/ 
152b6(rgyud): pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsol to zhes bsgragaso// de nas chu 'bebs kyis rdzing gi nya de dag la chos zab mo gya nom pa yang 'di skad du 'di yod pa'i phyir de
152b7(rgyud): yod/ 'di skyes pa'i phyir de skye bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs
152b8(rgyud): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len bI
153a1(rgyud): rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa 'byung
153a2(rgyud): ste/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di 'gags pa'i phyir/ 'di 'gag par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du
153a3(rgyud): byed 'gegs pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug
153a4(rgyud): 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas cho dar ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags
153a5(rgyud): pas/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'ag ga/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag/ rga shi 'a/ gags pas mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
153a6(rgyud): bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' shig 'gag par 'gyu ro zhes bshad do// chos 'di dag bshad nas/ gzhan ya
153a7(rgyud): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bstan to// tad+ya thA/ bi tsa ni/ bi tsa ni/ bi tsa ni/ saM shU ni/ saM shU ni/ saM shwA ni/ b+hi Shi ni
153a8(rgyud): b+hi Shi ni/ b+hi Shi ni/ swAhA// tad+ya thA/ na ma ni/ na mi ni/ na mi nai/ sha ti ni/ sha ti ni/ sha ti ni/ sra pra sha ni/ sra pra sha ni/ sra pra sha ni sAhA/ mrapre tra ni/ pre tra ni/ br-i tra ni/ dri shi ni ni/ drin
153b1(rgyud): ni ni/ dri shi ni ni/ u pa d+hi ni/ u pa d+hi ni/ u ba d+hi ni/ swA hA// tad+ya thA/ b+ha bi ni/ b+hA bi ni/ b+ha bi ni/ sha ti ni/ sha ti ni/ sha ti ni/ sha ma ni ni/ sha ma ni ni/ sha ma ni ni/ sha ma
153b2(rgyud): ni ni swA hA// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshong dpon gyi bu'i sngon gyi rgyu 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams shin tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes bsngags pa brjod
153b3(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi so so nas/ gnas de nyid du mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smraso// leg so shAkya thub pa'i gtso// yan lag bcu gnyis mtshungs ldan
153b4(rgyud): pa/ dam chos rig sngags bkas bshad nas// sdig pas la bsod nams 'phel bar mdzod// bdag cag kyangani sngags brjod pa// dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bgyid// 
153b5(rgyud): gang zhig 'gal bar bgyis nas ni// legs par rje su mi 'breng na// ardza ka yi yal ga bzhin// mgo ni tshal pa bdun du 'gems// bdag cag bcom ldan spyan
153b6(rgyud): sngar ni// rig sngags lan cig brjod par bgyid// tad+ya thA/ hi ri mi/ ga te/ gan d+ha ri/ tsan d+ha ri/ d+hi ri/ dzI ba re shi hi/ b+ha re/ bu re pu re/ gu gu ma ti khi ra ma ti/ da d+hi mu kha/ laM ru b+hau/ 
153b7(rgyud): mu ru b+ha/ ku tsa mu ru gan+te/ du ru du ru du ru/ bIr+ye/ a d+hi sid+d+he da be/ da d+ha be/ u ste/ u ste/ ba d+he/ a na le pra b+ha te/ ku su ma ba te/ u su ma ba te swAh+ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
153b8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs dang / bu gnyis kyis rdzing de'i nya dag la/ chu dang zas byin nas/ chos bshad de slar rang gi khyim du dong ngo // tshong
154a1(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de dus gzhan zhig na// ston mo sna tshogs byas nas// chang gi ra ro ste nyal ba dang // de'i tshe nya stong phrag bcu po de dag dus gcig/ 
154a2(rgyud): tu tshe 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gang gis/ lha'i gnas 'dir skyes par gyur ces bsams nas/ 
154a3(rgyud): phan tshun cig la cig 'di skad du bdag cag ni sngon 'dzam bu'i gling du dud 'gro'i skye gnasu lhung nas nye'i lus blangs pa la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ bdag cag la
154a4(rgyud): chu dang zas byin nas/ gzhan yang bdag cag la rten/ cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i cho sa zab mo dang / gzungs kyang bshad/ de bzhin
154a5(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen gtsug bud kyi mtshan nas kyang brjod ba'i rgyu dang rkyen des bdag cag lha'i gnas 'dir skyes ba yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag cag thams cad tshong dpon
154a6(rgyud): gyi bu de'i thad du dong la/ drin bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa bya ba'i rigaso zhes smra so// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag lha'i gnas de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du sman pa'i
154a7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po'i thad du lhag so// de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de yang thog mthon po'i steng du bde bar gnyid log pa las/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mu tig gi phreng ba stong phrag
154a8(rgyud): bcu ni mgo drung du bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yas log su bzhag/ yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yon log su bzhag ste/ me tog
154b1(rgyud): man nga ra ba dang man ngar ba chen po'i char pa dbus nub tsam du phab nas/ 'od kyis kun snang bar byas te/ lha'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra dbyangs snyan pa dag byung nas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du
154b2(rgyud): gnyid log pa thams cad sad par byas// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang gnyid log pa las sad par gyur pa dang / de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mtshang ba byas nas/ nam mkha'
154b3(rgyud): la 'phur te dong ngo // rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul khamasu yang gnas de dang de dag thams cad du/ lha'i me tog pad+ma dam pa'i char mngon par phab bo// lha'i bu mang po de dag sngon
154b4(rgyud): gyi gnas dgon pa'i rdzing drung du dong nas/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab ste/ de nas mi snang ba ra gyur nas/ slar lha'i gnasu song ste/ yid bzhin du ci
154b5(rgyud): dga' bar 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par gyur/ to// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyang nam nangs pa dang / blon po chen po de dag la ma dang gsum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi
154b6(rgyud): phyir ya mtshan gyi mtshan ma de lta bu dag snang zhing / 'od zer chen po dag kyang bkye bar gyur ces smraso// blon po chen pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lha'i tshogs mang po
154b7(rgyud): chen po rnams kyi tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi sdum par mu tig gi phreng ba 'bum phrag bcu dang / me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phab pas/ dbus nub tsam du bgyis lagaso// rgyal
154b8(rgyud): pos blon po la bsgo ba/ tshong dpon gyi khyim du song la/ de'i bu bos shig/ blon po chen pos bka' mnyan nas/ de'i khyim du song ste/ rgyal po'i bka' bzlas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu
155a1(rgyud): bkug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang / mdang gsum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir/ ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu byung bar gyur ces
155a2(rgyud): dris so// tshong dpon gyis bus smras pa/ bdag gi spyad pa lta na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rdzing de'i nang gi nya mang po de dag mdo sde las gsung pa bzhin du tshe 'das nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes
155a3(rgyud): pas/ de dag drin lan glan pa'i slad du ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu bstan snyam bgyid lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lhas pho nya 'ga' zhig dang / 
155a4(rgyud): bdag gi bu gnyis rdzing chen po'i drung du btang ste/ nya stong phra dag bcu po de dag gum mam mtsho brtags na mad dam mi dmang ngam/ mkhyen par 'gyur lag so// rgyal pos de skad
155a5(rgyud): smras pa thos nas/ pho nya dang de'i bu gnyis rdzing de'i drung du bta/ nga ba las/ rdzing de'i nang na me tog man da ra ba mang dro/ phung po chen pos gang bar gyur pa dang / nya mang po thams
155a6(rgyud): cad dus las 'das par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang slar myur du log ste/ rgyas par rgyal po la gsol pa dang / rgyal po yang de ltar gyur pa thos pas/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sngon
155a7(rgyud): de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar
155a8(rgyud): shes par bya ste/ sngon byung ba tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin no// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'dzin zhes bya ba de ni mdzes pa'i tog yin no// de'i bu gnyis las bu chen ma
155b1(rgyud): chu rgyas shes bya ba de ni dngul gyi tog bya ba nyid yin no// de'i bu chung ngu chu'i mdzod ces bya ba de ni dngul gyi 'od dang ba nyid yin no// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba 'di ni/ byang chub kyi
155b2(rgyud): shing gi lha mo khyod nyid yin no// nya stong phrag bcu po de dag ni lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag nyid yin no// ngas sngon nya de dag la chu dang zas byin te/ tshim par byas nas/ rten cing 'brel
155b3(rgyud): par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bshad pa'i rgyu de dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug pud de'i mtshan nas brjod de bstan pa'i
155b4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyus mtho ris su skyes par gyur pas/ de'i dnga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ rab tu dga' bas chos mnyan dpas/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
155b5(rgyud): tu lung bstan nas/ de dag gi ming bstan pa yin no// rigs kyi lha mo ji ltar ngas sngon srid pa rnamasu 'khor ba na/ 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can tshad med pa snyed la rgya
155b6(rgyud): cher phan btags nas/ thams cad rims kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyod cag thams cad kyis kyang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis nges/ 
155b7(rgyud): par 'byung ba yongasu gnyer nas/ bag med par mi bya'o// de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang / thams cad kyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen
155b8(rgyud): pos thams cad yongasu bskyab pa dang / nan tan brtson 'grus bka' ba spyad na/ gdod bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs shing mngon du byed par 'gyur bar khong du chud par gyur pas/ 
156a1(rgyud): shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mchog rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/ 
156a2(rgyud): tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i mdo// 
156a3(rgyud): bam po bcu pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gi sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen bkas bshad nas/ yang byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo dang
156a4(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'das pa 'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyod pa na// chu dang zas sbyin pa btang nas/ nya de dag gi srog la
156a5(rgyud): phan btags pa 'ba' shig byas pa ma yin gyi/ shin tu phangs pa'i lus kyang yongasu btang ste/ de'i rgyud nga rkyen gang yin pa lhan cig blta bar bya'o// de nas de
156a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i gnas kyi steng dang / lha'i gnas kyi 'og thams cad na mchog tu rnam par rgyal zhing mchog tu btsun pa/ 'od/ 
156a7(rgyud): zer brgya stong du mas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar mdzad pa/ mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa/ yon tan yongasu rdzogs par gyur pa des/ 
156a8(rgyud): dge slong rnams dang / 'khor mang po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu phan tsa la'i ljong su byon nas/ nags tshal sa gzhi shin tu mnyam la cher ma rnams med pa me tog mchog dam pa
156b1(rgyud): dang / rtswa 'jam po dag gis kun tu khyab par bkram par gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis shing 'di'i drung du nga'i ched du stan
156b2(rgyud): thing shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan nas gdan bting ngo // bting zin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdan
156b3(rgyud): bshams lags na/ 'phags pas dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan gyi steng du skyil mo krung bcas te/ sku drang por bsrang nas/ yang dag pa'i dran
156b4(rgyud): pa nye bar gzhag ste/ bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag sngon dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel blta bar 'dod
156b5(rgyud): dam/ dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba/ bdag cag ma thong bar mos lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa/ sod nams brgyas rab tu rgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad dang / 
156b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i phyag gis sa la bsnun pa dang / de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur pas/ sa gas shing bye bar gyur pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs
156b7(rgyud): kyi dra bas rab tu rgyan pa zhig mngon par 'phags te byung ba 'khor mang po kun gyis mthong nas/ ngo mtshar che ba'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las
156b8(rgyud): bzhengs te/ phyag mdzad nas/ g.yas phyogasu bskor ba mdzad de/ slar gdan la bzhugs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mchod rten 'di sgo phye
157a1(rgyud): shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo phye ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgrom bu rin po che mchog dam pas brgyan pa zhig mthong ba dang / bco
157a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i sgrom bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa zhig gda' lagaso// bcom
157a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sgo phye shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan nas phye ba dang / ring bsrel kha dog dung dang / me tog ku mu da 'dra ba
157a4(rgyud): zhig mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/  sgrom gyi nang na ring bsrel kha dog dam pa gzhan la sa khyad par du 'phags pa zhig gda' lagaso// bcom
157a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis/ skyes bu chen po'i rus pa 'di khyer te shog shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ring bsrel de spangs nas/ 
157a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phulo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas/ dge slong rnams la khyed kyis bka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bzhag pa la ltos shig ces
157a7(rgyud): bka' stsal nas tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog ldan blo// rab dpa' brtson pas pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// rtag sgom byang chub phyir ni rgyun chad med/ 
157a8(rgyud): btang snyoms che brtan sems la ngal ba med// dge slong dag khyed cag thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus la gus pas phyag byos shig/ ring bsrel 'di ni tshul khrims dang / 
157b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dri tshad med pa dag gis/ yongasu gtugs pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa yin pas/ shin tu phrad par dka'o// de nas dge slong rnams dang / 'khor
157b2(rgyud): mang po rnams kyis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ mgo bos ring bsrel la phyag byas nas/ sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas
157b3(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdun du 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
157b4(rgyud): ston pa chen po ni/ thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa lags/ sems can kun gyis bsnyen bkur bgyi rab lags na/ rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di
157b5(rgyud): la phyag mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'/ kho nga ni rus pa 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
157b6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas/ sngon gyi drin bsab pa'i phyir/ deng ngas phyag byas pa yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ngas
157b7(rgyud): deng khyod dang 'khor mang po'i the tsom dang / som nyi gcod pa'i phyir/ ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa yang dag par bshad kyis/ khyed cag legs par yid la byos la/ 
157b8(rgyud): sems rtse gcig tu nyon cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag cag shin tu thos par mos lags na/ rnam par phye ste bkas bshad du gsol/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba
158a1(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ yul cig gi rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba/ bang mdzod rgyas pa/ dmag gi dpung rab tu dpa' ba/ mang
158a2(rgyud): bo kun gyi bkur zhing ngag nyan pa/ rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba/ mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa/ phyir rgol ba'i dgra med pa zhig yod de/ btsun mo dam pa byad bzhin shin tu
158a3(rgyud): sdug cing mdzes pa/ mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod de/ bu chen po'i ming ni sgra chen po zhes bya'o// bu 'bring po'i ming ni lha chen po zhes bya'o// bu tha chungs kyi ming ni sems
158a4(rgyud): can chen po zhes bya'o// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtse zhing lta da mo lta ba'i phyir/ ri dang nags kun tu blta bar chas pa dang / bu gsum po de yang phyi bzhin du dong ngo // me tog
158a5(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir pha spangs te/ kun tu 'khyu ma pa las 'od ma'i tshal chen po zhig tu phyin te/ nga khasos so// den rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du deng bdag ni
158a6(rgyud): sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na/ nags tshal 'dir gcan zan ma rungs pa dag gis/ bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur ram zhes smraso// rgyal bu 'bring pos yang 'di skad du/ 
158a7(rgyud): bdag ni rang gi lus la dang po nas phangs pa med na/ snying du sdug pa 'di dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhig 'byung du dog so zhes smraso// rgyal bu tha chungs kyis phung po gnyis la smras pa/ 'di
158a8(rgyud): ni lha dang drang srong 'dug pa'i gnas// bdag la 'jigs sngangs 'bral ba'i mya ngan med// lus sems kun khyab dga' bar skyes pa na// khyad par 'phags pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur// 
158b1(rgyud): de'i tshe rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems la ci bsams pa'i dngos po dag smras nas/ mthar gyis mdun du song ba las/ stag mo zhig bu bdun btsas nas// zhag bdun lon pa bu rnams
158b2(rgyud): kyis bskor bas/ bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir ba/ lus rid cing nyam chung ba/ ring por mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang / rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du/ 
158b3(rgyud): kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdun lon te/ bu bdun gyis yongasu bskor bas/ zas btsal ba yang mi khom ste/ bkres pa dang / skom pa dag gis rab tu gzir bas/ gdon mi
158b4(rgyud): za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyu ro zhes smraso// rgyal bu sem sa can chen pos smras pa/ stag 'di dag rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig za/ rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ stag dang / 
158b5(rgyud): seng ge phar spyang rnams// sha khrag dron mo 'ba' shig za// de bas gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis// 'di na nyam chung sel mi nus// rgyal bu 'bring pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang
158b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// stag mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la// bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar rnyed par dka' ba'i zas
158b7(rgyud): dang skom btsal bar nus/ su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang / srog phangs nas/ bkres pa dang / skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/ spang bar
158b8(rgyud): dka' ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang yang med do// rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/ deng bdag cag ni so so nas rang gi lus la sred cing mngon par zhen pa dang // 
159a1(rgyud): shes rab med pas/ gzhan rnams la phan 'dogs mi nus kyis/ skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas/ rtag par gzhan la phan
159a2(rgyud): gdags pa'i phyir/ rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas/ sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed/ gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med
159a3(rgyud): par rul zhing myags te/ bor bas phan pa ci yang byas pa med na/ ci'i phyir deng mchis snabs bzhin du yongasu spangs nas/ bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed
159a4(rgyud): snyam mo// de'i tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas/ so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed de/ stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g.yeng bar bltas nas/ 
159a5(rgyud): ring zhig tu bskor te cig char spangs nas dong ngo // de na sa rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du/ bad ga gis lus srog btang ba'i dus ni deng yin te/ de ci'i phyir
159a6(rgyud): zhe na/ bdag gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang / mi gtsang mnam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong // yo byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta// nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang ni// 'gyur/ 
159a7(rgyud): zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag/ rtag tshol dgang dka' srung bar rab tu dka'// rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni// nams kyang bdag 'dor byas pa'i drin mi shes// gzhan yang
159a8(rgyud): lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa// 'jig su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba// mi gtsang bas lung dang mtshungs pa yin pas// deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i
159b1(rgyud): las mngon par bsgrubs nas/ skye shi'i rgya mtshor grub gzings chen po byas te/ 'khor ba yongasu spangs nas/ nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo// gzhan yang 'di snyam du/ 
159b2(rgyud): gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na/ 'di nyid 'bras dang / nad ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin no// lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ab
159b3(rgyud): shig dang ldan pa/ chu bur lta bur mi brtan pa/ srin bu mang po 'dus pa rtsa rgyus rus pa phan tshun 'brel pa/ shin tu yongasu skyo bar bya ba'i nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas/ 
159b4(rgyud): de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yongasu spangs nas/ bla na med pa mthar phyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa yodasu btsal te/ mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang / mi rtag pa'i sdug
159b5(rgyud): bsngal dang / 'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas/ 2khor ba rgyun bcad de/ nyes pa rnams spangs nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyis phun sum
159b6(rgyud): tshogs par bsgoms nas/ bsod nams brgya stong mang pos rgyan pa/ thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa
159b7(rgyud): thob par bya'o// thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyi sman tshad med pa btang bar bya'o snyam mo// de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' sran dang / smon lam
159b8(rgyud): chen po btab nas/ snying rje chen po'i bsam pas/ sems rtas shing 'phel bar gyur kyang phu bo gnyis skrag cing sngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas/ smon pa mi 'grub par
160a1(rgyud): dogs pas/ phu bo gnyis la gcen gnyis slar gshegs shig/ bdag re shig slar mchiso zhes smraso// de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar
160a2(rgyud): tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas/ stag mo'i drung du phyin te/ gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ smon lam 'di skad btab po// bdag ni chos mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir/ 
160a3(rgyud): bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na// snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed g.yo ba med// skye bos phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed// byang chub nad med gdung ba med pas na// 
160a4(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos// khams gsum snga// ga bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun// deng bdag dra/ ngas nas bde la 'god par shog/ de nas rgyal bus tshig
160a5(rgyud): de skad smras nas/ stag mo rtogs pa'i mdun du lus bair te nyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang / snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag mos ci yang byed
160a6(rgyud): ma nuso// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong ba dang / ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni/ nyam chung zhing rlabs bdag la bza' bar mi nus so/ 
160a7(rgyud): snyam du bsams nas langs te/ mtshon btsal yang ma rnyed pas/ 'od ma skam po'i tshal pas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/ mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang / de'i tshe 'di ltar rlung
160a8(rgyud): gis chu bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g.yor bar gyur/ nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi ldan pas/ phyogs bcu kun tu mun nag tu gyur nas/ lha
160b1(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang / spos mchog dam pa'i char yang mngon par phab pas/ tshal gyi nang du kun tu khyab cing gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha tshogs mang po
160b2(rgyud): rnams kyis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang / rje su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo // zhes bsngags pa brjod do// thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs
160b3(rgyud): so leg so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ tshigasu bcad de smras pa// skyes bu chen po yongasu skyob pa snying rje'i sems bskyed nas// bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta// rab dpa'
160b4(rgyud): dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas// lus spangs po ngas skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'// nges par rta ga bde gya nom gnas phyin nas// 'khor ba 'ching ba mang po
160b5(rgyud): gtan du spong // ring por mi thogs byang chub 'bras thob na sa// nyer zhi bde ba skye mched mngon rtogs 'gyur// de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog
160b6(rgyud): mnas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang / khrag bldags te/ sha ma lus pa zos pas/ rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so// de nas rgyal bu chen pos sa g.yos pa mthong ba dang / nu bo la
160b7(rgyud): smras pa/ sa chen ri klung kun kyang rab tu g.yos// phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od mi ldan// lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab nas// 'di ni nu bos nges par lus spangs rtags/ 
160b8(rgyud): rgyal bu 'bring pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang / tshig su bcad de smras pa// stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ba// bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dogs mthong nas ni// sems
161a1(rgyud): can chen po skye ba bdag thos nas// nu bos lus btang deng bdag the tshom 'tshal// de nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas/ smre sngags
161a2(rgyud): bton te ngus nas/ gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung du phyin te/ nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/ rus pa dang sgra ni kun tu 'thor/ khrag babs pas ni rdzab tu gyur nas/ sa
161a3(rgyud): gzhi kun tu khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang / brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang gzungs ma nus pas/ rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/ ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang / langs nas lag
161a4(rgyud): pa bteg ste rab tu ngus nas smre sngags bton pa/ bdag cadag nu bo byad sdug mdzes/ pha ma gnyis ka lhag par bya dmas// ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas// lus spangs slar ni
161a5(rgyud): ldog ma gyur// gal te pha mas dris gyur na// bdag cag la na ni ji skad gdag/ lhan cig srog ni btang bla na/ rang gi lus nin ci phyir bzhag/ de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags
161a6(rgyud): bton te ngus nas/ yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo // de'i tshe rgyal bu tha chungs kyis khrid pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams phan tshun cig la cig 'di skad du/ rgyal bu gang na
161a7(rgyud): yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rig so zhes smras par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal bu'i btsun mo yang tog mthon po'i steng du nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ lhas ngan pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba 'di lta ste/ nu ma
161a8(rgyud): gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang / so lhung ba dang / phug ron gyi phru gu gsum thob pa las/ cig ni khras khyer/ gnyis ni sngangs shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to// sa g.yos
161b1(rgyud): pa'i tshe/ btsun mo sad de/ sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas/ 'di skad du smras so// ci'i phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g.yos// chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul// nyi ma 'od
161b2(rgyud): med g.yos shing bsgribs pa 'dra// mig 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yong mi 'dra// snying la mad sa phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir// lus kun/ rab tu g.yo zhing bde ba ci yang med// bdag
161b3(rgyud): gis rmi lam ltas ngan mthong bas na// nges par sngon med ltas ngan dngos po yod// btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las nu zho zags pa dang / 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon mi za bar ltas ngan gyi
161b4(rgyud): dngos po ston pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhi dag phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do// zhes zer ba thos pa dang / sems la shin tu skrag
161b5(rgyud): cing 'jigs pa skyes nas/ pho brang gi nang du song ste/ bcu na mo la 'di skad ces smraso// lha mo mkhyen lags/ sam/ slad rol gyi mi rnams las kun tu so sor btsal ba/ 
161b6(rgyud): las da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so// de nas btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang / mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal
161b7(rgyud): po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// lha chen po bdag gis slad rol gyi mi rnams la 'di skad du/ bdag gis bu sdug tha chung stor ces mchi ba thos legs so// rgyal
161b8(rgyud): bos tshig de thos pa dang / shin tu skrag par gyur pas/ bsnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du kyi hud sdug bsngal lo// deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas/ mchi ma
162a1(rgyud): phyis te btsun mo la spro ba bskyed nas 'di skad du bzhin bzangs khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ de deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/ 
162a2(rgyud): rgyal po btsun mo dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/ so sor gyes te phyogs kun tu btsal ba las/ ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nye bar
162a3(rgyud): 'ongs te/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha rgyal bu bzhugs zhes thos pas/ thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bu tha chungs ni da dung mi gda' lag so// rgyal pos
162a4(rgyud): tshig de thos pa dang / smre sngags bton nas/ 'di sa dad du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to// zhe/ sa smras par gyur to// dang po bu yod pa na dga' ba chung // 
162a5(rgyud): phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che// gal te bu srog ni slar thob na// nga yi lus shi sdug bsngal ci yang med// btsun mos de skad thos pa dang // dper na mangs phog/ 
162a6(rgyud): bzhin du mya ngan gyi kun tu dkris par gyur pas/ smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi bu ga sum 'khor dang bcas par ni// nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse ba las// bu sdug tha
162a7(rgyud): chungs gcig pu ma 'ongs pas// nges par bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos po yod 'gyur ba// de'i 'og tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa las rgyal pos blon po de la bu
162a8(rgyud): sdug gang na 'dug ces pa smras pa las/ blon po 'bring pos de yid la bcags te ngus pas/ lkog ma dang lce yang bskams nas tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang
162b1(rgyud): btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so// bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smos// bdag gi lus gdung kun tu bsregs par gyur// myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor// bdag gi/ 
162b2(rgyud): brang ni di ring gas snyam byed// de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongasu btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mos gtam
162b3(rgyud): de thos nas/ sme zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongasu btang ba'i sa phyogasu myur zhing rings par dong ste/ 'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpa' lus yongasu btang ba'i gnasu phyin
162b4(rgyud): nas rus pa rnams kun tu 'thor ba mthong ba dang / dag char sa la 'gyel te/ shi ba dang 'dra bar rgyal bar gyu dar pas/ de dper na rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po
162b5(rgyud): 'gyel pa bzhin du sems rmongs shing dran pa stor bas/ shes pa ci yang med par gyur to// de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun tu gtor ba dang / rgyal po dang / 
162b6(rgyud): btsun mo ring zhig lon nas/ gdod dran pa thob par gyur to// de nas lag pa bteg ste/ 'dug nas smre tshig gi smras pa/ kyi hud bu sdug mdzes pa'i mtshan ldan pa/ ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i
162b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses// gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shi na// 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur// de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas
162b8(rgyud): kyang skra long long por gyur te/ lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas// nya skams la 'gyel pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ste/ ba bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smre tshig smras pa/ bdag gi bu ni/ 
163a1(rgyud): sus btubs na// rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor// mya ngan skye ba rang mi theg/ kyi hud bu ni sus bsad na// mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra mthong // bdag snying rdo
163a2(rgyud): ni ma yin nam// ci yi phyir nags ma gyur// bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis// gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang // so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na// deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong // 
163a3(rgyud): phug ron phrug gu gsum las ni// cig ni khras khyer mthong bas na// deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas// ltas ngan ston la mi bden med// de nas rgyal po chen po de btsun mo dang / bu gnyis
163a4(rgyud): dang bcas par brtse bar btugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bzhag pa'i lus kyi ring bsrel bsdus
163a5(rgyud): te/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa 'a de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par bya'o// yang tshe dang ldan
163a6(rgyud): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga sngon 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na yang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / 
163a7(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu yang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu bskyabs nas phan btags te/ nges par 'byung ba thob par byas nas/ da ltar nyon mongs pa
163a8(rgyud): thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag med do// lha dang mi yi ston par gyur nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas// sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du//
