189b6(rgyud): sgrub cing g.yel ba med par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i don dang / bzod pa zab mo bstan pa/ bcom
189b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la mngon du thos nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// deng bzod bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang / ring
189b8(rgyud): bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag cing sems can rnams la phan pa rgya cher mdzad pa/ 'di 'tshal bar gyur nas/ lus dang sems dga' zhing rangs pa ngo mtshar du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
190a1(rgyud): sku tshe'i tshad 'di bstan pa na// grangs med dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
190a2(rgyud): skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog yang stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ slar
190a3(rgyud): yang rang gi gnas de nyid du 'dug go/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / 
190a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i
190a5(rgyud): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ gser dang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dam
190a6(rgyud): pas mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa shin tu zab pa de tshul bzhin
190a7(rgyud): ji ltar sgrub par bgyi zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / khyod la de'i don rnam par phye ste bstan par
190a8(rgyud): bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku rnam pa gsum mnga' ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ sprul pa'i sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / chos kyi sku'o// 'di lta bu'i sku
190b1(rgyud): gsum spyan gyis grub pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin te/ gang gis de mngon du gyur pa rnams 'khor ba la 'byung bar byed do// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas
190b2(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku shes par bya zhe na/ rigs kyi du de ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngonas rnam par sbyong ba'i dus na/ skye bo thams cad kyi phyir chos rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub bo// de ltar spyod pa sbyangs pas rnal
190b3(rgyud): 'byor gyi mthar phyin pa yin no// rnal 'byor de'i stobs kyis dbang chen po thob dbang chen po'i mthus skye bo'i bsam pa ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / khams ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad
190b4(rgyud): mngon du gyur nas/ dus la mi bzhes/ dus la mi 'da'/ gnas dang 'thun pa/ dus dang 'thun pa spyod pa dang 'thun ba chos bshad pa dang yang 'thun par sku rnam pa sna tshogs
190b5(rgyud): ston pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na bya/ nga chub sems dpas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes pa ra bya zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub
190b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams la thogs pa med par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa ston te 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa nyid shes par bya ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta
190b7(rgyud): ba bsal nas/ sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i rgyur gyur pas/ bden pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi
190b8(rgyud): ye shes dang 'thun par sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus/ sku de ston par 'gyur te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa/ 'od sku la 'khor ba grub pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs
191a1(rgyud): pa'i sku zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sku shes par bya zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba/ dge
191a2(rgyud): ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/ de kho na nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid tsam du gnas pa de ni chos sku zhes bya'o// sku snga ma de gnyis ni btags pa tsa mo// chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste/ sku de gnyis
191a3(rgyud): kyi gzhi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ye shes phun su
191a4(rgyud): tshogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i mthar phyin pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyis rnam par dag pa bsnyes pa'i phyir/ chos kyi de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas
191a5(rgyud): kyi chos rnams yongasu 'dzin to// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sa ngas rgyas thams cad ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi mthar phyin pa ste/ de la chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis ni bdag gi don mdzad// 
191a6(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni gzhan gyi don mdzad do// bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don mdzad pa la dbang brnyes pa'i phyir mdzad pa mtha' yas pa sna tshogs lhun gyis grub po// de bas na sangs rgyas
191a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa/ rnam pa mang po khyad par du bstan to// rigs kyi bu dper na rnam par rtog pa'i sems la brten nas/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa mang po dang / las rnam
191a8(rgyud): pa mang po dang / 'bras bu rnam pa mang po ston pa de bzhin du chos kyi chos nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna/ 
191b1(rgyud): tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs mang po ston to// chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang phun sum tshogs pa/ 
191b2(rgyud): brnyes pa de ni dam pa dpag par dka' ba yin no// dper na nam mkha' la ri mo bris te/ rgyan du byas pa de ni dpag par dka' ba yino// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i chos dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes
191b3(rgyud): la brten nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa yang dpag par dka' ba yino// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing / phrin
191b4(rgyud): las la mnga' brnyes pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang smon lam la mnga' brnyes pas/ phrin las kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang mdzad// 
191b5(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyis don thams cad grub par mnga' mdzad pa'ang de bzhin no// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin du snyoms
191b6(rgyud): par zhugs pa las sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis/ bsam gtan de las bzhengs te/ don dang phrin las thams cad mdzad pa ltar chos rnam pa gnyis kyang rnam par rtog pa med par/ don thams
191b7(rgyud): cad mdzad pa la mnga' brnyes pa'o// rigs kyi bu dper na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba la yang rnam par rtog pa med/ chu dang me long la yang rnam par rtog pa med/ snang ba la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/ 
191b8(rgyud): gsum 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo // de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/ smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can skal ba can
192a1(rgyud): dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku yang nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan bzhin rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa la byung ngo // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na/ tshad med grangs med
192a2(rgyud): ba'i chu dang me long dag ni snang ba la brten nas stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag snang ngo // stong pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
192a3(rgyud): sku dang / sprul pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams la chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par smon lam gyi dbang gis sku de gnyis snang ste/ mtshan sna tshogasu snang na yang chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa medado// 
192a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu sku de gnyis la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya da dan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo // chos kyi sku las dgongs te/ 
192a5(rgyud): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsu ngaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ der ni chos thams cad zad pa 'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir/ sku 'di gsum la brten nas/ sangs
192a6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa zhes bshad do// sku gnyis po ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi gsung ste/ chos kyi sku las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas
192a7(rgyud): med pa'i phyiraro// ci'i phyir sku gnyis po la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya zhe na/ sku de gnyis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa btags pa tsam pas skad cig tu skye zhing / 'gag pa rtag par mi gnas pa
192a8(rgyud): dang / yang dang yang du 'byung bas ma nges pa ltar chos kyi sku ni de lta ma yino// de'i phyir sku de gnyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya'o// chos kyi sku yang de dang mi gnyis pa'i phyir mya ngan las
192b1(rgyud): 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin pas sku de gsum las brten te/ mi gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni mtshan nyid gsum gyi
192b2(rgyud): phyir 'ching ba dang / sgrib pa yod pas sku gsum las ring du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang / yongasu grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// 
192b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid rnams shes pa dang / 'gog pa dang dag par ma gyur pa de'i phyir sku gsum ma thob bo// de lta bu'i mtshan nyid gsum shes pa dang / 'gog pa dang rnam par byang bar gyur pas/ sangs
192b4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sku gsum yongasu rdzogs pa ngar gyur to// rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi das rnam par shes pa gsum ma spangs pa'i phyir sku gsum las
192b5(rgyud): ring du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ dngos po la 'jug pa/ 'i rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'o// lam sbyong ba dag
192b6(rgyud): la gnas pas 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sbyong ngo // gcod pa'i lam la gnas pas/ kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid sbyong ngo // mchog tu rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pas/ kun gzhi'i rnam
192b7(rgyud): par shes pa sbyangaso// 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sbyangs na/ sprul pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro// kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid sbyangs pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston to// kun gzhi'i rnam par
192b8(rgyud): shes pa sbyangs pas ni/ chos kyi sku 'thob ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu
193a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang spyod pa 'thun pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang dgongs pa 'thun
193a2(rgyud): pa'o// chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku ni so so'i skye bo'i yid dang 'thun par rnam pa mang pos mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'i phyir mang po
193a3(rgyud): zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa gcig pas/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig pa ces bya'o// chos kyi sku ni mtshan ma sna tshogs las yang dag par
193a4(rgyud): 'das pa mtshan mar bzung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste/ de bas na gcig pa'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa'ang ma yin pa/ zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu sprul pa'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
193a5(rgyud): la brten te mngon par snang ngo // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni/ chos kyi sku la brten te mngon par snangango // chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste/ ci la yang mi gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu sku de
193a6(rgyud): gsum ni rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod/ mi rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// sprul pa'i sku ni thabs mkhas pas gnas thams cad du dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun mi
193a7(rgyud): 'chad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya'o// de gzhir ma gyur pas mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni
193a8(rgyud): thogs ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun mi 'chad cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ma 'dres pas yongs su 'dzin cing sdud pa'i phyir/ sems can zad pa med pas/ spyod pa yang mi zad de/ de'i phyir rtag pa zhes
193b1(rgyud): bya'o// de yang gzhir ma gyur pa'i phyir mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston par mi rtag pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku ni 'du byed kyi chos ma yin pa mtshan ma tha dad pa med pa rtsa ba dang gzhir gyur/ 
193b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ na mkha' ji lta ba bzhin pas de ni rtag pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na 'phags pa'i ye shes med do// de bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid las kyang lhag pa'i spyod
193b3(rgyud): yul med do// de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin de gnyis kyi de bzhin nyid ni gcig pa yang ma yin tha dad pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni ye shes rnam par
193b4(rgyud): dag pa dang / spangs pa rnam par dag pa gnyis kyi phyir/ chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o// ri gas kyi bu gzhan yang sku 'di gsum dbye ba la rnam pa bzhi ste/ 
193b5(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa/ yang yod/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa 'i sku ma yin pa yang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod
193b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa yang yod/ sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ma yin pa'o// sprul pa'i sku yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin
193b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das su zin kyang / smon lam gyi dbang gis skal pa ji lta ba bzhin phan 'dogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/ sprul pa'i sku ma
193b8(rgyud): yin pa gang zhe na/ sa'i snga rol pa'i sku'o// sprul pa'i sku yang yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang yin pa de gang de ni/ lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku'o// sprul pa'i sku yang
194a1(rgyud): yin la/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ma yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku de ni chos gnyi su med pa mngon du gyur pa'o// gnyis gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku
194a2(rgyud): de la mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gnyi ga med pa ste/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin no// gcig pa yang ma yin no// tha dad pa yang ma yin/ bgrang ba yang ma yin/ bgrang bar/ 
194a3(rgyud): mi bya ba yang ma yin/ snang ba yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin pa ste/ de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid kyi gzhir yang mi dmigs/ yod pa dang med par yang
194a4(rgyud): mi dmigs/ gcig pa dang tha dad par yang mi dmigs/ bgrang bar yang mi dmigs/ bgrang bar mi bya bar yang mi dmigs/ snang ba dang mun par yang mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di
194a5(rgyud): ltar spyod yul rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag/ pa de dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhir gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir na chos kyi sku de ni de bzhin
194a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mdzad pa sna tshogs mngon du gyur pa'o// rigs kyi bu sku 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen dang spyod yul dang / gnas dang 'bras bu dag gzhi nyid la brten pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ don de
194a7(rgyud): mngon par shes na/ sku de nyid theg pa chen po'o// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ sku de la brten nas/ sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sa
194a8(rgyud): yongasu sbyong ba'i sems mngon par 'byung ste/ sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang mngon du 'gyur ba dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gnas pa'i sems dang / rdo rje lte bu'i ting 'dzin
194b1(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yang mngon par 'byung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku la brten
194b2(rgyud): nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po yang mngon du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas/ ye shes chen po thams cad kyang snang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na sku gnyis/ 
194b3(rgyud): niting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chos kyi sku 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid la brten nas rtag pa zhes bya'o// bdag ces bya'o// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten pas na
194b4(rgyud): bde ba zhes bya'o// ye shes chen po la brten pas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par bde ba dang / rnam par dag pa la mnga' brnyes shing
194b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten pas/ pa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i/ ting nge'adzin thams cad dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs
194b6(rgyud): pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams cad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / gzungs thams cad dang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang / dbang thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid
194b7(rgyud): kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'byung ngo // ye shes chen po la brten pas ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sor yang dag
194b8(rgyud): par rig pa bzhi la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos thams cad dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste dper na yid
195a1(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las brten nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med grangs med pa thams cad snang bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po ma
195a2(rgyud): dang / ye shes chen po'i rin po che la brten nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med tshad med pa mngon du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de ltar na chos kyi sku
195a3(rgyud): dang / ting 'dzin dang / ye shes ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan mas mi gos pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ rtag pa yang ma yin/ chad pa yang ma yin pa ste/ de ni dbu
195a4(rgyud): ma'i lam bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// rnam par rtog pa yod par sna dang yang / ngo bo nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa yang med/ gas ma du bgrangs pa yang yod mod kyi/ dngos po gsum du'ang
195a5(rgyud): med do// 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa de ni rmi lam dang / sgyu ma lta bu ste/ gzung ba yang med 'dzin pa yang med do// chos kyi ngo bo'i de bzhin nyid ni rnam par grol ba'i gnas
195a6(rgyud): te/ 'chi bdag gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'khor ba'i mun pa las mngon du rgal ba/ skye bo thams cad kyis sgrub par mi nus pa/ mthar phyin par mi nus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang
195a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bzhugs par bya ba'i gnas so// rigs kyi bu dper na/ gang la la zhig gser 'dod de/ gnas kun tu btsal ba las gser gyi sbrang bu rnyed nas/ sbram bu de zhib
195a8(rgyud): du btags te/ snying po bzhu zhing sbyangs nas/ rnam par byang bar gyur pa dang gser de gdu bu la sogs pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du bsgyur te/ spyad kyang gser gyi rang bzhin nyid ni mi
195b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'jig rten gyi dge ba spyong par mos pa de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag mthong ste/ 
195b2(rgyud): bar bsnyen nas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni gang mi dge ba ni gang / yang dag pa'i sgrub pa gang bgyis pas/ rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
195b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de'i 'khor dag gis 'di skad ces 'dri ba la 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag ni/ dam pa'i chos nyan par mos pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'dod pa ste/ 
195b4(rgyud): 'di dag la yang dag pa'i chos bstan to snyam mo// de thos na ngas kyang tshul bzhin yid la bya ste/ nan tan gyis bsam/ pa skyes shing / brtson par gyur pa'i mthus/ le lo'i sgrib
195b5(rgyud): pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad bsal te/ bslab pa'i gnas thams cad la rab tu gus par gan sa shing / sems bying ba dang / rgod pa bsal te/ sa dang
195b6(rgyud): po la 'jug go/ sa dang po'i sems la brten nas/ sems can mang po'i don la brtson pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas sa gnyis pa la 'jug go/ sa de las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas
195b7(rgyud): sa gsum pa la 'jug go/ sa de las sems rnam par sbyong ba la sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa bzhi pa la 'jug go/ sa de las thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa lnga pa la 'jug go/ sa de las
195b8(rgyud): don dam pa dang / kun rdzob du dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa drug pa la 'jug go/ sa de las mtshan ma dang / spyod pa la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa bdun pa la 'jug go/ sa de las
196a1(rgyud): mtshan ma 'gog par yang mi dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa brgyad pa la 'jug go/ sa de las mtshan mar skye bar mi dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa dgu pa
196a2(rgyud): la 'jug go/ sa de las drug mngon par shes pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/ sa bcu pa la 'jug go/ sa de las shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa
196a3(rgyud): la 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni rnam par dag pa gsum gyi phyir/ rab tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / sdug bsngal rnam par dag
196a4(rgyud): pa dang / mtshan ma rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar gser bzang dpo bzhu zhing btul te/ sbyangs pa la rdul dang dri mas phyir mi dgos shing / rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gser nyid du snang ste/ 
196a5(rgyud): gser gyi dngos po rnam par dag pa yang med par gyur pa ma yi/ na pa bzhin no// dper na chu rnyog pa can dngas te/ rnam par dngas nas chu'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar gyur pa yin gyi// 
196a6(rgyud): chu de nyid med par gyur pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi sku yang nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'dus pa spangs nas/ bag chags ma lus par bsal te/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo
196a7(rgyud): bo rnam par dag pa nyid snang bar gyur pa yin gyi/ dngos po med par gyur pa nyid ni ma yin no// yang dper na/ na mkha' la du ba dang / sprin dang rdul dang / na bun gyis bsgribs pa de med par gyur na/ 
196a8(rgyud): namakha'i khams de rnam par dag par gyur pa yin gyi na mkha' de nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sku
196b1(rgyud): nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no// gzhan yang dper na 'ga' zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na chu chen pos khyer nas/ lus dang rkang lag bskyod de/ lus dang sems 'bad pa dang bcas pas
196b2(rgyud): pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin pa rmi'o// rmi lam de las sad pa dang / chu dang phan tshun gyi 'gram tha dad pa yod pa mthong ba med kyang / sems nyid med pa ma yin no// 'khor bar rnam par rtog pa zang
196b3(rgyud): pa yang blo rnam par dag pa ste/ sangs rgyas pa de med pa ma yin no// de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ 
196b4(rgyud): yang dag pa'i sku ni med pa ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi dbu chos kyi sku ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par ro longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang bar 'gyuraro// las kyi sgrib pa
196b5(rgyud): rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i sku snang bar 'gyuraro// ye shes kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas chos kyi sku snang bar 'gyuraro// dper na stong pa la brten nas glog 'byung / glog la brten
196b6(rgyud): te 'od snang ngo // de bzhin du chos kyi sku la brten te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te/ sprul pa'i sku snang ngo // de la rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i
196b7(rgyud): phyir chos kyi skur snang ngo // ye shes rnam par dag pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i skur snang ngo // de gsum rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi de
196b8(rgyud): bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / mthas klas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad
197a1(rgyud): ni sku tha mi dad do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po'o// zhes smra zhing mos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
197a2(rgyud): gnyi su med par bsam pa thag pa nas shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir spyod yul thams cad la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa yongasasu bsam pas/ chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyisu med pa dang / 
197a3(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba de la ji lta ji ltar gnyisu med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pas/ de lta de ltar sgrib pa thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 
197a4(rgyud): ji tsam du sgrib pa byang bar gyur pa de tsam du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa mchog tho/ dab par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid
197a5(rgyud): dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin du dang nga phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin cing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad kyang sbyong bar 'gyur
197a6(rgyud): ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de ni yang dag pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes dang / bden pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong ba de ni yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'phags
197a7(rgyud): pa'i gzigs pa zhes bya/ yang dag pa bden pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul bzhin du chos nyid mthong ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
197a8(rgyud): pa thams cad mngon du gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum las mngon par 'byung zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol bas/ 'phags pa'i
197b1(rgyud): gang zag de lta bus mthong bar mi nus so// de ma mthong bas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni thams cad kyang phyin ci log gis bslang ba dang / log pa'i rnam par rtog pas shes par mi nus te/ dper
197b2(rgyud): na shin tu mthu chung ba'i ri bong gi rgyal gyis rgya mtsho mi rgal ba bzhin du/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i shes pas/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par shes par mi nus so// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
197b3(rgyud): rnam par rtog pa med par chos thams cad la dbang chen po brnyes pa/ rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yin te/ gzhan dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'o// 
197b4(rgyud): de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bskal pa tsha dad med grangs med par sku dang srog mi phangs par dka' dab spyod pas/ shin tu mchog dam pa bla na med pa bsam
197b5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa tshig dang brjod pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ shin tu zhi ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sku de brnyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos
197b6(rgyud): kyi chos nyid shes shing mthong ba ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba med par yun ring du 'tsho ba'o// gnyid kyis log pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa med par sems rtag par ting nge
197b7(rgyud): 'dzin du gnas te g.yo zhing spros pa med pa'o// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la spros pa dang / bcas pa'i sems skyes na/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig
197b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bshad pa 'di phan pa dang bcas pas te/ sus mdo 'di thos pa des gcan zan dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / skye bo mi bsrungs pa rnams dang / yang phrad
198a1(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro// chos 'di thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang zad par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni lung du mi ston pa dang / yul thams cad
198a2(rgyud): la mkhyen par bzhed pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga'o// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la dgongs pa tha dad pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la ma btags pa'i lung ston pa mi mnga'o// sangs
198a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ye shes kyis ma bzung ba med do// chos thams cad la thugs rjes ma zin pa med do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bas ma
198a4(rgyud): bzung ba med do// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde 'di thos te/ mos na de sem das can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang lha ma yin
198a5(rgyud): gyi gnas su nam yang mi ltung ngo // rtag tu lha dang mi'i gnasu skye ste/ dman par mi skye ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing / dam pa'i chos nyan
198a6(rgyud): cing 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dag tu skye bar yang 'gyur te/ de ni chos shin tu zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
198a7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang mkhyen cing lung yang ston to// gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos 'di rna lam du
198a8(rgyud): lan cig thos pa yang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang za bar mi 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos la mi rmod/ 'phags pa rnams la mi brnyas/ skye dgu thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa ni skyed par/ 
198b1(rgyud): byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa rnams ni 'phel ba dang / yongasu smin par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa stobs par byed do// de nas byang
198b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i lha rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud
198b3(rgyud): nas/ shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
198b4(rgyud): 'di 'chad pa'i gnas de dang / yul de dag tu phan pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der rgyal po pha rol po'i dgra dang dpung dar ba yis mi tshugs
198b5(rgyud): pa dang / nad thams cad gsal zhing tshe ring ba dang / bkra shi sa shing bde bas yang dag pa'i chos ston par byed do// btsun mo dang / slas dang / sras dang / sras mo dang / blon
198b6(rgyud): po rnams kyang 'dum zhing / rtsod pa med pa dang / gtsam dang sgyus mcho ba spangs pas/ rgyal pos gnang zhing bkur bar 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa dam pa'i chos
198b7(rgyud): spyod cing / nad med pa dang / bde bas glo bur du 'chi ba med pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub cing yongasu 'dzin pa dang / gang dus thams cad du 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi
198b8(rgyud): 'phrod pa med pa dang / rtag par lha rnams kyis srung zhing skyob pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje mnyam pas/ gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba'i sems med pa dang / sems can rnams dkon
199a1(rgyud): mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub par smon lam 'deb so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu mdo sde 'di rgyas par bgyi ba'i
199a2(rgyud): slad du/ mdo sde 'di su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i gan su mchi zhing phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ leg so leg so rigs kyi bu de ltar de
199a3(rgyud): bzhin du khyed kyis kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di/ 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir spel ba dang / rgyas par bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
199a4(rgyud): po las/ sku gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes/ dpa'i tog gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba
199a5(rgyud): dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che'i ba
199a6(rgyud): DUR+Ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing / 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de na yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i
199a7(rgyud): sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag rjesu dran no// rjesu dran nas kyang
199a8(rgyud): de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ byin
199b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
199b2(rgyud): mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ rmi lam na rnga'i sgra las tshig su bcad pa gang dag thos pa de dag gsol to// nub cig g.yel ba med par
199b3(rgyud): yang // bdag gi rmi lam rmis pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnamasu snang bar gyur// 
199b4(rgyud): kun tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUR+Ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs
199b5(rgyud): ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung // ga ser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten
199b6(rgyud): gsum 'di na// ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal las// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ 
199b7(rgyud): ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar
199b8(rgyud): skye dgu'i ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i sgra ldan gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
200a1(rgyud): dam pa mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ 
200a2(rgyud): nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag
200a3(rgyud): / rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi gyur nas// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyi tshe rabs brgya dag dang // tshe rabs stong phrag
200a4(rgyud): bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig// de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che'i sgra skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed
200a5(rgyud): gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang
200a6(rgyud): yin pa// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi re kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzang skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya
200a7(rgyud): ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'a/ 
200a8(rgyud): yis ni/ de dag rnams kyis sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par ni gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur/ 
200b1(rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs rtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig
200b2(rgyud): pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnamasu mi 'dzin dang // 
200b3(rgyud): dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang // phyugs pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ 
200b4(rgyud): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nye bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang / nyes pa'i dmigasum bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang
200b5(rgyud): bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yi 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun/ pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyuradang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo ngag
200b6(rgyud): ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo
200b7(rgyud): dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs sgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa
200b8(rgyud): gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// 
201a1(rgyud): nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyod pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul
201a2(rgyud): gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad
201a3(rgyud): bdag 'chag so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// dam chos smra ba rnams
201a4(rgyud): la yang / gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang / dgus pa ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag/ so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni
201a5(rgyud): spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs
201a6(rgyud): bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las
201a7(rgyud): 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las
201a8(rgyud): de kun thar bgyid nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di/ 
201b1(rgyud): sems can de dag ston gyur cig/ gang gis bskal pa stong rnamasu// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan gcig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las
201b2(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par shog/ 
201b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig/ srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis// thams cad mkhyen tu
201b4(rgyud): rdzogs par shog/ ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // ga zungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi/ stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar shog
201b5(rgyud): dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la/ rnam par gzigasu gsol// thugs rjer ldan pa'i thug/ sa kyis ni// nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol// bdag gis
201b6(rgyud): bskal pa brgya rnams// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzor// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu
201b7(rgyud): dman par gyur// gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rjer ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu gzung du
201b8(rgyud): gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// thugs rje'i chu yis bkru
202a1(rgyud): bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// 
202a2(rgyud): nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam
202a3(rgyud): pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// sid kyi rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ 
202a4(rgyud): de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// mi dge las bcu spangs na sa su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis la// sa bcu la ni bad dag gnas shing // stobs bcu mchog tu gyur par shog/ 
202a5(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid/ ba// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag tham sa cad gshegs par bgyi// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir gang dag/ 
202a6(rgyud): dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gi bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag
202a7(rgyud): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par shog/ srid 'gror nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi nyams spyan sngar mchis nas ni// 
202a8(rgyud): sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyams nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam ngag yo sems nyam nga ba // lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bas / 
202b1(rgyud): de chag so// byis pa thun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // ngal ba'i nyam nga
202b2(rgyud): dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga bdag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang
202b3(rgyud): ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabasu mchi// rgyal ba de dag rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od // 
202b4(rgyud): med rnam dag bai DUR+Ya'i yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal/ gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i'o// da zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab
202b5(rgyud): tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan la ga dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa zla ba'i 'od zer dra
202b6(rgyud): bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od
202b7(rgyud): zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUR+Ya// skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba
202b8(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs legs rgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes// mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rga ba'i rba rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// 
203a1(rgyud): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ze lnga po rnams kyis bskams// yan lag gser gyi mchog tu rnam par snang // 
203a2(rgyud): shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa
203a3(rgyud): las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar na mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par
203a4(rgyud): mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal zhing bsams kyang ni// yo na tan mtha' ma shes par mi nuso// sku ni sgra yi rtse mo tshang cu ma dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskul/ 
203a5(rgyud): par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon te/ na shes par mi nu so// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe
203a6(rgyud): byang bzang po brgyad cus rgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog/ 'gro la ban phyin
203a7(rgyud): chos kyang ston gyur cig/ sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir bar byed sheg/ stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog/ bskal pa bsam rgyas ma/ 
203a8(rgyud): khya gnas kyu chog/ bdud rgya'i chulas sems can chem byed shog/ ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs paltar// ba ra la byin drug tha me rdzogs pa shon// nyon mongs bcom ni'i sdug bsngal sa ma gru
203b1(rgyud): cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang tig mug zhi byed shog/ tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu tshe rabs dran par shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos
203b2(rgyud): shog/ bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog/ sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong gyur cig/ dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog/ 
203b3(rgyud): zhing rnams kun na srogs chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhir gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun di ring dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad
203b4(rgyud): btab nyams chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyab sa med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur ci dag/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal
203b5(rgyud): po chom rkun dgras bsdigs bsad thug dang // sdug bsngal rna ma pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa// sems can nya ma thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog
203b6(rgyud): mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcings pas bcings gzir ba// phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs
203b7(rgyud): pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cig/ rdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar par shog/ bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs gyur thams cad
203b8(rgyud): 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag bkres sred skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ longs pas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas yid
204a1(rgyud): 'od sbra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// 
204a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sems can thams cad lta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag/ 
204a3(rgyud): tu bde ba du ma sogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang // chu mig mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka dag/ 
204a4(rgyud): gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal 'dab ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshog biDUr+ya// de dag dbasams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug
204a5(rgyud): bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthongam gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yis 'jig rten phun sum
204a6(rgyud): tshogs gang yod// de dag bsams par skye bar de dag gyur// bsams pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bu yongasu rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug
204a7(rgyud): pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // ljon shing ngag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cing // de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad
204a8(rgyud): dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs bcu rnamasu mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi
204b1(rgyud): khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal po dam pa mchog thob gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigasu skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru'i mdzod
204b2(rgyud): rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par rgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul pong mkhas
204b3(rgyud): shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUR+Ya'i// khri
204b4(rgyud): la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang / de dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams pa sgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ 
204b5(rgyud): sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams ca da ma lus zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bci ngas gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i theg pas dam bcing
204b6(rgyud): pa/ shes rab lag gis bcings pa khrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thob gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams
204b7(rgyud): na/ bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa// de dag kun la rje su yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sgrub pa yis// bdag gis rje su yi rang bsod nams des// bdag gi smon grub 'bras
204b8(rgyud): bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongasu bsngo ba'i brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa/ 
205a1(rgyud): drug cung ngan song spong bar gyur// tshig su bcad pa brjod pa 'ang dag gis// skyes pa zad med bram ze'i rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'jug ste rgyal ba gang 'grong / 
205a2(rgyud): pa/ tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyi yan lag rgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag
205a3(rgyud): tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar gshegs pa 'di ni grags gyur pa// de dag sa ng+yas gcig gis gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu
205a4(rgyud): la min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas/ ma yin// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcadad pa de dag gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes
205a5(rgyud): pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs lag so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rmi lamaH/ gser gyi rnga las de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa
205a6(rgyud): dang / sdig pa bshags pa 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde bas tshim par byed do// sgrib pa/ 
205a7(rgyud): thams cad byang bar 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig/ 'di lta bu'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni thams cad kyang sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod
205a8(rgyud): ba dang / smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag thos par gyur pa yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams
205b1(rgyud): cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo do// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam na bshags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
205b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rnam par dbye ba la bzhugs te/ shin tu zab mo mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ sku'i ba spu'i bug dag nas 'od ce
205b3(rgyud): kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa byung bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od de'i nang du snang bar gyur pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang dpe dang
205b4(rgyud): tshad kyis skrun par mi nuso// stegs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer nges snang bar gyur pa'i sems can dag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / mtshams med pa lnga
205b5(rgyud): byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la bkur ba 'debs pa dang / bla ma dang gnyen pa la srid du chung ba dang / slob / len dang / bram ze la bkur sti mi byed pa rnams/ sems can
205b6(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi gan sa ltung bar gyur pa de dag gi gan su 'od des reg ma thag tu bde ba so sor myong bar gyur to// gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od de'i mthus thams cad
205b7(rgyud): bde zhing nyams dga' ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs legs pa'i mchog thob pas mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs
205b8(rgyud): pa rnams mthong bar 'gyu ro// de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i tshogs mang po dang gang+gA'i lha mo la sogs te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag ya mtshad gyur pa'i 'od des bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga
206a1(rgyud): la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos
206a2(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
206a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
206a4(rgyud): ba 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'datshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor
206a5(rgyud): bshags par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces pa ka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
206a6(rgyud): bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang
206a7(rgyud): rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo
206a8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten gsum la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha
206b1(rgyud): dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dag da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
206b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi
206b3(rgyud): char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu brdung ba/ chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ 
206b4(rgyud): nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de da dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma dachod pa'i gnas/ phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/ ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/ 
206b5(rgyud): mkhyen par gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag la bdag mgo dang / ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshalo// 
206b6(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis gzir ba 'am/ gti mug gis gzir ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis las kyi sgrib pa
206b7(rgyud): gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ sangs rgyas su ma 'tshal ba dang / chosu ma 'tshal ba dang / dge 'dun du ma 'tshal ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge bar ma 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems
206b8(rgyud): kyis khrag byung ba dang / chos spangs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang / dge slong dgra bcom pa kum pa dang / pha ma 'akum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum/ ngag gi rnam pa 'ani/ yid kyi rnam pa
207a1(rgyud): gsum ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjesu yi rang ba dang / sems can kha cig la ngag rtsub bo smras pa dang / skur pa
207a2(rgyud): btab pa dang / srang la g.yo bgyis pa dang / gzhal ba la g.yo bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba drug tu 'khor bar 'khor ba dang / pha ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang / gang zag gi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge
207a3(rgyud): 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang / ji ltar bslab pa'i bzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang / 'gal bar bgyis pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis bsgo ba
207a4(rgyud): ma mnyan pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs dpa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ de
207a5(rgyud): las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la mi snyan par bgyis pa/ dang / smyos pa dang / brdegs pa dang / de dag la tha ba dang / zhe sdang bskyed pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna las byung
207a6(rgyud): ba'i sems kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang / dam pa'i chos la chos ma lags zhes bgyis pa dang / chos ma lags pa la dam pa'i chos lags zhes bgyis/ 
207a7(rgyud): pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor
207a8(rgyud): 'chag so// mthol lo mi 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// bdag las kyi sgrib po gang gis bsgribs te/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma
207b1(rgyud): yin gyi tshogs kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun mnyes par bgyis par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi khom pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di nyid la rnam pa
207b2(rgyud): smin te/ gzhan du mi myong bar shog shig/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du myur pa/ chang mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan
207b3(rgyud): pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chag so// mthol lo mi 'cha'o// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na las kyi sgom
207b4(rgyud): pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / ma bcabs pa de bzhin du/ dbadag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshag so// ma zol lo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad kyang mi bgyid// ji ltar ma'o/ 
207b5(rgyud): pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chab par
207b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa so sor bshag so// mthol lo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
207b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po dag/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ las kyi phyir las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / mtho lo// mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams sor bshags so// 
207b8(rgyud): mtho lo// mi 'cha'o// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 
208a1(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang / so sor bshags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshag so// mtholo// mi 'cha'o
208a2(rgyud): slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas/ 'di bzhin
208a3(rgyud): du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa nor che ba longs spyod che ba/ sa le
208a4(rgyud): snga ma dang / nor dang / yo byad mang ba/ shin tu skyid pa/ brko na pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa dades kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags
208a5(rgyud): par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bgyi'o// su bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa/ nor che
208a6(rgyud): ba/ longs spyod che ba/ sa le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang ba/ shin tu skyid pa/ bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor
208a7(rgyud): bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so/ 
208a8(rgyud): sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams
208b1(rgyud): so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de bzhin du/ su 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs
208b2(rgyud): pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod
208b3(rgyud): nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / sems can 'du shes pa dang / gya nom snang dang / shin tu mthong dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / mtshungs par skye bar
208b4(rgyud): 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so so// dar bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang / mi bya'o// su gzugs med pa na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
208b5(rgyud): du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mche da du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
208b6(rgyud): mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi
208b7(rgyud): bya'o// su rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du
208b8(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rigs pa gsum mam/ mngon par shes pa drug gam/ stobs rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
209a1(rgyud): sam/ nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nyan thos dbang che bar grags pa 'am/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa
209a2(rgyud): rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / 
209a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi
209a4(rgyud): bcab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA da ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang
209a5(rgyud): rkyen gzhan dang / gzhan gyis gzhan skye'o// gzhan 'ag go// de la 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa/ za da pa dang bral ba rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la yang las kyi
209a6(rgyud): sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// de ltar na 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung ba ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
209a7(rgyud): pas chos thams cad ni ston pa/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las
209a8(rgyud): byung yang bdag kyang yod pa ma yino// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la lo zhig 'di lta ste/ sems can med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gan
209b1(rgyud): pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni so sor bshags pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
209b2(rgyud): bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang
209b3(rgyud): rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtse ba rnams la rje su yi rang bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
209b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka/ da' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi dbu mos/ nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du bla gos
209b5(rgyud): phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la bcugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du phyogs pa nu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung
209b6(rgyud): ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/ de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i
209b7(rgyud): mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med
209b8(rgyud): pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pas rje su yi rang ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims
210a1(rgyud): las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la yang rjesu yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi/ 
210a2(rgyud): rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / 
210a3(rgyud): tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi
210a4(rgyud): rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo // bya// nga chub sems dpa' gang dag da ltar na/ sems dang po// bskyed pa de dag gi dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang
210a5(rgyud): ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems de pa'i bskal pa brgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phu nga po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i
210a6(rgyud): chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis
210a7(rgyud): thogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rjesu yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi
210a8(rgyud): rang ngo po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa
210b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom par
210b2(rgyud): bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / lhag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pas rje su yi rang ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
210b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog
210b4(rgyud): gis rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang nga / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / ltag na med pa dang / mnyam
210b5(rgyud): pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa
210b6(rgyud): de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang ba dam/ 
210b7(rgyud): pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang / phul dang / gya nom dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / lta ga na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rje su yi rang
210b8(rgyud): ngo// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin
211a1(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
211a2(rgyud): nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan pa/ chos kyi tshul rab tu gzung ba chos kyi char rab tu phab pa/ chos kyi char rab tu btang ba/ chos kyi tha tu jug rdzob rje phe 'dus
211a3(rgyud): chos kyi dung bus pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod tu 'dzud pa gang lags pa
211a4(rgyud): dang / de la nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi dag pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'am/ de la des gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
211a5(rgyud): pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang bas na/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnya ma pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang
211a6(rgyud): po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs
211a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang / 
211a8(rgyud): de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba gang
211b1(rgyud): lags pa/ de dag thams cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo
211b2(rgyud): mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas bcom/ 
211b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab
211b4(rgyud): tu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chos kyi chard rab tu gtong ba/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi rnga brdung ba/ chos kyi rnga bo che
211b5(rgyud): brdung ba/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang / 
211b6(rgyud): de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams
211b7(rgyud): cad la yang rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gi u yi rang ba nas/ rje su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rje su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams/ 
211b8(rgyud): kyi phung po'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rje su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rje su yi rang na/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// shA ri'i
212a1(rgyud): bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams
212a2(rgyud): cad dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ gos dang zas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi
212a3(rgyud): bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang zhig rje su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang na/ de ni de bas bsod rnams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
212a4(rgyud): kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rje su yi rang ba 'di das rje su yi rang bar bya'o// bud med skyes pa'i dngos po thob pa
212a5(rgyud): 'dod cing / bud med kyi dbang po rje bar 'dod pas kyang / rjesu yi rang ba 'dis rje su yi rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
212a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mos
212a7(rgyud): pa bskyes par 'gyur ba'i bskul ba'i phung po yang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rig
212a8(rgyud): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can
212b1(rgyud): gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/ 
212b2(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
212b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/ sangs
212b4(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa
212b5(rgyud): dang bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol/ chos kyi tshul ra ba tu gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/ chos
212b6(rgyud): kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ chos kyi char dbab tu gsol/ chos kyi char btang du gsol/ chos kyi rnga rdung du gsol/ chos kyi rnga bo che rdung du gsol/ chos kyi dung 'bud du gsol/ chos kyi
212b7(rgyud): srog shing sgreng du gsol/ zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag
212b8(rgyud): par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
213a1(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
213a2(rgyud): na/ sku tshe'i 'du byed gtong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ gsol ba 'debs kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
213a3(rgyud): 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi
213a4(rgyud): 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ chos kyi sgron me ni rab tu 'bar bar mdzad/ chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/ chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong / chos kyi rnga ni rab tu brdung / chos kyi rnga bo che ni rab
213a5(rgyud): tu brdung / chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/ chos kyi srog shing ni rab tu sgreng / chos kyi sgron me ni mched par mdzad/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/ 
213a6(rgyud): nyam bag du sbyong du 'dzud cing re shig bzhugasu gsol/ gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos te/ ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag
213a7(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba de bzhin du 'di yongasu bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba
213a8(rgyud): gdab pa'i phung po 'angs gsol ba 'debs na/ bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi
213b1(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ chos kyi 'kho/ 
213b2(rgyud): lo bskor bar bskul na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lnga zhog ste/ shA ri'i bu 'jig
213b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
213b4(rgyud): la dbul ba phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ de dag la gsol ba btab na/ de ni de bas bsod nam/ sa ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// de ci'i
213b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
213b6(rgyud): des na nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / 
213b7(rgyud): skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab bo// 
213b8(rgyud): shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du bzhugs pa gsol te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni/ nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs
214a1(rgyud): pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / yong
214a2(rgyud): su mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang 'di skad
214a3(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ 
214a4(rgyud): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sem sa can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
214a5(rgyud): 'tshal bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur b.rabagyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yod/ su bsngo bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
214a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs
214a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can thams cad dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
214a8(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag
214b1(rgyud): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun nam/ gang zag gam/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba rnams sam/ sems can gzhan
214b2(rgyud): dag kyang rung ste/ zan chang cig tsam stsal bar gyur pa dang / 'chags pa gang lags pa dang / gsol pa gdab pa gang lags pa dang / skyabasu mchi ba gang lags pa dang / bslab pa'i
