214b3(rgyud): gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang
214b4(rgyud): lags pa dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba 'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu ba sdus/ gzhal bzlums te/ sems dul zhing rnam par
214b5(rgyud): grol ba dang / gzung ba ma mchis pas/ sems can tha mas cad la stsal to// ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can rnams la btang bar bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas
214b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas/ ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de btang ngo // sems can thams cad
214b7(rgyud): lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang / longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang / bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / chos zad mi shes pa dang / ye shes zad
214b8(rgyud): mi shes pa dang / spobs pa zang mi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
215a1(rgyud): gyur cig/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus// gzhag
215a2(rgyud): zlums te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
215a3(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ de
215a4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi
215a5(rgyud): ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su bsngo'o// dge ba rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
215a6(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub
215a7(rgyud): phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su bsngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba
215a8(rgyud): ba'i slong du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
215b1(rgyud): pabar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad
215b2(rgyud): mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
215b3(rgyud): yongasu bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
215b4(rgyud): shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab
215b5(rgyud): pa/ dri ma med pa/ shin tu dkar ba la bzhugs nas/ bdu/ da sdig can bcom ste/ shes par bgyi ba dang / ba/ lta bar bgyi ba dang / rtogs par bgyi ba dang / mngon par
215b6(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya reng 'char dkar/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi brnyes te/ 'chi ba med par
215b7(rgyud): 'gro ba'i lam mngon par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams
215b8(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / 'od mchog dang / 'od dge dang / bsod nams 'od dang / mi 'khrug
216a1(rgyud): pa dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer brgya pa dang / 'od zer mtho dang / 'od kyi dra ba can dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / 'od 'bar dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / shin tu rgyan pa
216a2(rgyud): rin chen me tog dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / yan lag mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
216a3(rgyud): 'das gzhan dag gis bla na med pa drag yogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs
216a4(rgyud): brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams
216a5(rgyud): cad kyang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skye bo ma/ nga po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
216a6(rgyud): rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar shog shig ces brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu
216a7(rgyud): 'di ni yongasu bsngo ba'i phung po ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas yongasasu bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi/ 
216a8(rgyud): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len tam kun chub par byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ glog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na de'i bsod nams kyi phung
216b1(rgyud): bongade bas ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi
216b2(rgyud): lus thob par gyur la/ de dag snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas kyang / rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sti stang dang / phud
216b3(rgyud): dung du bya ba'i phyir gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/ rim gro bya ba lan gcig tsam yang rin po
216b4(rgyud): che'i phung po ri rab tsam gyi rin po che rnams yongasu zad par byas wa/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de dag gi ma chod rten rin po che sna bdun te/ gser dang / dngul dang / 
216b5(rgyud): mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang / mu tigadamar po las 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa byas te/ de dag la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / 
216b6(rgyud): ngan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du soms/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang
216b7(rgyud): lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo 'di 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'don par byed dam/ klog gam
216b8(rgyud): skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// bsod nams kyi phung
217a1(rgyud): po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ 
217a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo sgrub pa 'di la gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams
217a3(rgyud): kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do// de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/ so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas
217a4(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das dal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
217a5(rgyud): gis mdo 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// gzhan dag la yang rgya che ra yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// sgrub pa la gan sa par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
217a6(rgyud): bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos de lta bu dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing don du gnyer ba lag so// de nas lha'i dbang po
217a7(rgyud): brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i me tog man da ra bas mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang / tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das chos
217a8(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces smras pa bgyid pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
217b1(rgyud): de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/ 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
217b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ 
217b3(rgyud): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo // lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi
217b4(rgyud): phung po chen po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thob pa/ ra gyur to// de'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni/ bye/ dab phrag 'bum yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag
217b5(rgyud): pa zad pa sha stag go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa
217b6(rgyud): gsum pa ni bya ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/ lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
217b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o// lha'i dang
217b8(rgyud): po de'i tshe/ bud med gang ga'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
218a1(rgyud): zer gyi phung po chen po las mngon sum du gzung / kun chub par byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
218a2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas shi 'phos nas/ bud med kyi lus spangs te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ rtag par rgyun tu lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 
218a3(rgyud): lan brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur te/ ko'u shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
218a4(rgyud): bye ba stong phrag brgyan chos ston te// ngas de ltar na yang mthong ngo // ko'u shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
218a5(rgyud): rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i mtshan thos pa de dag thams cad so/ ngasu mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyuraro// bud/ med gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
218a6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i mtshan thos sam/ 'chi kar yang mngon sum du byed na/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gser 'od ngam
218a7(rgyud): ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'i phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yongasu rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun thams cad gcod par
218a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'chad cing ston pa'i gnas dang / yul 'gro
218b1(rgyud): der phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i rgyal po nad med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring zhing bar chad mi 'byung ba dang / dgra dang
218b2(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'joms par mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba la longs spyod cing / dam pa'i chos yongasu rgyas par byed pa de ni/ mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
218b3(rgyud): rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la sogs pas yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor de dag la rigs kyi bu dag/ de de lta yin nam zhes bka'
218b4(rgyud): stsal pa dang / de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa/ tshad med pa'i 'khor de dag so so nas/ tshig 'di ska/ da ces gsol to// de de lta lag so// bcom ldan 'das yul
218b5(rgyud): 'khor gang du mdo sde'i dbang po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / ston pa de'i rgyal po dang / yul 'khor der mchis te/ de la bdag cag gis rtag tu srung ba dang / lhan cig gnas par
218b6(rgyud): bgyis te/ rgyal po de'i phas kyi dgra dang / gnod pa dang / bar chad dang / nad dang / mya ngan la sogs pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// tshe ring ba dang / bde ba dang / bkra shis su ldan zhing / 
218b7(rgyud): bsams pa thams cad 'grub pas/ rtag par sems dga' bar yang bgyi'o// rgyal po'i 'khor de'i dmag rnams kyang dpa' zhing brtul phod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
218b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis leg so zhes bka' stsal to// leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bsgrubs shig dang / rgyal po de chos bzhin du sbyong bas/ de'i 'bangs rnams
219a1(rgyud): kyang rgyal po bzhin chos bzhin spyod par 'gyuraro// de la khyed kyis mthu dang kha dog phun sum tshogs pas btang zhing / phan pa dam pas gnas pa dang / 'khor
219a2(rgyud): la sogs pa 'od can du gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal ba bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes gsol to// de nas bcu
219a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'di bstan pa dang / rgyas par byed pa'i gnas dang / yul der rgyal po'i blon po rnams la phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur
219a4(rgyud): te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gcig la gcig gus shing / mdza' ba de'i semasu 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyal pos gnang / zhing / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal phran la sogs pas
219a5(rgyud): btsun par 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos don du gnyer zhing khe dang grags pa mi tshol bas/ grags pa chen po phye gsu rgyas shing kun gyis bstod pa dang / tshe ring zhing bde bar
219a6(rgyud): longs spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// gzhan yang dam pa'i chos 'di ston pa'i yul de'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la phan yon 'di bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gos dang bsod
219a7(rgyud): snyoms dang / mal cha dang sman la sogs pas/ phongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag kun kyang klog pa dang / 'don pa'i bsam pas sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ri dang nags tshal la
219a8(rgyud): sogs par bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang brnag par bya ba'i bsam pa de yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang bzhi po de dag go/ gzhan yang mdo 'di 'don pa'i yul de'i skye bo de
219b1(rgyud): dag nad med cing bde ba 'phel ba dang / nor dang yo byad dang / rin po che la sogs pa sgrub pa myur du 'grub cing / bsod nams 'phel ba la sogs te/ phan yon rnam pa de dag dang ldan par
219b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don zab mo'i snyan pa'i mdo sde 'di ji srid
219b3(rgyud): 'jig rten na/ gnas kyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams kyang gnas par 'gyuraro// mdo sde 'di nam mi bzhugs par gyur pa'i dus der/ dam pa'i chos
219b4(rgyud): rnams kyang med par 'gyuraro zhes gsol ba dang / bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de lta'o// rigs kyi dbu dag de lta bas na khyod kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di wa
219b5(rgyud): tha na tshig gcig gam/ tshig su bcad pa gcig gam/ le 'u gcig gam/ sde chang bar yang rung ste/ yang da ga par gdon par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bsam par bya/ yongasu
219b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// sems can mang po'i yun gyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir kun la ston cing rgyas par byed na/ de bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// zhes bkra
219b7(rgyud): srul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya
219b8(rgyud): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pastan lnga langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo
220a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog
220a2(rgyud): gi gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan
220a3(rgyud): 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sam/ 
220a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ma dmigs/ mi dmigs dmigs dpar yang mi 'gyur ro// byang chub las gud na yang byang byachub kyi sems mi dmigs te/ byang chub ni brjod du ma
220a5(rgyud): mchis/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis/ bstan du ma mchi sa/ thogs pa ma mchis/ rnam par rig pa ma ma ches shing / sems par yang mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan
220a6(rgyud): 'das ji ltar na chos 'di dag gi don rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda 'am/ gdags pa 'am tha snyad du mi dmigs shing / byang
220a7(rgyud): chub las gud na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs pa med/ rnam par rig pa med/ sems dpa' yang
220a8(rgyud): mi ngadamigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lte bar sems kyang de bzhin no// sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin// byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sem
220b1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhi no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
220b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob bo// chos thams cad kyi rjesu song ba'i sems de ni/ byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
220b3(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa med de/ byang chub kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa med
220b4(rgyud): sems can yang med/ sems can du gdags pa yang med// / nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su gdags
220b5(rgyud): pa yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus
220b6(rgyud): byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byasu gdags pa yang mi dmigs dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper
220b7(rgyud): na/ ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po bskyed de/ de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos
220b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang / bag tsha ba
221a1(rgyud): med pa dang / skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsal lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems
221a2(rgyud): bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang stobs dang shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
221a3(rgyud): pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni/ bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba sna tshogs yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pha rol
221a4(rgyud): tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni/ mun pa mun na ngag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo// dad gsal ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221a5(rgyud): phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni/ ded dpon mdzod chen pos phyug pa lta bur 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
221a6(rgyud): par byed pas/ de la legs par rgyan pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni/ zla ba nya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul
221a7(rgyud): gyis/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
221a8(rgyud): dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis/ bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
221b1(rgyud): sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis/ na mkha' dang mtshungs
221b2(rgyud): pa lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems
221b3(rgyud): dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par na 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub kyi sems kyang med do// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha
221b4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang // bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du
221b5(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po
221b6(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
221b7(rgyud): phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 
221b8(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las yongasu dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ngag gi las yongasu dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las yongasu dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi 'chi ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / 
222a1(rgyud): ngan song thams cad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi kho ba brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba sngon du phreM/ 
222a2(rgyud): bdang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam yongasu rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
222a3(rgyud): rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam
222a4(rgyud): pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rje su chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / lus la mi lta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / srog la yid mi rton
222a5(rgyud): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / zab mo'i chos la bzod pa sngon du
222a6(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi shes pa bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos
222a7(rgyud): rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams
222a8(rgyud): cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid mngon par sgrub pa la rje su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyir mi ldog
222b1(rgyud): papa'i sa la bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos
222b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang / 
222b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
222b4(rgyud): pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang ni na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa
222b5(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / ti
222b6(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongasu rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos
222b7(rgyud): yongasu srung ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
222b8(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khams la mkhas pa sngon 'gro
223a1(rgyud): ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar
223a2(rgyud): gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba
223a3(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// 
223a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs lamakhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam rab bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi bsam
223a5(rgyud): pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje chen kho sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mi
223a6(rgyud): skyo ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / khyad par gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu byang bar bya ba
223a7(rgyud): dang / yongasu smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du yongasasu rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems kyi stobs nye bar sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongasu thob/ 
223a8(rgyud): par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
223b1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa
223b2(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 
223b3(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thibs po nye bar/ 
223b4(rgyud): rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams tha dadad pa dang / khams gsum gyi thibs po nye bar rgyu ste/ sa pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
223b5(rgyud): dang / bag la nyal gyis thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'phang dang / skye ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 
223b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi phung po gsum du rnam par bzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba
223b7(rgyud): ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi
223b8(rgyud): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad bzod na
224a1(rgyud): nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin/ 
224a2(rgyud): pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa
224a3(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad/ 
224a4(rgyud): kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog/ rab med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sem das dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du
224a5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chubasems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di/ 
224a6(rgyud): lta ste/ chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dkar po'i chos shin tu yong su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa
224a7(rgyud): dadapag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongasu bzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang
224a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can gyi khams dang / nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du gro ba dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa'i spyod
224b1(rgyud): yul la 'jug cing rje su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba
224b2(rgyud): sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes
224b3(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/ spyod pa'i khyad par yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// ye shes
224b4(rgyud): zab cing rgya che ba yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol/ tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la cha// gas pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor
224b5(rgyud): ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'i don no// skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par bya dpa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos kyi mdzod zad
224b6(rgyud): mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can gyi khams rab tu
224b7(rgyud): shes par bya ba'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjesu rtogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/ 
224b8(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu
225a1(rgyud): phyin pa'i don no// bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas pa yongs su
225a2(rgyud): rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/ 
225a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyang ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 
225a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// byang chub kyi snying po la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni/ pha rol
225a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i don no// bdud thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i do na ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor ba dang mya ngan la sa 'das pa gnyi su med par ston cing grol ba'i don ni/ pha
225a6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i don no// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// stobs
225a7(rgyud): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bya/ 
225a8(rgyud): ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// chos kyi 'khor la
225b1(rgyud): rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba'i don ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i snga ltas ni/ stong gsum gyi
225b2(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongasu gang bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa
225b3(rgyud): gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la/ rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas legs par rgyan par mthong ngo // 
225b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/ ba dag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang / go cha sra ba thogs nas phas
225b5(rgyud): kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chu ba sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs bzhi nas
225b6(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog sna tshogs kyis mngon du mthor bar mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
225b7(rgyud): po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyis mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
225b8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga ltas ni/ rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa gser gyi phye ma bdal ba rnyog pa med cing dang la/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan
226a1(rgyud): pa'i chus yongasu gang ba me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu rang dang / pad+ma dkar pos rgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/ de la bdag nyid rtse dga' zhing yongasu spyod par mthong ngo // 
226a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/ phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/ 
226a3(rgyud): de nas bdag nyid ma rmas ma nyams par slar ldog pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/ phrag pa/ 
226a4(rgyud): gnyis na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can/ cod pa na thogs pa/ gcan zan phra mo thams cad skrag par bye/ dad cing 'dug par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub
226a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por mthong ste/ skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
226a6(rgyud): du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la/ mgo bo'i steng ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
226a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/ kha dog gser lta bu'i 'od 'dom gang ba/ tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
226a8(rgyud): du mas yongasu bskor zhing / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston par mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i
226b1(rgyud): sa bcu po'i snga ltas yin no// de la rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/ de ni thog mar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa de mngon du gyur te/ don chen
226b2(rgyud): po'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/ rab tu dga' ba chen po skye bas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o// ltung ba phra mo'i dri ma dang / tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
226b3(rgyud): phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// tshad med pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od snang ba de bskyod par mi nus shing / gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i
226b4(rgyud): gzungs la gnas pa'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg ci dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgoms pa'i me'i 'od 'phro
226b5(rgyud): ba cher gyur pas/ sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba zhes bya'o// de sgom pa'i thabs dang / mchog gi ye shes la dbang bsgyur bar dka' ba dang / mthong ba dang / bsgoms pas spangs
226b6(rgyud): pa'i nyon mongs pa thul bar dka' ba thul ba'i phyir/ sa lnga pa shin tu sbyang bar dka' ba zhes bya'o// 'du byed kyi chos bar chad med pa mngon du gyur te/ mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa
226b7(rgyud): thams cad mngon du byed pas/ sa drug pa la mngon sum pa zhes bya'o// zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la bar chad med cing / mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas/ rnam par grol ba'i ting
226b8(rgyud): nge 'dzin la rgyun ring du bsgoms pas sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir/ sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa bsgoms pa la dbang thob
227a1(rgyud): ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis g.yo bar mi nus pas na/ sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la dbang du gyur pas/ 
227a2(rgyud): kha na ma tho med cing / blo gros shin tu yangs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa'i phyir/ sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o// chos kyi sku na mkha' lta bu la ye shes chen po'i sprin lha
227a3(rgyud): bus khyab par 'gebs pa'i phyir/ sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin ces bya'o// de la rigs kyi bu chos dang gang zag la mtshan ma can du mngon par zhen pa'i rmongs pa dang / 'khor ba dang ngan
227a4(rgyud): song gi nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmos pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dang po la sgrib bo// ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul pa la rmongs pa dang / las dang spyod pa sna tshogs
227a5(rgyud): mngon par bskyed pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa gnyis pa la sgrib bo// ma thob pa thob para'adod pa'i rmongs pa dang / gzungs dam pa'i mchog thob pa la
227a6(rgyud): rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa gsum pa la sgrib bo// mnyam par gzhag pa'i ro'i dga' ba la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang / chos rnam par dag pa la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs
227a7(rgyud): pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bzhi pa la sgrib bo// 'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba'i rmongs pa dang / mya la 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa lnga pa la sgrib de/ 
227a8(rgyud): 'du byed kyi rgyu ba mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / mtshan ma sbom po mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa drug pa la sgrib bo// mtshan ma phra mo mngon du gyur pa'i
227b1(rgyud): rmongs pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bdun pa la sgrib bo// mtshan ma med pa la ched du rtsol ba'i rmongs pa dang / mtshan mar
227b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa la dbang thob pa'i rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa brgyad pa la sgrib bo// gang chos ston pa tshad med pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa la mkhas par ma gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / spobs pa la nga
227b3(rgyud): ma thob pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dgu pa la sgrib bo// mngon par shes pa chen po la dbang sgyur ba ma thob pa'i rmongs pa dang / don dang las gsang ba phra mo la mkhas par ma
227b4(rgyud): gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bcu pa la sgrib bo// spyod yul shin tu phra ba thams cad la/ shedas bya'i sgrib pa'i rmongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i
227b5(rgyud): gnas ngan len la rmongs pa dang / rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib bo// rigs kyi bu de la bya nga chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
227b6(rgyud): dpa' ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon
227b7(rgyud): to// sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnon to// sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa drug pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bdun
227b8(rgyud): pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa brgyad pa la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// sa bcu pa la ni ye shes
228a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ sems bskyed pa dang po ni/ rin po che yang dag par 'phags pani
228a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin
228a3(rgyud): gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su
228a4(rgyud): bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
228a5(rgyud): yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni da ltar/ gyis sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye
228a6(rgyud): shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongasu bzung nas skye ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
228a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems bskyed pa bcu pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po las khyad par gyi byin gyis
228a8(rgyud): brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye ste/ gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ pUr+Na ma nor the/ du hu du hu duh+ma/ yA ba sUr+ya/ a ba b+hA sa te/ yA bad tsan+d+ra da~M dAn+te/ dA ba da rak+Sha mAn/ daN+Da pa ri hA raM/ ku ru swA hA/ 
228b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ su zhig
228b2(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na/ 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ stag dang seng ge la sogs pa gcan zan ma rungs pa'i rigs dang / yi dgas
228b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ dgra dang / rkun po dang / gza' dang / nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa dang po rjesu dran par
228b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ ut+to li/ 
228b5(rgyud): tsi ro tsi ri/ ut+to ra/ to ra nA~M/ shAn+to/ shAn+to/ at+to li/ hu lu hu lu swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i/ klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
228b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gzungs so// gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di klog cing 'dzin na 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/ 
228b7(rgyud): de gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa pha rol gyi dgra dang / gza' dang / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga
228b8(rgyud): las rnam par grol te/ sa gnyis pa rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bus gsum pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
229a1(rgyud): 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ daN+Di ke/ baN+Di ke/ ka ra dzi/ kau ra Thi/ ke yu re/ dan+ti li swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed
229a2(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ su gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba dang / 'don pa de 'jigs pa thams
229a3(rgyud): cad dang / gcan zan ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas gtses pa dang / gza' dang pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sgrib
229a4(rgyud): pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/ sa gsum pa rjesu dran/ par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa bzhi pa la gnas pa/ 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdul dka'
229a5(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi r-i/ da mi da mi ni/ da ri da ri ni/ shi ri shi ri ni/ bi shA la/ bi shA la/ pa shA pa shA ni/ ban+d+ha nI ye swA hA// rig
229a6(rgyud): kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs
229a7(rgyud): sngags 'di 'don pa dang / 'chang ba de 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug
229a8(rgyud): bsngal mang pos gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa bzhi pa la rjesu dran par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
229b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan sna tshogs kyis bkod pa ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ ha ri hA ri ni/ tsa ri tsA ri ni/ ka ri mA Ni/ saM ka ri mA Ni/ saM b+ha sa ni/ 
229b2(rgyud): / dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ swa yaM/ pu ke swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa lnga pa la gnas
229b3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa
229b4(rgyud): dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol po'i dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gces pa dang gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te
229b5(rgyud): sa lnga pa rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu sa drug pa la/ gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
229b6(rgyud): gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ bi to ri bi to ri/ ma ri ni/ ki li ki li/ bo to han+te/ lu lu lu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ to lu ba to lu ba/ sha sha shad tsa pa ri sha swasti/ sarba
229b7(rgyud): satwa nAn/ sid d+hun+t+ra ma ma/ man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa drug pa la
229b8(rgyud): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma
230a1(rgyud): rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga
230a2(rgyud): las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa drug pa rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
230a3(rgyud): gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ dza ha dza ha ru/ ha dza hwa dza ru/ bai lu ke/ bai lu le/ a mr-i ta g+ha ne/ pa ru sha ne/ bai ru ti ke ba ru bat+te/ bi d+hi hi ke/ bin+da bi li ni/ a mr-i li ti/ ke bai
230a4(rgyud): dzu lu/ b+he dzu mu swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bco / ma ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang
230a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad de ngagacan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi
230a6(rgyud): ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gces pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa bdun pa rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// 
230a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ shi ri shi ri shi ni/ mi te mi te/ 
230a8(rgyud): kA ri kA ri/ he ru he ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni/ gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa brgyad pa la/ 
230b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi/ 
230b2(rgyud): dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa ste/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gces pa dang / gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa brgyad pa rjesu/ 
230b3(rgyud): dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgo mtha' yas pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o// gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ ha ri tsaN+Da/ 
230b4(rgyud): li ke/ ku la mA b+ha te/ to ra shi/ pa ta pa ta si shi ri shi ri/ gr-i shi ri/ ga bi shi ri/ swasti/ sarba satwa nAn swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed las 'das
230b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sa dgu pa/ la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir ga sungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 
230b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa dang / 
230b7(rgyud): gza' dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/ sa dgu pa rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad mi shes
230b8(rgyud): pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye ste/ gzungs la/ tad+ya thA/ sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi/ ma tsa ni mok+Sha ni/ bi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ da ma le/ mAng+ga le/ hir t+ya gar+b+he/ rat+na gar+b+he/ sa man+ta/ 
231a1(rgyud): b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ mas ni/ ma hA ma na si/ ata b+hU te/ a t+ya b+hU te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ ats+tsha te/ a mr-i te/ a ra dze/ bir dze/ brah+ma/ brah+ma sA re/ pU ra Na
231a2(rgyud): pUr Na/ ma nor the swA hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni bkra shis pa dang / spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ste/ gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ 
231a3(rgyud): bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srung ba'i phyir gsungs te/ sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gcan zan khro bo
231a4(rgyud): dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/ pha rol gyi dgra dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna chog/ das kyis gtses pa dang / gza' dang / gdug pa can thams
231a5(rgyud): cad dang / sgrib pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa las rnam par grol te/ sa bcu pa rjesu dran par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer
231a6(rgyud): snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di dag bshad pa thos nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
231a7(rgyud): la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ tshig su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// / zab mo mtshan nyid med chos la// skye bo shes pa nyams pa
231a8(rgyud): rnams// bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol mdzad pas// dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab spyan// chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig mi gzigs// yang dag chos kyi
231b1(rgyud): spyan gyis ni// kun tu gsal ba bsam mi khyab// chos 'ga'ang skye ba med pa ste// 'gog par yang ni mi 'gyur ro// de ltar mnyam par gzigs pa ni// bla med gnasu bzhugs par gyur// 
231b2(rgyud): 'khor ba dag kyang mi 'jig la// mya ngan 'das la'ang mi bshugs shing // mtha' gnyis la ni mi gnas te// de phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba brnyes// ngag dang ma dag phyogs la yang // rnam par// 
231b3(rgyud): dbye ba med pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ro gcig mkhyen pas na// rnam dag pa yi mchog brnyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshad med skus// tshig gcig ston pa med par yang // 'khor mang 'di
231b4(rgyud): dag thams cad la// chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad// sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi// mtshan nyid rnam par ga/ zigs med kyang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad las
231b5(rgyud): bcom ldan rtag tu skyob par mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal rtag/ mi rtag/ bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang // ga cig dang tha dad ma yin dang // skye ba med dang 'gog med
231b6(rgyud): pa'i// de 'dra'i don gyi rnam pa la// rnam par dbye zhing ston par mdzad// dper na brag cha stong par ni// de don sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen// chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pas// theg pa
231b7(rgyud): mi mthun gzhan med de// sems can rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir// gsum du rnam par dbye ba mdzad// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
231b8(rgyud): tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
232a1(rgyud): gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di shin tu dkon zhing dpag par dka' ba/ thog mar yang dge ba/ bar du yang dge ba/ tha mA yA ge gdong no/ 
232a2(rgyud): 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa 'di gang zhig 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
232a3(rgyud): rnams kyis mdzad pa bzo ba lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gang mdo 'di nyan
232a4(rgyud): par byed pa ni/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
232a5(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu smin par byed/ ba dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa yin pa dang / mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir/ mnyan pa
232a6(rgyud): dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gdon par bya'o// de yang rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ma byas
232a7(rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag ni dam pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu
232a8(rgyud): dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya
232b1(rgyud): mi bzad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur// sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa dang / sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i
232b2(rgyud): gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa bsgrubs pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar
232b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ro rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dge bar gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral
232b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ tshig dang spyod pa dang / sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ na mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgyas
232b5(rgyud): btab pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyu/ sa kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongasu rdzogs pa sgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bu gzungs 'di
232b6(rgyud): ngag thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston to// chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/ 'gro ba yang med
232b7(rgyud): 'ong ba yang med do// sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed kyang / sems can du dmigs pa yang med do// chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do// 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba
232b8(rgyud): ston kyang 'pho ba yang med/ skye ba yang med do// chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed rnams gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang mi 'gyuraro// / 
233a1(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gis/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa
233a2(rgyud): rnams kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems las ni phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo// sems can tshad med
233a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// 'khor ba'i rgyun
233a4(rgyud): gcod dam chos ni// zab cing phra la blta dka' ste// 'dod pas ba sgribs pa'i dmus long dag/ de ma mthong bas bsdug da bsngal len// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs
233a5(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di ska ce gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / 
233a6(rgyud): ston cing gnas pa der bdag cag thams cad mchis nas chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te/ de la phan pa dang bde ba stsal cing / lus dang sems bde bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis sems rtse
233a7(rgyud): gcig tu gyur par mchod par bgyi'o// nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par bgyi'o// rgyal po'i yul der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mu ge yang
233a8(rgyud): bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang / skye bo mang pos rgyas shing yongasu dar bar bgyi'o// chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa thams
233b1(rgyud): cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi rdzi zhing gtsang mar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos 'di bshang ba'i gnas 'di ni/ mchod rten lags pa'i slad du/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
233b2(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lha ba lhub kyis yongasu mchod par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang rtag tu srung zhing bskyabs te/ nyams pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
233b3(rgyud): 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di sgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig dang / dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig rten 'dir yun ring du gnas par 'gyuraro// 
233b4(rgyud): gser 'od ngam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ saHma par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo/ 
233b5(rgyud): byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por/ ser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba nges/ de bzhin gshegs
233b6(rgyud): pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+mo'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar
233b7(rgyud): gyur gang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na'ang gang 'tsho ba// rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang ni zhing rab ni rnam par dag
233b8(rgyud): sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/ 
234a1(rgyud): mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// kha bdungad ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing drim
234a2(rgyud): med// ud pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing leb la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra// bai DUR+Ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su
234a3(rgyud): 'khyil// thub pa'i sku ni zla ba phra 'dra zhing // zla ba zang 'dra spyan bkrag bung ba bzhin// zhal mtho shangs ni rtag tu lha nga ste// 'jam zhing sa yi gser ltar kha dog bzong // rtag par rgyun tu rgyal
234a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'ang/ dgas// spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyengs pa g.yasu 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthing 'dra bar 'tsher
234a5(rgyud): zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyog/ sa bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten
234a6(rgyud): gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems dmyal 'gro zhing dud 'gror 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha gnas mi yi gnas rnams su// 
234a7(rgyud): sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog bzang ba gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// bco ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bder
234a8(rgyud): gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnin pa'i mchog/ phyag/ 
234b1(rgyud): ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhang nge'o// thub pa'i dbang po sku mchog dri ma
234b2(rgyud): med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par ldang ba// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan byang zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ 
234b3(rgyud): de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin ga
234b4(rgyud): pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu rgyan pa'i// // glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i sku// phyag dang nas/ 
234b5(rgyud): 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'a dri snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das da nga // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed 'byung ba dang // gang dag
234b6(rgyud): phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog 'bul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dge ba'i sems kyis
234b7(rgyud): kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dge gyur pa// snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus// 
234b8(rgyud): rgyal gcig gi ston rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par gal nus// lhar bcas 'dzin
235a1(rgyud): rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// sgra yis rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig sa
235a2(rgyud): min// lus dang ngag dang yid rab dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pa// bdag gis bsod snyoms 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur/ 
235a3(rgyud): cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rma
235a4(rgyud): lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga mthong zhing // der ni bshags pa de 'dra thos par shog/ rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal la di 'dra ba// tshe rabs de dang der ni rnyed gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
235a5(rgyud): yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam na yang thos par shog/ nyin gyur tshe yang de dag ston gyur cig/ sems can/ 
235a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal mtsho las thar byed shog/ pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bgyis nas// phyin chad byang chub bla med thob par shog/ bdag gi zhing ni 'gran zla med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par
235a7(rgyud): smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du mthong bar shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i
235a8(rgyud): dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu po de dag gnyi ga dang // byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med
235b1(rgyud): cing / skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dang // de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur
235b2(rgyud): cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod gyur cig/ gser 'od dam pa yis ni bshags pa yis// 
235b3(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chod par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye she
235b4(rgyud): dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtshon ma dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi mtshor 'gyur bar na dag/ byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs// gas
235b5(rgyud): 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bA sod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chu ba snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa
235b6(rgyud): yi// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan
235b7(rgyud): par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyis rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji
235b8(rgyud): snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de
236a1(rgyud): 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ mdzes pa'i tog gis shes par byos// rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gis// sngon tshe smon lam 'di btab ste// de nyid da ltar khyod yin/ 
236a2(rgyud): no// sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis ni// gser gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od// de nyid dngul tog dngul 'od ces// ngas ni de tshe lung bstan to// 'khor mang de dag 'di thos nas// kun gyis byang chub
236a3(rgyud): sems bskyed pa// da ltar ma 'ongs dus dag tu// rtag par bshags pa 'di byed shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
236a4(rgyud): ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang
236a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bar gnas/ pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
236a6(rgyud): bu mo gang la las/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mchod cing / bkur bstir byed par 'dod pas gzungs 'di 'chang zhing bzung bar bya'o// de ci'i/ 
236a7(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ gzungs 'di 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher 'phel
236a8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis 'dzin cing 'chang bar 'gyuraro// tshul khrims rnam par dag pa mnyams shing skyon sde/ 
236b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu zab mo 'di la 'jug nus par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzungs sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ sngar sangs rgyas bcom
236b2(rgyud): ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod cing sems rtse gcig pas phyag tshol la/ de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 
236b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshalo// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// shar
236b4(rgyud): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho/ phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// byang
236b5(rgyud): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'a tshalo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba dam pa'i dpal la/ 
236b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas spos mchog brtsegs pa'i rgyal po/ 
236b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas mnyam pa gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma
236b8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas dri med 'od snang la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bla
237a1(rgyud): 'od rnam dag grags pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs
237a2(rgyud): rgyas dge 'ong dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs dbang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas 'jigs med grags pa la phyag 'tshalo// sangs
237a3(rgyud): rgyas rab mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po
237a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dang da' sems chen po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems
237a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bza nga po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
237a6(rgyud): chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
237a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs 'di gdon par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti ku Ti/ ni i
237a8(rgyud): mi ri ti/ ko sha Ni/ i mi ri Ni/ i rI swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzungs 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi
237b1(rgyud): yum yin pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'phel bar 'gyu ro// grangs
237b2(rgyud): med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsngags par byas par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
237b3(rgyud): chub tu de la lung ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba des gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / rin po che dang / mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang / nad med
237b4(rgyud): cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'thob ste/ bsod na dmas shin tu mang du 'phel lo// ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang / de dag thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas/ 
237b5(rgyud): sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/ rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang / byang
237b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang
237b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' deng ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis srung bar byed do// bde bar gnas/ gzungs 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin
237b8(rgyud): par shes par rig par bya'o// thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsa brgyad chang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor byas te/ tshes bcu drug gi nyin
238a1(rgyud): par khrus byas te/ gos sar pa gyon te 'dug pa dang / me tog dang / zhal zas sna mang po la sogs pas mchod par bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ thog
238a2(rgyud): mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/ gus par phyag 'tshal zhing sdig pa bshags nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
238a3(rgyud): sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzla'o// de nas lus bsrang te 'dug nas/ tsa 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza'
238a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas zhag bco lnga lon pa dang / bzod dkyil 'khor de nas 'byung bar byas te/ mi de ni bsod nams dang / gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
238a5(rgyud): zhing / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gal te bsams pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas/ bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ 
238a6(rgyud): de phyin chad kyang rtag par rjesu dran par bya'o// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po las/ gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o// 
238a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzungs de gsungs nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang
238a8(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir/ don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong
238b1(rgyud): pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams
238b2(rgyud): thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can
238b3(rgyud): 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni
238b4(rgyud): dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig/ gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i
238b5(rgyud): dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna chog sa dri rnams 'phrog/ lce yi dbang po rtag tu rol rgyu/ ga/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang
238b6(rgyud): po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam
238b7(rgyud): dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun ngag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes
238b8(rgyud): pa/ de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ 
239a1(rgyud): sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag
239a2(rgyud): nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongasu rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa
239a3(rgyud): dang mi dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi
239a4(rgyud): sbrul rnams bzhi pa de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyi sa ni thur du 'gro/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams gnyis gnyis te// khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jigs
239a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'dri gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang / rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi na mkhar 'gro ba
239a6(rgyud): yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bang
239a7(rgyud): kan rlung dang khris pas zad gyur na// lus shi gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo
239a8(rgyud): khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can gang dag gang zhig yod// chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod 'am/ 
239b1(rgyud): yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad de// 'du shes rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya
239b2(rgyud): ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam
239b3(rgyud): dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo rtol// phung po'i gnas la ltong bar gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas
239b4(rgyud): ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas// der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas// ngas
239b5(rgyud): ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi ma chog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// ngas ni nyon mongs dgra
239b6(rgyud): tshogs rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa sgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs
239b7(rgyud): me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du
