239b8(rgyud): mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongasu tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / 
240a1(rgyud): yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// be DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad nga
240a2(rgyud): rtswa dang rtsa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang saM las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyer blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil
240a3(rgyud): 'khor ci tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
240a4(rgyud): sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig dgis gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// 
240a5(rgyud): ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar na sa srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nuso// thub pa chen ngo'i ye shes gang // skad cig cig la 'jug pa yang / 
240a6(rgyud): bskal pa byed du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha mo rin
240a7(rgyud): chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos nas/ dga' ba dang rangs pa dang skyes te 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo
240a8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
240b1(rgyud): la tshig su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te// 'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa// byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul// bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol// rigs kyi/ 
240b2(rgyud): lha mo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod la the tsom ci yod pa// dri ba'i don de zhus shig dang // rnam par phye ste bshad par bya// de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag
240b3(rgyud): dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral ba'i// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo la
240b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ te// byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas ni// mnyam pa nyid/ la non tan du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs
240b5(rgyud): kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcu na pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/ byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan
240b6(rgyud): tan du bgyi ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyingasu 'dogs te/ chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do// phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa/ phung po lnga ma yin pa yang
240b7(rgyud): brjod du med pa ste/ de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni/ chad par 'gyur ro// gal te phung po lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma gnyis dang bral bar mtha'
240b8(rgyud): gnyis la mi gnas pa/ bltar med pa blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do// rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga las chos kyi dbyings ji ltar
241a1(rgyud): gdags zhe na/ phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa ste/ de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na ni/ skyes zin pa skye 'am/ mi skye ba skye zhes bya/ 
241a2(rgyud): gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni/ rgyu dang rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rig so// gal te ma skyes pa skye na ni// skye ba dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma
241a3(rgyud): yin pa nyid pas ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa gzhan pa dang dpag pa dang / dper bya ba mi brjod pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis skyed par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi lha mo dper na snga'i sgra ni/ shing
241a4(rgyud): dang / ko ba dang / lag pa la brten te/ sgra 'byung mod kyi/ rnga 'i sgra de ni 'das pa'ang stong / ma 'ongs pa'ang stong / da da ltar byung ba'ang stong ste/ rnga'i sgra de ni shing las kyang ma byung / 
241a5(rgyud): ko ba dang lag pa las kyang ma byung / dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gogaba'o// gang mi 'gog pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i// 
241a6(rgyud): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o// gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa ma yin pas/ gcig pa yang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
241a7(rgyud): gal te gcig pa yin na/ chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas// 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang // don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dam/ 
241a8(rgyud): pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no// gal te tha dad pa yin na ni sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang // mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin
241b1(rgyud): pa yin pas/ rnam par grol bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
241b2(rgyud): zhe na/ 'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin no// de bas na phung po lnga de ni yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma
241b3(rgyud): yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yang ma yin/ rgyu dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa/ tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa/ rgyu dang rkyen med pa/ dpes
241b4(rgyud): bstan du med pa/ thog ma dang tha mar dben pa rang gi ngang dgis stong pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen dpar bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan du spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o// / 
241b5(rgyud): de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyingasu ston to// gzhan nga rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi rdu mo gong la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par
241b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang / kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/ 'phags pa dang / ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i
241b7(rgyud): rang bzhin ma yin te/ kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/ don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// de'i tshe bcom
241b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo
242a1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
242a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshalo// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas/ 
242a3(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces dris so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu sgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur/ de nas rigs
242a4(rgyud): kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// dngas pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don de shin tu zab pas/ so so'i skye bo thams
242a5(rgyud): cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/ mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o// bdag ni chos 'di la brten te/ bde bar gnas pa thob bo// 
242a6(rgyud): gal te tshig de bden pa blta na/ snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni/ tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/ mtshan
242a7(rgyud): su nu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing / bde ba tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang / lha'i me tog mchog gi
242a8(rgyud): char 'bab cing / lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo ma krol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog shig/ ces smras ma thag tu snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ 
242b1(rgyud): sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing // 
242b2(rgyud): bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pa na/ ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs bres pa/ rin po che sna bdun
242b3(rgyud): kyi 'ad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa rin po che sna bdun dang / lha'i me tog gi char 'bas pa/ lha'i rol mo sna tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to// de nas rigs kyi
242b4(rgyud): mo rin chen 'od 'phros yang bud med kyi lus las/ tshangs pa 'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' darin cheni 'od 'phro la/ tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smraso// 
242b5(rgyud): btsun pa khyod ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ sna sa pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi sgra da pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// 
242b6(rgyud): lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
242b7(rgyud): pa bzhin/ bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa khyod don gang la gnas te/ 
242b8(rgyud): tshig de skad ces smra/ lha mos smras pa/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing / rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ 
243a1(rgyud): gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig so// smras pa/ skyes
243a2(rgyud): bu khyod ci'i phyir/ de skad ces smra/ byis pa yang gzhan mkhas pa sngags/  chubs/ byang chub ma yin pa yang gzhan rnam par grol ba yang gzhan/ rnam par grol ba ma yin pa'ang gzhan ma yin
243a3(rgyud): mod kyi/ tshangs pa chen po chos de dag thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyingasu mnyam pa nyid de/ so so ma yin pa yang dag par dbyer med pa/ bar mtshams med pa 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa/ 
243a4(rgyud): la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dpe dar na/ sgyu ma mkhan dang / de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gis/ lam gyi bzhi
243a5(rgyud): mdor sa dang bye ma dang / shing dang / rtsa dang / lo ma la sogs pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/ sgyu mi sprul pa 'di lta ste/ rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang dmag dang shing rta la
243a6(rgyud): sogs pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang / bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to// de la sems can byis pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can
243a7(rgyud): dag gis mthong nas/ sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang / thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/ gzhan ni brdzun pa snyam du sems shing / 
243a8(rgyud): phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog par mi byed do// de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/ thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di
243b1(rgyud): snyam du sems te/ rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/ rta dang glang po che dang / bang mdzod la sogs pa
243b2(rgyud): 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/ bdag gis mthong ba dang / thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la/ phyis zhib tu brtags na yang brdzun pa slu ba'i chos su shes so// de/ 
243b3(rgyud): lta bas na/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/ ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa
243b4(rgyud): dang tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no// / snyam mo// yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phag
243b5(rgyud): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa rnam sa kyis ni chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid pa rjod du med par yang shes la/ gang mthong ba dang / thos pa/ 
243b6(rgyud): dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes
243b7(rgyud): par mi nus so// de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang / 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi mthu dang / las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o// 
243b8(rgyud): zhes mngon par mi zhen te/ 'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/ 'du byed kyi ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi bden pa/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du/ 'du byed dang 'du
244a1(rgyud): byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/ bden pa'i rang bzhin du ma grub par 'phags pa rnams kyis/ kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas/ yang dag
244a2(rgyud): pa bden pa'i don de ston par byed do// de bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i gzigs pas/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod
244a3(rgyud): du med pa bzhin/ 'du byed dang / 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/ kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna tshogs la brten nas gzhan la ston par byed do// de nas yang byang chub
244a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa chen pos 'di/ skad ces smras// sems can ji snyed gcig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes pa nus/ smras pa/ 
244a5(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po gang sprul pa mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de snyed kyis shes so// tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/ 
244a6(rgyud): sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na/ de dag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba gang nas skye bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma
244a7(rgyud): yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis/ zab mo de'i don shes par nuso// de nas tshangs pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
244a8(rgyud): dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ tshangs po chen po da
244b1(rgyud): ltar khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyod la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du bsgrubs shig dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
244b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang / gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag po gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga/ 
244b3(rgyud): sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smra so// deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad
244b4(rgyud): cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems
244b5(rgyud): dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rin po/ che'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
244b6(rgyud): pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyuraro// zhes bka'
244b7(rgyud): stsal to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag su mo stong gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu khri phrag
244b8(rgyud): brgyad stong dang / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis/ rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus
245a1(rgyud): pa de'i nang nas dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpal
245a2(rgyud): rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yong su rdzogs nas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ so so
245a3(rgyud): nas rang rang gi gos gyon pas phung de/ byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/ bla na med pa'i mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de/ smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchi
245a4(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo'o// zhes smon lam btab bo// tshad sa pa chen po dge slong de dag gis/ bsod nams de la brten
245a5(rgyud): nanas ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/ bskal ba chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/ 'khor ba la sogs yongasu 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'ang
245a6(rgyud): kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur te/ bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal
245a7(rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus cig tu kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag kun kyang mtshan smon
245a8(rgyud): lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ yon tan gyi mtshan bcu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// zhes lung bstan to// gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
245b1(rgyud): bo gang nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa de dag gi mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ dper na gang la la zhig gis/ thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskal pa chen po brgyang stong / 
245b2(rgyud): du spyod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang la la zhig gis gser 'ong dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam tu bris te zla ba phyed byed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ 
245b3(rgyud): klog cing 'don na/ bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma nges brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ grangasu bgrang ba dang / dper skrun par yang mi bzod do// tshangs pa chen
245b4(rgyud): po de lta bas na/ khyed kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing / nan ta na du sgrub pa dang / gzung zhing gzhan la yang yang dag par rgya che ra bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na
245b5(rgyud): nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar skyes bu dpa' kho g.yul ngor lus dang srog la mi lta ba bzhin du ngas kyang / mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bzung zhing 'dzin pa dang / klog
245b6(rgyud): cing 'don pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to// tshangs pa chen po dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar rin po che
245b7(rgyud): sna bdun yang med par yang mi 'gyur ro// gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na/ rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
245b8(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du/ bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nam med pa na/ gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyuraro// de lta
246a1(rgyud): bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ mnyan pa dang gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jugru pa dang / 
246a2(rgyud): lus dang srog la mi lta bas ngal ba dang / dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya ste/ bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du
246a3(rgyud): bslab cing nan tan du bya'o// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin
246a4(rgyud): gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.ya das pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 
246a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad sa bdag gis kyang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'i rgyal po 'di srung ba dang / yongasu rgyas par bgyi'o// chos
246a6(rgyud): 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang / bar chad kun bsal te/ dge bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang mthu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / lus dang sems bde
246a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyam su myong ba dang / gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de yang mu ge dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na yang / 
246a8(rgyud): bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongasu bsrungs pas de dag bde zhing skying ba dang / gnod pa rnams mi 'byung bar gyur na/ de dag kyang bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gang
246b1(rgyud): la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim gro bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po
246b2(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/ tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams la leg so nas bka' stsal to// legs legs so// 
246b3(rgyud): kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa dang / srung ba dang / bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa nges bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan
246b4(rgyud): pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'ad/ das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po la
246b5(rgyud): sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon parabastod do// / gser 'od dam pa mdza sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la brten nas bsam
246b6(rgyud): pa yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal
246b7(rgyud): po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung
246b8(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ 
247a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis
247a2(rgyud): yongasu bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba
247a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par
247a4(rgyud): bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skyes pa/ nas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal tham/ sa cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa
247a5(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge 'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza'i gnod pa thams
247a6(rgyud): cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa 'bum rab tu zhi bar bgyid
247a7(rgyud): pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos mnyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag
247a8(rgyud): cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang bskyed par/ 
247b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rdul po bzhini chos dang ldan pa/ chos
247b2(rgyud): smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
247b3(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
247b4(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par
247b5(rgyud): dag pa/ mi'i las 'das pas/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskya nga bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ 
247b6(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong ba zhes ming du chag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par
247b7(rgyud): 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i yang ba 'am/ nad kyi yang ba 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
247b8(rgyud): cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po/ 
248a1(rgyud): bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang du mchi bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang
248a2(rgyud): yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
248a3(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po gang gis yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyuro// 
248a4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od ngam ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ de thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams
248a5(rgyud): cad las kun tu srung bar bgyid/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yod su 'dzin pa dang / yongasu skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bca ma ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po
248a6(rgyud): de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa
248a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/ bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa
248a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par
248b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa dang / sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ 
248b2(rgyud): rim gro bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas/ ches sti stang du bgyid/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror
248b3(rgyud): bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen po bzhes lha dang mi la rnam par blta bzhi
248b4(rgyud): bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// / de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag leg so leg so// rgyal
248b5(rgyud): po chen po khyed yang leg so leg so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam sa bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
248b6(rgyud): la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi lha dang / mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems/ 
248b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ ma phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems
248b8(rgyud): can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro
249a1(rgyud): byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis
249a2(rgyud): shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
249a3(rgyud): kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yongasu bskyang ba dang / yongasu bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bu drag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/ 
249a4(rgyud): lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
249a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ da ge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde/ 'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yong
249a6(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 
249a7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
249a8(rgyud): 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po
249b1(rgyud): rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dag gi yul du spyong par
249b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo
249b3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa/ 
249b4(rgyud): de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim 'gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gse/ ra 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos
249b5(rgyud): mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang nga gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin
249b6(rgyud): chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par yang 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi byin dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs
249b7(rgyud): pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dabadag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus ltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ 
249b8(rgyud): da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur
250a1(rgyud): bde dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la
250a2(rgyud): kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag
250a3(rgyud): dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur/ 
250a4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bdagyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog pa
250a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sden dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po
250a6(rgyud): gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam
250a7(rgyud): par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de
250a8(rgyud): rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' ba dang / 
250b1(rgyud): nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel pa sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna
250b2(rgyud): tshegs brgya dang / brel pa sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dag ba sogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogasu mchi
250b3(rgyud): ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dbug gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gan
250b4(rgyud): pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar 'gyur na bcu// na pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum
250b5(rgyud): phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ de ra mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul tu zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel
250b6(rgyud): ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga
250b7(rgyud): la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legaso legaso// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs
250b8(rgyud): so// khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po
251a1(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa/ 
251a2(rgyud): dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor/ 
251a3(rgyud): de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul de
251a4(rgyud): dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa tham sa cad las yongasu thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag gas rnams kyang bzlog par gyis shig/ 'dzum+bu'i gling thams
251a5(rgyud): cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'cha/ nga mi 'dru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spyod ra gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa
251a6(rgyud): khyed bzhis/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon pa/ 
251a7(rgyud): dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par 'che ba dang / ngan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang / 
251a8(rgyud): phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir/ pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir/ grong khyod brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal
251b1(rgyud): bo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag nang ban tshun du byams pa'i semasu 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sem su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'tshang mi 'dru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rung ni/ 
251b2(rgyud): yul dgan dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i byor rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas khyed bzhis la m+bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ li legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo dang / 
251b3(rgyud): mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang byon can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba byed pa dang / lo khyud 'khor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / 
251b4(rgyud): nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char ba 'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang / nor nga
251b5(rgyud): 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che ba dang / se ra sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba ba cu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro
251b6(rgyud): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
251b7(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du byed
251b8(rgyud): bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyod bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa
252a1(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu klung / chos bdud brtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyuraro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi
252a2(rgyud): gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phelo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mi'i
252a3(rgyud): rgyal po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyuraro// mi'i rgyal
252a4(rgyud): bo des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de ba bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la ya dang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgya che ba yangs pa thams
252a5(rgyud): cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// des na mi'i rgyal po chen po de la srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// de nas mi'i rgya la po de la kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / 
252a6(rgyud): yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams/ 
252a7(rgyud): cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang srung ba chen po byas par 'gyu ro// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde
252a8(rgyud): leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis
252b1(rgyud): mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par
252b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzib dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
252b3(rgyud): la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// / 
252b4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang / mnyan 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag nyid la yang srung ba chen
252b5(rgyud): po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ btsun po dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnam sa dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang / srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar
252b6(rgyud): gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur// 
252b7(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams
252b8(rgyud): kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yang yong su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu srung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa
253a1(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad mgo ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ 
253a2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 
253a3(rgyud): sti steng du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// 
253a4(rgyud): / der mchis nas kyang / rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tsho/ rigs kyis chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tsho gas bkram par bgyi'o// spos chag sna tshogs kyis chag
253a5(rgyud): chag btab pa der/ chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs
253a6(rgyud): par rgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba/ gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gis stan rab tu
253a7(rgyud): dmar ba gding bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang / 
253a8(rgyud): dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par
253b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang / phan pas blta bar
253b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa rnams dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi
253b3(rgyud): chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/ bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam
253b4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi 'o// bdag nyid chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// ba de dag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen
253b5(rgyud): bo bskyed nas/ chos skye ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces ga sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po zhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i
253b6(rgyud): tsheche de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes par bgo bar bya'o// sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs dkar po yang
253b7(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar
253b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba/ de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los
254a1(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa de snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis/ 
254a2(rgyud): mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi
254a3(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang lha'i rgya che zhi rgya che ba 'bum phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye bar thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang
254a4(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya cher bar 'gyur// bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
254a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan
254a6(rgyud): zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog tu ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i
254a7(rgyud): bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po
254a8(rgyud): des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / da pag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs
254b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyu ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
254b2(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig
254b3(rgyud): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan par 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin
254b4(rgyud): gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ 
254b5(rgyud): mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba bya sa par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba da / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gi
254b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
254b7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal
254b8(rgyud): po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs
255a1(rgyud): su thar par byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// 
255a2(rgyud): deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la srung ba chen po byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
255a3(rgyud): mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis yul 'di dag thams cad kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yongasu bskyang ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / 
255a4(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdza ba dang / nad 'gro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur snyam du sems paskye dad par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
255a5(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa ma do sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la/ mi'i rgya la po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus sti stang du byed/ 
255a6(rgyud): bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin no// mi'i
255a7(rgyud): rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 
255a8(rgyud): tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyis kyang rgyan par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra
255b1(rgyud): thams cad chos dang 'thun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bco ldan du gang
255b2(rgyud): la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la de chos la gus pa de lta bus/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i
255b3(rgyud): dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid
255b4(rgyud): spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de dag nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad
255b5(rgyud): kyi slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig sbyin pa ra bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po des/ 
255b6(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i sladu/ 
255b7(rgyud): bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu/ spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po
255b8(rgyud): bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur
256a1(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang / 
256a2(rgyud): bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo
256a3(rgyud): brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
256a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal dpo chen po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / 
256a5(rgyud): de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang
256a6(rgyud): mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
256a7(rgyud): 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdag pa sna tshogs kyi
256a8(rgyud): 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos
256b1(rgyud): sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ lag na pog snod gcig thogs pa de las/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud
256b2(rgyud): tsam de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po
256b3(rgyud): ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
256b4(rgyud): brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes me du/ 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrangag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
256b5(rgyud): de dag thams cad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phra/ ga brgya po thams cad nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi
256b6(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos kyi dri
256b7(rgyud): rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnamasu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
256b8(rgyud): po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas pa de bzhin
257a1(rgyud): du/ gser 'ong dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dpa mdo sde'i
257a2(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
257a3(rgyud): khams du ma/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnamasu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi
257a4(rgyud): bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnam su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag/ khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs
257a5(rgyud): rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ 'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung
257a6(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyu ro// rgyal po chen po dag/ cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
257a7(rgyud): dag na/ chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa leg so leg so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mo'i don 'di lta
257a8(rgyud): bu/ zang mor snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan bsam gyis me khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang par 'dod pa/ khyod yang leg so leg so// zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ 
257b1(rgyud): su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa
257b2(rgyud): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
257b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir// de nas phyogs
257b4(rgyud): bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du dam/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs dpa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas
257b5(rgyud): kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig 'thun pa dang / ngag 'thun pa dang / sgra skad 'thun pas dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di
257b6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal
257b7(rgyud): po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed
257b8(rgyud): pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma ngag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po la legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes
258a1(rgyud): dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud
258a2(rgyud): kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi
258a3(rgyud): snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang brel ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
258a4(rgyud): khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'kho dar lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ ma chog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu
258a5(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
258a6(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ 
258a7(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ shin tu 'jig su rung ba/ 'jigs pa
258a8(rgyud): chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongasu thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam
258b1(rgyud): pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyu ro zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi pa
258b2(rgyud): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta
258b3(rgyud): bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yongasu 'dzin pa mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ 
258b4(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po/ bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin la dbum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos
258b5(rgyud): dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis ba skul ma thag tu/ lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs
258b6(rgyud): par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi
258b7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen po dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen po dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
258b8(rgyud): dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
259a1(rgyud): chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi
259a2(rgyud): gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram bi'i sa la bshams
259a3(rgyud): pabar gyur pa ga la ba der/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag
259a4(rgyud): thams cad 'thun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/ dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa/ das kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/ chos kyi bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis
259a5(rgyud): tshim par gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung b.rabagyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyin
259a6(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul da yang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// 
259a7(rgyud): tshad ba spang bar yang bgyi'o// yul der yang 'jigs pa dang / gnang ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig/ 
259a8(rgyud): mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ da
259b1(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la/ sti stang du mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ bdag cag rgya
259b2(rgyud): bo chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin yang
259b3(rgyud): rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang mi skyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid
259b4(rgyud): pa lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po che na po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin dbye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar
259b5(rgyud): dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sa yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i chu gas thams cad kyis kyang / yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur// 
259b6(rgyud): btsun pa bcom 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na
259b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'chang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nang rnam pa sna tshogs yul/ 
259b8(rgyud): du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar
260a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba na mkha' la gnas pa yang / rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par
260a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ dus dus su na mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar
260a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ char pa drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i yang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de
260a4(rgyud): dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / 
260a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang yul na gnas pa'i lha da nga klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod
260a6(rgyud): pa stong 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs/ 
260a7(rgyud): yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid
260a8(rgyud): 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongasu skyong 'tshal bar gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal
260b1(rgyud): bar gyur/ rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i
260b2(rgyud): rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang / 
260b3(rgyud): bo 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i
260b4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / ches bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'a/ dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gri gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de
260b5(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal kho des gdon mi 'chal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdza sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa/ 
260b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan
260b7(rgyud): bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
260b8(rgyud): las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa
261a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag
261a2(rgyud): khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags
261a3(rgyud): so// ci nas 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis/ rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rang gi yul kun tu
261a4(rgyud): bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang / yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur bad nga / ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgram dmachis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pha rol dam ga chog
261a5(rgyud): rnams pa ma ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas su la de dag na nang 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad
261a6(rgyud): chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi yul rnamasu chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing / snang bar bgyis
261a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gno
261a8(rgyud): sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'jam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gror bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen
261b1(rgyud): bos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / 
261b2(rgyud): dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / 
261b3(rgyud): ci nas 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa
261b4(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya cheni dang rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba
261b5(rgyud): dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'a/ gyur pa de dag thams cad da lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de
261b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag pas/ ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang
261b7(rgyud): ldan pas/ byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dag gis lha'i shes pa bas/ ches 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong
261b8(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
262a1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi don du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher
262a2(rgyud): yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'jam+bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can
262a3(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde
262a4(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongasu brjod// yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan da'adas rgyu de dang rkyen des/ mi'i rgyal po nges/ gdon mi 'tshal la
262a5(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyis/ gus pas rim gror bgyi/ dgus bar mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
262a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/ gdon mi zabar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa ma
262a7(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu srung ba'i phyir slob rgya cher gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
262a8(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shig dang / de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di
262b1(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dang
262b2(rgyud): po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gro zhing / gas
262b3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu/ 
262b4(rgyud): bsrung bar bya/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyu/ dar bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las
262b5(rgyud): langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs bdag cag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i ga zungs mchis pa 'di/ sems can gang la la dag 'dzin cing
262b6(rgyud): 'chang bar mos pa/ de la bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis srung zhing bskyabs pas/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bde bar gnas
262b7(rgyud): par bgyi'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang bskyed par bgyi'o// gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus srung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di sngar brjod par bgyi'o// na mo
262b8(rgyud): be shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ra rar/ ku no ku nau// khu no khu no// ru no ru no/ sabs pa/ ka ra ka ra/ bi kA ra/ ma hA bi kA ra~M/ ma hA ka la/ ma hA rAdz+ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/ sarbasatwA nA
263a1(rgyud): swAhA// bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di srud pa dkar po la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar lan bdun byas nas/ dpung ba la btags na/ 
263a2(rgyud): don de nges par 'grub par 'gyu ro// de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/ khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/ spos gu gul dang / tsan ngan dang / ga pur dang / du ru ska dang / a ga ru dang / pog
263a3(rgyud): dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o// na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA d+ha na dA ya/ tsaN+De shwa rA
263a4(rgyud): ya a kaR+Sha/ a ba ra mi ta/ tsit+ta shwa rA/ par ma/ kArba Ni ka/ sarba satwa/ hi ta tsin+ta/ ma ma d+hA na bad+d+ho/ brkyenaswa ya~M/ A kaR+Sha ya swA hA// sngags 'di lan bdun
263a5(rgyud): bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sdig/ sa 'di 'don pa'i dus su/ dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bul sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// 
263a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skong zhing / nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags
263a7(rgyud): 'di bzlas na/ sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyu ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i sngags kyi
263a8(rgyud): snying po 'di smra so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si mi si mi/ su mu su mu/ tsaN+Da tsaN+De/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ kau li ki li/ ku ru ku ru/ 
263b1(rgyud): ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ saM dA ya/ at+ma naM/ ni t+ya ne/ an+d+har+d+ha tu swA hA/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ d+hA na dA ya swA hA/ na mo ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swA hA// sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu/ 
263b2(rgyud): khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te/ bshos ci dang ci 'byor par mchod par bya'o// spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / nyin mtshan
263b3(rgyud): du sems rtse gcig pas/ sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras/ dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs
263b4(rgyud): kyis/ de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhe das dri bar bya'o// de nas bdag ni dkon mchog gsum ral mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig
263b5(rgyud): ces smos shig/ de nas sras ji nar sha b+ha sa yab la gso la pa/ skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa
263b6(rgyud): dang / yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa ni brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas sngags sgrub pa des/ ltas de lta bu mthong nas don de grub par she/ 
263b7(rgyud): te/ gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la/ nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog gcig bzhag ste/ nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang
263b8(rgyud): nas nor 'byung ba las/ nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog dang / spos dang / zhal zos la sogs pa sbyar ba dang / brel cing 'ongs pa rnams
264a1(rgyud): la yang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par 'gyur bas khro ba'i
264a2(rgyud): sems mi skye bar rtag tu srung bar bgyi'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gzhan yang sras dang / sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la
264a3(rgyud): rtag par bsam zhing / bstod pa dang bsngags pa bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang / bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar
264a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / dge ba rgyas pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag gis de ltar byed dpa de mthong nas/ kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing
264a5(rgyud): de la srung ba dang / skyob par byed do// sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongasu spong ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad
264a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dag dang / gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsams pa thams cad kyang grub par
264a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan zan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa nges bdag
264a8(rgyud): mthong bar 'tshal na ches brgyad dam/ chos bco lnga'i nyin par/ ras dkar po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka bi ta dang sbyar ba'i mtshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// 
264b1(rgyud): mo mkhan gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogasu ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/ sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogasu ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
264b2(rgyud): gdab bu smad dang / 'khor du bcas par bris te/ gnas der bkram nas/ me tog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis/ nyin
264b3(rgyud): mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o// sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// na mo shrI
264b4(rgyud): kar+N+Na ya/ bud+d+hA ya/ na mo bai shra ba NA ya/ yak+Sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ a ti rA dzA ya/ na maHshrI ma hA de byaMd ta/ d+ya thAHta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra ba ra/ su shud+ha su shud+d+he
264b5(rgyud): ha na ha na/ ma ni ka na/ badz+re bai DUr+ya/ muk+ti ka/ a lakri te/ sha rI rA ya/ sarba sata/ hi ta kA ma/ bai shra ba NA/ shrI ya de bi pra b+ha ya e hi e hi/ mA bi l+li/ g+hAr+Na g+hAr+Na/ bar
264b6(rgyud): s+ya pa ra s+ya/ da dA hi ma ma/ daR+sha nau/ kA ma s+ya duR+sha naM/ ma ma/ man pra la dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong na/ bad ga byams pa
264b7(rgyud): dang / dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang na rgan po 'am/ dge slong gi gzugasu byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser
