264b8(rgyud): gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod
265a1(rgyud): ni ci dang ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par bya ste/ nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che 'dod pa'am/ mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa
265a2(rgyud): 'am/ gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa 'am/ sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / sman bcud kyis len
265a3(rgyud): 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyis/ de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod pa na yang thams cad
265a4(rgyud): bsam pa bzhin du yongasu grub par bya ste/ rin po che'i gter mi bzang ba dang / bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyu ro// dper na nyi zla 'dis la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa
265a5(rgyud): chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ den pa'i tshig 'di ni nams kyang slu bar mi 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bde ba dang / yid bzhin du skying ba longs spyod pa thob
265a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di sgrub pa yang rung ste/ tshegs chung
265a7(rgyud): dus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi che sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bde ba'i
265a8(rgyud): mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyu ro// bdag gis kyang de yongasu srung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir rjesu 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par
265b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing rgyas par byed pa dang / sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag degom pa brgya tshun chang 'od kyi snang bar byas te/ 
265b2(rgyud): bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyis kyang / rtag tu de'i g.yog tu sgom zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug/ bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang / bcom
265b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dgongasu gsol/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis leg so leg so zhes bka' stsal to// rgyal po
265b4(rgyud): chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs dpa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di smras pa dang / gzhan yA
265b5(rgyud): mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du yongasu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ sdug sa 'di bshad pa ni leg so leg so// de nas rgyal po che na po bzhi stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
265b6(rgyud): gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gcugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa
265b7(rgyud): 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pang rtsa rdul
265b8(rgyud): med tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs/ 
266a1(rgyud): ni 'khor los bris 'dra ste// khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba ngang ba'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo
266a2(rgyud): lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal// yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam
266a3(rgyud): mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigasu bcad bkA/ 
266a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ stobs bcu dag gis gser 'ong pa yi// ming sde dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong / deb khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan
266a5(rgyud): pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam+bu gling 'dir/ 
266a6(rgyud): yun ring gnas por 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi no// sdug bsngal thams
266a7(rgyud): cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni yul dag
266a8(rgyud): bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'jam+bu'i gling 'dir bde ba dang // shin tu la legs nyam kyang dga' 'gyur zhing // 'dzum+bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde bar
266b1(rgyud): 'gyur bar gyis// 'di ni mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// mdo
266b2(rgyud): sde'i dbang po mchog tu dge bar byed// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol dmag tshogs bzlog byed dge ba byed// mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen
266b3(rgyud): shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta// dper na chu grang skom pa sil
266b4(rgyud): byed pa// tsha ba nyam thag che ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag / gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'a dri de bzhi no// dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i
266b5(rgyud): gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang po'i tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i ngang / nga po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis
266b6(rgyud): mchod mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis
266b7(rgyud): kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// 
266b8(rgyud): phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs
267a1(rgyud): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// 
267a2(rgyud): gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das
267a3(rgyud): la tshig su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag
267a4(rgyud): lus 'phar yan lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / yid pa/ de ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis
267a5(rgyud): gtor// mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang / stan rnams las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
267a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po
267a7(rgyud): re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya/ lnga brgya dag/ chos smra ba de la srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// gal te mdo sde 'di las
267a8(rgyud): tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang / bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / mi brjed pa'i mchog gis gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdo sde'i dbang po
267b1(rgyud): 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongasu rgyas par byed pas/ nam yang nub par mi 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag
267b2(rgyud): la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis ye shes dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde
267b3(rgyud): dang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba yongasu spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyuraro// gser 'od/ 
267b4(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po pa zhis yul 'khor yongasu skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
267b5(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti/ 'i bu 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos
267b6(rgyud): thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu 'dzin pa yino// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
267b7(rgyud): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes
267b8(rgyud): bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod
268a1(rgyud): theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi
268a2(rgyud): gnas phyogs na mi gnas shing / chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/ dngos po can yang ma yin// 
268a3(rgyud): dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba las byung ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos
268a4(rgyud): gang gi skye ba yang ma yin/ 'gog pa yang ma yin par cho/ das ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la pha dran par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / 
268a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya
268a6(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang / stobs kyi gnas 'dri ba legaso leg so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di
268a7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas gang na gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
268a8(rgyud): ba dang / yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang / rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang / lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam
268b1(rgyud): grangs bsha du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa
268b2(rgyud): ti'i bu leg so// leg so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas nyid brjod par bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub
268b3(rgyud): sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa des/ sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs 'di
268b4(rgyud): nyan par byed pa dang / gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa/ dang / gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi// sems dang ma bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de
268b5(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyu ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ san+d+hu ra Ni/ ud+d+ha ra Ni/ su saM pra tiShI taM/ su nA ma/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya ba la satwA pra ti dz+nyA/ su a ro hA/ dz+nyA na
268b6(rgyud): pra ti/ ut+pA da ni/ a ba nA baM ni/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi bya ha ra/ shu b+ha ba sti/ su ni shrI tA/ baM hu gum+b+ha/ a b+hi ba dA swA hA// sha radwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di bya
268b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang / legs par gzung ba byas nas 'chang bar byed pa de la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag pa 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam bskal pa brgya
268b8(rgyud): steng du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ dug gis ma yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
269a1(rgyud): chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/ 
269a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po
269a3(rgyud): che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang / zhal zas gya nom
269a4(rgyud): par bzhugs par byed pa bas/ gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tshig ci ga tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches
269a5(rgyud): bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa 'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams
269a6(rgyud): cad kyi yum yin no// gser 'ongad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
269a7(rgyud): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad bzlog pa/ so sor 'brang ba'i sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
269a8(rgyud): gsungs pa/ nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dag
269b1(rgyud): bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / 
269b2(rgyud): phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o// glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de
269b3(rgyud): ngag tu/ glog thams cad mi 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ drA bi ba'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni mi/ ni min d+ha ra~M/ 'jig rten gsum
269b4(rgyud): snang bar byed pa/ lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir daglog thams cad bdag la bsrung shig/ bsrungs shi dag/ swA hA/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269b5(rgyud): chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'a/ khor de nyi du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom lda na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
269b6(rgyud): bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ drA bi Da'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ka Te bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ pra t+ya mi tre/ pra t+ya mi tre/ shud+d+he/ muk+te/ bi ma le/ 
269b7(rgyud): pra b+ha swa re/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra/ bA si ni/ ha ri kaN+Da ri/ ka pi li/ piM ga la/ a k+Shi da d+hi mu khi dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig bsrungs
269b8(rgyud): shig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/ bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo/ 
270a1(rgyud): rjes/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis kyang
270a2(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu nin d+ha re/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti ma hA ma ti/ ha ha ha ha/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jig/ 
270a3(rgyud): ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi Da swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di/ su'i snying la 'dzin tam/ yi ger bris pa de dag gis rtag par rgyun tu/ 
270a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar bgyi'o// dus ma la/ gas par 'gum pa thams cad las thar par bgyi'o// / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan
270a5(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba bskyed pa'i sladadu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la// 
270a6(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma pu re swAhA/ brah+ma swa re swA hA/ brah+ma bi su gar+b+he/ puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/ bcom ldan
270a7(rgyud): 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa/ sdog pa thams cad las rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lag so// / 
270a8(rgyud): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / 
270b1(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bi ni ba ra ni/ ban+d+ha/ ma daN+De/ ma ni ne ti/ ti ni gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ puH/ 
270b2(rgyud): se/ sa la pra b+he/ he na ma t+yo taM/ ut+tA ra ni/ ma ho ra ni/ d+ha ra Ni ge/ tsakra bA ke/ sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ bdag gi rigs sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs
270b3(rgyud): ba zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma legs par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lag so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 
270b4(rgyud): 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
270b5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kya / skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grang
270b6(rgyud): 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ du ma pa ri hA re/ Ar+ya pu sha ste/ shan+ti ni muk+te/ maM ga l+ya/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he s+yA ste/ sta bi te swA hA/ 
270b7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/ cha skyong ba dus ma
270b8(rgyud): lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu skyob pa lag so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i
271a1(rgyud): rgyal po 'od zer brgyabs/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sa/ 
271a2(rgyud): ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/ glog thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/ gshed byed dang / byang stems
271a3(rgyud): dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / ser sna spang ba'i sladadu/ thugs brtse bar
271a4(rgyud): dgongs te bzhe su gsol/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dangs bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te/ sems ser snas bskor ba lag so// tad+ya thA/ a tsa le/ a ma le/ a
271a5(rgyud): mri te/ ak+Sha ye/ a b+hi yai pu N+ye/ bar+ya ba te/ sarba pA baM/ pra sha ma nI ye swA hA/ Ar+ya ban+d+ha/ su ba ra nI ye swAhA/ btsun kha bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes
271a6(rgyud): pa'am/ bud med gang la la lce la 'don dam/ yi ger bris pa de la/ glo gi 'jig pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bya'o// rtsa ba'i dug gam/ mche ba'i dug gam/ dbyig dug gam/ gang
271a7(rgyud): ngag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ de
271a8(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i dbang po de dag la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bzhin bzang dag/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa
271b1(rgyud): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjesu gzung ba'i phyir/ dra bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad leg so leg so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log
271b2(rgyud): pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
271b3(rgyud): ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
271b4(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ yid ba zhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can
271b5(rgyud): gyis/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.ya sa pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
271b6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan pa'i sla du/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi/ gzungs
271b7(rgyud): kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
271b8(rgyud): 'di la tshig 'ga' 'am/ yi ge gang yang rung ba dag cig yongasu nyams par gyur tam bsgyung na/ bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad sgrub/ 
272a1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dgu la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi skad du/ gser 'ong ngam pa ma
272a2(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ 
272a3(rgyud): shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 
272a4(rgyud): srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dang / ngag tu ma mchis par rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / rabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan
272a5(rgyud): bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob pa ra 'gyur ba dang / bskrad pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i skud
272a6(rgyud): du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gis don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi
272a7(rgyud): ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams
272a8(rgyud): cad dang / byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi'u wang smri ka dang / sha mya sha/ 
272b1(rgyud): myi shi ri sha/ in+d+ra hasta skal ba che/ dzam shing tsa a ga ru/ sha ri be sta swa rtsi'i pog/ gu gul ras sha la gi/ rdo dreg lo ma rgyu spos dang // tsan dan dang ni ldong ros dang // gi'u wang dang bcas ru/ 
272b2(rgyud): rta dang // gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug smel na la dang // na ga ge sar u shi ra// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni
272b3(rgyud): sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdag por bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kr-i te/ ka ma ta li/ na li dza na ka ra te/ haM ka ra te/ in+d+ra dzA li ni/ shaM ka ra dre/ ba shang dre/ a brta ka/ sau ke na ku tra ku/ 
272b4(rgyud): ka ba le/ ka be la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ ban+ti/ d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/  shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi te swA hA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor debagyis nas ni// me tog sil ma bkram par bgyi// gse
272b5(rgyud): gyi snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba bzhag par ba gyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang bzhag par bgyi// rab tu rgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thog/ 
272b6(rgyud): pa bzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par rgyan// bar bar dag tu me long
272b7(rgyud): bzhag/ mnga' dang mdung rtse sna sbrang bzhag/ de nas 'tshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu bgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams bcad pa yang brtsam par
272b8(rgyud): bgyi// s+yAng ya the ngan/ a ra kaM/ na ya ne/ hi le mi li/ ki le/ khi khi le swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su khrus bgyis nas// sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na// khrus kyi/ 
273a1(rgyud): zhi bar sbyaro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De/ big ta ba ti swA hA/ phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis che bsrungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod/ 
273a2(rgyud): pa dang // phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzang zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me bi sha me swA hA/ sa ga De/ bi ga De swA hA/ 
273a3(rgyud): big De ba te swA hA/ sA ga ra/ saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ skan+d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+DA ya swA hA/ a ba ra dzi ta/ bir+ya ya swAhA/ hI ma ban+d+ha/ saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ a ni mi la bak+tA ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ 
273a4(rgyud): brah+ma Ne/ na ma sA ra sA t+ye/ ma hA de byaM sid+d+han+tu mAM/ man+ta de/ dA/ ta ra tu bi tsi ti/ brah+ma nu ma nu t+yA swA hA/ dge slong chos smra ba de la srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ge/ 
273a5(rgyud): bris pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis pa dag nyid der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal
273a6(rgyud): lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la
273a7(rgyud): phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med
273a8(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / btsos pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan
273b1(rgyud): ba dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can
273b2(rgyud): khyod// skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te khyod kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 
273b3(rgyud): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug
273b4(rgyud): lha mo chen po dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 2'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dur brtsa yis gos bskus pa/ dur ba
273b5(rgyud): rtsa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol mdzod// s+yAd ya the
273b6(rgyud): dan/ mu re/ tsi re/ a ba dze/ a ba dza ba ti/ mi gu le/ maM gu le/ ping+ga la ba ti/ mid+YA She/ mA ri ts+yai/ sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ta ma grI/ ta ra tsi/ ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi ri tsi ri/ shi ri mi ri/ mA ra ts+yai/ 
273b7(rgyud): pran bi ye/ lo ka dz+yeSh+Te/ lo ka shreSh+Te/ lo ka pr-i ye/ sid+d+hi prAp+te/ b+hi ma mu khi/ shu tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti ha te/ a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA/ na mu tsi/ ma hA de byi/ pra ti gri hA/ na ma ska rAn// bdag
273b8(rgyud): gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshig su bcad pa'i rgyu dang sde snod dang snyan ngag la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha be/ 
274a1(rgyud): li he li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ kA ra te ke yU re/ ke yU ra ma ti/ hi li mi li/ ti'i mi gis ng+yas/ 
274a2(rgyud): kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas lha motshan mo thug pa bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / 
274a3(rgyud): bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi la~M mi li/ hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo
274a4(rgyud): dbyangs can la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi rmi dag rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas lha mdabyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/ yang
274a5(rgyud): bram ze ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu chen po khya sems can thams cad la spobs pa dam pa dang / 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / 
274a6(rgyud): nor dang / dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa leg so leg so// mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad pa
274a7(rgyud): 'di dag smras so// gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
274a8(rgyud): rnams dang dam chos dang // byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang // tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing // rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang // rim gro gus par bas
274b1(rgyud): byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas ni// sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod// ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la// mchod pa rgya chen bshams par bya// skye bo'i rigs ni mang po la// snying rje'i sems
274b2(rgyud): kyang bskyed par bya// bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing // bcom ldan gsung rab dam chos kyis// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de yi
274b3(rgyud): tshig don legs bsams te// stong nyid sgrub pa'ang gnas par byos// bcom ldan thams cad mngon sum du// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang // 
274b4(rgyud): gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan dang del mgur gsung chos kyis// dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stong gsum khebs
274b5(rgyud): mdzad cing // so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston// de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa la// rtag par bsam zhing 'dzigs pa spongs// bsam mi khyab pa'i ljags mtshan 'di// 
274b6(rgyud): smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes// chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa// ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin// sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la// de bsams smon lam chad
274b7(rgyud): med 'grub// gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchod dam// yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin// lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ye shes
274b8(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa'ang // rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing // nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs// gang zhig nor sgrub nor ldan dang / 
275a1(rgyud): khye dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub// 'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnams grol bar// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis sbyongs// yon tan mang po tshad med dang / 
275a2(rgyud): bsam pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas// 'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa// nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs// dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ran byos pa der// bu
275a3(rgyud): pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste// dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod// ba dan gdugs dang lnga ldi bri// phye ma byug pas rgyan par brgyan// sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod/ 
275a4(rgyud): mtho bA 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du// zhag pa dun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te lha de ma mthong da na// bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas// de yi nub mo
275a5(rgyud): 'ang ma mthong na// gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te/ tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la// mchod cing / bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcod// bdag dang gzhan don chad med
275a6(rgyud): la// nyin mtshan rgyun tu brtson bskyed de// de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs// des ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ste'ang bsam pa ma gru ba na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/ yang na
275a7(rgyud): brtson pas lor bzlas na// mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang thob// de nas bram ze ke'u di n+yas 'di skad ces bshad pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/ 'khor
275a8(rgyud): 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang / bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/ 
275b1(rgyud): dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir/ tshig su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o// phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dir dbang brnyes par// sngon gyi drang srong gis ba
275b2(rgyud): pas// de phyir bdag gis khyed la bstod// dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang // thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin// rtag tu dpal la brtson chen
275b3(rgyud): spyod// g.yul gyi gnas la rtag tu rgyal// snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i sring mos lung ston cing // rtag tu dar gos sngon po banabs// mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston
275b4(rgyud): cing // spyan mig sus mthong dngang pa bskyed// spyod pa cha dad med 'jig rten 'das// skyabasu 'ongs rje su 'dzin// bar dga' ri dang brag la gnas// bar 'ga' phug dang chu
275b5(rgyud): bo'i 'gram// yang na ljon sdong nags rnams// gnas de da ga ni lha mo'i rten// ji ltar ri brag mi rnams kyis rma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas shing // rtag tu lha mo
275b6(rgyud): de mchod na// thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob// stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing // bya dang phyugs dang de la brten// dri chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas// bin d+ha'i ri la grags
275b7(rgyud): par gyur// phyag na tri shUl thor tshugs dbu// yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsdus sa// zla ba mar ngo'i bcu cig gam// dgu yi dus su mchod par bya// g.yul 'gyeng dus su thugs brtse
275b8(rgyud): bas// 'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir// lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas// lha mo'i mchog de dpe med pa'o// phyugs rje rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing // lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag tu
276a1(rgyud): rgyal// yun ring 'jig rten bde bar byas// bar dga' khros shing bar 'ga' ni// bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang // rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas// drang srong
276a2(rgyud): lha yi dbang brnyes pas// sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed// lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang // rgya mtsho lung bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis// kun gyi gtso byed 'dul ba
276a3(rgyud): nus// mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog/ 'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la dgongs// rgyal po'i gnas na'ang pad+mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dang gzings// zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/ 
276a4(rgyud): mang du thos ldan brten yang byed// ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags// bsam pas gling dang rab kyang ston// lha dmin la sogs lha rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan bstod
276a5(rgyud): cing bsngags// spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang // gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du blta// sems can gangadag ci 'dod pa// de kun bsam pa myur du skong // blo myur
276a6(rgyud): zos pa 'dzin pa yong // sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ngag tu// rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin// bya dang gcan ri dgas kyi'ang // kun gyis
276a7(rgyud): bsam pa yongasu stong // bud med kyi mchog re bo bzhin// drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral// mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra// 'jig
276a8(rgyud): rten 'thun par gzugs ston cing // 'dod khams par gyi lha gnas su'ang // khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas// de las mchog pa'i sems can med// gal te g.yul dang 'jigs/ 
276b1(rgyud): pa'i gnas// me yi don du lhung gyur tam// chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad// rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa yang // yang na dgra yis bsad par
276b2(rgyud): yang / rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos pa// sdug bsngal dag las thar par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge kun las skyob// byams dang snying rje mdun du gnas// de phyir bdag ni sems btud
276b3(rgyud): de// phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o// de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u dri n+yas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i
276b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gis rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes
276b5(rgyud): pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags/ pas yan lag rgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni ya ngas shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med ye shes yon tan
276b6(rgyud): rnams kyis rnam par rgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir// mchog rab dag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag
276b7(rgyud): bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam mi khyab pas/ 
276b8(rgyud): rgyan pa dang // zla ba dang 'dra dri ma med 'ong dang // ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // mnga' gzhu
277a1(rgyud): mdung dang ral gri dgra sta dang // be tshon lcags kyu 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab
277a2(rgyud): zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung po'i tshogs kyi gan
277a3(rgyud): rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA hA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub gsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag
277a4(rgyud): tu bsrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang / da ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob
277a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze ko'u di n+ya la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems ca na la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir lha mo dbyangs can la bstod/ 
277a6(rgyud): pa dang / dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas bstod pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig gis/ lha mo
277a7(rgyud): chen mo dbyangs can la gsol nas/ yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/ skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes sgrub cing / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med
277a8(rgyud): pa dang / thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing / tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsol zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/ 
277b1(rgyud): bsam pa de nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis/ lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 
277b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
277b3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par bden pa'i gsung gnas pa/ so so'i dbang po dang 'thun par bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar gsung ba bskal pa bye ba tshad med par
277b4(rgyud): yang dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing / gsung ba de dag la rje su yi rang ngo // bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/ 'dzam+bu'i gling dang / rgyal chen
277b5(rgyud): bzhi dang / stong gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsu ma gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'a jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs
277b6(rgyud): shing / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshalo// ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang / bdag spobs pa tshad
277b7(rgyud): med pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog/ byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog/ zung bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs
277b8(rgyud): can mchog/ bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog/ yang dag gzigs dang dbyangs can mchog/ drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo dbu ma dbyangs can mchog/ skye ma byed
278a1(rgyud): lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ gzi can klu yang dbyangs can mchog/ mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog/ bde nas lha sras
278a2(rgyud): dbyangs can mchog/ rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ lha mo be mo dbyangs can mchog/ tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lha
278a3(rgyud): mo dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog/ hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog/ ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 'phrog ma mo yang dbyangs can mchog/ gnod
278a4(rgyud): sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dpya/ rangs can mchog/ bdag la las mchog kun gyis stongs// mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod// sku med pa la
278a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// rnam par grol la phyag 'tshalo// 'dod chag sa bral la phyag 'tshalo// bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshalo// 'od snang
278a6(rgyud): mdzad la phyag 'tsha lo// bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tsha lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshalo// don dam gnas la phyag 'tshalo// 'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tsha lo// dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal// 
278a7(rgyud): bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod// bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur du grub par mdzod// nad med rtag tu bde ba dang // tshe ring ba yang thob par shog/ rig pa'i gnas la
278a8(rgyud): mkhas pa dang // byang chub lam la brtson pa dang // skye bo kun la phan mang mdo// re ba thams cad myur du skongs// bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang // bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa// dbyangs
278b1(rgyud): can lha mo mchog gis ni// bdag gi don de grub par mdzod// lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod// lus dang ngag dang myur zhugs shing // yid myur spobs
278b2(rgyud): pa rdzogs par mdzod// bdag gis lce yi dbang po la// bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod// tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni// sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod// bdag gis tshig
278b3(rgyud): ni ci smras pa// don de thams cad grub parare shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing // byed pa thams cad chud ma gson// nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa// don de grub par ma gyur na// 
278b4(rgyud): lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyuradar // mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgya/ sa bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra bcom pa dag/ 
278b5(rgyud): dang // byas pa bzo ba'i tshig rnams dang // shA ri'i bu dang mo 'u dag la dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang // thams cad bdag la grub
278b6(rgyud): par shog/ sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang // bdag gis der 'dir spyan drang gis// bdag gi re ba bskang pa'i phyir// thams cad myur du gshegs par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i
278b7(rgyud): tshig gsol ba// thams cad slu ba med par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang // tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang // tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams
278b8(rgyud): cad dang // stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang // de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang // de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad
279a1(rgyud): cing // brtse ba kun gyis gzung bar mdzod// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang // gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang // byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i
279a2(rgyud): gnas// dga' ldan gnas kyi lha rnams dang // 'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang // gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad
279a3(rgyud): dang / sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang // de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // zur phud lnga can nor rgyas dang // nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar
279a4(rgyud): dang / de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten bde bar ma dzad pa'i gnas// de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad du/ sdig pa'i las la ma mos dang // sangs rgyas la gus
279a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i ma// bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang // lha dang klu da/ nga gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang ni lha ma yin// ga/ zhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang // lto 'phye che la sogs
279a6(rgyud): pa rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni// bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes brtse ba'i dgongs pa yis// bdag la thogs med spobs pa bskyed// lha dang mi rnams
279a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi// gzhan gyi sems rigs mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthu yis byin rlabs shing // bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ ji snyed na mkha' mtha' gtugs shing // 
279a8(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sems can de dag thams cad kyis// bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ de nas dbyangs can lha mo la// bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skas gsol pa/ 
279b1(rgyud): dang // lha mos skyes bu chen po de la dge'o zhes smras te/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ tshig su bcad pas bstod pa dang // gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang
279b2(rgyud): zhing 'dzin pa dang // dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song ste// sems 'dun pas rje su dmigs shing // ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas/ chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gser
279b3(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.yeng bas
279b4(rgyud): byas pa ni ma gtog so// de skad smras pa dang / bram ze ko'u di n+ya ra/ ba tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar/ ba byas nas rjesu 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
279b5(rgyud): kyis lha mo dbyangs can la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ lha mo khyo da kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongasu srung zhing yongasu rgyas par bya ba dang / mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams
279b6(rgyud): cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang / bsod nams dang / spobs pa tshad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gang sems bskyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
279b7(rgyud): byang chub thob par byas pa leg so// legs so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom
279b8(rgyud): ldan 'das la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang / chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun su
280a1(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan pas par
280a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod
280a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyis slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring
280a4(rgyud): du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbyang po'i rngarnga po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig
280a5(rgyud): 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par/ 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams
280a6(rgyud): cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
280a7(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ gos dang
280a8(rgyud): zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gso sman dang / sman zong dang / yo byad dang / 'chog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs
280b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal
280b2(rgyud): gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang / gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der sems can bye ba
280b3(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / 
280b4(rgyud): dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram de dra/ yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi 'ongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyuraro// lha
280b5(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal gyis mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum
280b6(rgyud): brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa'i bcud
280b7(rgyud): ngag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams// le tog shin tu sna tshogs rnam kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
280b8(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la/ lha mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur// de dag la dpal chen mor byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha
281a1(rgyud): mo chen mo la leg so zhes bka' stsal te/ leg so leg so// lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes dran pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / sems can
281a2(rgyud): tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs shing mdo sde 'di yang yongasu rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
281a3(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas lha mo dpal chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
281a4(rgyud): 'das 'di nas byang phyogasu mi ring ba zhig na/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na bskyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ 
281a5(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang bzang pad+ma dam pa ga/ ser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na/ bdag gnas te/ mi gang la la zhig 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des/ 
281a6(rgyud): rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos rab tu dri zhim par bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
281a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod lha
281a8(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal gyis lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
281b1(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing / me tog dang bdug pa yang dbul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang dbul na/ 
281b2(rgyud): gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus/ de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ ngo'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyur// lha mo chen ma
281b3(rgyud): dpal dgug par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas
281b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
281b5(rgyud): pa dri ma med par 'bar ba'i rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de
281b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gan+da
281b7(rgyud): gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrol ma chen po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhi
281b8(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshalo// nub
282a1(rgyud): phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
282a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tsha'o// 
282a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
282a4(rgyud): rig pa 'di bdag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag rnal 'byor par gyur cig/ s+yAd ya the dan/ pra ti puN+Da/ tsa re/ sa man+ta daR+Ya ne/ ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man+ta bi ma na ga/ 
282a5(rgyud): te/ ma hA kar+ya/ pra ti pra ma ne satwa ar+tha sa man+ta nu pra bu ne/ a yA na d+harma tA/ ma hA b+ho ge ne/ ma hA mai tri/ su pa saM hi te/ ma hA kle she/ su saM gri ho tai/ sa ma ra thA nu pA la ni
282a6(rgyud): swA hA// 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub par sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la
282a7(rgyud): spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na tho ba med par dag gis/ lo bdun du 'don cing / 'dzin pa dag la yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsnyen te/ bdag dang sems can
282a8(rgyud): kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang / spos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa
282b1(rgyud): 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang bar byas la/ lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ spos dang / 
282b2(rgyud): bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma yang gting bar bya'o// sa la me tog gi sil ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la/ dpal lha mo 'ongs nas der gnas par
282b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gan su nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par 'gyur ro// 'gron bu dang gser
282b4(rgyud): dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad
282b5(rgyud): las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ de nas de ji srid 'tshe'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'phang bar mi 'gyur de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongasu
282b6(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongasu sbrel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom
282b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ de ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong
282b8(rgyud): ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam dgon pa'i phyogs sam ri'i sman ljongs ma/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljong/ 
283a1(rgyud): sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
283a2(rgyud): ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang na/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom
283a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan
283a4(rgyud): 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang / de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og log su mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos
283a5(rgyud): smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas rten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang cho/ sa mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim pa/ ra bgyi/ yang dag par rim gror bgyi/ yang dag par mchod
283a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// bdag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyis par gyur nas/ rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar
283a7(rgyud): du/ sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ sa'i bcud kyi snum
283a8(rgyud): gyis brlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o// de nas 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal sna tshogs rnams gzi byin dang rab tu/ 
283b1(rgyud): ldan par 'khrud par 'gyur/ kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal dang / shing ljon pa thams cad dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa thams cad dang / rab
283b2(rgyud): tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi/ dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang / snum dang rab tu ldan pa dang / ro zhim por gyur/ blta na rab tu sdug pa dang / rab tu che bar 'gyu ro// sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang
283b3(rgyud): bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang stobs dang / kha dog dang / dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzugs dang rab tu
283b4(rgyud): ldan par gyur nas kyang / sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgying par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad par 'gyur/ stobasu bgyi ba'i
283b5(rgyud): las rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad/ sa rgyu des 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba nga/ nga / lo legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ 
283b6(rgyud): skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur 'dzum+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag gzi byin dang / stobs dang kha dog
283b7(rgyud): dang / gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'ja/ 
283b8(rgyud): pa de dag chos kyi khri stan la mchis gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
284a1(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos smra ba de dag la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ btsun
284a2(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs
284a3(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yA/ 
284a4(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha dmo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'das tshim pa ra gyur/ gzi byin dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / 
284a5(rgyud): shugs chen po thob par gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud/ chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu ro// sa chen po gzi byin
284a6(rgyud): dang rab tu ldan par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/ chen por yang 'gyur ro// sa la
284a7(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang / longs spyod dang yongasu spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/ bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / 
284a8(rgyud): btung ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang gos dang / mal cha dang stan dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang / chu mig dang / 
284b1(rgyud): mche'u dang / mtsho dang lteng ka dang / 'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa sa las 'byung ba/ sa la brten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu/ 
284b2(rgyud): des na sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa bzo bar bgyi'o// gdon mi 'tshal ba gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi/ 
284b3(rgyud): bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/ rigs tha dad pa dang
284b4(rgyud): khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur/ la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang khyim dang / grong dang / 
284b5(rgyud): grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/ rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis/ de rang chos mnyan pa zab mo tho so// de ring bdag cag
284b6(rgyud): gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas// / 
284b7(rgyud): deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongasu thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongasu thar to// 
284b8(rgyud): deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro// khyim tha dad pa
285a1(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ba de dag sems can gzhan dag la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa
285a2(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/ sngon byung ba gcig gam/ tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig gam/ tha na tshig bzhi
285a3(rgyud): pa'i tshogasu bcad pa gcig gam/ tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu
285a4(rgyud): ston tam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sem das can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu/ 
285a5(rgyud): 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid da ma/ gtam brgyud brjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'ad sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa
285a6(rgyud): dang / shin tu snum par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyuraro// rna
285a7(rgyud): par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas par gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyuraro// nor che ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog
285a8(rgyud): gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la
285b1(rgyud): dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshigs gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs kyi nang du lba'i
285b2(rgyud): rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir gnas de dag legs par
285b3(rgyud): rgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig gam/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yog nas/ sa'i lha mo rtag tu rgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de
285b4(rgyud): dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhal med khang rgyan tha/ mas cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyu ro// gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas
285b5(rgyud): shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa'i lha'i mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzha/ la med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyuraro// lha
285b6(rgyud): bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na/ 
285b7(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs kyi sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag
285b8(rgyud): ngag la dge ba'i rtsa bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
286a1(rgyud): sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar
286a2(rgyud): dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
286a3(rgyud): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur
286a4(rgyud): bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa yan lag gi dam pa mgo bos brten par bgyi de'o// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
286a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang / mi thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ 'khor bzhi
286a6(rgyud): po gang la la zhig gis/ bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang / nor dang nor bu rin po che dang / dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang / sman bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa dang / 
286a7(rgyud): phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/ gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/ khrus byas gos sar pa bgos te/ rtsa bting ba'i steng du 'dug nas/ sku/ 
286a8(rgyud): gzugs ring bsrel can gyis mdun nam/ mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mchod de skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i chos brgyan
286b1(rgyud): la sems rtse gcig gis gzungs sngags 'di bzlas pas spyan drangs par 'gyur te/ sngags la/ tAd+ya thA/ kyi ma tsha la/ tsu lu su wa/ ku ru kuR+Sha/ ku Tu kA ru/ ( d+d+hoH/ bta baH/ shab rig pa
286b2(rgyud): swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis bdag spyan drang ba'i phyir/ sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag de'i gan du mche bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan
286b3(rgyud): 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dang mjal cing smra bar 'tshal na/ cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te/ sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ an tsa ni kya li k+Sha ni/ shi shi d+ha ri/ hA ha/ 
286b4(rgyud): hi hI/ ku ru ba re swA hA// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig 'a/ di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na/ de'i mdun du lus bstan te/ nges par bsam pa rdzogs
286b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// gang sngags 'di zlos par 'dod pas/ sngar lu sa srung ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di brjod do// tad+ya thA/ ni shai ri/ b+ha sha ka ti/ da ti shud ti/ b+hu ta/ b+hu te ri/ b+hu te ri/ Ti Ti
286b6(rgyud): ba Ti/ ku ku Ti/ ka ba tsi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe/ tshon srung sna lnga la sngags la na re gdab cing / mdud pa re re bcing ngo // de 'dra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
286b7(rgyud): bsngags te/ dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsal te/ lus bsrungs par 'gyur ro// sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas nas/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub
286b8(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// bdag gi tshig 'di mi slu bar/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams bdag la mngon du gzigs shing dgongs par gsol/ 
287a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la leg so// zhes bka' stsal to// gang khyod kyis bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang / 
287a2(rgyud): chos smra ba de la srung bar byas pa de ni leg so leg so// de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
287a3(rgyud): las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
287a4(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gci dag tu dgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i nga sa la ba tsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo/ 
287a5(rgyud): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa da do sde'i dbang po'i
287a6(rgyud): rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan/ 
287a7(rgyud): 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ 
287a8(rgyud): dgon pa'i phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong chos smra ba de la srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu
287b1(rgyud): bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad gang su dag gser
287b2(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa cig nyan pa dang / tha na tshig cig gam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byung
287b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan cig tsam thos par gyur te/ bzung ba dang tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par 'gyur te/ 
287b4(rgyud): bzung ba de thams cad kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu ba skyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang // zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag
287b5(rgyud): dang / khyim de dag dang / grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang ngo / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de dag dang / pho bra nga 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab
287b6(rgyud): pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
287b7(rgyud): chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur zhe na/ 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad
287b8(rgyud): 'tshal to// chos thams cad yong su 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang / chos thams cad ji lta ba dang / chos thams cad gnas pa gang lags pa dang / 
288a1(rgyud): chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rigs gang dag lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo// 
288a2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ye
288a3(rgyud): shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag
288a4(rgyud): chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongasu brtags pa dang / yang dag par yong su 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par rnam par blta ba dang / yang dag par
288a5(rgyud): khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge
288a6(rgyud): slong chos sla ba de'i tshig rgyan par bgyi ba'i slad/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba
288a7(rgyud): dang / rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi sla du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi sla du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
288a8(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur
288b1(rgyud): ba dang / ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs
288b2(rgyud): pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / 
288b3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i// 
288b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de'i spu'i bu ga rnamasu gzi byin sprul bar bgyi'o// de'i lus la mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grub chen po
288b5(rgyud): bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyA kha par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bya'o// de che/ ra spro bar bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dben chen po yang
288b6(rgyud): dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs sngags zhig mchis pa 'di/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
288b7(rgyud): spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o// sngags la/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na maHsa g+ha ya/ na mo brah+ma ya/ na mo in+d+ra ya/ na maHtsa turma hA rA dzA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ 
288b8(rgyud): mau li mi li/ gau ri ma hA go ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma hA gan+d+ha ri/ dri mi Di/ ma hA dri mi Di/ dar+b+ba bu khun+te/ ha ha ha ha ha/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hu hu hu hu hu teha lo d+ha me/ gu d+ha me/ tsa tsa tsa tse/ tsatsi tsi tsa~M tsi/ tsu nu tsu tsu/ tsaN+De shwa ra/ 
289a1(rgyud): shi kha ra shi kha ra/ ut+tiSh+Tha he b+ha ga bAn/ sa bid dz+nyA ya swA hA/ gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/ bdag gis de la 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsod snyoms dang / gos
289a2(rgyud): dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / nor dang / rin po che la sogs pa thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// gang la la zhig pu pho mo smos pa dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang
289a3(rgyud): rgyan la sogs pa'i yo byad 'dod na yang / bdag gis de la yid bzhin du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ gang gsang sngags 'di zlos pa'i
289a4(rgyud): che/ bdag myur du de'i gan du mchis te ci yang thogs pa med par 'grub pa bgyi'o// gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ thog mar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyis
289a5(rgyud): gzugs/ srid chags bzhi pa'am lnga pa/ lag na dgra sta thog/ sa pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa/ 'i grwa bzhir/ sbrang rtsi 'am bu ram chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi
289a6(rgyud): zhog la/ byug pa dang phye ma dang / bdug pa sreg cing / me tog gi phreng bas kyang mchod par bgyi'o// yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun du/ sbyin sreg gi thab khung brkos pa la/ dud pa med pa'i nang du mar dang / 
289a7(rgyud): yungs dkar bsres la/ sngags lan re bzlas shing / thab de'i nang du sbyin bsreg bya'o// de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pa dang / bdag de la lus mngon par ston to/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar
289a8(rgyud): bya'o// de nas sngags grub pa des kyang / ci 'dod pa de la smos shig dang / ci 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// gang gser dngul 'dod pa dang / gter tshol bar 'dod pa dang / lha'i drang srong 'dos
289b1(rgyud): pa yang 'grub ste/ nam mkha' la 'gro'o// gzhan yang lha'i mig dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed do// sems can thams cad la mi/ 
289b2(rgyud): bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rgyun bcad de/ rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la legs
289b3(rgyud): zhes bka' stsal te/ leg so leg so// gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'di yongasu srung ba'i phyir/ gosang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras pas/ bsod nam
289b4(rgyud): dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyuraro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde 'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po ya nga dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// 
289b5(rgyud): de nas sa'i lha mo bstan ma zhes bya ba de/ 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ thal mo sbyar ba btude
289b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang yul 'khor na/ mi'i rgyal po byed pas yang dag pa'i chos mi spyod na/ yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang / rang gi lus
289b7(rgyud): rgyal thabs 'thon po'i sa na/ yun ring por gnas par mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pas rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par
289b8(rgyud): gsol/ de thos pas mi'i rgyal po rnams chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing / rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang / yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag thams cad kyang
290a1(rgyud): yongasu bde bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i tshogs kyi nang na/ sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo khyod de'i phyir shin tu
290a2(rgyud): legs par nyon cig sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la/ bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba de'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ yab
290a3(rgyud): mchog gi rgyal po'i tog las blangs pa/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ ngas rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des/ lo nyi khri'i ba
290a4(rgyud): du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/ tha na sems kyi skad cig/ gcig tsam gyis chod kyang sngon chos ma yin pas/ byo dgas 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma sheso// bu rgyal po'i
290a5(rgyud): bsten bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de gang na na/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal dri stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya bas/ bu rgyal po mdzes pa
290a6(rgyud): tog la/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sems can kun la phan byed pa// the tshom
290a7(rgyud): thams cad gcod pa po// nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa// rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya// rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i semasu 'gyur byos la// lha yi dbang
