290a8(rgyud): po'i dam tshig kun// thal mo sbyar te nyan par byos// rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir// lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang langs// khyod/ 
290b1(rgyud): ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste// khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod// bdag cag dogs pa bcad gsol// mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la// ji lta bur ni lha zhes
290b2(rgyud): bgyi// gang gi rgyus na rgyal po la// lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lha ni ji lta bur// mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skyes zhing // mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la// rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur
290b3(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de skad yongasu dris pa dang // lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des// 'jig rten skyong ba 'di skad smras// de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// de ltar bdag la
290b4(rgyud): dris pa na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bco das dam pa kho bos bstan// mi yi gnasu skyes pa ni// rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang // rgyu gang gis na yul rnamasu// 
290b5(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dbang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyi// ma yi rum du 'jug gyur te// lha yis sngar ni byin rlabs nas// phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// mi
290b6(rgyud): yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur pas na// de ni lha yi sras zhes bya// khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis// rgyal po'i
290b7(rgyud): skal pa byin nas ni// mi rnams la ni dbang por sprul// nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang // sems can legs byed dgod pa dang // lha yi gnasu dgye ba'i phyir/ 
290b8(rgyud): mi yi dbang po ma shas dang // lha yi shas dang dri za'i shas// gdol ba'i shas dang srin shas kyis// nyes par byed pa bzlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams la// mi yi dbang po pa
291a1(rgyud): ma'i shas// rnam sbyin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang // nyes pa byas pa'i las rnams kyi// rnam smin
291a2(rgyud): 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs// yul na nyes byas gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing // sdig pa can gyi skye bo la// 'thun pa'i chad pas mi
291a3(rgyud): gcod cing // nyes par byed pa yal bor ba// de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel// 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang // yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir 'byung // sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na// lha yi dbang
291a4(rgyud): bopo 'khrugs par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ dgang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad pa// drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur// pha rol
291a5(rgyud): dmag tshogs lhags na su// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'a jig/ longs spyod rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang // g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// 
291a6(rgyud): phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid// bya ba de ni mi byed na// glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin// rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma
291a7(rgyud): rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar bor na der// sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras// legs par smin par mi 'gyur/ 
291a8(rgyud): zhing // mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor na// de tshe lha rnams khang pa na// yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// lha rgyal dbang po
291b1(rgyud): de dag kun// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan de// chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur// rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par// lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur// 
291b2(rgyud): lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na// de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung gyur zhing // mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// g.yo rnams dang ni 'thob mo dang // nad kyang kun tu
291b3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams ni rab 'khros shing // lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor// yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed// spun nam yang na bu yang rung // sdug
291b4(rgyud): pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'a/ bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar ma dag kyang / ltung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba byung // pha rol gyi ni dam
291b5(rgyud): tshogs dang // mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yis glang lo phangs pa dang // blon po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi 'og tu rnga mo ni// phangs pa dag ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyim dang / 
291b6(rgyud): longs spyod nor rnams kyang // phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun du ni 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab mo dag dang rtsod dang g.yo// yul rnams ni 'byung bar
291b7(rgyud): 'gyur// yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// de yi 'khor dang blon po yang // chos dang ldan pa
291b8(rgyud): ma yin 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la// rtag tu chas pas gcod par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur// chos ldan
292a1(rgyud): chad pas bcad pas na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur// chos min skye bo bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs// sems
292a2(rgyud): can mdangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnam pa gsum par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing // skye bo dam pa rmad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur// 'bras
292a3(rgyud): bu lo tog ro dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can nad pa mang po dag/ yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag/ yul rnams na ni yod pa yang // kha ba
292a4(rgyud): dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur// rtse dang dgod dang da dga' ba dang // sngan chad dga' ba'i dngos po dag/ dga' ba nyams shing mi dga' 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrug/ 
292a5(rgyud): lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu yi// snum dngos khu ba zad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi / 'gyur ro// sems can rnams ni mdog ngan cing // mthu chung
292a6(rgyud): shin tu ring bar 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang ni// tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang // de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag
292a7(rgyud): yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// sems can nang mang 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i// gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min
292a8(rgyud): phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te// nyes byed yal ba
292b1(rgyud): 'dor ba'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lha dbang rnams kyis dgongs gang phyir// rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yis// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing // nyes byed
292b2(rgyud): yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sems can rnams// lha yi gnasu lhar yang skye// nyes par byas pas yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye// gang tshe rgyal po'i yul
292b3(rgyud): rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas nas// nyes par byas pas ltung bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na// de ni bu yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams/ 
292b4(rgyud): kyis// gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur// g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de// phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis
292b5(rgyud): brlabs// nyes par byas pa zhi bya'i phyir// legs par byed la mdzud pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la// yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin// legs byas dang
292b6(rgyud): ni nyes byas kyi// las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// lha tshogs
292b7(rgyud): rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs// lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang // yul 'khor dag na skye bo ni// sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang // yul gyi don gyi chos kyi phyir// srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang // 
292b8(rgyud): chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing // shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni// yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa// de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin// ji ltar g.yo rnams 'byung ba la// g.yo byed chang bar ma bcad na// 
293a1(rgyud): yul du shin tu mi bzad pa// g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyis rdzing chen bzhin// yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang 'khro
293a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na// de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyi yul
293a3(rgyud): 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya// srog kyang yongasu btang bya zhing // nyes mgon bya bar mi bya'o// skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang
293a4(rgyud): gcig bya zhing // phyogasu ltung bar gyur ta ro// rgyal po chos dang lnga na pa yi// grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams na// lha yi dbang po dgar gyur te// 'dzum+bi
293a5(rgyud): gling na nged kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin// chos kyi yu la 'khor der bstan nas// legs par 'byung la skye bo/ bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skye bo dag ni 'dir
293a6(rgyud): bgyid de// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed snya mo// chos kyi yul 'khor dar bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang 'gyur bas// mi yi rgyal po
293a7(rgyud): de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur// rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khru
293a8(rgyud): rnamasu lo legs byed// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha yi gnas rnams gang bar byed// de lta bas na rgyal po yis// bdag gi phangs pa'i srog btang gis// gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur
293b1(rgyud): pa// dkon mchog chos ni ma btang ste// yon tan rnams kyis gang rgyan pa// chos dang ldan pa bsten par bya// rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba// rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs// chos kyi yul
293b2(rgyud): 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par byed la sems can dgod// nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin gdul bar byed
293b3(rgyud): pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing // rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing // skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
293b4(rgyud): po'i rgyal po las rgyal po'i bstan bcos// lha'i dbang po'i dngam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di
293b5(rgyud): ngag bka' stsal to// gang tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'a gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams dang // gling ba zhir rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang // sngon gyi rgyal ba
293b6(rgyud): ngag la ngas phu'o// chos kyi sku de yongasu btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med// bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang // ji ltar sngon
293b7(rgyud): gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i// bstan la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de ni gling bzhi'i
293b8(rgyud): dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na// de tshe rgyal po dam pa gnyid kyis log/ rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan
294a1(rgyud): thos// chos smra rin chen sogs pa gnyid dkyil na// rnam par lhang nge mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di// rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur// rgyal po de ni gnyid kyis log/ 
294a2(rgyud): las sad// de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur// mgu nas rgyal po khab nas sngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnasu song // rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 
294a3(rgyud): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen tshogs// yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces// chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gi
294a4(rgyud): nang na 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la// kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de// phun sum gzi brjid dpal
294a5(rgyud): gyis rab 'bar zhing // phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur pa// de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan// 'di ni chos smra ri/ na chen sogs pa 'dir// rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin
294a6(rgyud): pa ste// gser 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston// rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od
294a7(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra ba shadadu gsol// rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyid la// rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na// stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten
294a8(rgyud): thams cad// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur// de tshe mi yi dbang po sa phyogs ni// gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der// rin chen chu dang spos chus chag chag
294b1(rgyud): btag/ me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par rgyan// rgyal pos khri der tsan dan dam pa dag/ 
294b2(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor// lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye ches// lha yi me tog man da ra ba'i char// khri de la ni mngon par rab tu/ 
294b3(rgyud): pab Ta chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong // bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa// rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sa la me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor// chos smra rin chen
294b4(rgyud): sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bya gros te// khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// 
294b5(rgyud): bar snang 'dus nas me tog man da ra'i// char pa 'bebs shing si// la snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs// rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra nges// phyogs ba
294b6(rgyud): ngag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas// de ni mngon par 'dzegs te 'dag par gyur// sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag
294b7(rgyud): bskyed byas te// rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni// de yi tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo sbyar byas 'dug na su// tshig gcig gis ni rje su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma
294b8(rgyud): byung // de yi lus la dga' bas khyab par gyur// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe rgyal po leg par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir smon la/ 
295a1(rgyud): btab pa na// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang yang 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor bu rin po che'i// char pa de ring 'dzam
295a2(rgyud): bu'i gling du phob// de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang // dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur// rgyal po legs
295a3(rgyud): par byung bas 'dzam gling du// rin chen char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas// gli bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
295a4(rgyud): nga// rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi dag ngan rin chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongasu ba tang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la// de tshe mdo
295a5(rgyud): sde 'di ni rab bstan pa// rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to// nga/ sa gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing // tshig gcig gis ni rjes
295a6(rgyud): yi rang ste// ngas ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang // chos mnyan pa dang rje su yi rang bas// gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes dang // lha stong bye ba
295a7(rgyud): rab tu dga' byed pa// skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los bsgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang // 
295a8(rgyud): ngas ni khams kyi rgyal po myong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhir de yin no// gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i// stobs bcu
295b1(rgyud): dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas// ngas gang mdo thos rje su yi rang ba// bsod nams phung po de ltar tshad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob// chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo// 
295b2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la
295b3(rgyud): la zhig/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par
295b4(rgyud): 'dod cing / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongasu shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag
295b5(rgyud): khang ngam/ dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'od da ma pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der/ des gdon mi za bar
295b6(rgyud): g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna blags te/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/ de'i
295b7(rgyud): tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la// bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba// zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pa/ gtsug
295b8(rgyud): lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam// gang na gser 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas bas
296a1(rgyud): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las// sems can thams cad thar par byed// mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang // dbus dang de bzhin mtha' ma mthong // mdo sde dbang po rab zab ste/ 
296a2(rgyud): 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin// gang ga dang ni sa rnams dang // rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la// gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar ni mi nus so// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de yi
296a3(rgyud): che na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni// zab mor rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong // yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis// mdo sde 'di ni
296a4(rgyud): rab tu ston// grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa dbye ba ji snyed par// lha dag dang ni mi rnams kyi// bde ba dag ni rjesu myong // gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bdag
296a5(rgyud): gi bsod nams kyis// phung po bsam yas sgrub snyam du// de tshe des ni de ltar shes// mes gang 'obs kyis bskor kha yis// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing // tsher ba drag pa
296a6(rgyud): bzod byas nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du// zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med pa 'gyur// rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gzar
296a7(rgyud): dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang // zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// 
296a8(rgyud): der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri// de lta bu yang bshams par bya// khri de la ni 'dug nas su// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa bklag par bya// de bzhin yongasu chub par bya// khri de la ni babs
296b1(rgyud): nas su// yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang // khri de la ni yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugasu yang // de na res 'ga' snang bar gyur// res 'ga' sangs
296b2(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ste// res 'ga' byang chub sems dpa' yang // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs te// res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugasu yang // khri de la ni snang ba
296b3(rgyud): 'gyur// res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par
296b4(rgyud): 'gyur// thams cad du yang grub par byed// dpal yon pa dkra shis phun sum tshogs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul dpa yin// rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed// phyir rgol
296b5(rgyud): ba yang bzlog par byed// pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ sdig pa
296b6(rgyud): thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir thams cad// grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni// shin tu pham pa nyid du
296b7(rgyud): 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// g.yul ngo'i rnam par gdong las rgyal// ngagra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum
296b8(rgyud): dbang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am ci dbang lha
297a1(rgyud): min dbang // de bzhin na mkha' lding dbang po// de dag las ni sogs pa dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // chos kyi mchod rten bsam yas la// rtag tu mtsha/ 
297a2(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams// mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag
297a3(rgyud): thams cad kyang // phan tshun du ni smra byed pa// bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bsags pa de dag kun la bltos// gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di// nyan pa'i don du 'dir lhags pa// 
297a4(rgyud): mi de dag ni rab sbyangs pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhags so// dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas// de dag 'jig rten snying rjer ldan// de
297a5(rgyud): dag sems can phan byed pas// de dag zab mo'i chos rnam sa kyi// dam pa'i chos kyi ro yi snod// chos kyi dbying sa la 'jug pa yi// de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag
297a6(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa'i mdo// dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pas// de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yis ni// mdo 'di nyan pa de dag la// 
297a7(rgyud): dbang rgyal po kun dang ni// dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du// dpal ldan rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul
297a8(rgyud): ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang // srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni// skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // bsreg bya
297b1(rgyud): za dang skye dgu dang // stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin mtshan g.yeng ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// stobs chen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang // 
297b2(rgyud): sred med bu dang dbang phyug che// yang dag shes la sogs pa dag/ gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa
297b3(rgyud): thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // gnod sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang // de dag la ni srung bar byed// gnod sbyin dbang po
297b4(rgyud): nor bu bzang // de bzhin gang ba bzang po dang // ji 'jigs dang / ni 'brog gnas dang // dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang // gno dang sbyin dbang po re re yang // gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni// gang
297b5(rgyud): ngag mdo sde 'di thos pas// de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba'i rgya la// nor bu'i 'gul dang nges 'grin dang // de bzhin char pa'i
297b6(rgyud): bdag po dang // kham po che dang nag po dang // de bzhin gser 'dra'i skra dang ni// lnga rtsen dang ni ra rkang dang // de bzhin bskal pa chen po dang // yur ba can dang chos skyong dang // spre'u dang ni bzhin khri byed dang / 
297b7(rgyud): khab kyi sku dang gnyen bshes dang // de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni// yur chen can dang khyim med dang // 'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang // mthu bo che dang gangs can dang // bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te// stob
297b8(rgyud): chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag la ni srung bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // e la'i 'dab dang btang
298a1(rgyud): bzung dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyig dang // klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar/ 
298a2(rgyud): byed// stobs chen sgra gcan mi gtong dang // thag bzangs ris dang bde mchog dang // rab sim byed dang phrag rtsub dang // de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang // lha min brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu
298a3(rgyud): 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las// de dag la ni srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'im mo 'phrog ma ni// lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang // 'dug dang nyal dang ra ro'i tshe// de dge
298a4(rgyud): la ni srung bar byed// gdol pa mo dang gtum mo dang // de bani na gnod sbyin gtum mo dang // dung can dang ni so brtsegs / dang // sems can kun gyi gzi 'phrog ma// stobs chen pha rol
298a5(rgyud): gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // phyogs bzhi da ga ni kun nas su// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// dbyang sa can dag la sogs pa rnams// lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang / 
298a6(rgyud): dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du// lha mo dag ni thams cad dang // sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni// lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang // kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dag dang rlu dang // lha
298a7(rgyud): rnams de dag thams cad 'dir// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la// sems can rnams ni sbyor/ 
298a8(rgyud): par byed// dpal dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyi// phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu rkyen// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// rgung dang sdig dang rmi ngan pa// de dag tham
298b1(rgyud): cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yis// sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni// gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang porar yis tshim// dpag chang dag ni brgya mi phrag/ stong phrag drug cu
298b2(rgyud): brgyad nas// rdo rje'i gdan la thug bar du// sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi// 'og tu sa yi bcud song ste// de ni phyir yang log nas ni// sa yi steng dag snum par byed// 
298b3(rgyud): mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur// gzi byin ldan par rab 'gyur zhing // de bzhin rab tu stobs
298b4(rgyud): ldan 'gyur// bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// 'bras bu lo tog nags lha rnam ngas// sna tshogs ro yi tshim 'gyur zhing // shin tu rab tu dga' bar
298b5(rgyud): 'gyur// mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bra/ sa bu shing ljon sna tshogs kyang // kun nas rab tu skye bar byed// 
298b6(rgyud): 'bras bu shing ljon thams cad kyang // kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams// me tog rab tu chags byed cing // sna tshogs dri ni rab tu 'byin// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs
298b7(rgyud): ldan pa yi// rtswa dang nags tshal thams cad dang // sa yi steng na skye bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di mas cad na// klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song
298b8(rgyud): ste// rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du// ku mu da dang pad+ma dang // ut+pal dang de bzhin du// pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs bskyed// na mkha' la ni du ba dang // sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag/ mun pa dang ni rdul med
299a1(rgyud): cing // phyogs rnams rab tu 'od gas lo// nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan yang // 'od zer dra bas 'od kyang 'gyed// snang ba dag ni zab mo yis// rab tu dga' ba 'char bar 'gyur// 
299a2(rgyud): dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu// 'dzam+bu'i gling gi gser gyi ni// gzhal med khang na 'dug pa yang // mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu tshim// dbang po nyi ma rab dga' nas// 'dzam+bu'i gling du 'char byed cing // 'od zer
299a3(rgyud): mtha' yas dra ba yis// kun nas rab tu snang bar byed// de ni shar pa tsam gyis kyang // 'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing // rdzing bu sna tshogs khengs pa yi// pad+ma dag ni kha yang 'byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni tham
299a4(rgyud): cang du// lo tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs// yang dag yo dang su smin byed cing // sa rnams thams cad tshim par byed// / zla ba dang ni nyi ma yang // de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur// rgyu
299a5(rgyud): skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // rlung yang de bzhin lda/ da dzam+bu'i gling ni thams cad du// kun tu lo yang legs 'gyur te// gang na mdo sde 'di yod pa// yul 'khor de ni khyad par
299a6(rgyud): 'phags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gnod sbyin gyi gnas shes bya ba kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de skad ces bka' stsal pa
299a7(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das la rig kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par sdud pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha'i
299a8(rgyud): bu khri bo dag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang / gang bgyis shing bsags pas/ skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob nas/ da ltar
299b1(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 
299b2(rgyud): bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
299b3(rgyud): byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
299b4(rgyud): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnam/ das kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten
299b5(rgyud): du 'byung ngo // ji tsam ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu sa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de/ yod
299b6(rgyud): su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ste/ de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad nub par gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams
299b7(rgyud): rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung // ji
299b8(rgyud): tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i bstan pa yong ye thams
300a1(rgyud): cad nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyidadu/ bla na med
300a2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar
300a3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od zer du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba
300a4(rgyud): 'jig rten du 'byung // zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan la dngas kyis/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa de'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rig
300a5(rgyud): kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa 'di skad ces gso la to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad pa ra gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri bo de dag
300a6(rgyud): ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po cher yang ma gyur/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyad skad kyang mi gda'/ rkang pa dang / mig dang / lag pa dang / yan lag gi dam pa
300a7(rgyud): mdo dang bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo phongs pa dag sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda'/ nor dang 'bru dang mgron bu dang / gser dang mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru
300a8(rgyud): dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / rin po che rnams sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda'/ gza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / rten dang / khang khyim dang / 
300b1(rgyud): gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dag sngon yong su btang skad kyang mi gda'/ glang po che dang / b.lang dang / rta bo rgod dang / bran po dang / bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongs
300b2(rgyud): btang skad kyang mi gda'/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs
300b3(rgyud): pa'i ming du lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du/ sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis
300b4(rgyud): pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag pas/ dam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dag dang / yo byad thams cad/ kyis mchod par bgyis/ yongasu gtong bar bgyi ba'i dngos po
300b5(rgyud): thams cad kyang yongasu btang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /  ga dang / yan lag gi dam pa/ mgo dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bu mo phangs pa yongasu gtong bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yod
300b6(rgyud): su gtong / nor dang / 'bru dang / mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram rnams yongasu btang bar bgyi ba rnams
300b7(rgyud): kyang yongasu gtong / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng
300b8(rgyud): ka dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / rta'o rgod dang / bran po dang / bran mo yongasu btang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongasu gtong zhing / rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu rdzogs
301a1(rgyud): par bgyid/ rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs par bgyis nas/ bde ba 'bum phrag mang po yang 'byor par 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang / 
301a2(rgyud): rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis/ 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa
301a3(rgyud): 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa du ma na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa la'i dbang po'i mthon po rgyal mtshan dang / 
301a4(rgyud): ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang / rus gcig pa dang / ming gcig tu rims kyis bla na me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 
301a5(rgyud): rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sang / sa rgyas khri 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabasu lnga na ba bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'du
301a6(rgyud): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angasu 'gyuraro// zhes da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags/ de skad
301a7(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la
301a8(rgyud): sogs pa lta'i bu khri po 'di dag gang byas shing / bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas/ 'dir lhags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod/ de'i
301b1(rgyud): rgyu yod/ de'i byed rgyu yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum gyis byang chub tu bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ shin tu/ 
301b2(rgyud): ri mor byed cing dga' ba dang / dang ba thob par gyur to// de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongasu dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// dri ma med la shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab
301b3(rgyud): pa'i sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to// bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs
301b4(rgyud): pa lha'i bu khri bo 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i da dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ lhag par ri mor byed pa dang / rab tu dang ba thob par gyur to// de tsam du bai DUr+ya
301b5(rgyud): dri ma med pa ltar yongasu dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te// de'i phyir lung bstan pas rjesu ston to// rigs kyi lha mo chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / sngon
301b6(rgyud): gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khro bo 'di dag/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gser
301b7(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo sngon gyi smon lam de dag gang zhe na/ 
301b8(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i ches grangs med pa rgyas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
302a1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med
302a2(rgyud): pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
302a3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang
302a4(rgyud): phyug 'od ces bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyis rgyal sring skyong gi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ yul tham/ sa cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha mar gyur
302a5(rgyud): pa lta bu zhig byungango // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon ral pa' dzin ces bya ba/ sman pa gso bar byed pa khams la mchog
302a6(rgyud): tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to// kye rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i tshong dpon gyi bu chu
302a7(rgyud): 'bebs zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po// rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa bstan bcos sna tshogs la mkhas pa/ bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong
302a8(rgyud): du chud pa yi ge dang / grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung ngo // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na sems
302b1(rgyud): can 'bum phrag du ma nang sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing / nang sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ drag po yi du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar gyur to// 
302b2(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba 'bum phrag du ma de dag gi don gyi phyir/ snying rje chen
302b3(rgyud): po sems skyes par gyur to// sems can 'bum phrag du ma de dag ni nad sna tshogs kyis btab cing / nad sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir te/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ drag po yid/ 
302b4(rgyud): du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi pha tshong dpon ra la pa 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ che'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang
302b5(rgyud): ldan pa 'di ni/ rgas 'khogs gtugs/ lam du zhugs/ na chod rje su thob/ khar ba la rten cing 'dar te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / 
302b6(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro mi nus na/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa nang sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag nang sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
302b7(rgyud): bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi nang du song la/ nad kyi phyir khams la mkhas par bya ba yongasu dris te/ khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa des/ bdag grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong
302b8(rgyud): rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro bar bya'o// song nas kyang sems can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag
303a1(rgyud): du ma dag nang sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bya'o snyam nas/ rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ 
303a2(rgyud): rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin la/ 
303a3(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa/ ji ltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing // khams rnam kyang ni yongasu 'gyur// gang gi dus na lus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar
303a4(rgyud): 'gyur// dus dang dus min zas zos pa// ji lta bur ni bde bar 'a gyur// gang gi lus kyi nang du ni// lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'a/ gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang // 'dus las gyur dang
303a5(rgyud): bad kan gyur// nad rnams zhi bar bgyi sladadu// ji lta bur ni ga so bar bgyi// gang gis mi la gnod gyur pas// rlung ni ga nga gi dus na g.yo// gang gi dus na 'khris pa g.yo// bad kan
303a6(rgyud): gang gi dus na g.yo// de nas tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba rnam par bstan to// zla gsum dbyar te zla gsu
303a7(rgyud): ston du shes// gsum ni dgun te gsum ni dpyid yin no// de ltar zla ba'i go rims 'di ste dus ni drug/ lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum gsum du ni tshigs rnams bsdus par shes/ 
303a8(rgyud): zla ba gnyis gnyis shing na dus su bstan// zas dang skom ni de ltar 'jug par 'gyur// sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan// dbang po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang // lo gcig nang gi tshi/ 
303b1(rgyud): tshigs yongasu 'gyur// dbang po dag ni yongasu 'gyur ba na// lus can rnams la sna tshogs nad kyang 'byung // de nyid ni sman pas zla gsum pani// tshigs kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni// kham/ 
303b2(rgyud): drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te/ rlung gi shas che'i nang ni dbyar na ldang // ston du gyur pa na ni 'khris pa g.yo// dgun gyi dus su de bzhin 'dus pa/ 
303b3(rgyud): ste// bad kan shas che'i nang ni dpyid ldang ngo // dbyar ni snum dro lan tsha sbyar ba'i ro// ston ni mngar dang snum dang bsil bag go// dgun ni mngar dang skyur dang snum pa ste// dpyid kyi dus na rtsub re cha/ 
303b4(rgyud): ba'o// bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang // mkhris pa tshe ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang // rlung shas che ba zhum thag tu ldang // khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta'o// rlung gi bdag nyid la ni
303b5(rgyud): bcud kyis g.yo// bkrus sman gyis ni mkhris pa gsal ba ra bya// 'dus pa la ni gsum dang 'thun ldan pa// bad/ kan tshig su bab na skyugs sman btang // rlung shas che dang mkhri
303b6(rgyud): dang 'dus pa dang // bad kan shas che'i tshigs rnams shes par bya// dus gang khams gang dus ni gang yin pa// de yi sman dang bza' btung bsten par bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
303b7(rgyud): kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu/ de tsam zhig yongasu dris pa des/ tshe'i rig byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na chong
303b8(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad song nas/ sems
304a1(rgyud): can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa// nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag la kho bo ni sman pa'o// kho bo ni sman pa'o// zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'che ste/ 
304a2(rgyud): kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bya'o// zhes dbugs phyung // rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu srog chags 'bru
304a3(rgyud): phrag du ma de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur to// dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i
304a4(rgyud): dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna chog sa kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag nang sna tshogs da las yongasu thar te/ nad med par gyur to// nad med par gyur
304a5(rgyud): nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang // stobs dang / brtson/ 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sem sa can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nang sna tshogs kyis
304a6(rgyud): gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas/ gang su dag nad drag pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / sems can nang sna tshogs
304a7(rgyud): kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sman dpyad gang ci bstan pa des/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad
304a8(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byas// nad med pa dang / nang nyung bar gyur nas kyi ba mkho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i
304b1(rgyud): dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na/ sems can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nang sna tshogs
304b2(rgyud): kyis gzir ba/ 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nang sna tshogs las yongasu thar par byas par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 
304b3(rgyud): nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ 
304b4(rgyud): kyis sems can thams cad nad med par byas nas nyung zhing // snga mkho bzhin du spro ba dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i lus/ su gyur to// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ sems
304b5(rgyud): can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod de/ sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin par byed/ bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ tsheng dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la yang / tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu
304b6(rgyud): 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ sman po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi nad gso ba/ mngon sum du byang chub sems dpa' nges pa che'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa
304b7(rgyud): thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs de la chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo chu'i pad+ma'i snying po
304b8(rgyud): la khye'u gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni chu'i gos zhes bya// gcig ming ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u 'di gnyis dang lhan
305a1(rgyud): cig tu mthar gyis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan
305a2(rgyud): zhig na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog khong khong zhig tu phyin to// de nas 'brog khong khong der sha za ba'i khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / wa dang / khra dang / bya dag 'brog khong khong na rdzing zhig yod pa gaM la ba
305a3(rgyud): der rgyug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang / spyang ki nas/ bya'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snya mo// de nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag khyi dang / sbrang ki dang / 
305a4(rgyud): dang khra dang / bya rnams phyogs gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro da bar bya'o snya mo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu/ 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song nas/ 'brog khong khong na
305a5(rgyud): rdzing zhig ga la yod pa der phyin to// rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig ga nas te/ des der nya brgya phrag mang po zhig chu dang bral bar mthong nas/ des de la snying rje ba'i sems skyes pa dang / de na
305a6(rgyud): mo zhig shing las lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/ lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di
305a7(rgyud): rnams la chu byin cig/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ gang chu 'bebs pa dang gang chu sbyin pa'o// de bas na rang gi ming dang 'thun par bya ba byos shig/ chu 'bebs kyis slar smras pa/ lha
305a8(rgyud): mo nya 'di dag la ji snyed cig mchis/ lha mos smras pa nya khri tham pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs cher mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe 'brog
305b1(rgyud): khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing bu chen po de ni/ chu'i lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/ de na nya khri 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyu go// rigs kyi lha mo de na tshong dpon
305b2(rgyud): gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir rgyugs pa dang / nya khri bo de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de log su chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar blta'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas
305b3(rgyud): tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/ chu btsal kyang der chu ma snyed de/ phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / des ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa chen po mang po
305b4(rgyud): zhig mthong nas/ shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te/ shing gi yal ga rnams bcad nas/ shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te/ rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / shing
305b5(rgyud): gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri bo de dag la shin tu bsil ba 'i grib mar byaso// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der chu 'bab pa tshel te/ gang nas chu
305b6(rgyud): 'bab ces de phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang / chu mi rnyed nas der myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi srol du song ste/ rigs kyi lha mo 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing der/ chu 'bab pa zhes bya
305b7(rgyud): ba'i chu klung chen po de las/ der chu 'bab pa'i klung de yang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis/ nya khri bo de dag gi phyir/ ci nas kyang nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyog
305b8(rgyud): kyi grog po chen por klung de phab bo// des de mthong nas kyang bsams pa klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang / srol de nyid dbab par mi nus na/ bdag gis lha dbab par ga la nus snyam nas de phyir
306a1(rgyud): log go// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rings pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od
306a2(rgyud): kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyus kyis smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chag 'og tu/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal thams cad/ sems can rnams kyi nad kyi
306a3(rgyud): rgyun ni bkum na/ gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig na/ 'brog khong khong na yod ces bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis pa de na/ nya khri zhig gnas pa chab dang bral nas/ gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis
306a4(rgyud): ti/ ji ltar mi rnams la stsal pa ltar ci nas dud 'gro'i skye gran su gyur pa/ de dag la yang srog rtsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas glang po che nyi shu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal po lha'i
306a5(rgyud): dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po la/ glang po che nyi shu/ zhig byin cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o// blon po rna/ mas kyis smras pa/ sems can chen po glang po che'i lhas ga la ba
306a6(rgyud): der song la glang po che nyi shu khrid de/ sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / bde bgyis shig/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan
306a7(rgyud): cig tu/ glang po che nyi shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i rdzi bo las ba lang gi rgyal ba brgya blangs te slar log nas/ chu 'bab ces bya ba'i chu klung chen po gang du bab pa der song ste/ rgyal ba de dag chus bkang nas/ 
306a8(rgyud): glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/ myur ba myur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzig la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas/ 
306b1(rgyud): phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang / tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de log su nya khri po de dag rgyugo/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs 'di snyam du sems te/ 
306b2(rgyud): ci'i phyir nya khri bo 'di dag bdag ga la ba de log su rgyug snya mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ nya khri po 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mes yongasu nyen nas/ bdag la za ba slong du nges kyis/ bdagi kha zas/ 
306b3(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o snyamo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ rang gi bu chu'i go la 'di skad ces smraso// bu glang po che thams cad kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon te
306b4(rgyud): bdag cag gi khyim du myur ba myur bar song ste/ mes po che dang dpon la/ kye mes po chu 'bebs kyi mchi nas/ khyim 'di na pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang
306b5(rgyud): las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba/ gang ci mchis pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag tu myur bar rdzongs shig ces mchi'o// zhes
306b6(rgyud): de skad gyis shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che de la zhon nas/ myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu rgyug ste/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / de dag rgyus kyis zhib tu smras te/ 
306b7(rgyud): nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngar smos pa'i kha zas sbyar ba de thams cad glang po che'i rgyab du bkal nas/ glang po che de la zhon te/ 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der dong ba dang / chu 'bebs
306b8(rgyud): kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas/ dga' mgu ste bu las zan blangs nas/ phul te rdzing der gtor nas/ nya khri po de dag tshim par byas nas 'di snyam du bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na/ dgon
307a1(rgyud): pa'i gnas gzhan zhig na dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las/ thos na su mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de/ bde
307a2(rgyud): 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o// zhes thos kyis bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
307a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan kyang bsgrags par bya'o snyamo// de'i tshe na 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di na sems can rnams kyi lta ba gnyisu gyur te/ kha cig ni theg pa chen po la mngon par dad ngo // / 
307a4(rgyud): kha cig ni smad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ de'i tshe rdzing bu de'i rkang pa gnyis ka'i dbus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsa
307a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsun tor tsa na de la phyag 'tshalo// zhes che du brjod pa de skad che du ba rjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon
307a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par
307a7(rgyud): skye bar gyur cig/ ces smon lam de skad btab bo// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung / 'di
307a8(rgyud): skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis
307b1(rgyud): skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen
307b2(rgyud): gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung
307b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas/ 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di yang 'gag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 
307b4(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'beb da kyis/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa de dag la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/ rang gi bu chu'i gos dang tshul
307b5(rgyud): snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro te mal na nyal ba dang / de'i
307b6(rgyud): tshe de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur te/ mtshan mo de 'das pa dang / nya khri bo de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye so// skyes ma thag tu
307b7(rgyud): de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyamo// de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te
307b8(rgyud): bdag cag 'dzam+bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te/ bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa las/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ chu mang po dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/ bdag cag
308a1(rgyud): la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan
308a2(rgyud): kyang bsgrags pas dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang / rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/ bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de la mchod pa bya'o// 
308a3(rgyud): snyam nas/ de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas/ mi snang bar gyur nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs
308a4(rgyud): mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag gis/ mu tig gi se mo ngo khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag/ mu tig gi sen mo ngo khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag/ mu tig gi sen mo do khri ni
308a5(rgyud): g.yas logasu bzhag/ mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yon lo/ gsu bzhag ste/ dbus mo nub tsam du me tog man dar kha'i char chen po yang phag/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang bkrol
308a6(rgyud): nas des 'dzam+bu'i gling pa thams cad kyang sad/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang sang ngo // de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag na mkha' la dong ste/ lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi gan
308a7(rgyud): dang / gnas gzhan dag tu yang me tog man da ra ba'i char 'bebs shing / nags khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/ de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man da ra ba'i char chen
308a8(rgyud): po mngon par phab ste/ de nyi du mi snang bar gyur nas/ slar yang lha'i gnasu dong ste/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/ dga' dgur spyod cing dpal dang skal pa bzang po
308b1(rgyud): chen po dag kyang myong ngo // 'dzam+bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang / de nas rgyal po chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir mdang sum ltas 'di dag
308b2(rgyud): byung / de dag gis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du/ mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri'i char bab cing / me tog man da ra ba'i char yang phab po zhes byas
308b3(rgyud): ba dang / khyed dong la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig/ de nas skar mkhan dang / blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu
308b4(rgyud): chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smra so// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'o/ rang khyod la 'bod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug
308b5(rgyud): 'od ga la ba der song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ chu 'beb/ sa mdang gsum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba 'di ci'i ltas shes sam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal
308b6(rgyud): po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smraso// lha bdag gis 'tshal te/ nya khri po de dag gum pa gyur du nges so// rgyal pos smras pa ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/ lha chu'i gos rdzing
308b7(rgyud): der nya khri bo de dag gum mam/ ma gum ltar stsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/ khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smra so// 'brog khong khong
308b8(rgyud): na yod pa'i rdzing gi nya khri po de dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar rdzing 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ba dang / nya khri po de dag shi ba'i
309a1(rgyud): dus byas par gyur cing / me tog man da ra ba'i char chen po bab pa'ang mthong nas/ slar log te pha la smras pa nya gum par gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs
309a2(rgyud): kyis khye'u chu'i gos la tshig de thos pa dang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas/ de dag rgyas nas zhib tu smras te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad gsol/ nya khri bo de dag thams cad ni gu
309a3(rgyud): par gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de dag bdag gis mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/ bdag gi khyim du yang mu ti gi se mo do bzhi khri dang
309a4(rgyud): me tog man dar ba'i char yang phab bo// de nas rgyal po de dga' zhing mgu zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs par gyur to// de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag
309a5(rgyud): par bsdus pa la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ 
309a6(rgyud): de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa
309a7(rgyud): 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces
309a8(rgyud): bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
309b1(rgyud): ngade'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chung mchu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod
309b2(rgyud): sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// sgra gcan zin ni/ de'i tshe de'i
309b3(rgyud): dus na khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u chu'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nya khri bor gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin sgra
309b4(rgyud): du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de'i tshe ngo'i dus na/ nya khrir gyur to// gang
309b5(rgyud): dag ngas chu dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shi nga / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i/ zab mo'i chos kyang bsta na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
309b6(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des nga'i gan du 'dir lhags te/ des na da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
309b7(rgyud): to// rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus par chos mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa thob par bya ba'i ming thob par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
309b8(rgyud): shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ shing gi lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs
310a1(rgyud): 'dis na/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 
310a2(rgyud): lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chu 'bebs kyis gdul bya'i nya'i sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
310a3(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir/ lus kyang yongasu gtong // de ji lta zhe na/ dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zer snang
310a4(rgyud): ba dang / lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom lda na 'das/ dge slong stong gi yongasu bskor te/ yul lnga len gyi ldong
310a5(rgyud): rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ nags sna tshogs zhig du byon pa dang / de ra des sngo zhing 'jam la/ mthing kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos la me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i
310a6(rgyud): sa phyogs zhig gzig so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sa phyogs 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan
310a7(rgyud): ma yod kyis/ da de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan thing shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gtan bting ngo // gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
310a8(rgyud): gdan bting lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog/ mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings dkrol// bzhugs te mi la sman slang mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mching dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol// 
310b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/ de skad
310b2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong dam pa sems can mchog snying po pa// bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang rdul dka' zhing // blo
310b3(rgyud): gros dran dga' yon tan dpag med gnas gyur gyi// rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo
310b4(rgyud): can dang / me tog ka ma la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis/ sa'i ngos la brdabs te/ bsnun ma thag tus rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ nor bu dang / gser dang / dngu/ 
310b5(rgyud): las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung // de nas bcom lda na 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsa la pa/ kun dga' bo mchod rten 'di phye shig/ de nas tshe dang
310b6(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ mchod rten de phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang / mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za
310b7(rgyud): me tog gcig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog dag cig mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
310b8(rgyud): za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye shig/ de bzhin du thams cad kha phye ba dang / des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang / me tog ku mu da 'dra ba dag gcig mthong // mthong nas kyang bcom
311a1(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag gcig ganga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa
311a2(rgyud): rnams khyer te shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams dge 'dun gyi 'dun du
311a3(rgyud): bsnams te/ phyag bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag yon tan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa spro ba grags mchog dam pa ste/ blo gros
311a4(rgyud): ldan rnams phyir zhing rtag tu byang chub 'di la ni// spro brtan mo sa dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas// de na sa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa// 
311a5(rgyud): pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrim/ sa dang yon tan gyis yongasu bsgos pa/ mchog tu ma thong bar dga' ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams
311a6(rgyud): la phyag tshol cig/ de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
311a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de
311a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis nga
311b1(rgyud): 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ rgyal po shing chen po zhes bya ba gnon pa/ 
311b2(rgyud): stobs du ma dang ldan pa/ thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de// sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang / snying stobs
311b3(rgyud): chen po'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rtse ba'i phyir/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhonu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing / me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu te/ nags khrod
311b4(rgyud): chen po bcu gnyi su zhug so// de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang // gzhon nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas// phan tshun du dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i bskyed mos cha
311b5(rgyud): chen po'i nags khrod bcu gnyi su zhug so// de nas sgra chen po sa nu bo gnyis la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na 'dir bdag cag gcan zan gyis bsad du 'ong
311b6(rgyud): gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam du bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ thub pas bsngags
311b7(rgyud): pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/ bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi// shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste// bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon de
311b8(rgyud): dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na/ stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/ bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams smad nas/ lus
312a1(rgyud): mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas/ zhag drug/ zhag bdun
312a2(rgyud): zhig lon par gyur la/ de ltar zas ma rnyed pas/ yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/ yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ nyon mongs ma
312a3(rgyud): 'dir zas ci/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'dir gang sha sar pa dang / khrag dron mo yod na/ de ni stag dang / dom dang dred dang / seng gau rnams kyi zas yin// zhes zer ro// lha chen pos smras pa/ 'dir nyon
312a4(rgyud): mongs ma 'di bkres pa dang / skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus gyur dpas srog gi lhag ma cung zad gcig lus te/ rab tu/ nyam chung bas 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi
312a5(rgyud): nus na/ 'di'i srog yongasu srung ba'i phyir/ su zhig rang gi lu sa yongasu gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu/ sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongasu btang ba ni bya dka'
312a6(rgyud): ba'o// snying stobs chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa/ blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus yongasu gtong ba
312a7(rgyud): la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya dka' ba ma lag so// yang snying brtse ba'i snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lha yul dang nis 'dir
312a8(rgyud): rang lus rnyed snyam ste// gzhan gyi srog phyir 'thun pa'i dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis brtse// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste/ stag mo de la mig
312b1(rgyud): mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo // de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gis lus 'di yongasu btang ba'i dus la bab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes
312b2(rgyud): pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mthar ngan pa/ rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang / bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang / sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// 
312b3(rgyud): yang na thams cad mi gtsang bar gyur pas na// de'i 'tsho ba med kyis de bdag gis de las bzang po'i las la sbyar bar bya'o// de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho la rgal ba'i gru bo che lta
312b4(rgyud): bur 'gyu ro// yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas dgang byas pa chud gson pa/ 'bras dang 'dra ba'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di btang ste/ mya ngan
312b5(rgyud): med cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan ba rgyas gang rdul dang bral bar thob par bya// de snying rje chen
312b6(rgyud): bopo mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas/ de ltar btul nas khyed gnyis gshegasu gsol/ bdag ni rang gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du/ nags khrod chen po bcu gnyi su 'jug zhes de gnyis bsku // 
312b7(rgyud): de nas rgyal bu gzhonu snying stobs chen po nags mdab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnasu song nas nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/ bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med
312b8(rgyud): pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/ gzhan gyis btang bar bka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyi gnyer ba thob par shog/ 
313a1(rgyud): bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya/ zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas snying stobs chen pos stag mo'i mdun du nyal
313a2(rgyud): ba dang / de nas byams pa ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ stag mos ci yang ma byaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma'o// 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nu so// snyan nas langs te/ snying brtse
313a3(rgyud): ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na/ gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas/ de nas 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel
313a4(rgyud): to// byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu/ chu'i dbus sa son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa dru dag tu g.yo so// nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du/ 'od
313a5(rgyud): zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spos dang / phye ma dang / 'dres pa'i me tog char yang bab po// de nas lha zhig gi sa ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la
313a6(rgyud): bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/ mi'i dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di btang bas na/ skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba'i gan
313a7(rgyud): kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyed kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/ de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbag pa la bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha
313a8(rgyud): dang khrag med par rus pa zhig lus par byaso// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces smra so// ji ltar phyogs bcur rgya mtsho'i mthar thug rgya mtshor
313b1(rgyud): bcas pa yi/ sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas nas// nga bzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag/ 
313b2(rgyud): lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras pa/ bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs// de
313b3(rgyud): nas rgyal bu gzhon de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste// lam de nyid la slar log nas// stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga dag la gazla
313b4(rgyud): rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral// khrag ni rdzab du gyur/ sgra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong // mthong / nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon
313b5(rgyud): pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa sgreng ste/ nyams thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang // de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra ba'i
313b6(rgyud): mig ring khyod kyis gar bzhag ces// ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chungs 'dri bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gat+ta ni sa phyogs 'di nyid// shi na legs kyis gson pa de lta ma yin no// snying stobs chen
313b7(rgyud): po med par gyur pas bdag cag la// pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu gzho nu'i rim gro/ 
313b8(rgyud): ba rnams kyang gzhonu tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshamasu rgyug pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong nas gzho nu ga re/ gzho nu ga ri zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ sdug
314a1(rgyud): pa dang bral bar rmis pa la 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba dang / thi ba'i phrug gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer bar rmi so// de nas btsun
314a2(rgyud): mo sa g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/ nyi ma'i 'od zer med par gyur pasang yi snying
314a3(rgyud): la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston// nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa// nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram kye/ de nas de snyam du bsams pa
314a4(rgyud): dang / bran mo yang snying myos te 'ongs nas/ btsun mo la smras pa/ jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon tshol zhing mchis na/ jo bo stor ces gda'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun
314a5(rgyud): mo'i snying 'dar zhing mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu sdug pa sto ces thos so// rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos
314a6(rgyud): kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smraso// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs de byung ba'i phyir/ nga gzho nu btsal ba la nan tan tu byed kyis bzang mos mya ngan ma byed cig/ der gzhon
314a7(rgyud): nu tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs dag rong rong por gyur to// de nas ring po ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhonu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gnon
314a8(rgyud): de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kyi hung bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi bde ba/ mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yi no// 'jig
314b1(rgyud): rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am/ mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/ de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/ rnga mo gan du bsnun pa bzhin du/ shin tu mi zad
314b2(rgyud): pa'i sgra byu // de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog tshogs bcas te/ me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dge tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na// bdag gi snying dang 'dra/ 
314b3(rgyud): ba'i tha chungs de ga re/ de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa/ khye'u tha chungs ga re zhes gzhon gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyams thag cing mig mchi mas gang
314b4(rgyud): ste/ rkan dang mchu dang / kha dang so bskams nas cang mi zer ro// / btsun mos smras pa/ kho mo'i bu sdug tha chungs dig re/ kho bo 'i snying 'di gas la thug gyur cing // lus ni mi bzad rab tu
