314b5(rgyud): gzir gyur te// kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du smros/ de nas gzhonu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur de zhib tu smraso// de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo myos par gyur te/ 
314b6(rgyud): myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje'i skad du/ ngu zhing phyogs der dong // de nas rgyal po dang / btsun mos rus pa de dag/ sha dang khrag dang / rgyus pa med cing / skra phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba
314b7(rgyud): mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chu dang ri ma la ya'i tsan ngan gyi
314b8(rgyud): 'de gus/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i lus sim par byas// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed nas/ rgyal po langs te snying rje rje'i skang du 'bod pa/ kyi hung bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba// 
315a1(rgyud): 'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir ngal sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung // btsun mo yang myos pa las sangs nas/ skra
315a2(rgyud): gzhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang la brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng du 'dre ldog cing ma hi be'u stor ba dang rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje'i skad du'o// kyi hud sdug cing gces/ 
315a3(rgyud): pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/ bdag gi dgra po gang gi de ring sa 'dir bcom// kyi hud sa 'dir bu mchog
315a4(rgyud): bsang mthong ba// lus 'di ci phyir di ring zhig ma gyur// sdu dgra bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pa// bdag gi snying 'a de lcags ni yin yang dag/ de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma
315a5(rgyud): 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad// so yang phyung bas dri ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rungs gyur/ bdag ni sa thi ba'i phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar
315a6(rgyud): khras khyer bzhin// bdag ni bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'i tshe bdag khyer// kyi hud sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu grub pa ni 'di yi no// de nas rgyal po dang btsun
315a7(rgyud): mo snying rje rje'i skadadu/ rnam pa mang po sme zhing / rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams sa phyogs 'dir
315a8(rgyud): bzhag go// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhonu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i
315b1(rgyud): dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon skyong stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug las yongasu ma grol ba de'i tshe yang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sngus
315b2(rgyud): bsngal las/ ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re ri
315b3(rgyud): phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnamasu bska cu spro zhing / skyo ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par grol lo// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bye dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas 'gro ba mtha' das
315b4(rgyud): phan btag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// byang chub mchog la dang yongasu tshol ba ma/ bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste/ 
315b5(rgyud): ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur// da ltar ngas ni lus na mas yongasu btang // sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te// shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de la bu ni gtong
315b6(rgyud): che ldan pa// snying stobs che zhes bya ba dam pa yod// de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de// ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// spyan tshogs de dag nags tshal khrod dong // de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba
315b7(rgyud): mthong // de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes// stag mo 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas na// bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis// de ltar bdag lus da ni btang bar bya// shing rta che yi bu ni snying stobs
315b8(rgyud): che// stag mo bkres mthong stag phrug rnams// thar par bya phyir snying rje yis// ri ngos gzar ba mchongs pa dang // sa ni r-i dang bcasu g.yos// bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs skrag
316a1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di// mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur// de yi phu bo sgra chen dang // de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags tshogs chen po der bltas nas// snying stobs chen
316a2(rgyud): po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med nags kyi nang na rgyu// nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing // gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhon de dag gnyis// 
316a3(rgyud): stag mo nyams chung gar nyal ba// der ni nye bar song ba dang // stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag gi mchul khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa la rnam par mthor ba mthong // de yi khrag
316a4(rgyud): gi thigs pa ni// nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis// khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong // rab tu ba rgyal te sa 'di la// 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur// lus
316a5(rgyud): rnams la ni rdul gyi gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang // snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab mthor zhing // lag pa sgreng ste
316a6(rgyud): ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun mo gces mchog bskyed pa'i ma// bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang // pho brang nang na der 'dug pa// nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrag du 'byung
316a7(rgyud): zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun// khab kyis btsags pa bzhin du cha// snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang // bu bral mya ngan drag 'das phog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste// mya ngan rab gdungs yid
316a8(rgyud): mi dga'// snying rje'i sgra yis rab du zhing // rgyal po shing rta che la smras// mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngan ma yis tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'gyu/ 
316b1(rgyud): bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin tsha// bdag gi snying yang gsal thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje mdzod de
316b2(rgyud): bdag srog gsol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam na// thi ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na// bdag gi thi ba'i phrug gu ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni// thi ba phrug gu de khras 'tshal// 
316b3(rgyud): bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra yi// mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs// sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas// bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes ldan pa
316b4(rgyud): bdag srog rtsol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam pa dar nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i
316b5(rgyud): 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu/ btsun mo dam pa rgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel ba mthong na sa ni// de ma thag tu rgyal dbang te// bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non/ 
316b6(rgyud): blon po dang ni 'khor rnams kyang // gzhonu rnams ni btsal phyir dong // grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag/ tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod// ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag/ lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri// 
316b7(rgyud): gson nam 'on tam shi 'am ci// snying stobs chen po de gar song // bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'// de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing // yun ring mya ngan mi
316b8(rgyud): bzang rlung // sgra mi phyin cing rgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldang zhig gam// rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid chu'i rgyun
317a1(rgyud): kyang mthong // ji srid dran rnyed ldan gyur pa// de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing rta chen po yis
317a2(rgyud): btsun mo'i mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang // gzhonanu rnams ni chol phyir dong // khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// 
317a3(rgyud): btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nang nas byung // mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te// yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang
317a4(rgyud): po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir// grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po/ 
317a5(rgyud): shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma thag/ sdug pa'i khu ni lta ba'i phyir/ rgod pa'i mig gis phyogasu bltas// ma/ go bregs yan lag khrag spags shing // lus la rdul gyis
317a6(rgyud): gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag du bzhin du// ring ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu mi bzang mya ngan gnas// ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag/ lag pa spring ste ngu
317a7(rgyud): zhing 'dug/ de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ongs// 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni// shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras yid du
317a8(rgyud): 'ong bar mchis// ring po mi thogs khyod kyi gan 'dir ni// sras mchog yid 'ong 'chi ba khyod kyis gzigs// rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de nas blon po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul
317b1(rgyud): chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi ma'i gdong gyis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni// mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras
317b2(rgyud): mchog gcig mi gda'// snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa// rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag la ni gzhonu sems can ches// snying rje
317b3(rgyud): chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas// byang chub du ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la// ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis/ 
317b4(rgyud): reg par bya// sems can chen po rangs gzar nas mtsho/ dngas// stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam dgyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe
317b5(rgyud): lus// ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzang 'bar// 'kho
317b6(rgyud): dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni// ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang // chus mthor lag pa sgreng ste rab tu ngu// blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhon gnyis po dag/ 
317b7(rgyud): nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas// dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni// bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag nas
317b8(rgyud): kun nas 'bar ba mthong // yud tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pa sgreng ste gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi sngags pa rab tu
318a1(rgyud): brjod// rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing // bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu 'don zhing smre sngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs
318a2(rgyud): sems// bdag bu sdug cing yid 'ong gcig po ni// sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gi/ 'di ltar bdag nyid myur
318a3(rgyud): du deng song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya// bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya// de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi snying // mya ngan ma yi
318a4(rgyud): gang bar 'gyur du 'ongs// bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob gyu/ ra te// srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po/ blon po tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhon te bu nas
318a5(rgyud): blta phyir song // bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong // rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid na su// rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas
318a6(rgyud): ni/ de yi skyen par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang // sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi// bu de snying stobs chen po
318a7(rgyud): mchog gyur cing // gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa rgyu 'phrul gyur// sgra chen
318a8(rgyud): bo ni byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal po lha chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che// stag phrug dag ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de
318b1(rgyud): nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang // btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas// rgyan thams cad bkrol te// skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas// snying
318b2(rgyud): stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di dag phyogs 'di nyid bzhag ste// rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten 'di byaso// snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongasu btang ba 'dis// phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus
318b3(rgyud): na bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnam su yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye
318b4(rgyud): dgu'i sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rten 'di ra bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten
318b5(rgyud): de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi na nga na zhug so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgya la po las stag mo la lus yongasu btang ba'i le'u zhes bya
318b6(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste
318b7(rgyud): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig
318b8(rgyud): tu 'khod nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de la tshigasu bcad
319a1(rgyud): pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog gtso ma'i gser 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog
319a2(rgyud): thub pa pad+ma dkar po'i gser mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyis sku lus rgyan// dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri
319a3(rgyud): med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sku dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs// seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu'i bsgrags pa'i dri med sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la bing
319a4(rgyud): ka'i sgra// shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyis rgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri dmed dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra// 
319a5(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse'i mchog/ 'jig rte/ na dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rna mas ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/ 
319a6(rgyud): 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba gsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar
319a7(rgyud): par mdzad// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol// zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'jud// skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol pa// khyod la dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes
319a8(rgyud): yon tan mtsho// srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // 
319b1(rgyud): yon tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad// bdag
319b2(rgyud): gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod
319b3(rgyud): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/ blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
319b4(rgyud): la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo/ sbyar ba btud nas/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bco ma ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni
319b5(rgyud): bsod nams rgya yi mtshan// dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar ba
319b6(rgyud): 'od kyis khyab// kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po dkar po ser po bai DUr+ya// zangs dang skya red shel gyi 'od lta bus// rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing // zhing rnams bye ba du mar
319b7(rgyud): snang mdzad do// sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal ba blta na mdzes// gzugs ltas mi ngoms skye bos
319b8(rgyud): blta na dag/ rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rjes rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa
320a1(rgyud): bsags// dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan rgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad// bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung
320a2(rgyud): gnas 'byung // yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyan// zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste// me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar na mkha'i nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin// ri rab lta
320a3(rgyud): bur yon tan kun ldan par// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'// ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing // kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi zhal mdzes pa// dang / 
320a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshan ga/ nas zla ba 'dra// g.ya su 'khyil cing khong chud 'dra ba la dgas// bai DUr+ya 'dra'i spu 'od dkar rnams kyis// nam mkha'i dkyil
320a5(rgyud): na nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
320a6(rgyud): de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag pas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa// rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral
320a7(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing // srid dang srid min mkhyen pa'i rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshalo// kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas ste// kye
320a8(rgyud): ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum bA rI me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// sems can dag ni thams cad rje su bzung smad du// gang
320b1(rgyud): gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po'i rigs kyi tog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// 
320b2(rgyud): zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyi
320b3(rgyud): dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na// sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to// rtag par khong zug du ni rgyal ba dran
320b4(rgyud): par bgyid// rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du// rtag pa ru yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid// bdag ni rtag tu
320b5(rgyud): dog sar dbus mo btsugs na su// rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems// 'dren pa'i slad du snying / rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid// bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa
320b6(rgyud): mthong bar rab tu skom// mya ngan me yis kun tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag nyid khyod kyi gzugs la blta bas rab tu skom// thugs rje'i chab kyi
320b7(rgyud): bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rjer mdzad gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la stsal du gsol// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyob pa ste// 
320b8(rgyud): 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te// na mkha' 'dra zhing na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags// sgyu ma smig rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba
321a1(rgyud): 'dra/ 'dren pa khyed kyi ston pa tshe dang ldan pa lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod
321a2(rgyud): legaso leg so// khyod yang leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu
321a3(rgyud): mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
321a4(rgyud): de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas dpa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu dngas pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa
321a5(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las 'jug bsdus kyi len zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg
321a6(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI la in+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la
321a7(rgyud): phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su baR+Sha pra b+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ha ra dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg
321a8(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// 'das pa dang ma byin pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad
321b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byad
321b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la// mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongasu brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas
321b3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs kyis byin rlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogasu// rin chen tog gis lho phyogasu// 'od dpag med kyis nub phyogasu// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogasu// sdig pa
321b4(rgyud): thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shi das pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cang sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams
321b5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs par rgya ni// byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun
321b6(rgyud): sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang // bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor bsgribs pas ni
321b7(rgyud): gnod pa dang // mya ngan mngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byed ste ma dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan mngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam
321b8(rgyud): sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab rgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod/ 
322a1(rgyud): yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa ste// shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur// 'jin/ 
322a2(rgyud): rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po tshogs kyis dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // nai rany+dza ra gnas pa dang // 'byung
322a3(rgyud): ma mo 'phrog ma dang // sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin na mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang
322a4(rgyud): stobs dang bzhon pa dang // bcas te de dang der lhags nas// / nyin dang mtshan mo mo g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gas
322a5(rgyud): ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu shad par bya// gang gang mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang // gang su rje su yi rang dang // gang dag
322a6(rgyud): mchod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis// bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// 
322a7(rgyud): / de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi// byang chub
322a8(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzang bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gzhag nas// g.yel
322b1(rgyud): ba med pas mchod par bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang
322b2(rgyud): legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste// sangs rgyas
322b3(rgyud): mang pos rab tu bsngags// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na
322b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba// sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
322b5(rgyud): phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te// rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku
322b6(rgyud): tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa
322b7(rgyud): dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge
322b8(rgyud): ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur// zas dang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongasu btang ste// tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang
323a1(rgyud): gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las
323a2(rgyud): 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khang pa yangs shing rgya che la/ bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ lpan
323a3(rgyud): las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de yi phyogs bzhi nas/ lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting
323a4(rgyud): bdag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma/ rin po che du mas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas
323a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs
323a6(rgyud): nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khrid de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu de nas
323a7(rgyud): de'i tshe/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar
323a8(rgyud): dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char sang 'bag lha'i sol snyan gyi sgra yang thung ngo // sangs
323b1(rgyud): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams
323b2(rgyud): cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can nu mus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smon pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ 
323b3(rgyud): sems can sems g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'drangs par gyur/ sems can / 
323b4(rgyud): pa dag ni sgom pa dang bral bar gyur/ sems can nad kyis bta/ dab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams rab dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtsha
323b5(rgyud): rma du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang / chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ de tshim
323b6(rgyud): zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
323b7(rgyud): rnams rjes dran la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rje su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bor gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo
323b8(rgyud): brgyad cu zhig thub ste sku che thung ba 'di ji lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang / 
324a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems
324a2(rgyud): shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / 
324a3(rgyud): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi
324a4(rgyud): mtha' phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyi su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ngag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa
324a5(rgyud): brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i bu'o/ dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkhwa/ 
324a6(rgyud): lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mi 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhag so// 
324a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshig su bcad mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu nas
324a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi// thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub
324b1(rgyud): pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las na mkha
324b2(rgyud): la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nuso// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba
324b3(rgyud): brgya dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni// rkyen yang rnam pa gnyis yin te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste// de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// 
324b4(rgyud): sku tshe'i grangs ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am// grwadangs med pa'ang de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'a gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za cig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma ni// 
324b5(rgyud): grangs ni gang du'ang ma dmig so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slo ba dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
324b6(rgyud): byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la ngus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 
324b7(rgyud): gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par
324b8(rgyud): gyur pa/ zla ba lta bur snang bar mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu legs shing / gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag
325a1(rgyud): la dam pa cig su la du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der li tsa byi gzhonu sems can thams cad kyi mthong
325a2(rgyud): na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa ko'u ngi n+ya la 'di skad ces smraso// ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdag gis khyod la
325a3(rgyud): dam pa cig sbyin no// bram zes smras pa/ li tsa byi gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring bsrel gyi phye ma bgos pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam
325a4(rgyud): la bsten par 'dod do// ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de mngon dpar mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bad dag po 'ba' shig 'thob ces grag so// kye li tsa byi gzhon nu
325a5(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas tham sa cad kyis shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka'ade lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang / yon tan dang ldan pa gser
325a6(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye li tsa byi gzhonu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi tha
325a7(rgyud): ze rnams ni gang bcangs pa na/ sems can rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo // kye la tsa
325a8(rgyud): byi gzhonu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel za ma tog du bcug te bcangs pas/ sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par
325b1(rgyud): mi 'dod dam/ kye li tsa byigazho nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas yis byi gzhonu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'ung rgyal tshig su
325b2(rgyud): bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang+gA'i chu rgyun la// me tog rnams ni skye ba dang // bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang // khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags
325b3(rgyud): dang // 'bra go ra a sma'i dag pa chags// de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nam zhig ru sbal spu rnams las// go su legs par btags gyur te// dgun gyi grang
325b4(rgyud): ba sel byed la// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig/ sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang thog legs par byas kyu/ dar te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod
325b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad+ma kun// so ni dkar por skye sa gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir// nam
325b6(rgyud): zhig ri bad rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa/ 
325b7(rgyud): de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu
325b8(rgyud): bde 'gyur la// mchu dmar bim par 'drar gyur cing // glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang
326a1(rgyud): phan tshun 'thun par gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// ba la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sa gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabasu nam gyur pa/ 
326a2(rgyud): ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yid par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri bo
326a3(rgyud): spos kyi ngad ldan pa// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas// le tsa byi gzho nu 'jig
326a4(rgyud): rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshig su bcad pa da ga gis slar smras pa/ leg so legaso gzhon mtshodag/ rgyal ba'i sras po cheg po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas
326a5(rgyud): ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon pa skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bas ma gyis mi khyab gor rims bzhin// gzhon nus bdag la
326a6(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa me // sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung // sangs rgyas
326a7(rgyud): thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das ni bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par/ 
326a8(rgyud): mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sku la rus pa khrag med na// ring bsrel yod par gal 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyi
326b1(rgyud): ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gi
326b2(rgyud): 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
326b3(rgyud): sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog pa rab tu nas/ sgra dbyangs
326b4(rgyud): gcig tu tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi gda'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems da can yongasu smin mdzad phyir// yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sa
326b5(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa 'i sku// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna chags ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma
326b6(rgyud): pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab
326b7(rgyud): tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can grangs med pa
326b8(rgyud): dpag tu med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
327a1(rgyud): las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe 'tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyis kyis log pa'i
327a2(rgyud): lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na
327a3(rgyud): rin po che bai DUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rnga de
327a4(rgyud): brdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sang ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshigasu
327a5(rgyud): bcad pa de dag rjesu dran no// rje su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan no/ zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byu te/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung
327a6(rgyud): po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs
327a7(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan
327a8(rgyud): pa'i tshog su bcad ba thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// // nub cig g.yel ba med pa
327b1(rgyud): yang // bdag gi rmi lam gyur pa ni// mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste// thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lhang nge ste// phyogs bcu rnams snang bar gyur// kun
327b2(rgyud): tu rin chen shing drung na// rin chen bai DUr+ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig
327b3(rgyud): / rnga chen rab tu rdung ba mthong // de yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na// ngan song
327b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug pa sngal ma lus zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub
327b5(rgyud): dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar// sems can 'jigs ming 'jigs dang bral bar shog/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang / 
327b6(rgyud): ldan pa ltar// skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yis sgra skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur// 
327b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog reg shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ nyon mongs
327b8(rgyud): 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rnga chen bsgrags/ 
328a1(rgyud): pa thos gyur cig/ sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang // skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu
328a2(rgyud): dran gyur cig/ de dag gis ni rgya chen gsung thos shog/ rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog/ bya ba dge
328a3(rgyud): ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon pa gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi don kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems
328a4(rgyud): can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yo dus 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems
328a5(rgyud): dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal/ mi bzad drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung
328a6(rgyud): gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par yang gyur pa da ga/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan
328a7(rgyud): pa'i thugs// gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu spyan sngar
328a8(rgyud): bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnamasu mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis pa/ 
328b1(rgyud): phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // bzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang / 
328b2(rgyud): nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigasu ma ltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs
328b3(rgyud): po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 
328b4(rgyud): 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// ga/ yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis nyes pa gang dab gyis pa// phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe// 'dod pa rnams
328b5(rgyud): kyi 'jigs rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom
328b6(rgyud): gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 
328b7(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnams gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul ni gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de
328b8(rgyud): bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus/ 
329a1(rgyud): / pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la'ang gus pa ma bgyis
329a2(rgyud): pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// blun pa dang ni
329a3(rgyud): byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams
329a4(rgyud): la mchod pa bgyi// bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnam ngas// sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi// sa
329a5(rgyud): bcu la ni gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// 
329a6(rgyud): bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag bstan par bgyi// gang gis
329a7(rgyud): bskal pa stong rnams// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zang
329a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// 
329b1(rgyud): srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo dang // sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya
329b2(rgyud): phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gi/ stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la/ 
329b3(rgyud): rnam par gzigasu gsol// thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnamasu// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sem/ 
329b4(rgyud): phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'dza dgas par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang de dag gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du dga' ma mchis/ 
329b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las
329b6(rgyud): rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag la ni// snying rje chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis
329b7(rgyud): dang // da ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang / 
329b8(rgyud): sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// lus kyi bgyis dang ngag gi
330a1(rgyud): las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// mi dge las bcu spangs nasu// dge ba bcu po bsten
330a2(rgyud): bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// 
330a3(rgyud): dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang
330a4(rgyud): yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs dpa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la re dag par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu
330a5(rgyud): mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam smra na sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags bar bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga
330a6(rgyud): g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chag so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga
330a7(rgyud): dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams sgrub pa nyam nga dag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi nyam mngon sum
330a8(rgyud): mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mchog ri snang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabasu mchi// rgyal
330b1(rgyud): ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mdog/ dri med rnam dag bai DUr+ya'i yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ 
330b2(rgyud): thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gi mun pa mun nag gsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can
330b3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i med 'dra la// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal
330b4(rgyud): gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'ji dag rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri dmed rgya tshon kha dog sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// skya reng dmar dang dngul dang
330b5(rgyud): shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du / yis ni// mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi churga ba'i dba' rlabs can// 
330b6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyi skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog
330b7(rgyud): tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshalo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni
330b8(rgyud): dpag med dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar na mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus// 
331a1(rgyud): bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nuso// chu ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ 
331a2(rgyud): bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa'i sku lus dang // dpe byad bzla
331a3(rgyud): po brgyad cus rgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir
331a4(rgyud): chos kyang bstan par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal ma/ dang gzir thar bar bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas pa dud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar
331a5(rgyud): bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdu da rtsi chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs
331a6(rgyud): par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom phyir sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang
331a7(rgyud): po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de yi gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sde pa'i las rnams rnam par spang
331a8(rgyud): bar bgyi// dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun ni gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang
331b1(rgyud): yan lag nyams// de kun de'u re dbang po chang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyams chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med myur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nang / 
331b2(rgyud): med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdigs bsad thug pa dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing
331b3(rgyud): sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzang rgyad po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcing bas bcings gzir ba// phongs pa sna tshogs dag ni gnas gyur cing // nyon mong
331b4(rgyud): stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bza du mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de dag thams cad bcings la sa grol gyur cing // brdeg pa dag ni brdag las thar par shog/ 
331b5(rgyud): bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig/ phongs gyur// thams cing 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can gang dag bkres sreng skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna
331b6(rgyud): cho gas rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig/ 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can
331b7(rgyud): dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tsher bas gnod ma gyur// 
331b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams
332a1(rgyud): dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cing // rnga rnga cang te'u bi wang sgra stan dang // chu mig mche'u thing bu lteng ka dang // gser gyi pad+ma ud ba la pad+ma can// zas sgo
332a2(rgyud): gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod
332a3(rgyud): mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsam par skye bar de dag gyur// bsam pa thams
332a4(rgyud): cad bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng sa dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dang // ljon shing dag las
332a5(rgyud): dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cing dag ra gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas tham sa cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / 
332a6(rgyud): rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs bcu rnamasu mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ ngal ba'i rgyal po
332a7(rgyud): dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu thon po'i rigasu skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha
332a8(rgyud): dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par rgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ 
332b1(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUr+ya'i// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de
332b2(rgyud): dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad lus ni zang grur/ 
332b3(rgyud): cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lags gis bcings par bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las thar
332b4(rgyud): gyur myur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di dang / gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnam bying ba// de dag kun la rje su yi
332b5(rgyud): rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yis// bdag gis rje su yi rang bsod nams de// bdag ni smon grub la bras bu thob par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur
332b6(rgyud): cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongasu bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spang bar 'gyur// tshig su bcad pa
332b7(rgyud): brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag rgyan// 
332b8(rgyud): bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de
333a1(rgyud): dag sangs rgyas gcig gis gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ 
333a2(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub
333a3(rgyud): yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad+ma'i
333a4(rgyud): 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i
333a5(rgyud): 'jig rten dag na gang bzhes pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la'o// phyag bgyi'o// rgyal de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// / thub dbang ni zhing rab ni rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu
333a6(rgyud): rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung sten to// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ 
333a7(rgyud): kha bu dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshoms// rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'// spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med// ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing legs la
333a8(rgyud): bad+ma'i midag/ bad+ma 'drar snang bad+ma'i ba ba 'dra// zhal gyi mdzod spu badra dung dang 'dra// be DU r+ya'i mdag 'dra gal su 'khyil// thub pa'i zlab phra zhing zla ba bang ba 'dra// sku laM lte ba rung ba gsal ba bzhin/ 
333b1(rgyud): zhal mthon shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste// 'jam zhing sa la gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags// sU yi bu ga nas
333b2(rgyud): ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.ya su 'khyil ba ste// mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo mdzes// bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs
333b3(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems can dmyal 'gro dang dro'i grib dang // yi dgas
333b4(rgyud): gnas mi yi 'gro rnams// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad ni// / kha dog mdog bzang gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od// bco ma'i gse
333b5(rgyud): ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnams mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal
333b6(rgyud): / gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ phyag dang phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ge'o// thub pa'i dpa
333b7(rgyud): po sku mdog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang nge bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnamasu yang // mtshan byang zla ba nyi ma mang po
333b8(rgyud): / dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na// de bzhin gshegs
334a1(rgyud): pa'i nyi ma'i sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu rgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag/ phyag
334a2(rgyud): dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed// phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul rnyed 'byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed
334a3(rgyud): bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dga' ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshalo// 
334a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nuso// rgyal ba gcig
334a5(rgyud): gi yon tan rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjodami nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi// yo/ na tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig
334a6(rgyud): rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// skra'i rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba
334a7(rgyud): yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nam 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnam
334a8(rgyud): bstod nas// rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnamasu yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing // der ni bshags/ 
334b1(rgyud): pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal stong pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka'
334b2(rgyud): ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal 'tsho las thar bar bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyi nas byang chub bla/ 
334b3(rgyud): med thob par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi// der ni bdag
334b4(rgyud): gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang ga/ ser gyi 'od// bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang // der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga dang // byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par
334b5(rgyud): shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing // skyabs dang nga bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la yang ma'o// ngas dus rnams na// skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten
334b6(rgyud): gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// gser
334b7(rgyud): 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho bskams par shog/ bdag gis las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams rgya
334b8(rgyud): mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag cing // yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cing // 
335a1(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/ 
335a2(rgyud): bdag gis lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams dam pa lhag ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyab par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug
335a3(rgyud): bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon thar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba
335a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis// yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog// gser
335a5(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa da nga ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa me tog pad+ma'i
335a6(rgyud): 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos
335a7(rgyud): rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes
335a8(rgyud): par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung ba'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / 
335b1(rgyud): thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad
335b2(rgyud): grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi sheso// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce
335b3(rgyud): yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ 
335b4(rgyud): sems ni sgyu ma lta bu g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul dal rnam spyod de// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dam ga dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni
335b5(rgyud): yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas pa/ cas te// dbang pod+ma yul dag kyang rab tu shes// gzugs dang
335b6(rgyud): sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por bzhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas
335b7(rgyud): bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongasu rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul/ 
335b8(rgyud): 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sbrul gdugs gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma
336a1(rgyud): yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gnyis gnyis te/ khams sbrul de ngag
336a2(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi na mkhar 'gro ba yin// 
336a3(rgyud): ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris
336a4(rgyud): pazang gyur nas// lus shi gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod da gra na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams
336a5(rgyud): la ltos// 'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod// chos rnam sa 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// 
336a6(rgyud): ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba
336a7(rgyud): yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas nga ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin
336a8(rgyud): srid pa dang // skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung ba mi 'byung dang // tshul
336b1(rgyud): bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gi lta bar gyur pa bcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo grol// phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan
336b2(rgyud): rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngas ni bdud rtsi khu bas bdag tshom byas// ngas ni
336b3(rgyud): chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// nges ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal/ 
336b4(rgyud): ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa sgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sem sa can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi la sa rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs
336b5(rgyud): gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung nyen med pa dag/ srog chags nye na mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi khu ba ba sil bas tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon
336b6(rgyud): chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongasu tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog
336b7(rgyud): dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal
336b8(rgyud): dag dang sa las ni// 'khrung ba thams cad bcad btubs te// de dag thams cad byer blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par phye ma'i phung po spungs nas
337a1(rgyud): ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shre
337a2(rgyud): pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyi// thams
337a3(rgyud): cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nu so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser/ 
337a4(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// / de nas rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
337a5(rgyud): srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po che/ na po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gci/ ga tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
337a6(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
337a7(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
337a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i cho ga sa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig
337b1(rgyud): rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags pa brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ 
337b2(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmago tshogs thams cad
337b3(rgyud): rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa tham cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba ma chog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa/ 
337b4(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi ba dar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid ba lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa
337b5(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang da ga par bshad na/ chos nyan pa bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ ba gcag rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus
337b6(rgyud): 'di gzo chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu ro// bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang / stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag gi lus la 'jug
337b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang
337b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshigs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs 'brog
338a1(rgyud): pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag
338a2(rgyud): du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ 'dzum+bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dra
338a3(rgyud): de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzum+bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par
338a4(rgyud): 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ ga/ nod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang / gnod pa ba rgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa
338a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gse/ ra 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong / chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan
338a6(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po
338a7(rgyud): 'di yul de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i
338a8(rgyud): rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po yang bsnyen par 'gyuraro// btsun pa
338b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu srung / 
338b2(rgyud): bar bgyid/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / yongasu skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po n+de/ mi'i rgyal po'i de'i yul thams cad na gnas par
338b3(rgyud): sems can rnams kun tu srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos
338b4(rgyud): nam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba tha ma sa cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
338b5(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba/ 'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun
338b6(rgyud): sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la sti stang bgyid/ bla mar
338b7(rgyud): bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches sti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim
338b8(rgyud): gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag leg
339a1(rgyud): so leg so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang leg so leg so// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag
339a2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po/ chos kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams ca
339a3(rgyud): la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad
339a4(rgyud): 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi 'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
339a5(rgyud): la mchod pa dang / rim gror byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu/ srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzu/ nga ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang
339a6(rgyud): bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ des na rgyal po chen po dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
339a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba yang 'gyu ro// des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang bcas/
