339a8(rgyud): pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
339b1(rgyud): thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu
339b2(rgyud): bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyis bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags
339b3(rgyud): skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba
339b4(rgyud): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcu ngan pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam grong khyer ram/ 
339b5(rgyud): grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor ga/ nga du spyod par 'gyur ba dang // mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
339b6(rgyud): mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim
339b7(rgyud): gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror
339b8(rgyud): bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog
340a1(rgyud): tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen
340a2(rgyud): por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal mi mo bzhi/ dpung dang g.yog
340a3(rgyud): tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang / lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ po
340a4(rgyud): brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i/ rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi 'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
340a5(rgyud): po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa da / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba
340a6(rgyud): dang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / 
340a7(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yong su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol/ 
340a8(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla
340b1(rgyud): 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra d+hA 'ang ba nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ 
340b2(rgyud): yul ngo rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i cha der dus na/ gser 'o ngas pa med sde'i dbang ba'i rgyal po 'di ga'i brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla'ang ba nye ba'i/ 
340b3(rgyud): rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyeng bar 'gyur// rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur// rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul dugapa' dang nad kyang 'byung
340b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de bdag rang gi yul du phyin na/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya
340b5(rgyud): dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa ba/ com ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan la/ ga bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshog su mchi
340b6(rgyud): ba'i sladu rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzho pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam
340b7(rgyud): par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te
340b8(rgyud): der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de yul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba sna tshogs dog kyang nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ 
341a1(rgyud): der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la leg so
341a2(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag leg so leg so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
341a3(rgyud): byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / 
341a4(rgyud): yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba de/ dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor
341a5(rgyud): de dag dang / yul de dag kyang yongasu bsrungs shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba
341a6(rgyud): bgyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog shig/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams
341a7(rgyud): cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'chang mi 'bru ba dang / mi rtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'ja
341a8(rgyud): bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang // 
341b1(rgyud): rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas/ rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
341b2(rgyud): gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang / nam 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag phan tshun du tshu 'u yu
341b3(rgyud): ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i semasu 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab/ 'chang mi 'bru/ mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas
341b4(rgyud): ba khyed bzhi 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di rgyal bar 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po da du/ mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus
341b5(rgyud): dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo khyud kor thams cad kyang nga yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par
341b6(rgyud): rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ long
341b7(rgyud): spyong che ba/ ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i
341b8(rgyud): khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par
342a1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rim gror byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang byed/ bla mar
342a2(rgyud): byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'ong dam pa mdo
342a3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu klung chu'i bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyuraro// khyod kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phelo// 
342a4(rgyud): khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyod kyi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa dar 'phelo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
342a5(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la ya nga mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa bya/ sa par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po nges 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / 
342a6(rgyud): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas mi'i rgyal po de la
342a7(rgyud): srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba byas/ 
342a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun me'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su gzung / 
342b1(rgyud): ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches sto/ 
342b2(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyangs par
342b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
342b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal dpo chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang de dag 'di skad ces
342b5(rgyud): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'a/ de yang nyan par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang srung
342b6(rgyud): ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs la yang srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i
342b7(rgyud): pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal
342b8(rgyud): srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma
343a1(rgyud): mchis pa yongasu 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu srung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod/ 
343a2(rgyud): pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun po bcom ldan
343a3(rgyud): 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyid de mnyam par
343a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal
343a5(rgyud): po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing / me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon
343a6(rgyud): po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus
343a7(rgyud): bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu gda' ba gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis
343a8(rgyud): nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/ 
343b1(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam
343b2(rgyud): pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang / phan par blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal
343b3(rgyud): po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan par smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pasgral bgyi'o// chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du rtsal bar bgyi
343b4(rgyud): dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas dbadag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi
343b5(rgyud): bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag da ga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad
343b6(rgyud): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// 
343b7(rgyud): spung ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dkar po yang bzung bar bya'o// rgyal po mthu chen po bzhi dang rgyal po bkod pa chen po bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs
343b8(rgyud): te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la/ chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed bor ba snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi
344a1(rgyud): 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du// 
344a2(rgyud): 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che lha'i gzhal med khang rin po
344a3(rgyud): che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun
344a4(rgyud): ring du 'chi bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'a gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par
344a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ chen po che chen
344a6(rgyud): po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing / gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang
344a7(rgyud): phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong nas mi'i
344a8(rgyud): rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs
344b1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyu ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
344b2(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshis gsol bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig
344b3(rgyud): rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
344b4(rgyud): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen
344b5(rgyud): po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyu ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud la gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thad
344b6(rgyud): shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyu ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyuraro// deng bdag
344b7(rgyud): gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khri brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyod par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya
344b8(rgyud): stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyu ro// deng bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongasu thar bar byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nam
345a1(rgyud): kyi phung po dpag tu med pa/ bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong su bzung bar 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad srung ba
345a2(rgyud): chen po byas par 'gyuraro// deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med par byas par 'gyur/ deng bdag
345a3(rgyud): gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yongasasu bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba med pa dang / 
345a4(rgyud): 'khrug pa med par 'gyu ro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal bro chen po dag/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bskye na nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
345a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gu/ sa pa 'di lta bus sti stang byed bla mar byed rim gror bye da/ mchod pa byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang
345a6(rgyud): g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed
345a7(rgyud): pa dang / tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par
345a8(rgyud): 'gyu ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzi brjid kyang rgyan par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyuro// de skad ces
345b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de/ 
345b2(rgyud): bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan pa la/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyid
345b3(rgyud): bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid cing rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi sladu/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par
345b4(rgyud): 'debs la/ bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mo dang du chos mnyan pa de mnyan cing / bdag dang lha tham nas cad kyi slad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad sbyin par bgyid
345b5(rgyud): na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi sladadu/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdug
345b6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas gdugs ma thag tu spos chogs rnams las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs
345b7(rgyud): kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing
345b8(rgyud): dag gi gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag gi khang pa rnams kyang bar
346a1(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag skad cig yud tsam de la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams
346a2(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can ma dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu
346a3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa
346a4(rgyud): dang / de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs/ rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po
346a5(rgyud): yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gsar du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thams cad snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
346a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa/ 
346a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la
346a8(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu/ lag na spos snod cig thogs pa de la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skad cig thang cig
346b1(rgyud): yud tsam de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgya lho ri rab byed
346b2(rgyud): phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa
346b3(rgyud): gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsug sa
346b4(rgyud): gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi khang / 
346b5(rgyud): pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyu 8/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa
346b6(rgyud): rnamasu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
346b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas pa de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
346b8(rgyud): 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus spos/ 
347a1(rgyud): dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang ga'i klung gi
347a2(rgyud): bye ma snyed dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnamasu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug
347a3(rgyud): ba sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi
347a4(rgyud): kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhing snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang+ga'idaklung bye ma snyed dag snang bar byas par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen
347a5(rgyud): po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/ gang+gA'i klu bye ma snying dag chos smra ba de dag la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu
347a6(rgyud): dam pa legaso leg so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bur zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di zhang
347a7(rgyud): rgyacher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyed leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin par 'gyuraro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba
347a8(rgyud): ngan ngon dang mi ldan/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / 'chang pa dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
347b1(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir/ 
347b2(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// / bam po gsum pa// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag na/ 
347b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshig gcig dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge
347b4(rgyud): slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces pa dka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa
347b5(rgyud): khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las/ 
347b6(rgyud): rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang
347b7(rgyud): chub kyi snying po legs par rgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal
347b8(rgyud): po'i drung na 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mi sdug pa ston pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu
348a1(rgyud): / dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa/ rab tu zhi ga/ rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par rdzogs
348a2(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu de ba khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
348a3(rgyud): bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal

348b3(rgyud): po de khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal
348b4(rgyud): po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos nyan pa'i mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po pa/ rgya byin dang / lha mo dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo dpal
348b5(rgyud): dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin

348b7(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri 'thon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ 
348b8(rgyud): me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i sla du mchi bar 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin
349a1(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad 'thun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa dge ba thob par bgyid pa/ bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos

349a7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma chos nyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gror mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi'ang rna
349a8(rgyud): par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang mi bskyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi
349b1(rgyud): bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma ngag gis yul de sal bar dor bar bgyin/ 
349b2(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yul de yal bar bor na/ yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyu ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams
349b3(rgyud): kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / 
349b4(rgyud): 'thab pa skye ba dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye ba dang / rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dadogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / bza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur/ phyogs tha dad pa nas/ 
349b5(rgyud): skar mnga' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba de'i/ 8/ nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i
349b6(rgyud): gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba na mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su na mkhal 'ja'i kha dog lta bur 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa yang
349b7(rgyud): g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grags par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha
349b8(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyuro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
350a1(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang yul na gnas pa'i lha yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / 
350a2(rgyud): gnod pa sna tshogs stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de dag nyid la kun tu srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun
350a3(rgyud): ring por myong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha rol
350a4(rgyud): gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'pham par bgyid 'tshal bar 'a gyur/ yul thams cad yun ring du yongasu skyong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi
350a5(rgyud): yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 2khrug pa thams cad las yongasu thar par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des
350a6(rgyud): gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stad
350a7(rgyud): bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi khu ba
350a8(rgyud): 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gis gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar
350b1(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs/ ji snyed
350b2(rgyud): bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi
350b3(rgyud): don gyi slad du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag las ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo
350b4(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma dngas pa'i dbang po brgya stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khra ga khrig brgya stong du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can
350b5(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad
350b6(rgyud): pa lag so// ji ltar na 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrungs par
350b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par
350b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta
351a1(rgyud): mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnamasu chos sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha
351a2(rgyud): dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tsho gas
351a3(rgyud): thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus
351a4(rgyud): dang / stobs dang mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar ba bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tsho rags pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i
351a5(rgyud): gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' la/ skye bo dang mi/ sa gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad nga na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba
351a6(rgyud): dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
351a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa de dag thams
351a8(rgyud): cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs
351b1(rgyud): rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon/ 
351b2(rgyud): bar shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
351b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi sla du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzum+bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgongs pa
351b4(rgyud): dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dga' dzam+bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag
351b5(rgyud): thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nye bar bstan/ yod
351b6(rgyud): su brjod yang dag par rab tu bshadado// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par
351b7(rgyud): bgyid gus par rim gror bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed
351b8(rgyud): bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu srung ba'i phyir sprob cher
352a1(rgyud): gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug
352a2(rgyud): shig dang / de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
352a3(rgyud): 'chad par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ji nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma srung ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / nad med pa dang / 
352a4(rgyud): 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gse dar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
352a5(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzu nga ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar
352a6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
352a7(rgyud): gcig tu bgos nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad
352a8(rgyud): pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pang rtsa rdul med chems/ 
352b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa te/ 
352b2(rgyud): khor lug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bu rab tu ganga'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po// yon
352b3(rgyud): tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nya ba 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma smig sgra lta bu chags med pa/ 
352b4(rgyud): rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de ba dka' stsal pa// stobs bcu dag go gser 'od dam pa yi/ 
352b5(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu ba rten pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdo sde'i dkon mchog zab
352b6(rgyud): mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar sgo gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten
352b7(rgyud): ngag na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam bu'i gling gnas
352b8(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad kyi// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar
353a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di na mi'i dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag
353a2(rgyud): bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad byed pa// pha rol dgra tshogs bzlog pa dge byed pa// mchog tu
353a3(rgyud): 'jigs pas phongs pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa
353a4(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// ji ltar chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tsha bas nyam thag tshe/ ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// 
353a5(rgyud): mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// mdo sde rin chen tha mas cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod na lag mthi la yod pa ltar// mi yi dbang po tshogs la gser 'od
353a6(rgyud): mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag
353a7(rgyud): gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
353a8(rgyud): legs zhes brjed pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di
353b1(rgyud): ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi// lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par
353b2(rgyud): byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi brjid chen po yis ni lha yi lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de
353b3(rgyud): nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis/ 
353b4(rgyud): yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid pa de ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur na/ yang
353b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag gis gto/ 8/ mngon par gtor to// gtor mngon par gtor nas kyang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa cig tu
353b6(rgyud): bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
353b7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po re re yang gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang chos smra ba de srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu
353b8(rgyud): dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po
354a1(rgyud): chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyi gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
354a2(rgyud): la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs
354a3(rgyud): can bdag gis kyang / dge slong cho smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i sladadu/ spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi// gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/ nges pa'i tshi ga brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi/ dge
354a4(rgyud): slong chos smra ba de la yis kyi snang ba chen po bgyi'o// gser 'o// dad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di las tshig yi ge ga/ dang yang rung ba dag gis yongasu nyams par gyur tam/ bskyed
354a5(rgyud): na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge de dag tha~Md sgrub par bya'o// de ltar sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge ba'i
354a6(rgyud): ba bskrun pa'i seMn de dag gi don gyi sladadu/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzem+bu'i gling na ring du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma bdag gis
354a7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bas gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba
354a8(rgyud): dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / thabras
354b1(rgyud): sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos thad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskyud ba ma mchi
354b2(rgyud): par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal par bgyi'o// dge slong cho smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod
354b3(rgyud): par bgyi ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag 'khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod/ 
354b4(rgyud): pa thad dang / bya dang ro langs thaMd rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gi das mkhas pa dag khrus bgyi du rtsal ba'i sman dang / sngags ni 'di dag ste/ shu dag gi rkang 'bu sug dang
354b5(rgyud): sha myang sha mi shi ri sha/ dbang po'i lag dang skal ba che// dzA ma shing tsa a gA ru// shi ri be sta sra rtsi dang / gu gul ras shal la ki/ rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang / tsan+dan dang / 
354b6(rgyud): ni ldong ros dang // gi wang bcas dang ru rta dang // gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mo sug spel na la da// na gage sar u shi ra// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// skar ma rgyal la
354b7(rgyud): btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di// lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad+ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma la nI la/ dza na ka ra te/ aM ka ra De/ in+ta dza li shaM ka ra dri/ pA sha dre/ a
354b8(rgyud): brta ka si ke na ku/ ku Ta ku/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+ha d+hu d+hu ma pa ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sa t+ya sI te swA hA/ lcibs dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma dkram par bgyi// gser gyi
355a1(rgyud): snod dang dngul snod du// mngar ba'i khu ba bzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang bzhag par bgyi// rab tu rgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs
355a2(rgyud): par bzhag par bgyi// rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du brtsal// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bgyi// lha mo de ni legs par rgyan// bar bar dag tu me lo
355a3(rgyud): bzhag/ mda' dang mdung rtse rna sgang bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang bcad par bgyi// de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// mtshams bcad pa yang rtsam par
355a4(rgyud): bgyi// s+yang the dan/ arka// na ya ne/ hi le/ gi le/ khi khi le swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasu khrus bgyis nas// sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na// khrus kyi zhi ba
355a5(rgyud): sbyor ro// tad+ya thA/ sa ga De bi ga De/ bi ga ta pa ti swA hA// phyog sa bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag ni tshe bsra ngas shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang // phung po'i/ 
355a6(rgyud): los kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung ba'i khams rnams 'khrug bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me bi sha me swA hA// sa ga De bi ga De swA hA/ sA ga ra saM bud+d+hA ya/ 
355a7(rgyud): swA hAHskan+d+ha mA tA ye swA hA/ nI la kaN+Tha ya swA hA/ a pa ra dzi ta bi d+yA ya swA hA/ hi ma bi d+ha saM bud+d+hA ya swA hA/ in mi la bAk+ShA ya swAhA/ ni mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ga Ne na maHsa ra sa t+yai de byaM sid+d+han+t+ra man+t+ra pA dA/ 
355a8(rgyud): ta ra tu bi tsi ti brah+ma nu ma n+ya tu swA hA// dge slong chos smra ba de srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid dor mtsho bar
355b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
355b2(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
355b3(rgyud): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gza' dang / 'thab pa dang / rlog
355b4(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thad dang / byang dang ro lang das tha~Mng zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha
355b5(rgyud): mo dbyangs can la/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhug sa te/ khyod kyis sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i cho ga 'di
355b6(rgyud): 'dri ba bshad pa ni/ leg so legaso zhes bya ba byin no// lha mo dbyangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa
355b7(rgyud): bram ze ko'u di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchog 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog byin yon+dan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma ngar ba
355b8(rgyud): rtsa yi gos bskus pa// dar b+ha rtsa'i gos gyon rkang pa gcig gis gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod// lce khrol
356a1(rgyud): cig/ s+yad ya the dan/ mu ri tsi ra/ a badze/ a ba dza ba ti/ he gu le/ mi gu le/ bi ga la/ mi gu she/ mA ri tsA sa ma ti/ da sha ma ti/ a gri ma gri ta ra/ tsa ta ra/ tsa ba ti/ 
356a2(rgyud): tsi ri shi rI mi ri/ mA ri n+ye/ pra Na pri ye/ lo ka dz+reShI lo ka sheSh+Te/ lo ka pri ye/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+hi ma mu khe shu/ tsi tsa ri/ a pra ti he te/ a pra ti/ ha ta bud+d+hi/ na mu tsi/ ma hA na mu tsi/ mahA de bi/ 
356a3(rgyud): pra ti gri hU/ nam ska ran/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshigasu bcad pa'i rgyud dang / sde snod dang / snyan ngag la sogs pa la/ bdag go rig sngags dngos
356a4(rgyud): grub tu gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA pra b+ha bA hi li hi li/ mi l-i mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi ma thus bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ ka ra De ke yA/ 
356a5(rgyud): re ka yu/ ra ma ti/ hi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dag 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i
356a6(rgyud): bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo dgug par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi l-i
356a7(rgyud): hi li mi li/ bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de
356a8(rgyud): nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u di n+yas/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams tha dang la nyan par gyis/ 
356b1(rgyud): lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon+tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsagra/ 
356b2(rgyud): pas yan lag rgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar ba dang // dri med yis yon+tan sna tshogs rnam par rgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir// 
356b3(rgyud): mchog rab dag gi yon+tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchogi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag sngags dang yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang // mig
356b4(rgyud): mchog dang ni mig dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang da dge ba mthong ba dang // yon+tan bsam du med par rgyan pa dang // zla ba 'dra ba dri ma med 'od dang // yis 'byung gnas
356b5(rgyud): dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni rgyan pa dang // zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba dang // yid 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs
356b6(rgyud): snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // bgos mchog sgrub byed sen dam pa dang // lha dang lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dang lha min tshegs kun gnas brjod dang // 
356b7(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs kyis gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// swA hA/ bde gcag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon+tan khyad par kun stsol cig/ dgongs pa kun tu bdag la dngos
356b8(rgyud): grub rtsol// dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu bsrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar rab brjod par// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thang
357a1(rgyud): rnyed/ dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// / 
357a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha me chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang // ji nas chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad
357a3(rgyud): thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / brel phongs ma mchis par thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur
357a4(rgyud): ba dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di de las tshig dang yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub para'agyur ba dang / rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yang
357a5(rgyud): dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong da ga la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
357a6(rgyud): po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
357a7(rgyud): 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ga ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs
357a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs
357b1(rgyud): pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshen rje'i
357b2(rgyud): 'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur ba gang 'di gos dang zas dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang 'chog chas gzhan dag gis kyang dge slong
357b3(rgyud): chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon+tan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi kha dog bzang po gse
357b4(rgyud): du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ras dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ des da ltar phyogs pa/ dang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta
357b5(rgyud): ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma da ga bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur
357b6(rgyud): zas dang skom dang nor dang 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang mal shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo byad
357b7(rgyud): gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor bar 'gyuraro// lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par
357b8(rgyud): bya/ spos dang me tog bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ming nas lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang / bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/ ro bro ba sna
358a1(rgyud): tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa'i bcud dag rnam par 'phel/ lha rnams rtag par rab
358a2(rgyud): tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams/ lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pI/ 
358a3(rgyud): sems can de dag la lha mo chen po dpal sems par 'gyur/ de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur/ lha mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na bskyed mos tshal dam
358a4(rgyud): pa/ bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgya ral mtshan zhes bya ba na gnas te/ mi gang lo la 'bru'i phung po
358a5(rgyud): spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par/ bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o// 
358a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog ston rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi kha dog gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal
358a7(rgyud): zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / spos kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul
358a8(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing / me tog dang bdug pa yang
358b1(rgyud): 'bul ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus de'i tshe lha mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po
358b2(rgyud): yang 'phel bar 'gyuraro// lha mo chen mo dpal 'gug par 'dod pa des/ reg pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
358b3(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 
358b4(rgyud): de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ daskad tho dan/ pra ti pU ra Na ba re/ sa man+ta daR+sha na/ ma hA mi hA ra ga
358b5(rgyud): taM/ sa man+ta bi da na ga te ma hA/ kAR+ya pra ti/ pra ma no/ satwa.ar+tha sa ma tA nu pra pU re/ A yA na/ d+harma tA ma hI b+ho gi ni/ ma hA maM two ba sang hi ta/ hi te Shi sang gri hI te/ sa mar+tha
358b6(rgyud): nu pA lA ni/ 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub par sbyin pa/ mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig te/ sems can par
358b7(rgyud): ma la sbyor ba rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la snyan te/ bdag dang sems can
358b8(rgyud): kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod na/ des bdag gis bsam pa 'di
359a1(rgyud): 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la/ lci bas dkyil
359a2(rgyud): 'khor byas te/ spos dang bdug pa yang 'bul bar bya'o// stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o// sa la me tog sil ma bkram nas bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal
359a3(rgyud): 'ongs nas der gnas par 'gyuraro// de'i phyin chad khyim mam/ grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal la/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnasu nam yang brel cing phongs pa med
359a4(rgyud): par byed do// 'gron bu dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad 'byor pa dang / bde/ dbar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyu ro// dge ba'i
359a5(rgyud): rtsab gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las/ lha mo chen mo da bal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ des na de srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de na gnas par 'gyur/ 'phang ba
359a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// 
359a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa 'bar ba/ rin chen gser gyi 'od zer snang
359a8(rgyud): ba'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam+bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag
359b1(rgyud): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser rin chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshalo//

359b3(rgyud): tog la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi

359b5(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs na de bzhin ga shogs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba dang / nub phyo gas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya
359b6(rgyud): ba dang byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba ste/ su gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / byang chub
359b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i ming 'di dag 'dzin tam/ klo ga/ khong du chud par byed na/ de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces
359b8(rgyud): gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ grong ngam grong khyer ro/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ 
360a1(rgyud): dgon pa'i sa phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa
360a2(rgyud): phyogs sam/ ri'i sman ljongs so/ pho brang 'khor der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag 'chi bar 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo
360a3(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / sa phyogs gang dang gang na dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos khri shom par 'gyur ba dang / gang dang
360a4(rgyud): gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag pa der rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
360a5(rgyud): sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar chos khri'i 'og logasu mchis te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge
360a6(rgyud): slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o// bdag kyang chos mnyan pa dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yang dag par
360a7(rgyud): mchod pa bgyi'o// bdag tshim par gyur/ rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ phun sum chags par 'gyur ba dang / bral ba nges ma mchis par thob par
360a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang / gsar 'ang dam pa mang snga'i dbang pa rgyal po 'di las chag dang yig
360b1(rgyud): sa'i phung po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po 'di nas/ sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/ yang dag par rim gro bgyi/ yongasu
360b2(rgyud): rdzogs par bgyi'o// steng du yang rgya mtsho'i sa la thug pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis rlan par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di rab tu mdangs dang ldan par

360b7(rgyud): kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur nas kyang sa la mchis pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/ brtson par 'gyur/ 'bad
360b8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ stobasu bgyid pa'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcon ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam+bu'i gling thams cad zhi ba dang / l-i legs pa dang / rgyas pa dang nyam
361a1(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur/ mi'i skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can bde bar 'gyur/ dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ sems ca
361a2(rgyud): de dag gzi brjid dang stobs dang / kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyu ro// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
361a3(rgyud): nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi stan la mchis pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/ mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas/ sems can thams cad kyi
361a4(rgyud): don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gser 'od dam pa ma do sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i sladu/ chos smra ba de la gso
361a5(rgyud): ba 'debs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ btsun pa ba com ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang / po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad na/ si'i lha mo brtan
361a6(rgyud): ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/ rab tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / rab tu stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / mthu chen pa bskyed
361a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjed dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud
361a8(rgyud): rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang stobs dang / btsun 'grus dang mthu dang shugs chen po thob par 'gyur na/ sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i
361b1(rgyud): 'jam+bu'i gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ sa chen po mdangs dang rab tu ldan par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems
361b2(rgyud): can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyuraro// sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur kyang / long spyod dang yongasu spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod
361b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bde ba yang myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca' rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang mal tshe dang / gnas dang / khang pa dang gzhas
361b4(rgyud): med khang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / rdzing dang chu mig dang / mche'u dang mtsho dang lteng ka dang / 'di da lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ 
361b5(rgyud): sa las byung ba/ sa lo rten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de da ga thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa bzo bar bgyi'o// 
361b6(rgyud): gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi/ bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ rim gror bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// 
361b7(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba de'i gan du mchis pa'i slad du rigs tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dag nas byung ste/ mchis nas gser 'od
361b8(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/ thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang / khyim dang grong dang grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas rang rang gi khyim na gnas
362a1(rgyud): pa dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag gis de ring chos mnyan bzang mo thos so// de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyi mi khyab pa yongasu
362a2(rgyud): bzung ngo // bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so// deng bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can
362a3(rgyud): dmyal ba las yong su thar to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul las yongasu thar to// deng bdag cag chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pI/ 
362a4(rgyud): dus na/ tshe rabs brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mir skye ba yod su gzung bar 'gyur zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur// / khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can
362a5(rgyud): gzhan dag la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe cig brjod dam/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na
362a6(rgyud): le'u gcig go/ sngon byung ba cig gam/ than byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig/ tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig/ 
362a7(rgyud): tshig gcig gis sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/ tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/ btsun/ 
362a8(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag sa phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa de dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag cig/ 
362b1(rgyud): la gcig brjod dam/ thos par bgyid dam/ gtam rgyud brjod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu mdangs dang ldan pa dang / snum par 'gyur/ 
362b2(rgyud): sa phyogs de dang de dag thams cad kyi phyir/ sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 'gyur/ rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ shin tu rgyas pa
362b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyuraro// nor che ba dang / long spyod che ba dang / sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par
362b4(rgyud): 'gyur// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces pa dka' stsal to// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag/ 
362b5(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la/ sa tha na tshig gcig nyan na/ de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum
362b6(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi nang du lha'i rigs gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro// sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la
362b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir/ gnas de dag legs par rgyan par byed dam/ tha na gdugs gcig go/ ba dan gcig gam/ ras gcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/ sa'i lha mo
362b8(rgyud): rtag tu rgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa lha'i ros bdun po dag tu/ lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu
363a1(rgyud): gnas par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/ sa / 
363a2(rgyud): lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang myong bar 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka'
363a3(rgyud): sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nges na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi
363a4(rgyud): stan la mchis pa de'i chos kyi stan gyi 'og logasu sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par 'gyi'o// ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la dge/ 
363a5(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du
363a6(rgyud): nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
363a7(rgyud): stong phrag du mar/ lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na
363a8(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
363b1(rgyud): gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgos brten par bgyi'o// gser
363b2(rgyud): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon ya
363b3(rgyud): dag shes/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lho nga sa la btsugs
363b4(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga/ sol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma
363b5(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang / po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rnga/ la lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam
363b6(rgyud): ri'i sman ljongs sam/ pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag/ gnod sbyin gyi sded po
363b7(rgyud): chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i phyogs sam ri'i sman ljongs pho brang 'khor der ma
363b8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// lus mi gda' bar bgyi ste/ dge slong tshesnga bde spong bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskya pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bsrung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang zhing / 
364a1(rgyud): dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// skyes pa 'am bud med dam khye'u 'am/ bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad dang / gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde
364a2(rgyud): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang / tha na tshig gcig dang / tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las
364a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig thos par gyur te/ bzung ba dang / tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming
364a4(rgyud): thos par gyur te/ bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang ku dan tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde leg su/ 
364a5(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rigs de dag dang / khyim de dag da 8/ grong de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / grong rdal de dag dang / dgon pa de dag dang / pho brang 'khor de dag
364a6(rgyud): kyang kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom
364a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/ 'di ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sumo// btsun
364a8(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to// chos thams cad yong su 'tshal to// chos thams cad khong du chud do// chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang / chos
364b1(rgyud): thams cad ji lta ba dang / gnas pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rigs gang lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
364b2(rgyud): chos thams cad bdag la mngon sumo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yis kyis ngag gsal ba
364b3(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yis kyis rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khya'o// ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab po// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis yis
364b4(rgyud): kyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab po// btsun dpa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams ca dang yang dag par 'tshal ba dang / yang dag par yongasu ba/ 
364b5(rgyud): pa dang / yang dag par yong su 'tshal ba dang / yang du ga par rnam par bltas pa dang / yang dag par kha nga du chud pa'i rgyu des na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
364b6(rgyud): bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig rgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
364b7(rgyud): spobs pa nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// ci nas chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang
364b8(rgyud): gang gi slad du sangs rgyas brgya stong ngag la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi spangadu// gser 'ongad dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam+bu'i gling du yun
365a1(rgyud): ring du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes
365a2(rgyud): kyi phung po bsam gyi mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus
365a3(rgyud): na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma
365a4(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuradar ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
365a5(rgyud): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba de'i spu'i bu ga rnam su mdangs rtsal bar bgyi'o// de'i lus la mthu dang
365a6(rgyud): stobs dang / brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o// de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o// de cher spro bar bgyi'o// 
365a7(rgyud): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// // bam po bzhi pa'o// bcom ldan
365a8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yonan rgya mtsho bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi me tog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la
365b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon+tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas sku legs par rgyan pa gang
365b2(rgyud): chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar mdzad pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo chen mo dpal yon+tan gyi 'bru dang / bkra shis pa dpag tu med pa phun sum tshegs pa de la phyag
365b3(rgyud): 'tshalo// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can shes rab kyi yon+tan dpag tu med pa de la phyag 'tshalo// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gi bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog
365b4(rgyud): la dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon pa/ rgyal srid la gsar du gnas pa la 'di skad ces smraso// bu gang ngas sngon pa dbang bskur nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na yab mchog dbang
365b5(rgyud): po'i tog las blangs pa/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dang / nga po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de ngas rgyal po/ 'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po dam tshig des lo nya
365b6(rgyud): khri'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/ tha na sems kyi skad cig tsam gyi chod kyang / sngon chos ma yin pas phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma sheso// bu rgyal po'i bstan
365b7(rgyud): bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de gang zhe na/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gis/ bu rgyal po mdzes pa'i tog la rgyal
