365b8(rgyud): po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i tshog su bcad pa 'di dag gis rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// sems can kun la phan byed pa// the tsom thang
366a1(rgyud): gcod pa po// nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed pa// rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya// rgyal po thams cad so so nas// dga' ba'i semasu 'gyur byos la// lha
366a2(rgyud): yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun// thal mo sbyar te mnyam par byos// rdo rje 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir// lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na// tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir// 'jig rten skyong
366a3(rgyud): ba rnams kyang langs// khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste// khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags// khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod/ bdag cag dogs pa bcad du gsol// mir skyes pa ya/ 
366a4(rgyud): rgyal po la// ji lta bur na lha zhes bya// gang gi rgyus na rgyal po dal// lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur// gal te lha ni ji lta bur/ mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skye zhing // mi bdag
366a5(rgyud): gyur te mi rnams la// rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur// 'dzi ga rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la// de skad yongs su dris pa dang // lha yi gtso bo tshangs po des// 'jig rten
366a6(rgyud): skyong la 'di skad smras// de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis// da ltar bdag la dris pas na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan// mi yi gnasu skyes
366a7(rgyud): po yis// rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang // rgyo gang gis na yul rnams// rgyal por 'gyur ba bshad par bya// lha dbang rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// ma yi rum du 'jig 'gyur te// 
366a8(rgyud): lha yi sngar ni byin rlabs nas/ phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni// mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin// lha las skyes par gyur pas na// de ni lha yi sras zhes
366b1(rgyud): bya khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes// sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis/ rgyal po'i skal pa byin nas ni// mi rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul// nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa// chos ma yin/ 
366b2(rgyud): pa gzhig pa dang // sems can legs byed dgod pa dang // lha yi gnasu bgyi ba'i phyir// mi yi dbang po mi shas dang // lha ye shes dang dri za'i shas// gdol ba'i shas dang srin shwa
366b3(rgyud): kyi// nyes par byed pa bzlog par byed// legs par bya ba byed rnams la// mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// / 
366b4(rgyud): tshe 'di'i legs par byas pa dang // nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi// rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir// lha ra yi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// yul na nyes byed gan+da
366b5(rgyud): pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor zhing // sdig pa can gyi skye bo la// 'thun pa'i chad par mi gcod cing // nyes par byas pa yal bor ba// de tshe chos min shin tu 'phe
366b6(rgyud): 'thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang // yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir byung // sum cu rtsa gsu khang pa na// lha yi dbang po 'khrug par 'gyur// yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyas
366b7(rgyud): pos yal bor ba// de tshag yo ni mi bzad pa// drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs lpags nasu// yul 'khor der ni rnam par 'jig/ longs spyod
366b8(rgyud): rnams dang rigs kyang 'jig/ gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang // g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis// phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// bya ba gang gi rgyal po nyid// bya ba de ni mi byed
367a1(rgyud): pa/ glang che dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin// rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig/ ma rungs pa yi rlung ldang zhing // ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // gza' dang / 
367a2(rgyud): rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur// rgyal pos yal bar bor na der// sa bon lo tog 'bras bu rnams// legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing // mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul na nyes
367a3(rgyud): byed gnas pa dag/ gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba// de tshe lha rnams khang pa na// yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyuraro// lha rgyal dbang po de dag ku// rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te// chos min
367a4(rgyud): phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar 'a gyur// rgyal 'dis ring por mi thogs par// lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur// lha rnams rab tu 'khrug phra
367a5(rgyud): na' de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing // mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig pa ra 'gyur// g.yo rnams dang ni 'thab mo dang // nad kyang kun
367a6(rgyud): tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po rab khro shing // lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar dor// yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed// spun nam yang na bu yang rung // 
367a7(rgyud): sdug pa rnams kyang bral bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang 'bral// yang na bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur// skar mda' dag dang ba ltung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung // pha
367a8(rgyud): rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang // mu gi shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi glang po phangs pa dang // blon po phongs pa 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi 'og tu rje mon// phangs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
367b1(rgyud): khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang // phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur// yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis// phan tshun dag tu 'debs par 'gyur// 'thab pa dag dang rtsod pa g.yo// 
367b2(rgyud): yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yul 'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing // mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung // de yi 'og tu sbyin gan kyang / chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// de yi 'khor
367b3(rgyud): dang blon po yang // chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo la// de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur// chos dang ldan pa'i sems can la// rtag tu chad pas gcod/ 
367b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur// chos lnga na chad pas bcad pa na// der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung // rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur// chos min skye
367b5(rgyud): bzung bas na// dam chos ro yi slong po mdangs// sem/ sa can mngangs dang sa yi bcud// dngos po rnamag sum rnam par 'jig/ skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing // 
367b6(rgyud): skye bo dam pa smad pas na// 'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang // rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ro dang mdangs// de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can nang
367b7(rgyud): po mang po dag/ yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag yul rnams la yang yod pa yang // kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang // chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur// rtse dang
367b8(rgyud): dgod dang dga' ba dang // sngan chad dag raba'i dngos po dang // dga' ba nyams ni mi dga' 'gyur// nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs// lo tog rnams dang 'bras bu ni/ snum
368a1(rgyud): dngos khu ba zad pas na// lus dang khams dang dbang po la// de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro// sems can rnams ni mdog ngan zhing // mthu chung shin tu ring ba/ 
368a2(rgyud): 'gyur// kha zas mang po zos kyang ni// tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no// stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang // de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur// sems can brtson 'grus
368a3(rgyud): nyams pa dag/ yul rnamasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi// sems can mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i// gza' dang
368a4(rgyud): rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur// chos min phyogs la rab gnas te// rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na// khams gsum rnam par
368a5(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// gang tshe rgyal pos phyogs gnas te// nyis byed yal bar 'dod pa'i tshe// 'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag/ yul rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 
368a6(rgyud): dgos pa gang phyir lha dbang gis// rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa yi// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing // nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni// legs par byas pas sems can rnam// / 
368a7(rgyud): lha yi gnasu lhar yang skye// nyes par byas pas yi dgas dang // sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro skye// gang tshe rgyal po yul rnams na// nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe// sum
368a8(rgyud): cu rtsa gsum lha rnams nas// nyes pa byas pas bskur bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na// de ni bu yang ma yin la// lha yi rgyal po pa rnams kyis// gnas la nyes dang
368b1(rgyud): bcas par 'gyur// g.yo ni shin tu mi zad pas// gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba// de phyir lha yi dbang po yis// mi gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs// nyes pa byas
368b2(rgyud): pa zhi ba'i phyir// legs par byed la 'dzud pa ste// tshe 'di la ni sems can la// rnam smin bskyed pa rgyal po yin// legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi// las ni rnam par smin pa/ 
368b3(rgyud): 'bras// rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir// byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod// bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang // yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// lha tshogs rnams kyi byin
368b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs// lha rnams ngag kyang rje yi rang // yul 'khor rnams na skye bo ni// sdig can g.yon can ga dul ba dang // yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir// srog dang rgyal
368b5(rgyud): srid rnams kyang btang // chos ma yin pa bzod byed cing // / shes bzhin yal bar 'dor na ni// yul na 'dzi// gas pa mi bzad pa// de 'dra gzhan ni yod ma yin// ji
368b6(rgyud): ltar g.yo rnams byung ba la// g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na// yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i// g.yo rnams phyir zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// glang chen rnams kyi rdzing chen bzhin// / 
368b7(rgyud): yul 'khor der ni rnam par 'jig/ lha dbang rnams kyang khro bar 'gyur// lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig/ yul du dngos po thams cad ni// ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas
368b8(rgyud): na// de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams// nyes pa'i rim bzhin gdul bar bya// chos kyi yul 'khor bskyang bar bya// chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya// srog kyang yongasu btang bya zhing // nyes dgon
369a1(rgyud): bya bar mi bya'o// skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan// yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la// rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya yi// phyogasu ltung bar gyur ta re// rgyal po chos
369a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa yis// grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas rnams// lha yi dbang po dga' 'gyur te// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni nged kyi bu// 'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po ste/ 
369a3(rgyud): chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas// legs par byed la skye bo bkod// rgyal po de ni legs byed pas// skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de// lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis// lha gnas gang bar byed// 
369a4(rgyud): snya mo// chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan pas// rgyal po rnams ni da rab tu dga'// lha dbang rab tu dang gyur pas// mi yi rgya/ dal po de la srung // nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du// rgyu skar
369a5(rgyud): legs par rgyu bar 'gyur// rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing // char pa'ang dusu 'bab par 'gyur// lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du// yul 'khor rnams le legs
369a6(rgyud): byed// de lta bas na rgyal po yis// bdag gi khong pa'i srog btang gi/ gang gis 'jig rten bde 'gyur la// dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste// yon+tan rnams kyis gang rgyan pa// chos
369a7(rgyud): dang ldan pa bsten par bya// rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba// rtag tu sdig pa rnam par spangs// chos kyis yul 'khor bskrad bar bya// chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya// legs par
369a8(rgyud): byed la sems can dgod nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya// gang tshe sdig pa byed pa rnams// tshul bzhin 'dul bar byed pa'i tshe// yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing // rgyal po gzu
369b1(rgyud): brjid ldan par 'gyur// rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing // skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dang / 
369b2(rgyud): po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur// de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams
369b3(rgyud): btang // gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang // sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phu lo// chos kyi sku de yongasu btsal ba'i phyir// gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi// dngos po de dag
369b4(rgyud): ngas ni ma btang med// bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kya rang btang // ji ltar sngon gyi bskal pa bsam yas na// ri nu chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs// mya ngan
369b5(rgyud): 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs pa de'i// bstan la legs byu/ nga zhes bya'i rgyal po byung // de nas gling bzhi dbang ba/ 'i 'khor los bsgyur// rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la/ 
369b6(rgyud): rab tu ston// rgyal dbang gsung phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na// de tshe rgyal po'i dam pa gnyid kyis log/ mi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos// chos smre rin chen sogs pa gnyid
369b7(rgyud): dkyil na// rnam par lhang nger mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di// rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar gyur// rgyal po de ni gnyid kyi log las sad// de yi lus kun dga' bar khyab par
369b8(rgyud): gyur// mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas mngon byung ste// nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnasu song // rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di na
370a1(rgyud): rin chen sogs// yon+dan ldan pa'i dge 'dun gang yod ces// chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris// de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni// phug gzhan zhig gis
370a2(rgyud): nang du 'dug gyur te// mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di na rnam sems la// kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug/ dge slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa deng // phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis
370a3(rgyud): 'bar zhing // phug gzhan zhig gi nang du 'dug gyur pa// de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan// 'do na ches smra rin chen sogs pa 'di// rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste// gser
370a4(rgyud): 'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rta ngag tu ston// rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras// gser 'od
370a5(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal// zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra ba/ sha du gsol// rgyal po legs par byung ba de nyi/ da la// rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas ni/ stong
370a6(rgyud): gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// de tshe mi yi dbang po sa phyogs ni// gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der// rin chen chu/ 
370a7(rgyud): dang spos chus chag chag btab// me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas// rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par rgyun// rgyal
370a8(rgyud): pos khri der tsan+dan dam pa dag/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor/ lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// gnod sbyin dbang dang mkha' lding lto 'phye ches// lha yi me tog man da
370b1(rgyud): ra ba'i char// khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab// chos 'dod lha yin bye ba khrag khrig stong // bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa// rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung ba na// sa
370b2(rgyud): la'i me tog dag gis mngon par mthor// chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang // shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos te// khri der nye bar song bar byas nas ni// thal mo
370b3(rgyud): sbar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams// bar snang 'dug nas me tog man da ra'i// char pa 'bebs shing sil snyan brgya stong phrag/ bsam gyis mi khyab
370b4(rgyud): rab tu sgrogs par byed// rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas// de ni mngon par
370b5(rgyud): mdzegs te 'dug par 'gyur// sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni// snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskye da byas te// rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni// de yi tshe/ 
370b6(rgyud): na mdo sde 'di bstan te// rgyal po thal mo sbyar byas 'dug na su// tshi go gcig gis ni rje su yi rang ste// chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung // de yi lus ni dga' bas khyab
370b7(rgyud): bar gyur// mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs// sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni// 
370b8(rgyud): rin chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang // gang yang 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams// bde bar 'gyur ba'i nor ni chen po yis// char pa de ring 'dzam+bu'i gling du pho ba// de
371a1(rgyud): yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang // dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog/ de bzhin zas dang skom dang gos rnams kyang // gling bzhi dag tu rab tu 'bab par gyur// rgyal
371a2(rgyud): po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du// rin chen char pa bab pa de mthong nas// gling bzhi rin chen gang bas bcas pa ni// rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul// de bzhin ga
371a3(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa dang // rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya bar gyur// gling bzhi dag ni rin chen gang bcas kyi// sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongasu btang // gang gis rgyal po legs par byung
371a4(rgyud): de la// de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa// rin chen chos smra ba yi dge slong de// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to// ngas ni gang tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing // tshig
371a5(rgyud): gcig gis ni rje su yi rang ste// nga ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang // chos mnyan pa dang rje su yi rang dang // gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// lta na sdug
371a6(rgyud): cing mig tu mdog mdzes la// lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa// skye bo mthong na dga' lus rtag tu thob// bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag/ dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los
371a7(rgyud): bsgyur rgyal gyur// bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang // ngas ni khams kyi rgyal por myong bar gyur// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur// tshangs pa'i dbang po yid
371a8(rgyud): bzhin de bzhin no// gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i// stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas// ngas gang mdo thos rjesu yi rang bar// bsod nams phung po de ltar
371b1(rgyud): chad med mang // bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob// chos skungs pa yang ni ngas thob bo// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ legs par byung ba'i le'u/ 
371b2(rgyud): bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// dpal ldan lha mo rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
371b3(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyus shing / rgya cher bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod
371b4(rgyud): cing / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sa rangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spyod yul ba dab mo yongasu shes par 'dod pa des/ gtsug lag khang
371b5(rgyud): dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/ gang na gser 'od / ma pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher ya nga dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyogs der/ nges gdon mi
371b6(rgyud): bar g.yeng myed pa'i sems kyis rnab blags te/ gser 'od dam pa meng sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor
371b7(rgyud): la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la// bas ma yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi
371b8(rgyud): spyod yul ba// zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas// gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam// gang na gser 'ong dam pa yi// mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa// sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya// 
372a1(rgyud): mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// yon+dan rgya mtsho mtha' yang yas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las// sems can thams cad thar bar byed// mdo sde yi ni thog
372a2(rgyud): ma dang / dbus dang de bzhin tha ma mthong // mdo sde'i dbang por ba zab ste// 'di la dpe ni yod ma yin// gang ga dang ni sa rnams dang // rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la// gnas pa'i rdul
372a3(rgyud): ni gang yang rung // dper bya bar ni mi nuso// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de yi tshe na 'jug par bya// chos kyi bdag nyid mchod rten ni// zab mo rab brtan gang yin pa// mchod
372a4(rgyud): rten de yi dbus na ni// rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong // yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston// dgrangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye ba
372a5(rgyud): ji snyed pa dang // lha yi dang ni mi rnams kyi// bde ba dag ni/ rje su myong // gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa// de ltar bad ga gi bsod nams kyi// phung po bsam yas smra ba ma
372a6(rgyud): du/ de tshe des ni de ltar shes// mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yis// dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing // tshor ba drag po bzod byas nas// mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa// ge tsug
372a7(rgyud): lag khang ngam gnas khang du// zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur// rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang // gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang // byad dang gdon ni
372a8(rgyud): mi bzad kyang // zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni// thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni// rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar// der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri// de ltar
372b1(rgyud): yang ba sham par bya// khri de la ni 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan// yi ger bris pa klag par byed// de bzhin yongasu rung bar bya// khri de las ni bab na su// yul gzhan song bar
372b2(rgyud): gyur na yang // khrid de la ni yod pa yi// cho 'phrul rnams ni snang bar 'gyur// chos smra ba yi gzugasu yong // de na res 'ga' spang bar 'gyur// res 'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs ste// des 'gas/ 
372b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yang // res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang // de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugasu ste// res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugasu yang // khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur// res 'ga'
372b4(rgyud): 'od ni 'ba' shig snang // res 'ga' lha rnams snang b.ra'agyur// yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas// de nas mi snang ba dar yang 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur// 
372b5(rgyud): thams cad du yang grub par byed// 'bru dang bkris phun su ma tshogs// mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// rgyal dang dpal dang grags par byed// phyir rgol ba yang bzlog
372b6(rgyud): bar byed// pha rol dgra tshegs rab tu 'joms// g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed// mya ngan thams cad zhi bar byed// sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed// g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar
372b7(rgyud): byed// 'dzam+bu gling 'di thams cad du// grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur// de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni// shin tu pham pa nyid 'gyur// rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur// sdig pa
372b8(rgyud): thams cad rnams par spangs// g.yul ngo'i rtse las rnam par rgyal// dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'// tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // 
373a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // mi 'am cing dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin
373a2(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dbang po// de dag las ni sogs pa dang // lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // chos kyi mchod rten bsam yas la// rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// zhe sar bcas pa'i
373a3(rgyud): sems can rnams// mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang po mchog de dag thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // phan tshun du
373a4(rgyud): ni smra byed pa// bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag/ bas gas pa de dag kun la ltos// dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yi// mi rnams de dag 'dir lhags te// gang dag mdo
373a5(rgyud): sde zab mo 'di// nyan pa'i phyir ni 'dir lhags pa// dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas// chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas// de dag 'jig rten snying rje ldan// de dag
373a6(rgyud): sems can phan byed na// de dag zab mo'i chos rnams kyi// dam pa chos kyi ro yi snod // chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis// de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin// gang dag gser 'od dam pa'i
373a7(rgyud): mdo// dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pa// de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni// brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni// mdo 'di nyan pa de dag la// lha dbang rgyal po de kun dang // / 
373a8(rgyud): dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du// dpal dang rnam thos bu dang ni// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi dag
373b1(rgyud): ni kun nas kyang // srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur// dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang // rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni// skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang // sbyin sreg za dang skye dgu dang // stobs/ 
373b2(rgyud): chen pha rol gnon byed pa// 'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang // nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// nor sbyin gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang // sred med bu dang dbang
373b3(rgyud): phyug che// yang dag shes la sogs pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis// 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad
373b4(rgyud): no// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // dganod sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang // byang chub sems dpa thams cad kyang // de dag la ni srung bar byed// gnod
373b5(rgyud): sbyin dbang po nor bu bzong // de bzhin gang ba bzang po dang // ji 'jigs dang ni 'brog gnas dang // dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang // gnod sbyin dbang po re re yang // gnod
373b6(rgyud): sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pa// de dag rnams la srung byed 'gyur// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i rgyal// nor bu'i mgul dang nges ma
373b7(rgyud): dong / de bzhin char pa'i bdag po dang // kham po che dang nag po dang // de bzhin gser 'dra'i skra dang ni// lnga rtsen dang ni ra rkang dang // de bzhin bskal pa chen po dang // yur ba can dang chos
373b8(rgyud): skyong dang // spre'u de bzhin 'khri byed dang // khab kyi spu dang gnyi bshes dang // de bzhin rin chen sgra dang ni// yul chen can dang khyim med dang // 'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan dan dang // mthu bo che dang / 
374a1(rgyud): gangs can dang // bde ba'i ri nyid de bzhin te// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang // gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag la ni srung
374a2(rgyud): bar byed// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang // e la'i 'dab dang btang gzung dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis ga dang // klu ni brgya drag stong po dag/ stobs tshwa/ 
374a3(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyang // 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las// de dag la ni srung bar byed// stobs can sgra gcan mi gtong dang // thag zangs ris dang bde mchog dang // rab
374a4(rgyud): sim byed dang phrag rtsub dang // de bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang / da lha min brgya phrag stong po dag/ stobs chen rdzu 'phrald ldan rnams kyis// 'jig skrag byung bar gyur pa las// 
374a5(rgyud): de dag la ni srung bar 'gyur// 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni// lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang // 'dug dang nyal dang ra re'i tshe// de dag la ni srung bar byed// gdol pa mo dang
374a6(rgyud): gtum mo dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang // mdung can dang ni so brtsegs dang // sems can kun gyi mdangs 'drog ma// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa
374a7(rgyud): de kun kyang // phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nasu// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams// lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dpal la sogs pa de bzhin
374a8(rgyud): du// lha mo dag ni thams cad dang // sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni// lo tog 'bras bu nags lha dang // kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la// gnas pa dag dang rlung lha dang // lha rnams de dag thams
374b1(rgyud): 'dir// rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni// gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba// de dag rnams la srung bar byed// tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la// sems can dag ni sbyor bar byed// dpal/ 
374b2(rgyud): dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyi// phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu rgyan// gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dag/ de dag thams cad zhi bar byed// rgud dang sdig dang mya ngan po// de dag thams
374b3(rgyud): cad zhi bar byed// zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yi// sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni// gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po'i ro yis tshim// dpag tshad dag ni brgya yi phrag/ stong
374b4(rgyud): phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas// rdo rje gnas la thug bar du// da sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel// dpag tshad brgyar ni tsha/ dang ba yi// 'og tu sa yi bcud song ste// de ni phyir yang
374b5(rgyud): log nas ni// sa yi steng dag snum par byed// mdo 'di mnya na pa'i stobs kyis ni// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang // gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang
374b6(rgyud): po'i ro tshim 'gyur// mdangs dang ldan par rab 'gyur zhing // de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur// bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad na// 'bras bu lo tog
374b7(rgyud): nags lha rnams// sna tshogs ro yis tshim 'gyur zhing // shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas// 'bras bu rnams dang lo tog dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 
374b8(rgyud): 'bras bu'i shing ljon sna tshogs kyang // kun nas rab tu skye bar byed// 'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang // kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams// me tog rab tu chags byed cing // sna tshogs
375a1(rgyud): dri ni rab tu 'byin// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi// rtsa dang nags tshal thams cad dgas yi steng na skye bar byed// 'dzam+bu'i grwa
375a2(rgyud): 'di thams cad na// klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab// rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song ste// rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du// ku mu da dang pad+ma dang
375a3(rgyud): ut+pal dang de bzhin du// pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs skye// nam mkha' la ni du ba dang // sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag/ mun pa dang ni rdul med cing // phyogs rnams rab tu 'od gsalo// 
375a4(rgyud): nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan yang // 'od zer dra bas 'od kyang mdzes// snang ba dag ni zab mo yis// rab tu dga' b.ra'achar bar 'gyur// dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu// 'dzam+bu
375a5(rgyud): gling gi gser gyi ni// gzhal med khang na 'dug pa yang // mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu tshim// dbang po nyi ma rab da ga' nas// 'dzam+bu'i gling du 'char byed cing / 
375a6(rgyud): 'od zer mtha' yas dra ba yis// kun nas rab tu snang bar byed// de ni shar ba tsam gyis kyang // 'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing // rdzing bu sna tshogs khebs pa yi// pad+ma dag ni kha
375a7(rgyud): yang 'byed// 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di thams cad du// me tig 'bras bu sman sna tshogs// yang dag yongasu smin byed cing // sa rnams thams cad tshim par byed// zla ba dang ni nyi ma yA/ 
375a8(rgyud): de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur/ rgyu skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // rlung yang de bzhin ldang bar 'gyur// 'dzam+bu'i gling ni thams cad du// kun tu lo yang legs gyur te/ 
375b1(rgyud): glagang na mdo sde 'dri yod pa// yul 'khor der ni khyad par 'phags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu srung ba'i
375b2(rgyud): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par sdud/ 
375b3(rgyud): pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcu dag rgyu gang dang rkyen gang
375b4(rgyud): dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang / gang ba// gyis shing bsags pas skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob nas
375b5(rgyud): da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/ brtsa ma ldan 'das la chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog
375b6(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
375b7(rgyud): gser du snang bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
375b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgya
376a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung // tsa tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag
376a2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i ches nub ste/ de'i na/ 
376a3(rgyud): pa yong ye thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/ 
376a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogadas pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // ji tsam
376a5(rgyud): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzem+bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan
376a6(rgyud): pa yong ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ khye'u dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan
376a7(rgyud): de nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen/ 
376a8(rgyud): pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
376b1(rgyud): ser skya'i 'od gser du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
376b2(rgyud): chub tu lung bstan to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag ni de tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i
376b3(rgyud): spyod pa rlabs po cher yang ma gyur/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyad skad kyang mi gda'/ lag pa dang // sa dang / 98/ yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bu mo
376b4(rgyud): phongs pa dag sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda'/ nor da dang 'bru dang 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang sa he// nai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang
376b5(rgyud): sa le sbram dang / rin po che rnams sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda'/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal
376b6(rgyud): med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dag sngon yongasu btang skad kyang mi gda' glang po che dang / ba glang dang / rta pho rgod dang / bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongasu btang
376b7(rgyud): skad kyang mi gda'/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa phrag du ma de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/ de bzhin
376b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i ming du lung ma thob kyi bar du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phra grangs
377a1(rgyud): ma mchis pa du ma dag las mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag du ma dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyid yongasu btang
377a2(rgyud): bar bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang yongasu gtong la/ lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig dang / yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bu mo phangs pa yongasu bgyi ba rnams
377a3(rgyud): kyang yongasu gtong / nor dang 'bru dang 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu ti ga dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram yongasu btang bar
377a4(rgyud): bgyi ba rnams yongasu gtong / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang
377a5(rgyud): rdzing bu dang / lteng ka dang / glang po che dang / bal glang dang / rta pho/ rgod dang / bran pho dang bran mo yongasu btang bar/ bgyi ba rnams kyang yongasu gtong gi oM gyis pha rol tu phyin// 
377a6(rgyud): pa drug po thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid/ rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rdzogs nas/ bde ba brgya stong phrag mang po yang myong bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
377a7(rgyud): 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig gis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag bcom ldan 'dra
377a8(rgyud): la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa 'di dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa du ma na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
377b1(rgyud): sa la'i dbang po mthon po'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang rus gcig dang / ming gcig tu rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
377b2(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ rab tu dang ba'i zhal/ ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ mkhyen pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde
377b3(rgyud): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyur zhes de ltar bla na med pa
377b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan/ de skad ces ge sol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par sdud pa la 'di skad ces
377b5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag/ bcu po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos mnyan
377b6(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas 'dir lhags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod pa de'i rgyu yod/ de'i byed pa yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 'di gsum byang
377b7(rgyud): chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu ri mo byed cing dga' ba dang / dang pa thob par gyur to// de tsam du
377b8(rgyud): bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongasu dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// dri ma med pa shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pa sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to// bsod nas/ 
378a1(rgyud): kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag
378a2(rgyud): bcu po 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ lhag par ri mor byed pa dang / rab tu drang ba thob par gyur to// de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med/ 
378a3(rgyud): pa ltar yongasu dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i phyir lung bstan pa'i sa rje su thob bo// rigs kyi lha mo chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / sngon gyi smon la
378a4(rgyud): gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsta
378a5(rgyud): ba'i sa rjesu thob bo// rigs kyi lha mo sngon gyi smon lam de da/ ga gang zhe na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang / po'i rgyal po las lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa
378a6(rgyud): bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grags med pa rgyas pa bsam gyis mi
378a7(rgyud): khyab pa/ tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 
378a8(rgyud): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung // 
378b1(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i
378b2(rgyud): chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba chos can/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rgyal srid skyong gi/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin te/ yul thams cad na
378b3(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa zhig byung ngo // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba/ 
378b4(rgyud): sman pa gso bar byed pa/ khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan pakye rgyud dang ldan pa zhig/ byung bar gyur to// kyo rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
378b5(rgyud): tshong dpon ral po 'dzin ces bya ba/ de'i bu chu 'bebs/ zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ 
378b6(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/ yi ge dang grangs dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byu // rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
378b7(rgyud): rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na/ sems can brgya stong du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing / nad sna tshogs kyis yongasu gzir to// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa
378b8(rgyud): drag pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba rnams myong bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs
379a1(rgyud): kyis gzir ba/ brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi don gyi phyir/ snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to// sems can brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nang sna tshogs kyis btab
379a2(rgyud): cing nad sna tshogs kyis gzir te/ de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa drag po yi du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba rnams myong la/ bdag gi pha tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin sman pa gso ba byed pa/ 
379a3(rgyud): khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa 'di ni rgas 'khogs gtugs lam du zhugs/ na tshod rje su thob pa/ 'khar ba la rten cing 'dar
379a4(rgyud): cing / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro mi nus na/ sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ 
379a5(rgyud): nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ brgya stong phrag du de dag nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song la/ nad kyi phyir/ 
379a6(rgyud): khangs la mkhas par bya ba yongasu dris te/ khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa des bdag grong dang grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro bar bya'o// 
379a7(rgyud): song nas kyang sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma dag nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar bya'o// mnyam nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe
379a8(rgyud): de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs
379b1(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin la/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba dris
379b2(rgyud): pa/ ji ltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing // khams kyi rnams kyang yongasu 'gyur// gang gis dus na lus can la// nad kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dus dang dus min zas zos pa// ji lta
379b3(rgyud): bar na bde bar 'gyur// gang gi lus kyi nang du ni// lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur// rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang // 'dus pa las gyur pad kan gyur// nad rnams zhi bar bgyi smad
379b4(rgyud): du/ ji lta bur ni gso bar bgyi// gang gi mi la gnod 'gyur/ dpa'i// rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo// gang gi dus na ma khris pa g.yo// bad kan gang gi dus na g.yo// de nas tsheng
379b5(rgyud): dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la cha gsu bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas pa ra bya ba rnam par bstan to// zla gsum dbyar te zla gsum ston/ 
379b6(rgyud): du shes// gsum ni dgun te gsum ni dpyid yin no// de ltar zla ba go rims 'di ste dus ni drug/ lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod// gsum gsum du ni tshigs rnams bsdus par
379b7(rgyud): shes// zla ba gnyis gnyis zhing ni dus su bstan// zas dang skom ni de ltar 'jug par 'gyur// sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan// dbang po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang // 
379b8(rgyud): lo gcig nang gi tshogs tshigs yongasu 'gyur// dbang po dang ni yongasu 'gyur ba na// lus can rnams la sna tshogs nad kyang 'byung // de nyid la ni sman pas zla gsum bzhi// tshigs kyi
380a1(rgyud): bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni// khams drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya// zas skom sman rnams go rims ji bzhin te// rlung gi shas che'i nad ni dbyar na ldang // ston
380a2(rgyud): du gyur pa na ni 'khris pa g.yo// dgun gyi dus na de bzhin 'dus pa ste// bad kan shas che'i nad ni dpyid ldang ngo // dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa sgyur ba'i ro// ston ni mngar dang snum dang
380a3(rgyud): bsil bag go/ dgun ni mngar dang skyur dang snum pa ste// dpyid kyi dus na rtsub dro tsha ba'o// bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang // mkhris pa che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang // rlung shas che ba
380a4(rgyud): zhu ma thag tu ldang // khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta/ 'o// rlung gi bdag nyid la ni bcud kyis gso// bkru sma dan gyis ni mkhris pa bsal bar bya// 'dus pa la ni gsu
380a5(rgyud): dang 'thun ldan pa// bad kan tshig su bab na skyug sman btang / rlung shas che dang mkhris dang 'dus pa dang // bad ka na shas che'i tshogs rnams shes par bya// dus gang khams
380a6(rgyud): dang lus ni gang yin pa// de yi sman dang bze' btung bstan par bya// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'babs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhig yongasu dris pa des tshe'i
380a7(rgyud): rig byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ grong
380a8(rgyud): dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad du song nas// sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir
380b1(rgyud): ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag la/ kho bo ni sman pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/ kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar bya'o// zhes dbugs phyung ngo // rigs
380b2(rgyud): kyi lha me tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen por skyes par gyur to// dbugs
380b3(rgyud): phyin pa rnyed nas kyang / dga' ba dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis
380b4(rgyud): gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yodang su thar te nad med par gyur to// nad med par gyur nas da snga ma kho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
380b5(rgyud): ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ sems can nad sna tshegs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas gang su dag nad drag
380b6(rgyud): pos btab pa de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzer ba brgya stong phrag du ma
380b7(rgyud): de dag gi tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi sman byang gang ci bstan pa des/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas// nad med pa dang / nad nyung bar gyur nas kyang
380b8(rgyud): snga ma kho bzhin du mthu dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong
381a1(rgyud): rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na/ sems can nang sna tshogs kyis btab pa/ nang sna tshogs kyis gzir ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ 
381a2(rgyud): de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis nad sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar byas par gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i
381a3(rgyud): le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o// rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon
381a4(rgyud): gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nad med par byas pas na ba nyung zhing snga ma kho bzhin du spro ba dang / stobs dang ldan pa'i lusu gyur to// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi
381a5(rgyud): yul na/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga'/ mgu spyod do// sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin bsod nams nga/ ga kyang byed de/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la'ang tshong
381a6(rgyud): dpon gyi chu 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig/ sman pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi nad gso ba me ngan sum du byang chub sems dpar nges pa/ tshe'i rig byed yan
381a7(rgyud): lag brgyad thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do// rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de la/ chung mchu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi lha mo chu'i
381a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po de la khye'u gnyis yod de/ cig gi ming ni chu'i gos zhes bya/ cig gi ming ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs khye'u de gnyis dang / 
381b1(rgyud): lhan cig tu mthar gyis/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnamasu 'gro'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan zhig mchod
381b2(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin to// de nas 'brog dgon pa der sha za ba'i khyi dang / sbrang ki dang / wa dang / khra dang / bya dag gang na dgon pa na yod pa der rgyug pa mtho
381b3(rgyud): nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang / sbyang ki nas wa'i bar 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyamo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag khyi dang / sbyang ki dang / wa
381b4(rgyud): dang / bya rnams phyogs gang dang gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi lha mo de nas// tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ste
381b5(rgyud): dgon pa na rdzing zhig yod pa ga la ba der phyin to// rdzing che na po de na nya khri zhig gnas te/ des der nya khri phrag ma nga po zhig chu dang bral ba mthong nas/ de de la snying rje chen po'i
381b6(rgyud): sems skyes pa dang / de na lha mo zhig shing la lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/ lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu legaso legaso// 
381b7(rgyud): gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu byin cig/ rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/ gang chu 'bebs pa dang / gang chu sbyin pa'o// de bas na rang
381b8(rgyud): gi ming dang 'thun pa'i bya ba byos shog/ chu 'bebs kyis slar smras pa/ lha mo nya 'di dag la ji snyed cig mchis/ lha mos smras pa/ nya khri thams pa'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong
382a1(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyeso// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po na chu lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/ de nas
382a2(rgyud): nya khri zhig 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing / chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyu go/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang / nya khri
382a3(rgyud): kho de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de logasu chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar blta'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis
382a4(rgyud): phyogs bzhir rgyugs te/ chu btsal kyang der chu ma rnyed nas phyogs bzhir ltas pa dang / ngas ha cang la/ mi ring ba zhig na/ shing ljon pa chen po mang zhig mthong
382a5(rgyud): nas shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te/ shing gi ya la ga rnams bcad nas/ shing gi yal ga de dag/ khyer te/ rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang
382a6(rgyud): shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri bo de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i grib ma bya'o// rigs kyi lha mo de nas tsheng dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der 'bebs pa'i chu tshil te/ gang
382a7(rgyud): nas chu 'bab ces de phyogs bzhir brgyugs kyang chu ma rnyed nas de myur ba myur ba chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi rje su song ste/ rigs kyi lha mo dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing der chu 'babs pa zhes/ 
382a8(rgyud): bya ba'i klung chen po de las der chu 'bab pa'i klung de yang de'i tshe sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis nya khri po de dag gi phyir/ ci nas kyang phyis nyi de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur
382b1(rgyud): ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi g.yang sa chen por klung de phab bo// de nas de mthong nas bsams pa klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis srol de nyid du dbab par mi nus na/ bdag gis lta dbab par ga
382b2(rgyud): la nus snyam nas der phyir log go/ rigs kyi lha me de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rengs pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po lha'i
382b3(rgyud): dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod do// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de dag rgyus nas smras te/ bdag gis lha'i chab 'og tu grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal thams cad sems
382b4(rgyud): can gyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum na/ gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi ba de na/ dgon pa ni yod pa zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis dpa de na nya khri zhig gnas pa de tsha ba dang bral nas gdugs
382b5(rgyud): kyis gdungs shing mchis te/ ji ltar mi rnams la btsa/ la pa ltar/ ji nas dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa de dang ga la yang srog rtsol bar 'tshal na/ lhas glang po che nyi
382b6(rgyud): shu zhigs bdag la srul du gsol/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis sman pa'i rgyal po chen po la glang po che nyi shu zhig byin cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o// blon po rnams kyis
382b7(rgyud): smras pa/ sems can chen po glang po che'i lhas ga la der seng la glang po che nyi shu khrid te/ sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang / bde bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong
382b8(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu glang po che nyi shu khrid nas/ glang po che'i rdzi bo las ba lang gi rkyal pa brgya blangs te/ slar log nas chu
383a1(rgyud): 'bab ces bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song ste/ rkyal ba de dag chus bkang nas/ glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/ myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod/ 
383a2(rgyud): ba'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / chu de glang po che'i steng nas pha ba ste/ phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas/ phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang / tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu
383a3(rgyud): sa phyogs ga du 'gro ba de 'o gsun dri bo de dag kyang rgyu'o/ de nas rigs kyi lha mo tshang dpon gyi khye'u chu 'debs 'di snyam du sems te/ 'i byi khri lo de dag dag gas de mo su rgyug stagan mang ni dus bre te bri ba dag ni gle'i rtse mo ga zhags shA baphrod des kye ngag gis kha ras sbyin par bya'o snyam nas
383a4(rgyud): rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis da rang gi bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smraso// bu glang po che thams cad kyi nang nas mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon/ 
383a5(rgyud): te/ bdag gi khyim du song la myur ba myur bar song ste/ me sa po tshong dpon la/ kye mes po chu 'bebs kyi mchid nas khyim 'di na pha ma dang / spun dang sring mo dang / bran
383a6(rgyud): pho dang / bran mo dang las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba gang ci mchis pa thams cad cig tu bsdus te/ chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag du myur du rdzongs shig ces mchi'o// 
383a7(rgyud): de skad gyis shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che la zhon nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu rgyug te/ rang gi khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / de dag rgyas kyis zhi ba
383a8(rgyud): tu smras te/ de nas khye'u gos kyis slar smos pa'i zas sbyar ba de thams cad glang po che'i rgyab tu bkal nas/ glang po che de la zhon te/ dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing ga la be der song ba dang / 
383b1(rgyud): chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas dga' mgu ste bu las zas spangs nas/ phrul te rdzing der gtor nas nya khri de dag tshim par byas te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis dus gzhan shig/ 
383b2(rgyud): nas/ dgon pa'i gnas shig na dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa la su 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug ter can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
383b3(rgyud): rten du skye'o zhes thos kyi/ bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
383b4(rgyud): rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan yang bsgrags par bya'o//  snyam mo// de tshe na 'dzam+bu'i gling de na sems can rnams kyi lta ba gnyisu gyur to// kha cig ni theg pa chen po la
383b5(rgyud): mngon par dad do// kha cig ni smod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi/ khye'u chu 'bebs kyis de'i tshe rdzing der rkang pa gnyis ka'i dbus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/ bcom ldan
383b6(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshalo// zhes che du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
383b7(rgyud): gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
383b8(rgyud): lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad bta'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad
384a1(rgyud): pa 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung 'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ 
384a2(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis
384a3(rgyud): sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
384a4(rgyud): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur tu/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
384a5(rgyud): 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung / po 'di 'ba' shig kyang 'gag par 'gyuraro zhes bya/ ba'i bar du'o// rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
384a6(rgyud): tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'babs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa/ de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/ rang gi bu chu'i gos dang / chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu rang gi khyim du
384a7(rgyud): phyin pa'i bar du'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas/ chang gis ra ro ste mal na nyal ba dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur
384a8(rgyud): te/ mtshan mo de 'das pa dang / nya khri bo de dag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes// skyes ma thag tu de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis
384b1(rgyud): sems kyis rnam par rtog pa skyes te/ bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes snyamo// de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag
384b2(rgyud): 'dzam+bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te/ bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gyur pa las tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis chu mang po dang / kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/ bdag ca
384b3(rgyud): la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags
384b4(rgyud): pas dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang / rkyen des bdag cag lha/ rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/ bdag cag tshong dpo/ dan gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ de la
384b5(rgyud): mchod pa bya'o snyamo// de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur na sa/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te
384b6(rgyud): de'i tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa de la lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag/ chu nam ma l+r-i ni rkang pa'i drung du b.lal/ mu tig sa ma khron gas la lags su bzhag
384b7(rgyud): mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yon logasu bzhag ste/ dbus mo nub tsam du me tog man da ra ba'i char chen po yang phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang bkrol nas/ nges 'dzam+bu'i gling
384b8(rgyud): thams cad kyang sad/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyang sad do// de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag kyang na mkha' la dong ste/ lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul gyi
385a1(rgyud): gnas dang / gnas gzhan du yang me tog man da ra ba'i char 'bebs shing / dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/ de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man
385a2(rgyud): da ra ba'i char chen po phab ste/ de nyid du ni mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang lha'i gnasu dong ste/ de na 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga po dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/ dga' mgur spyod cing dpal
385a3(rgyud): dang skal pa bzang po dag kyang myong ngo // 'jam+b+ha'i gling du nam langs pa dang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis ltas te dag byung ba mthong nas skar mkhan dang / blon po chen
385a4(rgyud): rnams la smras pa ci'i phyir ma dang gsum ltas 'di dag bya nga / de dag gis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzod du gsol/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gi se
385a5(rgyud): mo de bzhi khri'i char bab cing lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i/ char yang pha bo zhes thoso// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyu/ ga 'od kyis blon po rnams la smras pa khyed deng la tsheng
385a6(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la snyan pa'i tshig gi bos shig/ de nas skar mkhan dang blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebra/ 
385a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smraso// rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od 'di khyod la 'bod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang
385a8(rgyud): phyug 'od ga la ba der song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu chu 'bebs ma dang gsum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba de ci'i ltas shes sam/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rgyal
385b1(rgyud): po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smra so// lha bdag gis 'tshal te/ nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus bgyis pas nge so// rgyal pos smras pa ji ltar shes/ chu 'bebs kyis smras
385b2(rgyud): pa/ lha chu'i gos rdzing der nya khri bo de dag gu ma ma 'gum ltar rtsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar gyis shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos la
385b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces smra so// bu song la dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing bu'i nya khri bo de dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig/ de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar dgon pa na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga
385b4(rgyud): la bder song ba dang / nya khri bo de dag shi ba'i dusu gyur/  cing me tog man da ra ba'i char chen po bab pa yang ma thong nas sla log te pha la smras pa/ 'chi ba'i dus su
385b5(rgyud): gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis khye'u chu'i gos las tshig de thos pa dang / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song nas/ de dag
385b6(rgyud): rgyus nas zhib tu smras te/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ nya khri bo de dag thams cad ni shi ba'i dus su gyur nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyis lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de dag
385b7(rgyud): dang bdag gi mthus ma dang gsum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/ bdag gi khyim du yang mu tig gi se mo de bzhi khri dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i char yod phab bo// 
385b8(rgyud): de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu ste yi rang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
386a1(rgyud): kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir
386a2(rgyud): zhe na/ shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur
386a3(rgyud): pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to// 
386a4(rgyud): rigs kyi lha me tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ de de lta mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong
386a5(rgyud): dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snyi/ snang po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod
386a6(rgyud): sems na/ de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shAkya'i bu mos 'tshe ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/ tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// 
386a7(rgyud): sgra gcan zin ni de'i tshe de'i dus ni/ khye'u chu'i gos shes bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u chu'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe nga'i
386a8(rgyud): dus na nya khrir gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yon snyam du khyod sems ni de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'o bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu waM
386b1(rgyud): po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nyi khrir gyur te/ gang dag ngas chu dang zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shing / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/ de bzhin ba
386b2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pa ste/ dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des nga'i gan du 'dir lhags te/ des na
386b3(rgyud): da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// rab tu dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus par chos mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan
386b4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par gyur/ rigs kyi lha mo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan de zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i
386b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na shing gi lha mor gyur to// rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe/ ngas ji ltar sems can
386b6(rgyud): mang po byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas te/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o// gser 'o/ 
386b7(rgyud): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chu 'bebs kyi nya btul ba sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// / rigs kyi lha mo
386b8(rgyud): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir lus yong su gtong ngo // de ji lta zhe na/ dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon+tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgya'i 'od zengs dang / 
387a1(rgyud): lha yul rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu
387a2(rgyud): bskor te/ yul lnga len gyi ljongasu rgyu zhing gshegs nas/ nags tshogs zhig tu byon pa dang / der des sngo zhing 'jam la mthing kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa
387a3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i sa phyogs shig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sprul pa/ kun dga' bo sa phyogs/ 
387a4(rgyud): 'di ni mdzes pa ste/ 'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtsha dan ma yod kyis/ da de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan thingangs shig/ de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin
387a5(rgyud): du gdan bting ngo // gdan bting nas kyang bcom 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdan bting lags na/ bcom ldan gtso bo mchog mi la// mchog stso la dam
387a6(rgyud): pa srid bcings grol/ bzhugs te mi la sman slad mthar bgyid kyi// bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs// dge slong
387a7(rgyud): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams lta bar 'dod dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
387a8(rgyud): la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po la/ bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing // blo gros dran dga' yon+tan
387b1(rgyud): dpag med gnas gyur gyi/ rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shong // de nas bcom ldan 'das phrag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang / me tog kam
387b2(rgyud): la gsar du kha bye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis sa'i ngos la brdabs te snun ma thag dus rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ nor bu dang gser dang dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de na
387b3(rgyud): byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun po la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo mchod rten 'di phye zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das / 
387b4(rgyud): ltar mnyan nas/ mchod rten phye ba dang / des der gser gyi 'phra can gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs pa dar g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog cig mthong ngo // 
387b5(rgyud): mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog cig mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
387b6(rgyud): za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye shig/ de bzhin du thams cad phye ba dang / des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang / me tog ku mu da dang 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo // mthong / 
387b7(rgyud): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rus pa dag gcig gda'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i
387b8(rgyud): rus pa rnams khyer te shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams
388a1(rgyud): bsnams te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du bzhag nas bka' stsal pa/ rus pa 'di dag yon+dan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog/ dul dang bsam gtan
388a2(rgyud): bzod par spro ba grag da pa mchog/ phyir zhing byang chub 'di la rtag tu blo gros ldan byas shing // spro brtan mos dang blo gros rtag tu sbyin la dga' ba yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
388a3(rgyud): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang / yon+tan gyis yongasu bsgos pa/ mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba
388a4(rgyud): bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag tsho la zhi/ ga/ de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ 2dun pa'i yid kyi rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to// 
388a5(rgyud): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po ni 'jig rten thad
388a6(rgyud): las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/ de nas
388a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
388a8(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba/ bzhon pa dang / stobs du ma dang ldan
388b1(rgyud): pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung te/ de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod do// sgra chen po dang / lha chen po dang sems can chen pa'o// 
388b2(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang / gzhonu de dag skyed mos tshal de'i yon+tan la chags shing / me tog 'dod pas phan tshun rgyu ste/ nags stug po chen
388b3(rgyud): po bcu gnyi su zhugaso// de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang / gzhon nu'i rim gro ba rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun dong ste/ kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen
388b4(rgyud): bo'i nags lhug po bcu gnyi su zhugs so// de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/ kho bo'i snying 'jigs pas non na/ 'dir bdag cag gcan zan gyis bsad du 'ong
388b5(rgyud): gis tshur shog/ lha chen pos smras pa/ bdag la 'jig/ nyes pa ni ma mchis na/ skye bo sdug pa dang bral ba snyam pa/ gyid pa'i snying du gyur to// sems can chen pos smras pa/ 
388b6(rgyud): thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir// bdag na mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi// shin tu rgyas mchog don chen snyed snyam te/ bdag gi snying 'di rab tu dga' bar
388b7(rgyud): gyurade nas rgyal bu gzhonu de dag nags stug po bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na/ stag mo bu byung nas zhag bdun lon pa zhig bu lngas bskor te/ bkres shing skom pas
388b8(rgyud): nyam smad nas/ lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra zhig mthong // mthong nas sgra chen pos smras pa/ kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di lta bu byung nas/ zhag drug gam bdun zhig la/ 
389a1(rgyud): par gyur lang ltar zas ma rnyed pas yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar gyur/ yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur// sems can chen pos smras pa/ nyon
389a2(rgyud): mongs ma 'di'i zas ci sgra chen pos smras pa/ 'di ltar gang sha sar pa dang / khrag dron po yod na/ de ni stag dang / dom dang / dred dang seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro// lha chen
389a3(rgyud): bos smras pa 'dir nyon mongs bkres pa dang / skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur pas/ srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/ rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis gnas 'dir zas skom tshel ni/ 
389a4(rgyud): mi nus na/ 'di'i srog yongasu srung ba'i phyir/ su zhig rang gi lus yongasu gtong bar byed cig gu/ sgra chen po/ des smras pa/ kye rang gi lus yongasu btang ba ni bya dka' ba'o// 
389a5(rgyud): sems can chen pos smras pa/ bdag cag lta bu sro ga dang lus la mngon par chags pa/ blo chung ba rna/ mas la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi/ gzhan lus
389a6(rgyud): yongasu gtong ba la zhugs pa/ gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni dka' ba ma lagaso// yang snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag/ lha yul dang
389a7(rgyud): ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/ gzhan gyi srog phyir 'thun par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// 'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam par brgya yis rtse// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de shin tu mi
389a8(rgyud): dga' ste// stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo // de nas sems can chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongasu btang ba'i dus
389b1(rgyud): la bab po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'byed mtha' ngan pa/ rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang // bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis
389b2(rgyud): ring bsrungs kyang // snga med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med// yang thams cad du mi gtsang bar gyur pas na// de'i tshe ba med kyis nga bdag gis de las bzang po la sbyar ba
389b3(rgyud): bya'o// de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang 'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyuraro// yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra ba srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud bzon pa// 'bras
389b4(rgyud): 'dra'i srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyisas gang ba 'di btang ste// mya ngan med cing 'gyur med phung med dri me/ bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis// kun tu gang ba'i chos
389b5(rgyud): sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par bya// de snying rje mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar brdul nas khyed gnyis gshegasu gsol// bdag ni rang
389b6(rgyud): gi bgyi ba zhig gi slad du/ nags stug po bcu gnyisu 'ju go zhes de gnyis skad do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/ stag gi gnas su
389b7(rgyud): song nas/ nags kyi yal ga la gos bzar te/ bdag gi 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs pa med pa zhi pa thob 'dod de/ gzhan gyis btang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros
389b8(rgyud): 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin// bdag gis skyon med byang chub rin med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog/ bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las
390a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po bsgral bar bya zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas sems can chen po stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang / de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i
390a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' la stag mos ci yang ma byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kye ma ho 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nuso snyam nas langs te/ snying brtse bas blo gros kyis mtshon cha
390a3(rgyud): btsal na gang nas kyang mtshon ma rnyed nas/ des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/ bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to// byang chub
390a4(rgyud): sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbusu son pa'i gya rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu ga yo so// nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'ong
390a5(rgyud): zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do// lha'i spros dang phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang phab bo// de/ nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang
390a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/ blo gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/ mi'i dbang po rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar ru sku 'dir btang bas ni// 
390a7(rgyud): skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi pa gnas kyi mchog/ zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes// de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus
390a8(rgyud): khrag gis sbags pa la bltas nas/ yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig las par byaso// de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas/ lha chen
390b1(rgyud): po la 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i rgyal po'i mthar thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma'ang 'od ni med gyur la// me tog char pa 'bab
390b2(rgyud): cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas ni// da bzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang thag/ lha chen pos smras pa/ de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smras la// bkres dang
390b3(rgyud): ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa// shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang // za bar chas la lta bas bdag kyang dogs// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de nyid rab tu mya ngan gyis
390b4(rgyud): non nas/ mche mas mig gang ste lam de nyid nas slar lo gas nas/ stag mo'i drung du phyin pa dang / gos thad ni 'od ma'i yal ga la gzar/ rus pa rnams ni bye zhing
390b5(rgyud): bral/ khrag ni rdzab du gyur/ skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'thor ba mthong ngo // mthong nas brgyal te/ rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas/ ring zhig lon pa dang
390b6(rgyud): 'du shes rnyed de langs nas lag pa sgreng ste/ nyam thag pa'i sgra byung ngo // kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang / de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma// pad+ma 'dra ba mig
390b7(rgyud): ring khyod kyis gar bzhag ces/ ma ni bdag cag la yang tha chung 'dri bar 'gyur// kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa phyogs 'di nyid du// sha ni legs kyis gson na de lta ma
390b8(rgyud): yin no// sems can chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/ pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bu gzhonu de gnyis kyis/ snying rje rje skad du rnam pa/ 
391a1(rgyud): mang por ngus nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal bu gzho nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su rgyug pa dang / cig gis cig mtho/ 
391a2(rgyud): nas/ gzhon nu ga re gzhon ga re zhes 'dri'o// de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ sdug pa dang bral ba rmis pa 'di lta ste/ nu ma gnyis bcad pa dang / so phyung ba
391a3(rgyud): dang thi ba'i phru gu skrag pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer ba mthong ngo // de nas btsun mos sa g.yos pas snying sngangs te/ mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/ 
391a4(rgyud): 'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab ba tu g.yo ci zhig gu/ nyi ma 'od zer med par gyur pas dra yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur bar ston// nga yi lus ni zhum
391a5(rgyud): zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcang rmis pa/ nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar 'gyur ram ge/ de nas de snyam bsams pa dang / bran mo
391a6(rgyud): yang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun mo la smras pa/ je mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhonu tshol zhing mchis na/ jo tsa stor ces gda'o// de skad ces thos ma thag tu btsun mo'i
391a7(rgyud): snying 'dar zhing / mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/ rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos// rgyal po yang snying 'dar zhing shin tu myos te/ kyi
391a8(rgyud): hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so// de nas rgyal pos btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir nga gzho nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis bzang mo mya ngan ma
391b1(rgyud): byed cig/ der gzhonu tshol ba la zhugs pa na/ skye bo'i tsho gas dag rong rong por gyur to// de nas ring por ma lon par rgyal pos rgyal bu gzhonu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba ma
391b2(rgyud): do// mthong nas kyang smras pa/ gzhonu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/ kye hud bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o// ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid
391b3(rgyud): ni mi bde ba/ mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin// 'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba 'am// mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci// de nas
391b4(rgyud): btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas// rnga mo gan du ba snun pa bzhin du shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo // de lta bu dag gsum ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/ me
391b5(rgyud): togs kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las// bdag gi bu dag tha chungs 'ongs par ma gyur na// bad ga gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha chungs de ga re de nas de gnyis
391b6(rgyud): lhags pa dang / rgyal pos bu la dris pa khye'u tha chungs ga re zhes gzho nu gnyis la dris pa dang / de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste/ rkan dang mchu dang kha dang / 
391b7(rgyud): so skam nas cang mi zer ro// btsun mos smras pa/ kho mos bu sdug tha chungs de ga re/ kho mo'i snying 'di gas la thug gyur cing / lus ni mi bzad rab tu bzir gyur te/ kho mo'i
391b8(rgyud): dran pa nyams 'gyur myur du smos// de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de bzhin du smraso// de thos ma thag tu rgyalo dang btsun mo myos par gyur te/ myos pa sangs
392a1(rgyud): nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ste/ de nas rgyal po dang btsun mos rus pa de dag sha dang khrag dang rgyus pa med cing / skra phyogs
