392a2(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshamasu 'thor ba mthong nas/ shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to// de nas nye phan dang blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/ chu dang ri ma la ya'i
392a3(rgyud): tsan+dan gyi 'de gus/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'i lus bsil bar byaso// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / 'du shes rnyed de rgyal po langs te/ snying rje rje skad du 'bod pa/ kye ma bu
392a4(rgyud): sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba// 'chi bdag dbang du ci de'i phyir myur du song // 'chi bdag ci phyir nga la sngar ma 'ongs// nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi
392a5(rgyud): 'byung / btsun mo yang myos pa las sangs nas/ skra zhi gtsong lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te/ nya thang la phyung ba bzhin so'i steng na 'gre ldog cing / ma he
392a6(rgyud): be'u skor ba dang / rnga mo rde'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje skad du ngu'o// kye ma sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di// su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor// yid 'ong mig ldan
392a7(rgyud): zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu// bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de rings 'dir bcom// kye ma sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong na// lus 'di ci phyir de ring zhig ma gyur// sdug bsngal
392a8(rgyud): 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pas// bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag/ de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gis nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcang // so yang phyung bas de rang
392b1(rgyud): bdag gi bu sdug de ni myung du ma rung gyur// bdag gis thi ba phrug gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin// bdag gi bu gsum ngag gis bskor ba las kyang
392b2(rgyud): gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer// kye ma sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no// de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje skad du rnam pa mang por smre zhing rgyan
392b3(rgyud): thams cad bkrol nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig du bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/ gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams phyogs 'dir bzhag go// kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i
392b4(rgyud): dus na/ rgyal bu bzho nu sems can chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam khyod sems na/ de de da ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe
392b5(rgyud): de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu sems can chen po zhe/ sa bya bar gyur to// kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug las yongasu ma grol ba
392b6(rgyud): de'i tshe yang / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal los ngas 'gro ba thams cad la phan btags na/ skyon thams cad dang bral te/ yang dag par rdzogs par
392b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnamasu bskal par gnas par spro zhing / skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam pa
392b8(rgyud): bsgralo// sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tsho gas du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa
393a1(rgyud): 'di dag gsung so// byang chub mchog 'di yongasu tshol ba na// bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste// ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur// de ltar ngas ni
393a2(rgyud): lus rnams yongasu btang / sngon gyi skye ba rnams ni rjes dran ste// shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal por byung // de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa// sems can chen po zhes bya dam pa
393a3(rgyud): yod// de la bu pho dag ni gnyis yod de// ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po// dpung tshegs de dag nags tshal lhug por dong // de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong / 
393a4(rgyud): de la sems can mchog 'di snying rje skyes// stag mo/ 'di ni bkres skom gzir bas na// stag phrug de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis// de ltar bdag lus dag ni
393a5(rgyud): btang bar bya'o// shing rta che bu sems can ches// stag mo skes mthong stag phrug rnams// thar bar bya phyir/ snying rje yis// ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa dang / 
393a6(rgyud): sa ni ri dang bcasu g.yos// bya tshogs rnams mang rnam par 'thor// ri dgas tshogs bskrag 'jig rten 'di// mun pas 'thibs par gnas par 'gyur// de yi bu pho
393a7(rgyud): sgra chen dang // de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis// nags mchog chen po dor ltas na// sems can chen po ma rnyed nas// shin tu mya ngan zug rngu'i snying // dran med nags kyi nang na
393a8(rgyud): rgyug/ nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing // gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu// sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po// rgyal bu gzhonu de dag gnyis// stag mo nyal chung gar nyal ba/ 
393b1(rgyud): der ni nye bar song ba dang // stag mo dang ni stag phrug gi/ stag gi mtshul khrag chags mthong // skra dang rus pa cung zad cig/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong // de yi khrag gi
393b2(rgyud): thigs pa ni// nyung zhing sa la yod par gyur// rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis// khrag chags pa yis de mthong // rab tu brgyal de sa de la// 'gyel nas yid ni nyams par
393b3(rgyud): gyur// lus rnams la ni rdul gyis gos// dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos// de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang // snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non// de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing // 
393b4(rgyud): lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing gnas// de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang // btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma// bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang // pho brang nang na bde 'jug pa/ 
393b5(rgyud): nu sor gnyis ka'i rtse mo nas// 'o ma khrag tu 'byung // zhing 'dzag/ de yi lus dang yan lag kun// khab/ kyis btsags pa bzhin du tsha// snying ni rab tu mya ngan
393b6(rgyud): gang // bu bral mya ngan drag mangs pog/ rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste// mya ngan rab gdung yid mi dga'// snying rjer sgra yis rab ngu zhing // rgyal po shing rta che la smras// 
393b7(rgyud): mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson// bdag lus mya ngan ma yis tshig/ bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas// 'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung // bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin
393b8(rgyud): tshe// bdag gi snying yang gas la thug/ ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni// phyin chad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas// bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rjes mdzod
394a1(rgyud): de bdag srog krol// de ring bdag gi rmi lam na// thi ba phrug gu gsum rnyed na// bdag gi thib dru gu ni// sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa// der ni khra mchis bdag gi
394a2(rgyud): ni// thi ba phru gu de khrag 'tshal// bdag gi rmi lam de 'dra yi// mya ngan snying 'dir rab tu zhugs// sems ni mya ngan rab gdung bar// bdag ni ring por ma thogs 'gum// 
394a3(rgyud): bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal// thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog rtsol// de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog/ brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur// dran pa'i dbang po rnam
394a4(rgyud): par nyams// sems kyang stor cing dran pa med// btsun mo'i 'khor tshegs thams cad kyang // snying rje'i ska dad kyis rab tu ngu// btsun mo dam pa brgya la gyur te// 
394a5(rgyud): sa la 'gyel pa mthong nas ni// de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de// bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non// blon po dang ni'o/ khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir
394a6(rgyud): dong // grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag/ tha dad khyim na byung zhing 'khod// ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag/ la kar snying stobs che de 'dri// bsod nams 'on te shi 'am ci// sems
394a7(rgyud): can chen po de gar song // bdag cag de ring mthong zhig gam// yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'// de ring mi snyan thos gyur cing // yul 'dir mya ngan mi bzang rlung // sgra
394a8(rgyud): mi phyin cing sgyu mtha' yas// drag po'i sgra bcas ldan zhig gam// rgyal po shing rta che langs te// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la// bdag nyid
394b1(rgyud): chu yis rgyun kyang 'thor// ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur ba// de srid du ni chu yis gtor// bdag bu gum 'am gson shig ces// zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed// rgyal po shing
394b2(rgyud): rta chen po yis// btsun mo mchog la 'di skad smras// blon po'i tshegs la 'di skad smras// blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang // gzhon nu rnams ni tshol phyir dong // khyod ni rab
394b3(rgyud): tu yid zhum zhing // rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed// de ltar shing rta chen po yis// btsun mi dam pa spro bsrings te// rgyal po pho brang nas phyung nas// mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin du// blon
394b4(rgyud): po'i tshegs kyis yongs bskor te// yid rab zhum zhing lus kyang zhan// srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang // ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug/ rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i
394b5(rgyud): phyir 'grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung // rgyal po byung ba/ mthong nas ni// rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang // rgyal po shing rta chen po ni// grong khyer nas byung de ma
394b6(rgyud): thog/ sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir// rgod pa'i mig gis phyogasu bltas// mge bregs yan lag khrag sbags shing // lus la rdul gyis gos gyur la// gdong la mchi zag du
394b7(rgyud): bzhin du// 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni// shing rta chen po'i snying la yang // rab tu mi bzang mya ngan gnas// ngu zhing gdong la mchim zags// lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug
394b8(rgyud): de nas blon po gzhan zhig gis// rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ong // 'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni// shing rta che la 'di skad smras// mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ khyod sras
395a1(rgyud): ying du 'ong ba mchis// ring por mi thogs khyod kyi glan 'dir ni// sgras mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod gzigs// rgyal po yang tsam lam du zhugs pa dang // de/ 
395a2(rgyud): nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs// rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing // mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sras gnyis ni// mya ngan
395a3(rgyud): me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog cig mi gda'// sems can chen po minag nyid kyis zon// skrag mo bu byung ring por malon pa// rang gi bu rnam
395a4(rgyud): za bar 'dod pa mthong // de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can/ ches// snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/ byang chub tu ni smon lam che btab pa// sems can
395a5(rgyud): thams cad bdag gis grol bar bya// byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la// ma 'ongs dus na bdag gis reg par bya// sems can chen po ri ngos gzas nas mcho
395a6(rgyud): stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te// yud tsam gyis ni lus la sha med byas// rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tshe lus// ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas// rgyal po shing rta
395a7(rgyud): chen po brgyal gyur te// sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur// mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzang 'bar// 'khor dang blon po snying rje'i skad kyis ni// ngu zhing mya ngan non ban+da
395a8(rgyud): de dag kyang // chu 'thor lag pa sgreng ste rab tu ngu// blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni// bdag gis de ring gzhonu gnyis po dag/ nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur cing // 
395b1(rgyud): sal 'gyel te sems kyang stor mthong nas// dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du mi// bdag cag rnams kyi chab kyis rab tu gtor// phyogs bzhi dag ni kun nas 'bar ba mthong // yung
395b2(rgyud): tsam 'greng ste slar yang sa la 'gyel// snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don// rtag par lag pasteng ste gnas nas ni// nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod// rgyal po de ni
395b3(rgyud): rab tu sems zhum zhing // bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs// mya ngan rab tu gdung zhing smre bsngags 'don// rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongasu sems// bdag bu sdug
395b4(rgyud): cing yid 'ong gcig pu ni// sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin// bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang // mya dran me yis srog ni zad 'ongs gis// 'di ltar bdag
395b5(rgyud): ni myur du deng song la// mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta ba/ ra byas// gzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i khro/ brang gi/ rgyal po'i khab tu myur du bkri bar bya/ 
395b6(rgyud): de dag rnams ni bskyed pa'i ma yi snying // mya ngan me yis gas par 'gyur du 'ong // bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur te// srog dang bral bar gyur pa ma yin no// rgyal
395b7(rgyud): po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor nas// glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song // bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing // nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ongs pa
395b8(rgyud): mthong // rgyal po'i bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su// rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni// de yis sbyin par la gor myur du yang // btsun mo la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan// shAkya thug
396a1(rgyud): pa de bzhi gshegs pa nga // sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi// bu ste sems can chen po mchog gyur cing // gang gi stag mo bde bar byas pa yin// rgyal po'i
396a2(rgyud): dbang po'i dam pa zas gtsang ni// shing rta che zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur// btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu mar gyur// sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin// rgyal bu lba
396a3(rgyud): chen po yang de bzhin du// de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin// stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che// ltag phrug rnams ni dge slong lnga por gyur// de nas rgyal
396a4(rgyud): po shing rta chen po dang // btsun mos snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas// rgyan thams cad bkrol te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus
396a5(rgyud): pa la mchod pa byas nas// sems can chen po'i rus pa 'di dag sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste// rin po tsho sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byaso// sems can
396a6(rgyud): chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongasu btang nas// lus yongasu btang ba 'dis/ phyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnamasu yang sems can
396a7(rgyud): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o// zhes smon lam de skad btab po// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag
396a8(rgyud): tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mchod rten 'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin// rkyen ni 'di yin no// mchod rten de yang
396b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de nyid kyi nang du bzhug so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stag mo la lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste
396b2(rgyud): bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
396b3(rgyud): gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs rtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs
396b4(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig/ tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong da phrag du mas de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin
396b5(rgyud): gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gan la brtsegs de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i sku mdog gtse ma'i gser
396b6(rgyud): 'dra ste// sku lus gser gyi mdog du rnam par gda'// gser gyi ri dbang lta bu gser gyi mdog/ thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser mdog can// bzang po'i mtshan gyi mtshan gyi
396b7(rgyud): sku lus rgyan// dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras// gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar// shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra// tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs
396b8(rgyud): po'i dbyangs// seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs// yan lag drug cu bsgrags sgra dri mang sgra// rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la bing ka'i sgra// shin tu dri med dri bral
397a1(rgyud): gzi 'ong mdzes// rgyal ba bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis rgyan// mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog/ rgyal ba yonan kun ldan ri rab 'dra/ 
397a2(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse mchog/ 'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la/ 
397a3(rgyud): 'dzud pa lags// 'chi ba med pa'i bde ba stsol ba ste// rgyal ba bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston// 'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste// bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas ge
397a4(rgyud): ba'i gnas// rgyal ba 'gro ba sdug bsngal thar pa dar mdzod// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol// / zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud// skye dgu rnam
397a5(rgyud): la bde ba kun stsol ba// khyod la de pi ni bgyi bar mi nus te// ji snyed 'dren pa'i yon+ta na ye shes mchi// srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang // byams
397a6(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang // khyod kyi yon+tan ye shes rgya mtsho las// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang // yon+tan thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par// 
397a7(rgyud): lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis// yon+tan mtsho las yon+tan thigs blangs te// de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshang// bdag gi bsod nams gang
397a8(rgyud): bsags de yis ni// sems can de dag byang chub mchog reg shog/ gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod
397b1(rgyud): pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i me tog stan las langs te/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu/ 
397b2(rgyud): gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mang+ga
397b3(rgyud): bar bstod do// thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya yi mtshan// dpal stong mdzes pa'i yon+dan rnams kyis rgyan// kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston// nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam
397b4(rgyud): par 'phro// 'od zer du ma 'bar bas 'od kyis khyab// kha dog sna tshogs dang bas rin chen 'dra// sngon po da// dar po gser dang bai DUr+ya// zangs dang rgya reng shel gyi 'od
397b5(rgyud): lta bus// rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing // zhing rnam sa bye ba du mar snang mdzad de// sdug bsngal mi bzad dra/ ga po zhi bar mdzad// bde ba mchog gis sems can tshe
397b6(rgyud): bar mdzad// mdog dang dbang po gsal bag blta na mdzes// gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye bo blta na dga'// rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes// bung ba mang pos
397b7(rgyud): gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra// thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// ting 'dzin byams po bsod nams dam pa bsags// dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan// ting 'dzin
397b8(rgyud): byang chub yan lag yon+dan rgyan// khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad// bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung // yon+tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis rgyan// zhing rnams
398a1(rgyud): bye ba dag tu lhung ste// me yi 'od dang 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes// ji ltar na mkhar nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin// ri rab lta bur yon+dan kun ldan par// 'jig rten
398a2(rgyud): khams rnams kun tu rab tu dga'// ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing // kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po zangs 'dra ba'i// tshems kyi phreng bas khyed kyi zhal mdzes pa// ngang pa'i rgyal
398a3(rgyud): bos bar snang ji bzhin no// khyod kyi zhi zhal 'tshams gnas zla ba 'dra// g.yasu 'khyil cing khong chud 'dra ba lags// bai DUr+ya 'dra sku 'od dkar rnams kyis// na mkha'i dkyil na
398a4(rgyud): nyi ma lta bur mdzes// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang porgyal po las// de bzhin gshegs pa thad la bstod pade'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// / 
398a5(rgyud): de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ rnam par dag pa'i chos la spobs/ 
398a6(rgyud): pa'i blo mnga' ba// las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing // srid dang srid min mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba// sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 
398a7(rgyud): kye ma'o kye ma'o// sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te// kye ma'o kye ma'o// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra// kye ma'o kye ma'o// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te// u dum ba ra'i
398a8(rgyud): me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon// sems can dag ni thams cad rje su gzung slad du// gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa// mi dbang nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po rigs
398b1(rgyud): kyi tog/ kye ma'o kye ma'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi// zhi ba'i dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs// ting 'dzin
398b2(rgyud): zab cing rdul dang bral ba ni// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dpyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs// de ltar nyan thos rnams kyis lus ni stong pa ste// rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyis gnas
398b3(rgyud): pa'ang stong pa lags// chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na// sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal to// rtag par khor zug du ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid/ 
398b4(rgyud): rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid// rdzogs pa de'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du// rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid// bdag
398b5(rgyud): ni rtag tu dogs sar dbus mo btsugs nas su// rgyal ba/ 'i gzugs kyis skom pa'i mya ngan sems// 'dren/ pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid// bdag
398b6(rgyud): ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong ba rab tu skom// mya ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar gyur// mthong ba'i chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol// bdag ni khyod kyi gzugs
398b7(rgyud): la blta bas rab tu sgom// thugs rje'i char gyis bdag la rab tu sim par mdzod// 'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rje mdzad du gsol// zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni bdag la
398b8(rgyud): sprul du gsol// khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba skyob pa ste// 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags// sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/ 
399a1(rgyud): na mkha' 'dra zhing na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags// sgyu ma mig sgyusgra dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra// 'dren pa khyod ni stong pa tshe dang ldan pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'dra/ 
399a2(rgyud): gdan las bzhengs te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi lha mo legaso khyod yang legaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rigs
399a3(rgyud): kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang // lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa lha mo de dag thams cad dang / lha mo dpal la sogs pa/ lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams ca
399a4(rgyud): dang / rnam thos kyi bu la sogs lha'i dbang po de dag thams do cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
399a5(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bstod do// gis ra 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las ba sdus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
399a6(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa ha sra pra/ 
399a7(rgyud): mdzan sU tra/ bod skad du/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis blo/ 
399a8(rgyud): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul shing sngon pa rab tu snang ba'i nags tshogs na/ dge rje
399b1(rgyud): gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe
399b2(rgyud): dang ldan ka ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes ko'u ngi n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ki t+ya'i bu chen po dang / 
399b3(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
399b4(rgyud): dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzang dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ldeng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
399b5(rgyud): dga' bo'i bar de la sogs pa'i dge slong stong nyis pa rgyu lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag nga thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan
399b6(rgyud): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras na bza' dang / bshos dang gzims cha dang / bsnyun gyi gsos sman
399b7(rgyud): dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/ bla mar byas/ sti stang du byas/ mchod par byaso// yang de'i tshes yang cher g.yos par gyur/ sprin 'dus pa chen po yang byung
399b8(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser 'chen po dang / sprin tshon ba las tshar ba chen po yang 'obab par gyur/ 'brug kyang dri ri ri zer/ glog kyang byeng / phyogs bcu yang 'khrugs
400a1(rgyud): par gyur to// mun pa mun nag chen po yang byung ste/ skar ma rnams kyang mi snang / nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyang 'od dang mi ldan par gyur te/ lhan ner ma yin lhang
400a2(rgyud): der ma yin zhing 'od mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por 'jigs pa de dag byung ba dang / yangs can gyi li tsa byi kha cig gi grong gzhan dang
400a3(rgyud): grong khrir gang yin pa de dag gdon 'byung pos btab par gyur/ grong gi gzhon nu rnams dang / rtsis mkhan rnams dang / blon po dang blon po chen po dang / 'khor na gnas pa dang / 
400a4(rgyud): bran po dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / mngag pa dang / g.yog kha cig kyang gdon 'byung pos btab paragyur/ yul yangs pa can gyi ljongs kun gyi dge slong
400a5(rgyud): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnam sa kyang 'jigs skrag dngangs te/ spyi bung zhes byed na sa kha gnam du bltas te ngu 'bod cing / sangs rgyas dang
400a6(rgyud): chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag kha cig ni tshangs pa la phyag
400a7(rgyud): 'tshal/ kha cig ni brgya byin la/ kha cig ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal/ kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / 'phrog ma dang / nyi ma
400a8(rgyud): dang zla ba dang / gza' dang skar ma dang / ri dang nags cho gas dang / sman dang shing ljon pa dang / klung dang / lteng ka dang / mtshe'u dang rdzing bu dang / rdzing dang / mchod rten gyi gnas na gnas pa dag la
400b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i gnod pas/ 'jigs pa'i gnas nas ji ltar thar bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing 'khod pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi las 'phagra/ 
400b2(rgyud): pa'i spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
400b3(rgyud): gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur nas lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dad par gyur te/ 'dus par gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ 
400b4(rgyud): mngon par 'du mdzad do de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa da dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / rgyal po
400b5(rgyud): chen po bzhi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnaMs dang / gan/ da sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po stobs po che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma
400b6(rgyud): bu dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nub mo 'das pa dang / dag pa lta bu'i bya rgod phung po'i ri la bdag gi kha dog dang mthus snang ba chen pos snang ba byas
400b7(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshig gcig dbyangs gcig/ 
400b8(rgyud): ngag gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad de mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'bar ba'i gser dang 'dra// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// dpal ldan rnam thos bu bzhin pa// 
401a1(rgyud): rin chen rnams kyis 'byung gnas lags// seng ge glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros// glang chen myos pa bzhin du gnon// gser gyi ri bo dang yang mtshungs// 'dzam
401a2(rgyud): gling gi gser rgyan 'dra// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// na mkha'i zla ba dri med bzhin// nyam thos dge 'dun rnams kyis dbus// mtshan rnams kyis ni rgyan par
401a3(rgyud): gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di// thub pa la ni skyabasu mchi// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// srung ba dus nye bar gnas// sangs rgyas snga mas bshad pa yi// stong
401a4(rgyud): chen rab 'joms mdo sde 'di// kho ra khor yug ri mthi' da bar// mtshams gcod pa'i dam pa lags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu
401a5(rgyud): mchog khyod la// chos kyi rgyal po thub chen la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa yud tsam cig cang mi gsung bar dgongs nos/ 
401a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag gang khyed kyi 'khor nga'i 'khor la 'tshe bar sems pa de ni tshul ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i 'jig rten 'dir
401a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas byung ba dang / chos legs par gsungs pa dang / dge 'dun legs pa sgrub pa de la sa bon 'di btab na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
401a8(rgyud): rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur// de la 'jig rten de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas lce'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis las sbyo'i
401b1(rgyud): ris gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ rgyal po dag kyang dmag rnam bzhi dang ldan pa nas gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho la thug
401b2(rgyud): pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen por chos kyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur te/ de dag la yang bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mtsho gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ tshan po che'i stob
401b3(rgyud): kyi shugs bdog pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa stong 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bas na 'jig rten 'dir rnam pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
401b4(rgyud): bar khyed snying las chung ngus gnas pas gnas par gyi das shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan la das langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dngus
401b5(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'ad sa ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btude/ bcom lnga na 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
401b6(rgyud): bdag cag la grong dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhan med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / bsil khang dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / ngar gyi lda ldi bzang zhing mdze/ 
401b7(rgyud): pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / dril bu dang / mu tig gi dra bas yongasu bskor ba dang / pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs pa dang / me tog gis gtor ba'i khyim dang / gnas dang
401b8(rgyud): khang pa chen po dag mchis te/ der bdag cag bud med brgya phrag stong dag gis yongasu bskor cing 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan par gyur nas gnas te/ btsun
402a1(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rab tu myos pas bag ma mchis par gnas par gnas pa na/ 'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcu kun tu 'byer zhing
402a2(rgyud): skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas ma thag pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ bgegs
402a3(rgyud): 'gum par bgyid/ gsod par bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag gis 'khor bzhi'i mdun du bdag cag gi 'khor gyi mtshan
402a4(rgyud): ma bstan par bgyi'o// gang gi 'khor gyi gdon byung ba de/ ra rgyal po chen po de'i gzugs mchod rten dang ba/ ces pa chen po bgyis te/ nad pas rgyal po chen po de'i
402a5(rgyud): ming nas dbyung zhing dri sna tshogs kyis rang gi lag nas bdu ga par bgyi'o// dog sa la me tog bsil ma bkram ste/ zhugs mar bus la mchod rten de la mchod pa
402a6(rgyud): bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ phyi phyir rgod cing 'jigs par 'gyur/ 
402a7(rgyud): smra bar bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur// de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur// yang na shin tu na bar 'gyur// rtag tu gyen du blta bar 'gyur// skar ma dag la rnyeg par bgyid// nub mo shI
402a8(rgyud): tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'dar zhing sgra 'byin te// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// snang ya the dan/ sid+d+ha/ su sid+d+he/ sa te a re/ a re
402b1(rgyud): ba le ma hA ba le/ dzan+te/ dzi Ti le/ a kha ne/ ma kha ne/ kha kha ni/ kha rarene/ hir br-i gA le/ ti mi gi le/ ti mi gA lI mi ma ga le sahA/ bdag gi sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig
402b2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i ming dang / stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung stan las langs te/ bla
402b3(rgyud): gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso

402b7(rgyud): a khe na khe/ bi na khe/ ban+te/ ba rA N+De/ tsa pau le kha khe/ ba kha ne/ ba kha ne/ a khi le/ na khi ne/ ba hA le b+ha ge/ b+ha gan+da le/ ba she ba sha brti ni swA hA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gi ming
402b8(rgyud): dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gdon thang las thar bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal ba chen po 'phags skye bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrog pa gcog tu sa

403a2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yi dgas gral bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ shin tu skom pas 'debs par
403a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ g.yeng bas btab cing blta bar 'gyur// bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur// kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem skra
403a4(rgyud): dang se mo ring ba ste/ dri ma can la dri mi bda'// berdzun da dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig ma dachis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ 
403a5(rgyud): s+yA the daM/ kha kha kha me/ kha la ne/ kha lo me/ kha ra li kha ra le/ ka ra khe ka shi ne/ ka ra ste/ ka le/ ka mA ni/ ba ba le bi d+he ya sha ba ti sha mi/ sha mi ni swA hA/ rgyal po chen
403a6(rgyud): po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang / gnod pa tha~Md zhi bar gyur swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang sten las langs
403a7(rgyud): te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal wI
403a8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu mdab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shi dbug
403b1(rgyud): kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang glang bar 'gyur// rdul zhing dbu ba kha chu 'byung // phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur// kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste/ de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par
403b2(rgyud): 'gyur// se mo dag kyang ston par 'gyid// dog sar mchis shing bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgron po bdag la gson// srad ya tha dan/ kra ka ye/ kla ga

403b5(rgyud): dang ldan zhing / mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya che/ na po yang dag par bsgrag so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo

403b7(rgyud): a sang gi/ khaD+ga ba te/ ba la nir+m+mo She/ shU re/ shU re d+ha re badz+ra Shibadz+ra d+ha re/ staMm+b+he dze b+he dri D+ha sA re/ bi rA dze bi g+ha se/ bi rA grA pra p+te/ a ra Ne d+harma yuk+te/ di shi bi g+hu Sh+Te sA hA/ de bzhin
403b8(rgyud): pa'i mtshan dang / stobs dang dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas// 'jigs dang / 
404a1(rgyud): skrag dang sngangs gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'khod par gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs ni lpags pa rnams// sngangs 'khrugs rong rong por gyur nas// phyogs
404a2(rgyud): bcur rab tu 'byer byed cing // sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dge smra// kye ma rigs sngags rigs sngags che/ 
404a3(rgyud): stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// thos nas 'byung po skrag gyur te// dper na rab tu 'bar me dang // til mer ngar btags ral gri bzhin
404a4(rgyud): go'u mas ni rab bshad pa'i// rigs sngags spu gri so dang 'dra// drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa// de lta dgang zhig ma dad na// de yi bu yi thu bo ni// tshangs pa'i
404a5(rgyud): zhags pas med par 'gyur// me ni rab tu 'bar bya/ sa la// bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhir yang // sgra na sreg gi ni chus gtor te// nas dang nyung kar blangs
404a6(rgyud): nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me yi nang du blugs par bya// legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas// gal te myur du mi gtong na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba
404a7(rgyud): ni/ mar dang nyungs kar mer blogs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba mi rnyed de// de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni// 'bras chen nad kyang 'byung
404a8(rgyud): bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyi btab pa na// sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhan yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi/ 
404b1(rgyud): khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te// 'byung po mang po tshogs pa na// stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du// zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// 
404b2(rgyud): stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la// gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje 'chang khros te// spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur// spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis// de yi lce ni ga
404b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis// de yi sna dang rna ba gcod// 'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bos// klad pa rab tu bsheg par byed// tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis// de yi
404b4(rgyud): snying yang 'joms par byed// rnag dang khrag ni dron mo da ga/ de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rigs sngags zhugs pa'i chad pa yis// rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na/ 
404b5(rgyud): 'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid ni 'khor ra 'gyur// rgyal po chen po dpal ldan pa// phyogs pa zhi dag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te// 
404b6(rgyud): bzang po'i khri lo 'dug pa ni/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// dpa/ 
404b7(rgyud): dang gzi brjed 'bar ba yin// rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang // de tshe ston pa thad mkhyen// bar stong gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang // 
404b8(rgyud): de ni rdo rje'i gdan la zhugs// de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tsha lo// dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra// gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang
405a1(rgyud): mtshungs// me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas// sa la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas// nyi ma dang 'dra zla nya la// skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin// thub sku gser
405a2(rgyud): gyi kha dog la// mtshan rnams kyis ni yongasu bskor// 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yi so// 'jig rten sgron ma stod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// 'jig rten
405a3(rgyud): skyong la 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis// rjesu bstan pa ma thob ste// gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang // rang sangs rgyas dgo 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'di
405a4(rgyud): los nyan thos rnams kyang ste// lha rnams dag kyang skye ba 'gyur// rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin// bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur// drang srong skal pa che
405a5(rgyud): po dang // dge slong bram ze 'di las skye// khyed cag snyingalas chung byed pa// mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur8// tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong
405a6(rgyud): gi tshi gi smras pa// tshangs pa chen po de bzhi no// thub pa chen po de bzhi no// bdag gis ri rab bskol byas shing // sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par
405a7(rgyud): sbyang ba nyid bya// zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas// nyi ma zla ba rlung rnams dang // skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang // bdag gi su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing // 
405a8(rgyud): 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed// de dag la ni thams cad du// phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de// 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de// 'byung po mi yi
405b1(rgyud): skye dgu la// gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa// 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol gnod pa ston
405b2(rgyud): por byed// rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor// kun tu chad pas bsdigs byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// yang dag par yang brjod par bgyid// gang
405b3(rgyud): gis 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dri bshad pa ni mi nyan pa// de dag chad pa bshad par bya// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde'o// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// phan
405b4(rgyud): tshun du ni bltas byas la// bai DUr+ya dang gser dang dngul// mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // sdug dang rdo yi snyed po dang // rin chen bdun gyis rgyan pa yis/ rtsibs
405b5(rgyud): stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas// 
405b6(rgyud): 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyi du dong // sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul bar ltung dang skud pa dang // zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la/ phyogs kyis ni
405b7(rgyud): ji snyed pa'i// 'byung po thang khrid shog ces// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun// phyog bzhi dag tu bgyi ba byas// stong chen rab tu 'jom pa yi// mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di// tshangs pa'i
405b8(rgyud): 'jig rten par du zung / lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po y-i lus kyis// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po 'atul/ lus dra po yi tshig thos nas/ gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon
406a1(rgyud): dgang phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyud// dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams// shar phyogs/ 
406a2(rgyud): cha ni 'khodar pa dang / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsnams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brlung // grul bu las byung gdon gyi rigs// lho
406a3(rgyud): phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub po 'byung po nyi shu brgyad // klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams
406a4(rgyud): nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas deng gra kun// bcing ba lde yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po ma rang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// gnod sbyin
406a5(rgyud): las ni gdon gyur pa// byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis/ bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// lus ngon po
406a6(rgyud): yi bu thu bo// kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gnyi ba/ 
406a7(rgyud): skyed pa po zhes rnam grags pa// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'o zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gsum
406a8(rgyud): po de yi ming ni gdon po che// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sprin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa
406b1(rgyud): de yi ming ni bum pa'i lto// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po/ 
406b2(rgyud): lag bzhi pa la stobs po che// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// 'byung po 'joms pa'i ri/ 
406b3(rgyud): la ni dang 'byung po thams cad lhags nas// rigs sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rigs sngags 'di ni kun tu bsams// chad pa mi bzang drag po ste// gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis
406b4(rgyud): gsungs// go'u ta ma gus par ni// thams cad de la skyabs su song // g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shig/ thams cad med par gyur ta re// de nas thang tsog tsam gyis ni// 'drud
406b5(rgyud): po mang po thams cad lhags// ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa da nga // rgya mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang // klu dang 'bab chu/ lu ma dang // dpa' klong dag na gang 'khod dang // skyes mos
406b6(rgyud): tshal dang // gzhal med khang / kun dga' dang ni nags rnams dang // mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas// ldan shing drung na gang gnas dang // grong khyer sgo na gang gnas dang // grong rdal dang ni ljongs
406b7(rgyud): rnams dang // rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang // gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang // dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang // de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni// mtshams dang sho gam gnas rnams dang / 
406b8(rgyud): khang stong dang ni 'grams dang // gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni// rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams// rdza rnga dag ni
407a1(rgyud): brdungs nas su// la las rnga zlum dag ni brdung // pi bang gling bu khar ba'i rnga// stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byin te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // glu dang gar rnams
407a2(rgyud): byas nas su// dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // b+ha ra dA dza skye dgu bdag/ ma ldan pa dang kun tu lta// mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang // tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges
407a3(rgyud): dang / skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang // lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang // dri za sna tshogs ste dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba khru mchog dang // de bzhin phung bu lnga zhes bya// g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang // nya lcibs
407a4(rgyud): dang ni ral gri bu// kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang //  breg gnas dang ni yid bzang dang // khab sna dang ni ri sul kha// lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzang dag/ sde dag dpung dang bzhon
407a5(rgyud): bar bcas// lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// nyin gsum pa'i spro byed dang // de bzhin bzhi pa/ 'i rims ngag dang // 'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa// gnod
407a6(rgyud): sprin srin po ma rungs rnams// phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nasu// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru// thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras// phyag 'tshal
407a7(rgyud): skyes bu dpar khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshalo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi ni mngon rgyug pa// 'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/ 
407a8(rgyud): lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa// rkang bzhi po dang rkang gnyis pa// rkang pa sgreng la spri'u tshugs dang // lus ngan mgo bo gcig pa dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi/ 
407b1(rgyud): pa/ ming mangs po la lus phyed dang // mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang // bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ lag pa sgreng la mgo btud dang // mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin bu
407b2(rgyud): rnams zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyi so// zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag/ zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang pa dang // zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha// rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang // mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// 
407b3(rgyud): sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa// mig mi sdug la kha glal ba// chu srin rtag gi gzugs dang ni// gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po// mchu 'changs po dang sau yon por// rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can/ 
407b4(rgyud): gsus po che dang bum rna bo// rna 'phyang ba dang rna ba med// lag ring dang ni rna ba ring // sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring // lus skam lus ni ring ba dang // ska rings rab tu rgyun pa dang // rkang bam mid pa
407b5(rgyud): phra ba dang // dri nga ba dang bum lto bo// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang // / gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto// gnam lto ba la rna bo che// / gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dam re// mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin
407b6(rgyud): po/ skem po sgur po bum lte bo// ri rab rtse mo bskul nas su// me mngag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang // sprin gyi tshigs kyi mdog 'dra ba// dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang // grul bum
407b7(rgyud): rnga bran rnams kyi rnams kyi sgra// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin// ming po che la bong bu'i sgra// nag po ser po sngon po dang // dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra// dmar
407b8(rgyud): po khrag gis bskus pa rnams// mi ro dag ni khyer nas su// za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug/ se rnon lag pa dmar po dang // mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang // lus phyeng dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma
408a1(rgyud): snying dang nang grol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang // byis pa dag ni za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyis// rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog
408a2(rgyud): keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yis// mi yi lpags pa thogs nasu// mi bzang dug gis kun bskus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par
408a3(rgyud): rgyug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed// de ltar de na rgyal po yi// gdon dang 'jigs pa
408a4(rgyud): chen po rnams// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams/ phyag 'amal skye zung 'byor ga phyag/ datshal skyes bu mchog khyod dgas mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshalo// chos rgyal
408a5(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// grong khyor grong dang yul 'khor dang // tshe/ brang 'khor na rgyu ba ni// gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'a phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba// lus chen 'jig
408a6(rgyud): pa chen po ste// stobs po che la sgra yang che// mgrin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams// 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon thogs rab tu
408a7(rgyud): 'jigs// sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs// rdo rje mdung rtse lag par thogs// rab tu drag pa'i dmag
408a8(rgyud): brgal nas/ phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed// sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi// gsang ba po ni dang kun kyang // mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin// sha
408b1(rgyud): khrag dron por bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// ma he ba lang bong bu rnga// glang po che yi gzugs 'dra ba// dom dang gzig dang spang ki dang / 
408b2(rgyud): khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang // byi la byi ba spre'u'i gzugs// bes dang phrag dang sre mong dang // nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs// kha cig dang ni sram gyi gzugs// khwa dang 'gu pa khro drug dang // bya
408b3(rgyud): rgod khra dang nya ming bcas// rma bya ngang ba thi bya dang // khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha cig bya gag gzugs rnamasu// gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong // mdab bzang bya yi tshul gyis
408b4(rgyud): kyang skye bo mang po skrag par byed// kha cig mi yi mgo can da la// lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra// kha cig ma na gyis rab tu 'tshe// lus dang bral ba dag tu snang /

409a1(rgyud): ngag gi ni lus rnams la// rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang // spu yi bar dang gnang rnams dang // de bzhin rma yi kha rnams// lhags pa de dag thams
409a2(rgyud): cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod
409a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang // de bzhin kho ra khor yug dang // bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin// spos dang ldan dang gangs kyi ri// sna tshogs brtsegs dang / 
409a4(rgyud): padz+ro pA// na la da yi ri gnyis dang // dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni// gang dag shin tu 'thor 'phags dang // ri bo da dedag kun la yang // lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag
409a5(rgyud): thams cad mi dga' zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed// bye ba stong gi lha ngag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha yi bu mo skal chen dag/ thal mo rab tu sbyar
409a6(rgyud): bar byed// thags zangs ris dang sgra can dang // sim par byed pa'ang der phyin te// lha min bye ba phrag stong dang // lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang
409a7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang // klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang // klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis dag dang // rdo rje blo gros pag shu dang // gang ga dga' bo/ 
409a8(rgyud): sin+ni mtsho// bya yi rgyal po mang ba bzang dang // rgya mi che chen po 'khrug byed dang // stong phrag bye de'i klu yi rnams// bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang // de dag bu mo skal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu
409b1(rgyud): sbyor bar byed// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang // skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// gser gyi me tog yan lag na// ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed pa// gso ba'i mtha' na mi thod can// 
409b2(rgyud): kau sa la na rab tu dkar// bzang po'i yul na kha spu can// gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin// lnga 'dzin pa na skrag byed pa// rta skye ba na mig dmar gnas// srung byed pa na ser skya ste// sems
409b3(rgyud): pan ni mig ser po// be'u la na bum pa'i lho// dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes// ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms// dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs// ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni// 
409b4(rgyud): brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// chos skyeng rab tu dkar ba dang // ser skya rab mdzes khyu ba 'jug pa// bum lto gsum pa zlum po dang // chu srin
409b5(rgyud): bden pa 'chang ba dang // lnga ldan rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che// 'ge ba bzhi can ste/ khas po che// sde pa rab tu 'dul ba ni// mthu bo che la stob/ 
409b6(rgyud): po che gshin rje gshin rje'i po nya dang // bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang // gnod sbyin bya ba'i g.yog 'chang ba// gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin// sha ri ta ni sder bcas dang // ri yi
409b7(rgyud): bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang // gdol ba mo ni gtum po dang // bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang // mi rdung nag mo
409b8(rgyud): kaR+sha ta// pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can// me tog so dang sa ga dang // srin me bong bu'i rna can dang // tsan+dan dang ni khyab 'jug le na// seng ge ser skya dmar ser po// glang po klu yi so can dang // ra
410a1(rgyud): shes drag po'i mche ba can// srin po so bzang yod pa dang // tshangs pa len dang khyab 'jug len// gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang // gnod sbyin rnam
410a2(rgyud): pa'i mchu can dag/ mdung dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing // mi rta ba lang ri dgras rnams// za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dong // sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar
410a3(rgyud): byed nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems// ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed// skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing // phan tshun nas ni 'du ba dag/ rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags// 
410a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bum dacho ga khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan
410a5(rgyud): snga ru de dag lhags par gyur pa dang // de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol// bang ga gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su// rgyal po'i gnas su sprul
410a6(rgyud): ba ni/ lcang lor ldan pa yid du mchi// de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can// lha rnams kun gyis bsams par gyur// phyir shin tu mthon po can// rin chen
410a7(rgyud): kun gyis rgyan pa lags// 'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste// gser gyi rgyus las bgyis pa lags// phyogs bzhi cog ni re re la'ang // gnod sbyin rdo rje 'chang ba dag/ kun nas rab tu
410a8(rgyud): gnas par gyur// lag na mtshon cha legs par sprul// rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo// bzhi po gtod par bgyis pa ni// gcig ni gser las rigyes pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul las
410b1(rgyud): bgyis pa ste// gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags// bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras// grong khyer de yi nang dag na// bskyed mos tshal gyis me tog rgyas// de yi nang na gzhal med khang / 
410b2(rgyud): rin chen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis// rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can// bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin// me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram// sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa
410b3(rgyud): lags// gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang // glu dang rol mes rab tu rgyan// dpal gyi dam pa nyam su myong // de ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor der// gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag/ rnam
410b4(rgyud): pa'i mchog kun ljon pa ste// chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa// srog chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// zas dadang skom gyis mi brel te// skye dgu mi zad gzhan dag ni// 
410b5(rgyud): longs spyod chen po tshol bgyid// phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam bar lta// grong khyer sgo yi gam yo dang // bza' shing ra ba nags tshal na// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs
410b6(rgyud): bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa// de dag thams cad mdo sde yis// zhags pas drangs te brlag par bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas gyur pa// bsil ba'i
410b7(rgyud): rdzing bus bskor ba ste// tsan+dan nags kyi 'khor ba legs// kun nas dpag tshad drug cu ste// khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag/ gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste// gnyis ni
410b8(rgyud): dngul las bgyid pa lags// gsum pa bai DUr+ya las bgyis// bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu// lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste// drug pa rdo yi snying po lags// bdun pa sdug
411a1(rgyud): las bgyis pa ste// brgyad pa rin chen bdun las bgyis// bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang // de dag re re kun na gnas// ljab lbub sna
411a2(rgyud): tshogs mchog dag dang // cha byad sna tshogs mang pos rgyan// glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis// de lta'i rab tu dga' ba yis// bde zhing tshim pa'i
411a3(rgyud): yid gyur cing // de na bdag ni dgun skyems dang // 'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas// bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing // phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed // bud
411a4(rgyud): med dag dang skyes pa dang // de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang / mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jigs par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs la'ang 'tshe// skar ma ngag dang
411a5(rgyud): nyi zla dang // gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid// lo tog sa bon 'bras bu dang // me tog sman dang / zas skem dang // mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing // mthon
411a6(rgyud): po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid// 'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams// dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang // tshig gam zhig gam bsad phye ba// de kun 'byung po'i rnam par gyur// 
411a7(rgyud): sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang // bzlog par bgyid cing rgong par bgyid// 'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid// dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid// sdig pa'i rmi lam
411a8(rgyud): mthong bar bgying // nyal ba dag la gnod par bgyid// sgo nas se gol skra phyung zhing // mi snyan brjod da za bar bgyid// mdza' bo gnyen gshes gzugs dag tu// gda' zhing
411b1(rgyud): bka' mchid smra bar bgyid // bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid// nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni// zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid// 
411b2(rgyud): rlung dang skar mnga' lce gzugasu// tshe la gnod par de dag gda'// skar mda'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyir// rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang // mchod
411b3(rgyud): rten dag ni gnas na 'da'// skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas// 'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin// gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer/ 
411b4(rgyud): dag dang khyim rnams kyi// sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed// / srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid cing // lam ngan ku/ na tu bskor bar bgyid// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // 
411b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // rnam po sna tshogs nad kyis rnams// lus la na ba gnas par ston// nang rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed
411b6(rgyud): 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dag ston// rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na// de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu// langs te thal mo rab sbar
411b7(rgyud): nas// zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba// gser gyi mchod sdong 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po// thub pa chen po me dang 'dra// gnod sprin gsang sngags mi bzad
411b8(rgyud): can/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag/ byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// byang phyogs dag na gnod par gyi// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yAd ya
412a1(rgyud): be das/ 'ang+ge kheng+ge/ khang+ka gar+b+he/ bi tsak+ShaNe/ tsakra rAdzane/ tsan+d+he/ tsab le/ b+hI ma rab te// kha rA gre gu Til ka ra gre/ a kA kI ba ga ba ti/ sA rag ba ti/ tsi traT+Ti/ 
412a2(rgyud): bdag byang phyogasu dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'brog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag
412a3(rgyud): gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang / 
412a4(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig/ phyag 'tshal skye das bu dpa' khyed la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag
412a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang // langs/ thal mo sbyar btud nas// me tog tshogs ltar rgyas grur nga // ka la bi / 'i sgra dbyangs can// khu drug dang ni rma bya'i
412a6(rgyud): sgra// rdza dang 'brug gi sgra sgregs pa// thub chen gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi// shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// shar phyogs pa la gnod par byed// 'jig rten
412a7(rgyud): mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag changad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yAng ya the dan// d+hA ra ninai d+ha ra Ni/ bad+ha na sa ni b+hany+dza ni/ pra b+hany+dza ni bi d+ha ma ni/ ki pu ru Shau/ sha ka le/ sA ra the/ shU la d+ha re/ 
412a8(rgyud): shU la d+hA ri Ni/ shud+d+ha tsar Ne/ g+ho Sha ba te shwa rA gre/ shAn+te/ bdag shar phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che/ 
412b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi/ 
412b2(rgyud): brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal
412b3(rgyud): skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes kyang // thal mo
412b4(rgyud): sbyar te de nas langs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad/ gzigs// smra ba thams cad rab 'joms pa/ bcom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'jig rten thams cad
412b5(rgyud): rnam 'dren pa// grul bum yi dgas srul po dag/ ste nga phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams// lho yi phyogs cha'i phyog/ sa na gnas// de nas byung la gnod par bgyid// 'jig
412b6(rgyud): rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// srud ya the dan/ shIn+ta shA ra ba ti/ kAn+ti/ kA ra ba ti/ kaM ka ra si/ ki ka ra ti/ kaM ba ti/ d+ha ra Ni/ bar+d+ha ni/ b+hU mi/ d+hA ra Ni/ hi ma pa ti/ 
412b7(rgyud): ti shwa ra Ni/ mA lA gri/ bdag lho phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sprin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu
412b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blangs par bgyi// de dag gis ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams
413a1(rgyud): cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swAn// drug 'tshal skyes bu dpa 'a khyod la// phyag
413a2(rgyud): 'tshal skyes du mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal po mig mi bzang ba yang // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs// sprin chen seng ge/ 
413a3(rgyud): chen po ga// che ba che ba rgya mtshom// gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po// g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa// klu dang mdab bzang gsang babo// stong phrag drug curtsa bzhi dag/ nub kyi phyog
413a4(rgyud): cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung la gnod par bgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad ba ba dedag gis bshad// s+yAd ya the dan/ d+harmi ba ra gre/ ba la ba ti/ 
413a5(rgyud): ba li ni/ bi sha me/ bi ba shi/ sA ga re/ khA rI/ ka ba li tsaN+Da li// ra Ni nI rany+dza ne/ be d+hA ra Ni/ bal+la ma ti/ a tsa le/ bdag nu pa phyogasu dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin
413a6(rgyud): dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis// de
413a7(rgyud): ngag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 
413a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshalo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang // thal mo sbyar ba
413b1(rgyud): byas nas langs// tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa po// rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin// skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje// 'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa// gnod sbyin srin po gang / 
413b2(rgyud): gi rnams// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang // sa yi 'og dang bar dang steng // na mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag
413b3(rgyud): gis bshad// s+yAd ya thaM dan/ brad+d+he/ brAh+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma sa re/ badz+re badz+ra g+ho She/ badz+ra d+ha re/ s+thi te sA re/ a tsa le/ a ra Ne/ i Sha ni/ a rA Ni te/ shU re/ kha rA gra bAp+te/ sA ra ba te/ 
413b4(rgyud): bdag phyogs thams cad du dge bar gyur cig swAhA// sa pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dang dang drug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / 
413b5(rgyud): 'phrogam bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog s+ho sa dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis/ de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug
413b6(rgyud): stobs kyis kyang // nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigaso pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// rlung las glur dang mkhris las gyur/ 
413b7(rgyud): bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur// nang rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la
413b8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ 
414a1(rgyud): rnams ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / grong
414a2(rgyud): dang khyim nas sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin gyi// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas
414a3(rgyud): ba'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ni dper na sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa/ gso ba
414a4(rgyud): la brtson pa/ sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa da rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin/ yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin pa nas sems can gcig gi
414a5(rgyud): don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ba'i phyogs de dag tu mi rnams dang / mi ma yin pa dag kyang
414a6(rgyud): rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya bar sems kyis/ nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs pal po che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur/ 
414a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyu ro// snyam du dgongs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang / sham thabs banabs nas lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge
414a8(rgyud): slong steng nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shong du gshegs pa dang mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan
414b1(rgyud): 'das la g.yas rol tu phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom
414b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yab cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ 
414b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 
414b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i ga dugs dag blangs te/ nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul
414b5(rgyud): yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyes par bya ba brnyes na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs
414b6(rgyud): gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shing du babs te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po gal ba der gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin tu mdzes pa/ 
414b7(rgyud): dang par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul ba dang / zhi gnas kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ dbang po dben zhing khugs pa/ glang po chen po
414b8(rgyud): lta bu shin tu dul ba/ mtshe ltar dngas zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par rgyan pa/ dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus
415a1(rgyud): shin tu rgyan pa/ shing sa la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par smras pa/ nyi ma lhur 'od zer gyi du ba kun tu 'gyed pa/ mtshan mo mun/ 
415a2(rgyud): pa'i nang na ri bo'i spol me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lha me/ lhan ne/ ljang de rgyang ring po nas gnas der gshegs pa
415a3(rgyud): mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas/ sems dang bar gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen
415a4(rgyud): por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de phyags shing chag chag 'debs/ byi dor byed/ me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lnga ldi dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / 
415a5(rgyud): bdan sna tshogs kyis rgyan te/ 'dug spos sna tshogs kyi sa gdugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de re dang ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo/ 
415a6(rgyud): thos phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi sathil 'khor lo rtsibs steng dang ldan pa'i rim can/ me tog pang+gA'i snying ba ltar 'jam pa/ snron legs par spyad pa'i ma
415a7(rgyud): gyis rgyan pa/ gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer rabs lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer rab rgya drug mang po kun tu 'phro ba/ drim med pa'i phyag gis li tsi byidag gi
415a8(rgyud): mgo sa thugs te/ rjes su bstan pa mdzang // de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs nas/ nam gyi phung thun la so skyes kyi gzhi nabs kyis mnan/ 
415b1(rgyud): nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos bsil te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
415b2(rgyud): bsnyen ma 'am/ gang su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang / stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams/ 
415b3(rgyud): cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / 
415b4(rgyud): klog cing ston pa dang / kun chub par byed pa la yams nad da dang 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang /  'khrugs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba
415b5(rgyud): dang / kha mchu dang / shags dang / tha na phra ma dang / sni ga pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs sha / 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur// 
415b6(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo
415b7(rgyud): gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags/ 
415b8(rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa de'i phyir khyed legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod
416a1(rgyud): la bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldams kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
416a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// s+yAd ya the dan/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sA ra ma tsa le/ pra kri ti ber+Na/ prakri ti nir+g+ho She/ sa man+ta/ mu khe/ s+thi ra/ s+thA ba re bi g+huSh+Ta/ sha b+h+re/ bra ga la ne/ pA rang+ga me/ 
416a3(rgyud): sA rA su te/ sA rang+ga ba te/ ba le ma hA ba le/ ma hA nir+t+ti se swA hA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus su rtogs pa dran pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu
416a4(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi pa dang / bsam gtan pa ni dag / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 
416a5(rgyud): rjes su dran pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa dang / mthar gyi/ sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin
416a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa ma chas kyi sa cho me dang / nas dbyung ba dang
416a7(rgyud): rngubye ba rjes su dran pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang / tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal
416a8(rgyud): mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gAng+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ sangs
