422a3(rgyud): bi laM be/ ba le/ ba la ba ti/ tsan+de/ tsa ra Ne/ a mri ta ni N+Do She swA hA// rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur// bang kan las gyur 'dus las gyur// nang rnams thams cad rab bcom ste/ 
422a4(rgyud): bdag la rtag tu dge bar shog/ byad dang ro langs dang ldan pa ra'i las rnams la skyes pa 'am/ bud med gdugs zhag dag bsnyung ba bgyis pa/ rab tu khrus gyis/ shin tu rgyan
422a5(rgyud): pa des dog sa la me tog sil ma bkram te/ spos sna tshog/ sa kyis gdugs la seng ldeng dang / rgya shugs rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te/ sa ben thams cad phyogs
422a6(rgyud): bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zhugs kyin du'ang gtor bar bgyi'o// rtsa ba thams cad dang me tog thams cad tshen skud sna tshogs la brgyus te ral gri'am/ mdung rtse gsum pa 'am/ mdung ngam mnga'
422a7(rgyud): la gdags par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs sbyar te/ bum pa chen po'i nang du blugs la/ gang byang stams kyis phog pa de skud pa des bcings te/ bum pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/ skung
422a8(rgyud): ba yang ral gris bcad de shugs kyis nang du dor ro// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang / 
422b1(rgyud): tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyong // gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // de dag mthu dang gzi brjid kyis// ro langs
422b2(rgyud): las rnams chad gyur cig/ rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang // me yis bud shing sreg pa dang // rlung gis sprin ni 'thor ba dang // nyi mas nags tshal skems byed pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis
422b3(rgyud): byang stems las rnams tshig par shog/ spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis// sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal// tad+ya g+ha shu me hu me/ ka kha li/ ka kha li/ kha ra le/ dzuH ni/ dza ba
422b4(rgyud): le ha ra gre ha ri ni sha ba ri/ shAn+ti/ pra shAn+ti/ sAhA/ d+hU ba ni swA hA pra d+ha ba ni swA hA/ gAn d+ha ra b+he sAhA/ ba la/ nga gi ni swAhA/ sarba kA khor da ts+tshe da ni swAhA// lha thams
422b5(rgyud): cad kyi gsang sngags 'di dag gis bdag gi byad dang / ro la ngas dang / sman dang / sngags dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma rnams bcad do// bshigo/ pham par byas// pha rol
422b6(rgyud): bam par byaso// swA hA/ lba ba dang / shu ba dang / spro ba dang / 'bras dang / 'brum bu dang / kom po dang / dug 'thungs pa las thar par 'tshal ba shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ shin tu rgyan bstan pa
422b7(rgyud): bzang po'i steng du mchis te/ rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom dag gis mthu dag dang / gsang sngags 'dzin/ 
422b8(rgyud): pa thams cad dang // shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // mo'u dga' bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni// 'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // ko'u ngi rtsa'i sngags thob dang // kun da/ 
423a1(rgyud): bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i na rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po stobs
423a2(rgyud): ngag dang // sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis// bdag gis dug ni dug mang shog/ dug med dug rnams 'jig byed pa/ 
423a3(rgyud): gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags// s+yAd ya the dan/ ha ri ke shi ni kai le/ e hi raM/ a ma re/ at+ne re/ baN+Di ka Ta ke/ ke sU re/ ha se ha sa ha sa~M/ kha se kha se kha se/ khA ra gai/ ma ru ga ha ni swAhA/ mra/ 
423a4(rgyud): mu kA swA hA/ hi le swA hA/ mi le swAhA/ 'bras dang rma dang shu dang / g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang // ldog pa dang nigadaya' ba ni// bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom// 'dod chags
423a5(rgyud): zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten drug gsum ste/ bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga'// sangs rgyas gzi yis dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// 
423a6(rgyud): de dag 'jig rten dug gsum te// bcom ldan chos ni dug mi mnga'// chos kyi gzi yis dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun
423a7(rgyud): dug mi mnga'// dge 'dun gzi yis dug bcom mo// sa ni dug gi ma yin te// sa ni dug gi pa yang yin// bden pa'i bden tshig de dag gis// bdag gi dug ni dug med sheg/ dug ni sa yi nang du song // gang
423a8(rgyud): ba'i snod du drug song shig swA hA// de nis khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal bas thog mar mchod rten
423b1(rgyud): rten chen po la mchod pa bgyi'o// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pa ma mdzad/ chos ma yin ni chos kyis so// 
423b2(rgyud): dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pam// dbang pos lha yin pham par gyur// lha min rnams kyis zla ba pam// nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho'o// me yis shing rnams pham par gyur// chus ni me yang
423b3(rgyud): pam par 'gyur// rlung gi sprin rnams rab tu pham// rdo rje yis rin chen phug/ lha rnams bden par rab tu gsungs// sa yang bden par gnas pa lags// sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang bden/ 
423b4(rgyud): bden pa rgyal gyur rdzun ma lags// s+yA ya the dan/ a mr-i te/ a gra puSh+ma/ ba hu pa le/ ni bA ra Ni/ sarba ar+tha sA da d+ha ni/ a pa rA dze te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra ni/ gu trA bar te/ gau ta ma/ 
423b5(rgyud): gu b+ha ma ti/ dzam+b+ha ni swAhA/ pra dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/ ba la pra b+hany+dza ni swA hA/ dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ dza ya bi dza ye swA hA/ phyir rgol ba ni kun las rgyal// sdig pa thams cad rab tu
423b6(rgyud): pam swA hA/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs// mi 'khrugs pa dang snang mdzad spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rin chen 'od 'phro ri rab mu khrung 'od dpag med// rdo rje
423b7(rgyud): rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu gzung na ni// 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin non par mi 'gyuraro// gang gis mthu stobs chen po brgyad po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams rje su gzung ba'i phyir na rab brjod
423b8(rgyud): cing /  kun tu bskyab pa byas na de yi lus la ni// me dang drug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur// gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas// gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas
424a1(rgyud): pa las// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rjes su dran na ni// mtshon cha de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing 'brul// gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par gyur na yang / lag pa
424a2(rgyud): chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// sngan chad byas pa gang yin pa ni ma gtog so// lha rnams kyis 'thun par tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs
424a3(rgyud): rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bden pa rab ston thub pa khyed la phyag 'tshalo// deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi// bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'bras
424a4(rgyud): bur bcos gyur cig/ de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen gyis// langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas// stong chen rab tu 'jo dmas byed pa// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di// byis
424a5(rgyud): pa rnams la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du// rig snga gas rab tu ston mdzad pa// chos kyi rgyal po snang mdzad pa// sang
424a6(rgyud): rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshalo// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang // tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang // sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to// gang dag
424a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang // drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong // lha rnams ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de kun mi yi 'jig rten na// 'di las skyes pa sha sta go/ thub chen mang
424a8(rgyud): la 'tshal ba yi// gnod sbyin srin po 'di na mchis// rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus// bstan par yang ni mi nuso// gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang // gang gi mngal ni mi gnas dang // skyes pa bung
424b1(rgyud): ming 'dru ba na// dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid// mer mer po dang nur nur po// bu yis bon ma rung bgyid// gang yang mngal ni thur du gyur// sha ma mi 'byung gnos bgyid pa// de rnams kyi ni ming
424b2(rgyud): brjod kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// 'jam pa po dang ri dgas rgyal// skem byed brjed byed khu tshur can// ma mo dang ne dze mi ka/ 'dod pa can dang nam gru dang // srul po dang ni ma
424b3(rgyud): dga' byed// bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang // bzhin rgyan dang ni mig 'byung ba// de dag thams cang sa la rgyu// gdon rnams bco lnga de dag ni// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid// 
424b4(rgyud): ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yis// mtshan dang gzugs kyang ba brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa pos ni zin gyur na// mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid// ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na/ 
424b5(rgyud): skyugs pa mi bzang skyugs par 'gyur// skem byed kyis ni zin gyur na// skem byed pas ni byis pa 'gul// brjed byed kyis ni zin gyur na// 'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin// ngang/ 
424b6(rgyud): bi dang ni kha chu 'dzag/ khu tshur can gyis rab zin na// khu tshur 'chang zhing 'byed par bgyid// ma mo yis ni zin gyur na// rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin// dza mi kas ni rab zin na// nu zho nu bar
424b7(rgyud): mngon mi dga'// 'dod pa can gyis rab zin na// mal na gnyid log ngu bar 'gyur// nam grus rab tu zin gyur na// lce la sos ni 'cha' bar bgyid// srul pos rab tu zin gyur na// ku tsa
424b8(rgyud): 'don cing sgra yang 'byin// ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur// bya yis rab tu zin gyur na// mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gnya' lag can gyis
425a1(rgyud): zin gyur na// mgul ba rab tu 'gag par 'gyur// bzhin rgyan gyis ni zin gyur na// rims kyis btab cing 'khru bar 'gyur// mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur
425a2(rgyud): na/ skyigs bu dang ni sngam pa 'byung // byis pa ji ltar skrag bgyid pa// de yi gzugs ni brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgas 'dra// skem byed
425a3(rgyud): pa ni gzhon nu'i gzugs// brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra'o// khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs// ma mo de ni ma yi gzugs// dza mi ka ni rta yi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi/ 
425a4(rgyud): yi gzugs kyis te// srul po phag gi gzugs kyiso// ma dga' byed pa byi la'i gzugs// bya ni mngab chags pa/ zugs kyiso// gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs// ban/ 
425a5(rgyud): rgyan 'ug pa'i gzugs te// mig 'phyang ba ni pha bang gzugs// 'di dag byis pa skrag par bgyid// 'di dag pu'i phrog ma rungs pa// byis pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa/ 
425a6(rgyud): mdo sde'i zhags pas drangs nas ni// 'di dag shin tu dgug par bgyid// gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni// dri za tsan+dan zhes bgyi ba// yi ge phyag rgya de srul de// song la gdon ni drag po pa// bco lnga de
425a7(rgyud): dag khug shig ces// bo nyar yang ni btang bar bgyi// de dag rnams ni skad cig gis// bcing ba lnga yi bcing bzhin bkug/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po la// tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// srog/ 
425a8(rgyud): chags sa bon 'jig bgyid pa// 'byung po 'di dag rnams lhags te// mgon po yi ni spyan snga ru// 'di dag chad pas bshang par bgyid// bud med gang dag pu mi 'tshal// gang zhig btsas pa 'dzin
425b1(rgyud): 'tshal bas// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// bslab gzung dam chos skyabs mchis la// mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi// khrus bgyis shin tu rgyan nas ni// sa gzhir yungs kar
425b2(rgyud): gtor nas su// me tog spos kyis rgyan par bgyi// sna lnga'i tshon gyi skud pas ni// khor yug du ni bskor bar bgyi// nam phyed bar du mchis nas ni// spyi bor yungs kar bzhag nas su// tshangs
425b3(rgyud): bas rab tu byas pa te// tshangs pas sprul ces brjod par bgyi// lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni// gzhon nu rnams la phan bgyid pa// tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yi// rig sngags 'di la gang
425b4(rgyud): 'da' ba/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// mgo bo tshal ba bdu dan du 'gas// s+yAd ya the dan/ aM ge/ baM ge/ b+haM ge/ d+ha ba te/ i nan+de/ sU la ri/ gi ri ga ba ri/ sha ba ru/ ga ru Ni sha
425b5(rgyud): ru Ni/ gi ri/ ga ba re/ lo tsa ni/ lo sa naM/ ro tsa ni/ a la d+haM/ a~M ga ne/ a la~M b+he/ ta la b+he pra kaR+Sha NI swA hA// ma na bde bar gangs kyu'i// dbang po yang dag 'phel bar shog
425b6(rgyud): mngal na 'dug par bder gyur cig/ btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur cig/ mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dus bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog/ tshon skad sna tshogs rnams dang ni// yungs kar
425b7(rgyud): 'bru ni ma grugs pa// de dag srung bar gsungs pa ste// byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/ de nas ston pa kun mkhan gyis// rig pa'i sngags ni 'di dag gsungs// mngal na 'dug pa srung bar
425b8(rgyud): sheg byis pa rnams ni bder gyur cig/ s+yAng ya the dan/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+ha/ bo d+ha a nu ma te/ pha li na~M/ ba hU pa le/ shik+ShA shik+Sha/ sA ra ba te/ sa ra ba te/ sA ga le du rA sa de/ du rA ga
426a1(rgyud): me/ sh+yA brad+d+he/ shU rab te/ b+ha ge/ b+ha gA b+ha ke/ bA ge ni ni bA ra Ni swAhA// de nas gdon ni bco lnga po// rtag tu khrag la 'thungs rnams kyis// 'jig rten mamo/ 
426a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// grong ngam khyim bam grong khyer ram// gang na legs par gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni bzhugs pa der// byis pa rnams ni 'chi ma gyur/ 
426a3(rgyud): thub chen khyod ni ji bzhin du// rjes su 'thun par 'jug par bgyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshalo// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur
426a4(rgyud): cig/ grub par gyur cig/ rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/ tshangs pas bsam par gyur cig swA hA/ dr-i nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bla gros phrag pa
426a5(rgyud): gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stong chen po rab tu
426a6(rgyud): 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid pa nges mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o// mchod rten mchong ba la brtson par bgyi'o// 
426a7(rgyud): tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga'i dus su mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas rig sngags klag par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad kyi tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag rgyal po chen
426a8(rgyud): po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems par bgyid// ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid ngo // tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyingad // ming nas kyang 'don
426b1(rgyud): bar bgyid do// tshes bco lnga'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po dag nyid sems par bgyid cing nas kyang gdon par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde
426b2(rgyud): 'di len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa/ de ni srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par bgyid lagaso// btsun pa bcom
426b3(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang / zas dang mal cha dang / stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mi 'brel bar bgyi'o// sems can thams
426b4(rgyud): cad kyang sti snying bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon bo dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang / rim gro bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs
426b5(rgyud): can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' bdag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi/ 
426b6(rgyud): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te/ lus gtsang ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / yo byad khyad par can gtsang mar bgyi// yul ngan
426b7(rgyud): ba rnyed par mi bgyid/ yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bsten par mi bgyi/ yul ngan pa na gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o// gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong
426b8(rgyud): chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/ de la rgyal po chen po ban po dag nyid srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
427a1(rgyud): de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/ gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gum/ nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par/ 
427a2(rgyud): bsams na/ de la lo gcig gi bar du mi ma lags pas klags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyi ba'i 'o su 'gyur ba lagaso// gang stong chen po
427a3(rgyud): rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / phal ba gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 
427a4(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la sman pa'i slad 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa/ de do dgu pas gsang sngags kyis tshig 'di dag rab mchog
427a5(rgyud): gtso bo khyad par du 'phags pa/ dam pa/ zab pa/ rgya che ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ 'jug par dka' ba/ thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ni chos kyi
427a6(rgyud): phyag rgya lags so// de nas dbang po mig stong po// lha yi rgyal po bde sogs khyod/ thal mo sbar te phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol/ 'jig rten kun la
427a7(rgyud): phan bgyid pa/ rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs// gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi// rig sngags bdag gi brjod par bgyi// shing sha me tog a pa marga dang / ka ta ka yi/ 
427a8(rgyud): 'bras bu a ga ru// / rdo dreg dang ni sed btsong rnams dang // sU ka ri dang dzA ya mirga ti// pa ri be la sa ra bi ra dang // sa ma ka dang bus rgya spos dang // tsan+dan a brta ka ru rta dang // sder mo lo
427b1(rgyud): ma ka ta ma pa ra dang // pri yang ku dang 'bru gsug smig bcud dang // yungs kar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni// shing tsa shu dag gur gum shing kun dang // lo ma dag dang ldan pa'i brna ka/ 
427b2(rgyud): de dag sbyar te reng bur bgyis pa ni// gdon rnams kun las grol bar bgyid pa ste// 'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la// mig la de yis bskus pa bgyid na ni// de nas 'byung po rdo rje
427b3(rgyud): dang / gnam lcags mda' yis zin las thar// ldo shing tshe dang de bzhin du// mchod rten che la bskus bgyid na// gang gis gnas de mthong ba de// 'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis
427b4(rgyud): der ni 'byung po mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lag so// rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang // rnga bran dag la 'ang bskus na ni// de dag sgra ni gar grags par// 'bru
427b5(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur// grong du rgyu ba'i byan mas kyi// mngab ma ngag la bskus na ni// yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag tu// byed gang du mchis pa der// 'byung
427b6(rgyud): po rnams ni mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lag so// chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am// gang dang gang du bor yang rung // de ra ni dpag tshad khor yug tu// bde ba dang ni zhi bar 'gyur
427b7(rgyud): pha rol dmag tshegs nang mchis te// mtshon cha dag ni 'bab pa ni// gnas rnams kun tu blugs bgyis na// bang blag du ni thar bar 'gyur// lba ba dang ni gzhang nang dang // me dpal dang ni
427b8(rgyud): 'bras byung dang // gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas// 'thungs sam byugs na thar par 'gyur// lus la de yis byugs na ni// byang snga mas thams cad gcong par bgyi// rtsong pa rnams
428a1(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur// rgyal po'i gyod las thar bar 'gyur// ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur// dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur// bu ma mchis pa bu
428a2(rgyud): rnyed 'gyur// nor ma mchis pa nor rnyed 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yang // 'dis ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa dang // ljon shing rnams kyi
428a3(rgyud): 'bras bu dang // rig sngags 'chang ba thob la yang // 'di ni zhi ba'i las dge byed// 'di la gsang sngags tshig mchis te// dper na dbang po'i tshig bzhin no// sang ya the dan/ e kra me/ bi kra me/ 
428a4(rgyud): b+hU ta g+ho She b+hu taM/ ga me/ da ha ni d+ha d+ha re/ d+hA ra d+ha re/ da d+hi ni/ da ni kha me/ kha kha me/ kha ga ga ga/ sA raM ga me/ tsan+d+ra/ tsadab le/ ha li me/ ha le/ hA rA Nau swA hA// phyogs thams cad nas/ 
428a5(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA// de na sa tshangs pa dbang po dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyu ga che// gnod sbyin snga dben thams cad dang // 'breg ma bu dang
428a6(rgyud): bcas pa yang // thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas// sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol// nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba po// zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba// lha mar bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// khyod dang 'dra
428a7(rgyud): ba yod ma mchis// legs bsam so legs par sbar na ni// gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa// rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba// rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba// steng chen gyi ni 'jig
428a8(rgyud): rten na/ srung ba'i mdo sde dam pa lags// phyag 'tshol skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid du ni mo snang gur// de nas bcom ldan
428b1(rgyud): 'das nub kha'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde long shig/ chongs shig/ 
428b2(rgyud): lhogs shig/ ston cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong
428b3(rgyud): dag nga'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na de la lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par
428b4(rgyud): shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la dge slong
428b5(rgyud): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa dang / rma bya chen mo dang

428b7(rgyud): shig ces kyang bka' stsal la/ zas bsod snyoms la brten te rab tu byung zhig ces kyang gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms ni nyung / 'di ltar
428b8(rgyud): zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag
429a1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir su stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba des/ rma med pa'i nor gzungs zhes bya ba de
429a2(rgyud): bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir chongs shig/ des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe zas la mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam
429a3(rgyud): ba lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/ 'du byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med

429a7(rgyud): de bsregs la rin po che'i snod dam/ lcags kyi snod kyang rung chus khong ste me tog gis khyab par khrom la/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis gdugs te/ snod kyi nang nas skung ba de slar 'byor te/ 
429a8(rgyud): ma byung bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// de yang lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do// bram ze rnams kyis bslus na su// shAkya seng ge skyob pa la// dpal sbas kyis ni/ 
429b1(rgyud): dug can gyi// bsod snyoms ngag ni phul ba dang // de las de ni blangs na su/ ston pas dug ni bsad nas gsol// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su// zas ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar

433b6(rgyud): phub ma med dang dung can dang // longs spyod ldan dang dge tshul dang // kha na zho dang nor bu dang // pad+ma dkar po phyogs dag dang // stobs kyi sgyu dang dung rkang dang // la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog
433b7(rgyud): dang / klu yi rgyal po de dag la// nga ni rtag tu byams pa yin// gnas bcas chu sran kuM b+hi ra// de bzhin khab kyi spu dag dang // brang 'gro'i bdag po nag po dang // drang srong la yang dbyam so// 
433b8(rgyud): de bzhin rna ba tsha ba dang // shing rta'i bzhin la byams pa ste/ gzi can dang ni rab dga' dang // bad sa'i bu lang rtag tu// nga ni e la'i 'dab la byams// 'phyang ba'i tshul la'ang dbyams te// 
434a1(rgyud): mi min klu ni gang dag dang // de bzhin mi yi bla ma dang // klu chen tshol ba'i tshul can dang // btang zung zhes ni grags pa dang // klu gang sa la rgyu dag dang / 
434a2(rgyud): de bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang // gang dag par snang rgyu ba dang // gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang // mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa// de dag la ni ngartag byams// rkang pa med la dbyams te/ 
434a3(rgyud): rkang gnyis pa la'ang dbyams so// rkang bzhi pa la'ang nga byam so// rkang mangs la yang dbyam so// rkang medang la gnod ma byed nang gnyis pa gnod byed na ni nom byed/ rkang mangs nga la gnod ma byed/

434a5(rgyud): dbyamaso// sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'bru nga po dag ni thams cad kyang // thams cad bde ba 'ang/ 'a shig shog/ thams cad nang ni med gyur cig/ kun
434a6(rgyud): gyis bzang po mthong bar shog/ gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ byams pa'i sems la gnas na su// dug ni rab tu bsad par bya// srung bar yongasu gzung ba dang // de bzhin yongs su
434a7(rgyud): bskyang bar bya// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshalo// grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal// zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshalo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag

442b1(rgyud): ta le swA hA// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ lus ngan gyi ni bu bru bo// kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon/ phrugs su ldan na gnas pa/

443a1(rgyud): sgo drung na// 'jigs byed zangs kyi mdab ma can// brang gis 'gro na 'joms pa'o// 'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po// ser skya bo ni 'bru mangs na/ 
443a2(rgyud): 'phags rgyal na ni nor srung ba// srung byed na ni nor 'byor pa// gso ba'i mtha' na gso ba po// dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas// brang ba 'dzin pa chu mchog na// kun dga' 'chi med sa zhag
443a3(rgyud): na// mche ba dkar po dngos bzang na// mi brtan pa ni gzi can na// rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na// nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams gnas// smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes// 'jig rten

443a5(rgyud): ba mdun khang na// phreng ba srung na ri brtsegs pa// rta dmar na ni bzang po pa// ma rdzogs pa na thams cad bzang / snyem pa can na skyo ba po// ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go//

443b7(rgyud): snang byed zhi ldan na// sbrul gyi gdugs na dga' ba po// g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skye'o// gyen du 'gro na ba ku la// gang po snying po thob byed na// grong rdal tshel ba lnga mangs na// glang chen brjod pa
443b8(rgyud): 'du ba mchog/ chu lha'i yul na gzhu brtan po// g.yul 'gyed ldan par grong khyer rgyal// sgra ngan zhing ni gnod sbyin dang // gnyi dang rgyal ngan rgyal gnyin// gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na/ 
444a1(rgyud): gtum chen gser gyi 'od dpag can// gnod par byed dang don grub dang // 'byung bar byed pa nags na gnas// 'gro ba drug pa 'gro 'joms na// ka ba na/

444a6(rgyud): 'dzin dang gzhan brnyas dang // sgo ba gnas can rtag pa dang // dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag/ grags pa chen po bzang mdzes na// grong khyer snying por dgras dogs pa// mya nganas na rmongs byed pa//

444a8(rgyud): che'i yul gyis mtshams na// lngas rtsen zhes ni bya ba gnas// de la bu ni lnga brgya ste// sde po che la stobs pa che// lngas rtsen gyi ni bu thu bo// rgya yul gyi ni sa la gnas// phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba

444b2(rgyud): chos skyong ba// lag pa chen po ngan pa na// rnam thos bu yi bu dpa' ldan// rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // thog gar gyi ni yul na gnas/

444b5(rgyud): dang ldan na dmar ser gnas// ba ba da bskyed pa ba ra// 'dod ba sbyin na ma dang ldan// bu mo 'jug na rab sang ba// ka bu sha na nal ku ba// pha rol mtha' med dngul chun// nus pa'i
444b6(rgyud): gnas na zhi byed pa// ba lha ban thags zangs ris// ka ta ka na dmar ser ba// 'phral ras 'phel na bzhin rgyas pa// u rgyan yul na ma rungs pa// thong shol ngan na bum lto bo// chu srin rgyal
444b7(rgyud): mtshan mya ngan na// sna tshogs sde ni bo ka na// dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu// phung po'i bdag por dmar ser po// chung ma can na mthong dga' bo// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/ 
444b8(rgyud): yangs pa na ni gnas pa ste// brgya stong phrag ni mang ba yi// gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas// ba lang skyong ba sbrul gdug can// lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo ba// dga' ba'i grong na/ 
445a1(rgyud): dgur ba can// grong gi lhas na stabs chen gnas// wA las babs na rnam thos bu// rang gi sngoni yongs su spyong // ljang lo can na gnas pa ste/ 
445a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba// sde che ba stobs che ga/ pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa// thub par de/ 'a zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa/

460b8(rgyud): rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / 
461a1(rgyud): srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams
461a2(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun tu gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig/ le brgya 'tshe/ 
461a3(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ sdig pa thams cad sol cig/ dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig/ mi dge ba sol cig/ don rnams la snang bar gyis shig/ gnod pa rnams
461a4(rgyud): sol cig/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ nyi ma'i gu dang gi bde legs dang / nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs pa/ dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol swA hA/ kun dga' bo
461a5(rgyud): khyod kyis sgyu skar gang dag na mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnam sa kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ smin drag dang ni snar ma dang / mgo dang lag dang nam so dang / rgyal ni bkra shis pun
461a6(rgyud): sum tshogs de bzhin skag ste bdun pa ya ni/ de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar gyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongasu skyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags
461a7(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma ba chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang / de bzhin gri dang dbo gnyis dang // me
461a8(rgyud): bzhi nag pas ri dang // sa ga ste ni bdun pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag lce phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis
461b1(rgyud): kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang // de bzhin snron dang
461b2(rgyud): snrums dang ni// chu stod dang ni chu spang dang // de ltar gyi zhin gre zhin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun pa 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi spen gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su spong bar byed
461b3(rgyud): pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar sheg shig/ mon gru dang ni men gre dang // 
461b4(rgyud): bzhin khrums stong khrums spang dang // nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / 8/ bre nye do ni bdun pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang gi phyogs na gnas bdag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs srung
461b5(rgyud): zhing yongs su snang bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sdug sa kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ le brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog
461b6(rgyud): shig/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrid na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'brel ba dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi
461b7(rgyud): ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' ba sangs dang / gza' sbran pa dang / gza' mig dmar dang / gza' lhag pa dang / gza' lha min dbang po skra
461b8(rgyud): gcan dang / gza' du ba 'jug rings so// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no// skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te// rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / 
462a1(rgyud): sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag/ 'char ba dang ni nub pa dang // 'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu// 'jig rten du ni zang 'phel byed// gzi tshe rdzu 'phrul chen po
462a2(rgyud): dag/ rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis// rig sngags rje su yi rang byas// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya
462a3(rgyud): mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba dang / klung dang ri la gnas pa/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ dka' thub drag pa/ 
462a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ na mkha da' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod kyis zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
462a5(rgyud): chen pa g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ga na/ na phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba
462a6(rgyud): dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dre ba skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang
462a7(rgyud): sreng chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro/ 
462a8(rgyud): dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du
462b1(rgyud): bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nas/ 
462b2(rgyud): po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sde bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'bags po zhes bya ba dang / drang
462b3(rgyud): srong chen po yang dag 'bags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po
462b4(rgyud): bla ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang sreng chen po grung 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang
462b5(rgyud): drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po che/ byad 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ges ngan na sa bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba
462b6(rgyud): dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po pa ba sangs zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu
462b7(rgyud): khyad ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po smin pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen pos 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong / 
462b8(rgyud): chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rA zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gyur mod kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po skra'i bu zhes bya
463a1(rgyud): ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs bed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po
463a2(rgyud): go'u ta ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bi zhes bya ba dang / drang
463a3(rgyud): srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnams byed pa// gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod par 'dod pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ gzi
463a4(rgyud): brjid che ba grub pa/ pha rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ sten brgya mthong
463a5(rgyud): bar shog shig/ tad+ya thA/ hi ro hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ bu ri pu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi l-i/ mi li mi li/ si ri/ si ri/ rap+sA/ Dap+lu/ na p+lu/ gra sa ni/ ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ 
463a6(rgyud): da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ ba tsa ni/ bA tsi ni/ ta ba ni/ ta ba ni/ ha na na// da ha ni/ dAha ni/ da ha da ha/ da ha/ da la dA la ni/ ba Ta ni mo he na/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+hi ni swa ya d+hu swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sku
463a7(rgyud): dgu'i bdag po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'ab chen po rnams/ 
463a8(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i khyad par grangs med pa dag
463b1(rgyud): gis 'jig rten gsum du rnam par bzhag pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye dgu'i bdag po za tshul gyi bu dang / skye dgu'i/ 
463b2(rgyud): bdag po me dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang / skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang / skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye
463b3(rgyud): dgu'i bdag po zin po dang / skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de/ kun dga' bo skye dgu'i bdag po

463b6(rgyud): mi ri mi ri/ pu ri pu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ DapU/ Dap+sA/ Da Dap+lu/ gra sa ni/ tha ma ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni pa tsa ni/ bA tsa ni/ ta ba ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ dA phAn/ da ha da/

463b8(rgyud): ti/ be du ba ti/ si ri ba ti/ te dze pa ti/ te dze gra pa ti/ ye sho ba ti/ a sho gra ba ti/ a rAr+tha/ ta dA/ ta ra ta ra DA/ dan+ta/ dza ha dzi tA/ dze lA/ mai yA/ hA lA/ pA lA/ gu la hA/ ru tsi rA/ daM du r-I/ a ri ki tsi
464a1(rgyud): kaD+D+h+ya/ sha te ku rA/ bi pra li/ na ku li/ kir ga/ ta ra gI rAt+na/ a mA ma tiHm+b+ham ti/ ma d+h+yaH ti/ ka ma le/ bi ma lde ku/ le/ a b+hiHSh+T+rI/ du ti/ g+he/ bshwe / 
464a2(rgyud): bad sa nA b+he/ ma hA ga re/ tu lam+be/ du lam+be/ su lam+me swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / 
464a3(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bas

464a5(rgyud): zung shig/ 'di lta ste shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shi ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa

464a7(rgyud): ljon pa chen po rna ldan byed ces bya ba dang / shang ldan pa chen ba rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa tshon po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing
464a8(rgyud): ljon pa chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya
464b1(rgyud): 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ 
464b2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi
464b3(rgyud): rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jigs gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang
464b4(rgyud): ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa shri sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// 
464b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da lta/ ra bstan cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rig snga/ gas kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'od ni byang chub sems dpa' byams
464b6(rgyud): bas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rje su yi rang ba'o// rgyal po chen po
464b7(rgyud): bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi
464b8(rgyud): rang ba'o// klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang
465a1(rgyud): grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
465a2(rgyud): chen po lnga rtsen dang / 'brog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i
465a3(rgyud): gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas

465a6(rgyud): dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung po rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang /

465a8(rgyud): bas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ga rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs
465b1(rgyud): za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa
465b2(rgyud): 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// gshed byed dang / sbyar ba'i las dang / byang dang g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur dang / spyod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / 
465b3(rgyud): sgyuganyis dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes dang / sgo mnyes dang / smad pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang /

465b5(rgyud): drag po dang / 'byung ba'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// rims
465b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin po'o// klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ge mchus pa dang / mig nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na
465b7(rgyud): ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na pa dang / 'khur ba na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skyed pa na ba dang / brlan
465b8(rgyud): ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba las/ 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// shu ba dang g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdzed
466a1(rgyud): 'bras dang / pol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// nad thams cad dang dug thams cad dang / 
466a2(rgyud): sdang ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya
466a3(rgyud): ba ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byas na lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
466a4(rgyud): dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rungs par 'gyur ro// de sems ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i gang zag
466a5(rgyud): rnams bslus par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi sa kyang ga shu ra zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams
466a6(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyur ro// kun
466a7(rgyud): dga' bo su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na de bsad pa'i rig pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro// chang pas bcang ba'i rig pa ni gzhu gcog
466a8(rgyud): bso// gzhu gcog pa'i rig pa ni spro bas so// spro ba'i rig pa ni dem bca' bas so// dam bca' ba'i rig pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rig pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyuraro// 
466b1(rgyud): de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs te/ 
466b2(rgyud): mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no// bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro// bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra
466b3(rgyud): choms par 'gyur ro// smras pa med par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// bde bar yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 
466b4(rgyud): ma gtog so// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bkra dag par bya'o// des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char
466b5(rgyud): chen po ni gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am// gas kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid bar char 'bebs pa ra 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal me thub chen me
466b6(rgyud): 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang / dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba 'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyed kyi rig
466b7(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
466b8(rgyud): rma bya chen me dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'di kun chub bar gyis shig/ chongs shig/ ltogs shig/ tad thA/ yA ba ti/ d+ha ba ti/ d+hA ra ki/ hu lu/ tu lu me swA hA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang
467a1(rgyud): gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan drug med pa/ sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
467a2(rgyud): rnams/ de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa// chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ bcom
467a3(rgyud): ldan dge 'dun dug med pa// dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis// ngas ni bde/ 
467a4(rgyud): legs pa 'gyur ba byas// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal dmo rma bya chen mes dug bcom mo// dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
467a5(rgyud): ldan 'das la legaso zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lta ra mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos pa/ ga 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dge slong sa
467a6(rgyud): ri ga la bder seng ste byin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal me rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang ba byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / 
467a7(rgyud): zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcang ba dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
467a8(rgyud): bos srung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri de las/ sos so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la bder
467b1(rgyud): song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod/ 
467b2(rgyud): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan
467b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin du gsung ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho/ 
467b4(rgyud): chen po bzhi ni skam yang srid/ sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang sri dra/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la ltung yang srid/ krung ni rgyun las blo/ ngag kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du
467b5(rgyud): 'gyur mi srid ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang lnga/ na ba kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta/ khas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma ba chen mo 'di la 'khor
467b6(rgyud): bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan
467b7(rgyud): 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so// bcom ldan 'das
467b8(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
468a1(rgyud): 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
468a2(rgyud): kyis gsungs pal mngon par bstod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal me rmo ba chen mo gzungs rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan be shI lan+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na
468a3(rgyud): sid+d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa// 
468a4(rgyud): rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya ma yU ri pad+ma gar+b+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma ba'i yang snying zhes dbya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 
468a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// chos la byug 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra yis 'jigs pa 'am/ 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs
468a6(rgyud): pa'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ me'i 'jigs pa 'am/ chus 'jigs pa 'am/ 
468a7(rgyud): rlung gis 'jigs pa'am/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa
468a8(rgyud): 'am/ gdon gyis rin tam/ rims kyi btab pa 'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nang thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ in+d+ra ya/ in+d+ra ge mi si kA ya/ A sha ne bA sha ne/ 
468b1(rgyud): bA ba ni kA le/ ka bi la mit+te/ i li mit+te swAhA/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ nA rA ya Ni/ bA rA ya Ni/ ha ri ta/ tA li/ kun+d+ha li/ i li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti sA hA/ rig sngags/ 
468b2(rgyud): kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ ha ha hi hi hu hu/ kha rA/ ma rA/ kha hi kha ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ dgal bsrungs shig bslus shig/ le brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog/ 
468b3(rgyud): shig/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjed do// gter ma ri chen po la btang bar bya'o// des thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzog s+ho// 
468b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ A r+ya ma hA pra ti sa ra bi d+yA rA dzI/ bed skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ sangs rgyas dang
468b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skang bdag gis thos bi dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/ khang pa brtsegs brda/ 
468b6(rgyud): rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyis shing ljon pas legs par rgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzi gi rin po che dang / pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje
468b7(rgyud): chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng gis rnam par
468b8(rgyud): mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges
469a1(rgyud): par 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
469a2(rgyud): chu ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu che po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig zang
469a3(rgyud): cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya chen la zab cing yangs pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 
469a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa chen po'i dasprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang ga/ gzungs dang / ting 'dzin dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / 
469a5(rgyud): ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dngas dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / 
469a6(rgyud): btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / 
469a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang
469a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang
469b1(rgyud): dgra bcom pazag bzang ba/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'brul bsam gyis mi khyab pas
469b2(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba tshogs pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta
469b3(rgyud): ste tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa bskul
469b4(rgyud): byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byang dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab
469b5(rgyud): tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas ga/ tsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med/ brje/ da du med pa'i yang brjod du meng ba dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po
469b6(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
469b7(rgyud): dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang
469b8(rgyud): byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/ grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma
470a1(rgyud): dang / pad+ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
470a2(rgyud): g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po den thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 
470a3(rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig na mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sprin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sprin gyi rgyal
470a4(rgyud): bo g.yog du ma can dang / 'brog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo ba dun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la
470a5(rgyud): rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnam sa dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs kyi sa dang / 'byung po rnams dang / 
470a6(rgyud): bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyeng ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams
470a7(rgyud): cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba
470a8(rgyud): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang
470b1(rgyud): log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu
470b2(rgyud): rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha
470b3(rgyud): dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lte 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byed dang / brjed
470b4(rgyud): byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas da ba dang / gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa da ngag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub ka'i lha
470b5(rgyud): dang chung bar gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
470b6(rgyud): ni shin tu yongs su mthar byin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang
470b7(rgyud): sa ni brnyernyas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni sems can
470b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad
471a1(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang bas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang sgra dang / 
471a2(rgyud): tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgregs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / 
471a3(rgyud): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod
471a4(rgyud): ba las ni phyir ma log/ sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rgyan te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri tshon
471a5(rgyud): bo rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bdum sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin tu bstan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du
471a6(rgyud): ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i pang ba shams pa/ rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa/ rin po che ka ka ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil chen po dang / dun
471a7(rgyud): las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te/ kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par rgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam
471a8(rgyud): par rgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri
471b1(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par rgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang / dpag bsam gyi
471b2(rgyud): shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ 
471b3(rgyud): ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas
471b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zeradakyi dra ba dres stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dmas 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
471b5(rgyud): gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri bkod/ kha du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
471b6(rgyud): dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lnga dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
471b7(rgyud): thams cad dang thabs gcig tu chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
471b8(rgyud): phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'jom so sor 'brang ba yi// gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni thos pa tsam
472a1(rgyud): gyis kyang // sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// nad de cog las grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// lus
472a2(rgyud): can ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs// 'di yis srung ba byas na ni// lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni// 
472a3(rgyud): srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gre/ 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyeng par// 'byung ba'i tshigos rnams thams cad dang // dgra bo cag gis mi tshugs so// ming tsam
472a4(rgyud): bzung ste brjod byas kyang // bskem byed brjed byed smyo byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang // gdon rnams rab tu brla dag par 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// gzi
472a5(rgyud): chen mdangs rnams za ba dang / mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba// de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur// byang stems mi/ bzang gang yin dang // pha rol dmag tshogs bung bar byed// 
472a6(rgyud): sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol// dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs// mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// lce 'bab gleg gis mi tshugs te/ 
472a7(rgyud): dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur// rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur// gang / 
472a8(rgyud): gis rtag tu mgul ba 'am// lag par rig pa btags na ni// de yi dgos pa yod de cog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren/ 
472b1(rgyud): dang de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang // lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung // so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la// nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu srung ba
472b2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang // de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su// srung bar byed de the tsom med// brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa khyab
472b3(rgyud): 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che// sprin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshigs rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud ris gzhon rnams dang // drang srong gzi brjid gyi

472b6(rgyud): rdo rje po nya dang // nags pa bzang dang rdo rje nags// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rig pa lha me rdo rje phreng // bdud rtsi thab sbyar byed pa dang // gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// rna ba nag mo stobs chen me

476b2(rgyud): ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu me sa 'tshe ma bdag nyid ma'i nang du 'chongs pa dang /

477a1(rgyud): su song ste byin pa dang / rig pa chen po 'di brjod do// des de la lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug meng bar byas shing de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug
477a2(rgyud): bsngal chen po de las yongasu thas byas na rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byaso// bram ze chen po gzhan yang ji ltar yongs su
477a3(rgyud): shes zhe na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangasu chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po bA ra na sa na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/ de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ 
477a4(rgyud): des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bkon te/ grong khyer chen po bA ra na sa kun nas bskur nas gzhim par ba sha rimaso// de nas rgyal po tshangs byin de la blon po rnams kyis
477a5(rgyud): smras pa/ lha ba rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer 'phrogal thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gan ma bar bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsel zhes byas pa dang / rgyal
477a6(rgyud): bos khyed 'tsher 'grib chung ngur gyis shig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba yod de/ ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o// thal ba bzhin du bya'o/ 
477a7(rgyud): zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyi mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen po sngon bdag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// 
477a8(rgyud): de nas rgyal po tshangs pa byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo 'ang cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi sgra'i nang du bzhag nas rig
477b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te/ g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs su dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad
477b2(rgyud): na stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de gcig pu btang ngo // bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/ 
477b3(rgyud): mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to// snyam du bzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// phyi mo'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sem
477b4(rgyud): can che thung ba rnams dang bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / langs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur bar blta'o// bram ze chen po gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo
477b5(rgyud): 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag pa 'am/ mgul du btags na de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab sa par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
477b6(rgyud): skur rig par bya'o// rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par
477b7(rgyud): rig par bya'o// de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar ba 'od 'phrog pa'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de mi shigs po'i go cha can du rig par bya'o// de dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms
477b8(rgyud): pa rig par bya'o// de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o// de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes par yin te/ bram/ 
478a1(rgyud): ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/ ma byin par len pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'brog pa/ dge
478a2(rgyud): bdun gyi dang phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs rdzas gyur pa thams cad gang zag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig dus gzhan zhig na nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tsher ba myong
478a3(rgyud): po/ nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to// bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang dge slong dag la ba der
478a4(rgyud): song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal mo se sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bri das te/ dge slong de'i mgul du btags so// rig pa'i rgyal nga mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag
478a5(rgyud): tu tshor ba thams cad ni rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni ma ngas su thar te/ sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa da/ nga / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so// 
478a6(rgyud): lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis skang bu zhig la bzhago/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa
478a7(rgyud): bzhin du gnaso// dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de/ 
478a8(rgyud): bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to// mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad nge mtshar skyes nas chos kyi/ 
478b1(rgyud): rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do// sems can las las skyes pa yi// sdug bsngal mi bzang rab tu ni// shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha// sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na'ang
478b2(rgyud): sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'i// me ma mur de rab tu zhi// sog le rnams kyis bsheg ma mchis// spu gri'i sos yang gcod mi bgyid// lcags sdeng shal ma ri yang chag/ lcags zangs
478b3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi// ral gri lo ma can nags na// las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod // mi rnams la ni chos kyi ston// rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la/ khyod kyis
478b4(rgyud): brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can// chos dngos chos kyi rgyal po des// snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnam ngas kyi// 'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas// myur du 'di ni ci yin/ 
478b5(rgyud): smras 'dzini ci 'dra yang smros shig/ de nas mi bzang gshin rje 'i mi// gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis// chos kyi rgyalabo gshin rje la// 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras// mnar med rab
478b6(rgyud): tu nyam nga bar// sems can chen po 'di skyes la// gang gi ming ni mnar med pa// des na de ni nyam ngar brjod// gang gi sems can bde bgyis pa// rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs// 'dren
478b7(rgyud): kun tu bde gyur nas// slar yang lha yi gnas su mchi// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje kyang // mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni// 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste// 'di ni tshe rabs lnga lus tshe// ji ltar sku
478b8(rgyud): gdung brgya mang pos// ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar// so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas// de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes// de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po
479a1(rgyud): gshin rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lha ji ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi// chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa// gang gis tshig rnams se sor dran// de ni ngan 'gror / 
479a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba sgom pa yi// shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro/ sems can dmal ba'i srung ma khyod// rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong // der ni sgang bu mthon po la// lha rnams kyis ni
479a3(rgyud): bskor ba ltos// de mthong sems can thams cad la// byams pa'i semasu 'gyur bar gyis// de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo // de tshe der ni de dag gis// rgyal
479a4(rgyud): po'i pho brang nye ba na/ sgang bu de yi khor yug na// 'bar ba gci ngag gi sa gang bar mthong // mi ro zhig gi mgul pa na//  so sor 'brang ba btags pa'ang mthong // lha dang klu dang dri za dang / 
479a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis// kun nas 'khor bar bskor na/ sa ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed// de la gnod sbyin/ de dag gis// se sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags// de
479a6(rgyud): nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs de// slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par brjod do// de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshig de smras pa'i tha
479a7(rgyud): ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmal ba'i lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso// rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o// bram ze chen po nges na sngon chad yongasu
479a8(rgyud): shes so// de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar bzung bar bya'o// yi ger bri bar bya// bklag par bya'o// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la rtags na bcang bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal
479b1(rgyud): zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ ngan 'gre'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar 'gyur ro// glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so// glog gis ji ltar mi nus zhe na/ bram
479b2(rgyud): ze chen po sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun rdzi ba na/ tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba/ nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum
479b3(rgyud): tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bya bar grags so// de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya ming rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas// rnam par gzhig
479b4(rgyud): par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te/ 'brug sgra chen po sgrogo/ glog dang skar mnga' yang gtong ngo rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang bshams so// de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos
479b5(rgyud): sems non to// klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang glog dang / skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / nya ming de dag gi sa kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku tse'i sgra chen po bton to// 
479b6(rgyud): de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to// de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di
479b7(rgyud): skad smraso// sems can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros chen po nges/ tshong pa 'khrugs par
479b8(rgyud): gyur pa rnams la/ tshig 'di skad smras so// ma 'jigs ma 'jig tshong ba rnams/ khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang / khyed rnams sdug bsngal chen po yi// rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo// de nas
480a1(rgyud): yid ni brtan gyur nas// tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras// sems can chen po 'di ci lags// bgegs bral mur du bka' stsol cig/ blo gros chen po/ 
480a2(rgyud): khyod kyis mthus// bdag cag ji srid 'tshe ba'i tshe// ye shes tshe ba'i bdag nyid gsungs// slang na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi// de nas 'gron mang bdag po yis// de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod// ngal
480a3(rgyud): so sor 'brang ba yis// rig pa chen por grags pa yod// gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed// stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa// des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i// 'jigs pa che las ngas
480a4(rgyud): bsgral lo// de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo 'a di bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang // ri dgra ba'i rgyal me chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan
480a5(rgyud): gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya ming de dag thams cad kyis grung che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo // de nas klu ded/ ga byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas/ 
480a6(rgyud): mchod pa bya bar bshams so// nya ming de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to// 'gron po phal po che de dag kyang chen po de dag kyang klu
480a7(rgyud): chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por byin par byaso// de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen me ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ 
480a8(rgyud): bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen me zhes grags so// 'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcang bar bya'o// rlung dang / grang ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce
480b1(rgyud): 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs su thar bar byed de/ sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog
480b2(rgyud): chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs le tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang bya dang / gcan zan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam
480b3(rgyud): par 'jigs par 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo ma dang nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// 
480b4(rgyud): legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang // char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo // char dus su 'bab cing / dus ma yin pa mi 'bab par
480b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so// yul gang na ri/ ba'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa
480b6(rgyud): yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis mchod cing sti stang byas la/ tshen sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan
480b7(rgyud): gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba bas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pas sems can chen po de dag gis bsam pa
480b8(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste// bu po 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub/ mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/ mngal na bde ba
481a1(rgyud): skye ba dang / mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro// mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur/ cis mngon zhe na/ bram
481a2(rgyud): ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to// ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya ba de ni rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang
481a3(rgyud): nas ma'i nu zhol bzung ste/ nu zhe ngoms ngomasu 'thungs so// nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog du gyur te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur to// rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya
481a4(rgyud): bar btags par gyur to// gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i dgan du skye bo slong mo pa 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de lag dpa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sem
481a5(rgyud): dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do// rgyal po des kyang
