481a6(rgyud): skye bo slongs mo ba lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no// bsams pa tsam gyis slong me pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin to// bu po 'dong ba'i phyir lha rnams
481a7(rgyud): la mchod pa dang / sti stang char byas kyang bu po ma rnyed nas/ de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du sti stang bya bar brtsams te/ mchod pa dang / sti stang chen po byas so// 
481a8(rgyud): sbyin pa chen po sbyin te// bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so// bsod nams chen po byas so// sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul
481b1(rgyud): ma ga d+ha 'di nyid ni/ kyang yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer ku shi'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa/ tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos sems
481b2(rgyud): pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhag nas/ rig pa chen me so ser 'brang ba 'di nyid las brtsams te ches ston to// de nas mi dbul
481b3(rgyud): zhig gi sa chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o// chos kyang nyan to// gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos la mchod
481b4(rgyud): pa bgyid do zhes smras nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyi/ dang nyan to// dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des de nar gcig byin pa dang / des sems can thams cad yongs su
481b5(rgyud): bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu
481b6(rgyud): chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo// rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi bzad bar gyur to// de ltar bsod nams
481b7(rgyud): mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te/ lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su
481b8(rgyud): bstan te/ 'di skad du/ kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzus
482a1(rgyud): / chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin du bris la btsun mo dam pa spang ba byas la/ cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par
482a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po des de mtshan mo zang nas/ rtsis dang yi ge'i 'bru dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar
482a3(rgyud): gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te/ spang ba byas nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yang cho ga bzhin du bris te/ btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so// 
482a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so// / rin po che khyad par can yang sems can rnams la sbyin dab byin no// de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu po gzugs bzang
482a5(rgyud): pa/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa/ bram ze chen po de lta ra shes nas rig pa'i rgyal me chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams
482a6(rgyud): cad kyis mchod pa 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so// 'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no// gang gi tshe
482a7(rgyud): lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang / g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas/ pha rol pa ma
482a8(rgyud): par byas nas dge ba dang / dge bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no// bram ze chen po de ltar na sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ rig pa'i
482b1(rgyud): rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'di gang gis lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs
482b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par srung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang mi dang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze
482b3(rgyud): dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun tu phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos
482b4(rgyud): brjod cing mchod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das pa dadud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can dan po zhes gsung ngo // nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 
482b5(rgyud): de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po dmya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// de la lha
482b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng bar byed par 'gyur ro// des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/ rtag par rgyun du
482b7(rgyud): lus la bdags shing bcang bar bya/ rtag par rgyun tu yid la bya'o// kha ton tu bya'o// bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o// sdug bsngal ba dang rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang // 
482b8(rgyud): bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsang sngags kyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba
483a1(rgyud): rnams grub pa'o// oM a mr-i te / a mr-i ta ba re/ ba re b.rare/ pra ba re bi shud+d+hed+d+ha dz+wA la ban+d+ha swAt+ma/ oM a mr-i ta bi le kon gar+b+ha sa ma ra NI/ AkarmArmA
483a2(rgyud): hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o// oM bi ma le bi pu le dza ya ba re/ a mri te/ bi ra dze hU hUM phaT phaT sa~M hAM/ oM b+ha re b+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba la bi she d+ha ni/ ru ru tsa le hUM hU~M/ 
483a3(rgyud): phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM ma Ni d+ha ri/ badz+ri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad
483a4(rgyud): thabs gcig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsad sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// gsang sngags la di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i snying
483a5(rgyud): bo dang go cha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya sa btab pa'o// 'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na yi/ ger bri ba dang / tshig du 'den pa dang / klog pa dang 'chang ba dang
483a6(rgyud): gzhan la yang ston pa lta ci smos te/ de ni sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so// rjes su yi reng / lung bstan to// so sor
483a7(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog tu dkon pa'o// so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'i mang thos par yang shin tu dka' ste gzungs chen po 'di ni sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa
483a8(rgyud): stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa/ gzi brjid che ba/ 'od che ba yon tan brjod par che ba/ mthu che ba bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar
483b1(rgyud): ba'i bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa/ pha rol gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dug dang byang dang g.yengs byed kyi sbyor ba dang / gnod par bya ba dang drag shul du spyong ba dang / gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam
483b2(rgyud): par sbyong ba phyed/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa byed par mngon par dga' ba rnams la yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'dzin
483b3(rgyud): pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang 'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su sbyong ba'o// bram ze chen po so sor
483b4(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi/ bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang du thogs pa med do/ sten pa dgra las rgyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du
483b5(rgyud): thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po thob par 'gyuraro// ci mngon zhe na/ rig pa chen po bgegs dang leg 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sngon yongs su shes te/ 
483b6(rgyud): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu gzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang / gser dang rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon
483b7(rgyud): par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang po mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i
483b8(rgyud): tshe bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog dang bcas pa bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor ba/ gzugs sna tshogs mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgra mi snyan pa bdud
484a1(rgyud): kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul bar byin gyis rlob pa mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis char 'bebs pa/ mngon par sprul nas lhags te/ phyogs
484a2(rgyud): bzhi nas bskor nas bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang / gser dang / rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags
484a3(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig cing mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ rig pa'i rgyal me so sor 'brang ba chen me 'di yid kyis lan bdun brjod do// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshan mo so sor 'brang ba chen po 'di
484a4(rgyud): brjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
484a5(rgyud): ral gri dang / dgra sta dang zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / gsum pa 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tshig 'dra skad du gang dag bcom ldan 'das la gnod par byed pa/ bdud
484a6(rgyud): gnod sems can rnams zung shig zung shig/ chings shig chings shig/ gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig/ gnod sems can dang / gza' dang / bgegs dang / 
484a7(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad kyi sreg phye mar gyis shig ces 'dzer cing 'thon pa mthong ngo // de nas bdud de dag thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btul nas/ la las ni bslab pa'i gzhi
484a8(rgyud): rnams bzung nas/ la las ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o// de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'dren pa
484b1(rgyud): skyes bu chen po de dag mthong nas/ grong khyer de nyid du spa gong bar gyur/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams/ spobs pa dang / stobs dang / rtsal med par gyur cing / mnga' gzhu dag kyang chag
484b2(rgyud): nas bye ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab
484b3(rgyud): tu bskor to// pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so// bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pa
484b4(rgyud): tsam gyis sems can bsams pa yongs su dag pa rnams nga dang / gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
484b5(rgyud): byed do// bram ze chen po de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dra/ na pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o// yi ger bris te rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// ci mngon
484b6(rgyud): zhe na/ snga ma bzhin du nyon cig rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du mi zhig la nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la khyod kyis mi
484b7(rgyud): 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o// de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig du phyin nas/ ral gri shugs nas phyung ste bsang bar bshams pa dang / de'i
484b8(rgyud): tshe mi nges rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no// yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go/ sems can chen po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus/ ral gri
485a1(rgyud): me lce gcig tu gyur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to// de nas gshed ma'i mi ngag gis nges pa 'di rgyal po la zhig tu bsnyad do// de nas
485a2(rgyud): rgyal po de rab tu 'khrugs nas/ kye mi 'di dag sa phyogs zhig na gnod sbyin gyi phug yod de/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po sha rjen za ba gnas kyis/ der khrid de 'or cig ces bsgo'o// de nas
485a3(rgyud): mi de gshed ma'i mi de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi bug der bor ro// gnod sgron gyi bug der bar ma thag du de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid dga' ste/ mi sha bza'o snyam du brgyugs pa dang / de dag
485a4(rgyud): gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur dpa'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang thams cad spangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par mthong ngo // 
485a5(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khrid de sgo'i phyi rol du bzhag nas bskor ba ba bar brtsams pa na/ sa gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du
485a6(rgyud): snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po cher 'khrugs te spangs nas gal te de ltar na khyed cag deng la mi 'di chings te/ chu bor tsog ces bsgo ba dang / gshed mas mi de dag khrid nga chur bor ro// 
485a7(rgyud): mi de chur bor ma thag tu mi de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhin du chu med par gyur to// chings pa de dag kyang dum bur chad ngo // rgyal po de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig
485a8(rgyud): tshugs su bltas te/ kye ma'o mi 'ang ngo mtshar to// 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to// zhes smraso// de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/ kye mi khyod ci zhig shes
485b1(rgyud): zhes de skad smras so// mi des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las gzhan ni ci yang ma 'tshal te/ lha de ni de'i mthu lags so// rgyal pos smras pa ngo
485b2(rgyud): mtshar che'o// rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs// 'chi bdag nan thur rmongs byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs// sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol// nad dang sdug bsngal thar
485b3(rgyud): par byed/ rig pa chen me gzi brjid che// dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol// nad chen rnams ni bzlog byed pa// mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs// de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid
485b4(rgyud): kyis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo la mtsho/ dad nas mngon par bstod ngo // mi de yang blon thabs byin te/ rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang
485b5(rgyud): bskur to// bram ze chen po ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa che na po rnyed do// sems can gnod sems can thams cad kyis kyang
485b6(rgyud): 'gal bar mi bya'o// de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal po chen mo 'di yongs su shes te gang du yang thogs pa med do// de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o// bram ze
485b7(rgyud): chen po skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o// de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus
485b8(rgyud): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di'i cho ga ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod nyon cig/ sems can kun la snying brtsin
486a1(rgyud): phyir 'angs ni khyod la bshad par bya// gang gis sems can bde byed cing // nyam nga ba yi las las 'grol// nad rnams las kyang thar bya dang // bud med
486a2(rgyud): sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang // sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi// rma rnams gso bar bya byi ro// bsnyen gnas dag la gnas gyur nas/ rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la// sangs rgyas mchod la
486a3(rgyud): brtson byas te// byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed// snying rjes kun tu brlan sems dang // byams pa dang yang ldan gyur nas// rtag tu sems can thams cad la// phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya/ 
486a4(rgyud): tsan+dan dang ni gur gum dang // gla rtsir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te// bdug pa rnams kyis gdugs pa yi// gos gtsang rnams kyis bgo bar bya// sa dang lce ba bsres pa yi// 
486a5(rgyud): de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya// bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/ lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag/ de la rin thang che/ na po yi// me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol// tsan
486a6(rgyud): ngan sprika de bzhin du// a ga ru dang du ru ka/ sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i// bdug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul// cho ga ji bzhin dus bzhin bya// le tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// me tog 'bras
486a7(rgyud): bus bon dang // spos rnams kun gyis legs par rgyan// mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // nas thug 'o thug la sogs pas// gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya// mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis
486a8(rgyud): ba phyogs bzhi rnams su bzhag par bya// lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu rnams// grwa bzhi dag tu bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram log su/ 
486b1(rgyud): seng ldeng phur bu bzhi btsugs la// tshon skung kha dog sna lnga yis// 'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya// gal te bdag 'grub 'dod na ni// bram ze de ltar byas nas bris// kha zas dkar po zos nas su/ 
486b2(rgyud): phan par 'dod pas bri bar bya// dar ram ras sam gro ga'am// ci yang rung ba gzhan la bri// bud med dag la bu 'dod na// gi wang gis ni legs par bri// dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas ni// 
486b3(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod// lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya// pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing // brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya// nor bu de shal gser
486b4(rgyud): dag dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis dz+nyAn// gdul ba shin tu // 'ab bri// gra ba ni dog tu ri bi bro// galadabade bar 'tshe 'dod na// rab tu bsgrims te de ltar bri// bye
486b5(rgyud): brag du ni skyes pa rnams// gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya// de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom ming // pad+ma gnyis sam yang na gsum// bzhi 'am
486b6(rgyud): yang na lnga bris te// pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bri// de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams// ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri// pad+ma mdab ma rab rgyas la// sdong bu dar gyis
486b7(rgyud): bcings par bri// pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa// zur brgyad la ni dar spangs bri// de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas// mdab ma brgyad dang ldan par bri// pad+mar bcas pa'i ral gri bri// pad+ma de ni
486b8(rgyud): dkar por bya// pad+ma'i steng du dung yang bri// thams cad du yang rgyaso par bya// kun tu cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams// mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya// gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba// byis bI/ 
487a1(rgyud): gzugs rnams mi bya'o// sna tshogs rgyun gyis brgyan pa yis// sgra yi gzugs ni bri bar bya// dge slong byar ni rdo rje 'chang // gnod sbyin bsdigs
487a2(rgyud): par brtson par bri// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang // ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya// bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no// rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che// dmangs rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba/ 
487a3(rgyud): khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya// rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu// lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bri// khye'u yi phyir ni skye dgu'i bdag/ blo gros chen po bri bar bya// sngo bsangs mdag ni
487a4(rgyud): gang yin pa// de yi ched du khros pa bri// dkar me'i phyir ni grag das ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs su dbri// sbom ma'i phyir ni nor bu bzang // rab tu bsgrim
487a5(rgyud): te bri bar bya// skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang // rang 'byung nga yis bstan par bri// sbrum ma'i phyir ni nag bo che// tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya// gzhan yang
487a6(rgyud): ji ltar che ga las// gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri// rtag tu mgul du brtags na ni// de ni bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal
487a7(rgyud): mtshan rtse mo'i bde pa la// yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri// pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang // de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i snying por tho ba bri// cho ga
487a8(rgyud): las ni 'byung ba bzhin// pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri// cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin// nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar// 'od zer 'bro bas rgyas pa dang // ngar gyi bcings pa bri bar bya// klu mgo
487b1(rgyud): gangs ka dgu song la// nor bu rab tu 'bar ba dang // de dag kun gyi snying khar yang // rdo rje gnas par bsgrims te bri// rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang // ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu
487b2(rgyud): bririg pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bris// zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// sgra gcan 'jug rings gza' brgyad bri// cho ga bzhin du nges bris la// blo gros
487b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i mis sel na// za ma rnams ni ma ning yang // bu pho rnyed par 'gyur ba yin// 'odis ni thams cad 'grub par byed// shis shing sdig bzhi par byed// rang byung gi ni bka' bzhin du// gnas
487b4(rgyud): kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na'ang mchog tu da // 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// sum cu rtsa gsum de gnas la sogs// lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur// 
487b5(rgyud): 'dzam gling bzang zhing nyams dga' bar// khyad par can rigs gra gas pa dang // rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang / bram ze khyad par 'phags rnamasu// bdag nyid chen po
487b6(rgyud): de skyes te// rtag tu rig dang bde bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ma 'chang ba'i mis// bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// bsod nams phung po brjod mi nus// 
487b7(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcang // mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phye// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang // blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang // rtag tu
487b8(rgyud): dbugs ni 'byin par 'gyur// lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs// stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yis// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ltar// 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba yin// mi dang lha
488a1(rgyud): rnams dbugs 'byin te// gnod par sems pa skrag par byed// gang phyir rig pa legs bshad pa// de ni ring po mi thogs so// de ni mtshon gyi
488a2(rgyud): mi tshugs te// dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba'i sdig pa yang // de las thag ni ring du 'gro/ rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am// mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang rung // 'byung po
488a3(rgyud): gdon dang rtsod pa dang // chu dang me yis 'jigs pa dang // gcan zan sbrul dang seng ge dang // klu dang nad ni mi bzang rnams// gang la rig pa legs bshad pa// de la de dag kun mi 'byung // 
488a4(rgyud): de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur// bdud rnams kun gyi das thams cad du// mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te// / yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par byos// rig pa'i rgyal
488a5(rgyud): mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga rdzog s+ho// / de nas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phra ra rig sngags 'chang bsrung ba'i tshul gyi cho ga bshang par bya'o// 
488a6(rgyud): srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba// gang dang gang du srung byas nas// don yod 'gyur te the tsom med// 'jigs med rims kyis mi btab ste// gza' rnams
488a7(rgyud): thams cad bzlog par byed// rgyu skar rnams kyang 'thun par 'gyur// las kyi lu gu rgyud kyang gcong // bza' nyes pa dang sgom nyes dang // dgra tshogs kun gyis byas pa dang // gnod par blta
488a8(rgyud): dang bri nyes dang // byang dang gang yang mi bzad dang // phye ma sngags kyis btab pa dang // dug 'thungs pa dang sbyar ba'i dug/ gang zhig srung ba 'chang de la// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// 
488b1(rgyud): gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa// yan lag rnams la rnam par smin// so sor 'brang ba'i dmod bsdigs na// pha rol 'khor ni mi bzang dang // 'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams// de dag thams
488b2(rgyud): cad rab tu 'bros// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' nges pas srung // nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang // rang sangs rgyas kyis srung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rnam
488b3(rgyud): pab mang po yi// lha klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// 'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa// de la srung ba byed par 'gyur// rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di// thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams// kun tu
488b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa med 'gyur zhes// thub pa yis ni de skad gsungs// / rmi lam ngan dang ngan byis dang // gang yang nad 'ge mi ba zad dang // nad kyis btab dang nad chen gyis// gang dag zin cig
488b5(rgyud): 'khrag skyugs dang // gzhan yang rnam pa mang po'i nang // 'bra sa dang shu ba skem po dang // gang yang gnod pa mi bzang bas// mi yi skye dgu zin pa dang // mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i
488b6(rgyud): phyir// mchog tu mi bzad gnod byed rnams// srung ba stobs chen ga la bar// de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'di las srung ba byas na ni// bcings pa dag kyang grol bar 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba
488b7(rgyud): bris pas kyang // gal te dus kyi zhags pa yis// bzung nas gshin rje'i gnas khrid pa// de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel// gang zhig tshe ni zad gyur tam// zhag bdun na ni 'chi 'gyur ba// yi ge
488b8(rgyud): bris pa'i bar tsam gyis// 'tsho bar gyur te the tsom med// cho ga bzhin du srung ba byas// yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang // kun tu dge ba theb par 'gyur// 'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tshe// gang
489a1(rgyud): dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha// stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang // bye ba khrag khrig brag brgya dang // brgya byin mdun nas 'gro ba kun// sems can de la srung
489a2(rgyud): ba'i phyir// phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dang // lag na rdo rje stebs chen yang // rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // lhan cig rtag tu srung bar byed// zla ba yid
489a3(rgyud): bzang nyi ma dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang // stobs kyi lha ni stobs chen dang // gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // lnga
489a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang lngas rtsen dang // smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang dang // / lha mo chen mo dpal can dang // rnam thos bu dang dbyangs/ can dang // dung can dang ni me tog so// de bzhin ral pa gci/ 
489a5(rgyud): ba dang // gnod sbyin chen me dpal yon can// rtag tu srung ba nga bar 'gyur// za ma rnams kyi bu yang sbed// mang lon pa/ nas pa bde bar byed// de ni ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar// 'di ni sru
489a6(rgyud): ba chen por 'gyur// 'jigs med 'thab mo g.yul 'gyed par// dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin// chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la// 'dis ni gnang ba sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnam par gzhig
489a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ gus par byas te brin ni// de bzhin gshegs dang de bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa'ang lta bar 'gyur// de yi grags pa rnam par 'phel// bsod nams dang ni tshe yang 'phel/ 
489a8(rgyud): nor rnams dang ni 'bru dag kyang // 'byor par 'gyur te the tsom med// bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang // bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur// 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra kun
489b1(rgyud): gyis kyang mi rdzi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa yi tshe na yang // rig pa sgrub pa byas na ni// srung ba bla na meng ba 'dis// rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed// bde bar rig bsgrub byed cing // de la bgegs ni/ 
489b2(rgyud): 'byung mi 'gyur// de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin// skye ba dag ni thams cad du// de ni myur du dam tshig shes// rgyal po'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir// 
489b3(rgyud): ni yid brtan 'os yin no// bkra shis thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bsam pa thams cad grub par byed// 'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// bde bar 'chi ba'i
489b4(rgyud): dus byas nas// mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab pa dang ni rtsong pa dang // 'byed pa mchog tu mi bzang bar// 'jig sa ba kun las sgrol 'gyur te// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs
489b5(rgyud): bzhin no// skye ba rnams skye ba na// rtag tu skye dran the tsom med// rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa// 'di yi dbang du 'gyu/ ra ba yin// 'jig rten dge bar grags pa yin// rtag tu thun/ 
489b6(rgyud): mong 'gyur ba yin// de ni kun la sdug par 'gyur// lha dang mi ni gang yang rung // nyin dang mtshan rnams rtag par yang // de la srung ba bde bar 'gyur// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags/ 
489b7(rgyud): tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshal// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
489b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir// de la gus pas
490a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// da ni nga yis brjod par bya// rig pa gzi brjid chen mo 'di// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ste/ 
490a2(rgyud): rdo rje gdan la thug pa yi// 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // bdud dang bdud kyi rigs rnams dang // gza' dang log par 'dren pa dang // bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa// thams cad de yi/ 
490a3(rgyud): mo la 'byer// tad+ya thA/ oM gi ri gi ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ gau ri ba ti/ gu Na ba ti/ A kA sha ba ti/ A kA sha bi shud+d+ha/ sar+b+ba pA pa bi ga te/ A kA sha ga gan ta le/ A kA sha bi tsa ri Ni/ dz+wa li ta shaM
490a4(rgyud): kha re/ ma Ni mo ga ti/ kha tsi ta mau li d+ha re/ su ke she/ su bA k+She/ su ne tre/ su baR+She/ su baR+Sha ga raM/ a tItaM/ a nA dag te/ pra t+yud ban+d+he/ na maHsar+b+ba ShAM/ bud+d+hA nAn dz+wa la ti/ 
490a5(rgyud): sAM/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ b+ha ga ba ti/ mu gI/ um+be/ su pra b+h+ra/ sr-i da me/ su dAn+te/ ba raM ba re te/ b+ha ga ba te/ b+ha dra ba ti/ b+ha dre su b+ha dr-i/ bi ma le/ dza ya b+ha dre/ tsat+ti tsit+te/ pra tsaN+De/ pra
490a6(rgyud): tsaN+De/ badz+re tsaN+De/ ma hI tsat+ne/ gai ri/ gAM d+hA ri/ gau ri/ tsi ri/ tsaN+Da li/ mA ta gi/ brtsa si/ puHsi/ su ma ti/ sha ba ri/ shA ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dri mi Di/ drA mi ri/ re dri Ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA dA ni/ ba ra mar+tha
490a7(rgyud): sA dA ni/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba sha tAM/ da had ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ pre ta bi sha tsa DA ki nI nAM ma nuSh+mA/ a ma nu Sh+ya nA tsa/ btsa ba tsa/ hri da yan/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhim du gsol/ 
490a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/ gzhig tu gsel/ thams cad du 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ ma rungs
490b1(rgyud): pa thams cad bcings du gsol/ sar+b+ba kil+li Sha nA sha ni/ mastan Te/ mri tudad+ha ni pA ra Ni mA na no/ ma hA mA nin/ ma Ni d+ha ri Ni/ mAd+had ne mni ni mar+d+ha ni mri ta det+te/ tsa le tsa le bi ma le/ tsaT tsaTe/ baT dzarba/ 
490b2(rgyud): nirbi ni Ti/ ni ShITe/ g+ho ri nai g+ho ri ni/ ni mi Ni/ ba riNI/ bIrI ni bra ba re/ bra ba ra sa ma re/ tsat+tA li/ mA taM gi/ run+tu si/ ka ra si/ sa ri/ brtsa si/ su ma ti/ puk+ka si/ sha ba ri/ sha ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ sa ma ni Ta birbi/ 
490b3(rgyud): drA miTi/ dAHNI/ btsati/ ma thA NI/ mdzan/ sar / sa ra la b+he/ ts+tshin ma d+hod kriSh+Tha/ bi d+hA ro Ni/ bai d+ha ri Ni/ mati li/ ma nyam gyi li// ma nyam te/ le na ga/ ni ga n+d+he/ b+haT+Te/ mat+te/ maH/ mar+d+han/ dan+d+ra / 
490b4(rgyud): tsakra bA ki ni dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa la ni/ sha ba ri sha bdai ri/ shA ba ri shA ba ra~M/ sar+b+ba bya dI tA ra ni/ mu ni mu ni/ tsAHtsU Ti tsU Ti ni tsU DI ni/ ma hA tsu Di ni/ ni mi na mi/ ni mi d+ha ri/ 
490b5(rgyud): trai lo ka/ da ha ni/ trai lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ traM d+ha tu bya ba lo ka ni/ badz+ra ba ra shu/ pA sha/ mung+ga ra/ gang+ga/ shaM kha/ tsakra/ NAMshu la/ tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA bi d+yA d+hA raNI/ bdag thams cad
490b6(rgyud): du gnas thams cad na gnas pa na ma rungs pa thams cad dang // mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du/ 
490b7(rgyud): gsol/ badz+re badz+ra badz+ra ba ti/ badz+ra pA Ni d+ha re/ hi li ho li/ mi li mi li/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ bi li bi li/ si li si li ba ra ba ra/ ba ra de/ sar+b+ba tra/ dza ya lab+he sA hA/ sar+b+ba bA ba/ bi d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ 
490b8(rgyud): satwA tra/ sar+b+ba pA d+hi ba raNi.AhA/ sar+b+ba tra/ sar+b+ba b+ha ma har Ni AH/ sar+b+ba p+pa A hA/ sa sti rgyab tu me swA hA/ shAn+tika ri sahA/ bashrig ri sAH/ bal bar+d+han swar+tha/ dzam / dzas je yi/ dzas
491a1(rgyud): kAm le/ bi ma le/ khaM bu le swAk+Sha/ sar+b+ba mA ga ta nas na/ oM b+hU many+dzu kAN+DI swA/ oM b+hU b+hu dzA ba ti/ sar+b+bA thAg ngas/ bA sh+mi Amra/ 
491a2(rgyud): san+d+hu ra ni/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya bi dze/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bram ze chen po gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs 'dis yongs su
491a3(rgyud): srung ba byas shing yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / de byug pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba byas na// de tshe yongasu
491a4(rgyud): zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te ring du bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dran pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// skud pa da tsam dang / rdo rjes byabs pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi
491a5(rgyud): ba dang / nad chen po las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// rgyun ring / su na ba la yang byabs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// 
491a6(rgyud): nyin gcig bzhin du kha ton du ton na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa
491a7(rgyud): gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyang ma lus par yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang de'i
491a8(rgyud): lus la gzi borjing dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus snon par 'gyur ro// dga' ba chen po mang bar 'gyu ro// bram ze chen po tha na rig pa chen me'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dud 'gro'i skye gnas
491b1(rgyud): su song ba ri dgas dang / bya'i rnalam du thos na yang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brir mi ldog par 'gyur na/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dang
491b2(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam// de
491b3(rgyud): las gzhan pa 'ga' zhig gis/ lan gcig thos te/ thos nas kyang dad pa chen po dang / gus pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ge ra 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog
491b4(rgyud): gam/ yid drag pos sgom mam/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/ bram ze chen po de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad rnam pa thams cad du 'byung
491b5(rgyud): du ma dogs shig/ de'i lus la nad chen po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs// dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin dug sbyar mas ma yin/ byang
491b6(rgyud): kyis ma yin/ g.yengs byed kyis ma yin/ sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/ bye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ yan lag na bar mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btab par mi 'gyur/ klad pa na ba dang / nyin
491b7(rgyud): gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa'i rims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// dran bzhin du bde bar gnyid log cing dran bzhin du
491b8(rgyud): bde bar sang bar 'gyu ro yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur// de gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba
492a1(rgyud): de dang der skye ba dran pa 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyang byams par 'gyuraro// phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
492a2(rgyud): kyi 'gro ba thibs po kun dang / yi dag su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par
492a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal
492a4(rgyud): po chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 
492a5(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis rtse bar mi nuso// de dag 'o sa na yang rig pa'i rgyal me chen mo 'di dran par bya'o// len
492a6(rgyud): kyang 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag thams cad rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du ngag nyan par 'gyuraro// de la dgra'i
492a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // dgu'i tshogs thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyu ro// tha na bsang bar nges pa zhig la
492a8(rgyud): gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par zas na yang mtshon rnams rdul bzhin du dum bu dum bur chag par 'gyu ro// de nyid kyi dus na de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyu ro// de'i dran pa'i
492b1(rgyud): stobs kyang cher 'gyu ro// 'di ni srin po 'joms pa'i mchog/ gtsang zhing sdig pa 'jig par byed/ dpal du byed cing blo yang byed/ yon tan thams cad rnam par 'bel/ 'di ni bkra shis
492b2(rgyud): thams cad byed/ bkra shis ma yin rnam par 'jig/ rmi lam bzang po rmi bar bye/ rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig/ rig pa mthu stobs chen mo 'di/ skyed pa bud med sring ba'i mchog/ 'brog
492b3(rgyud): dgon dang ni mya ngan las// rtag tu de yi mod la thar/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhin du/ 'dod pa dag ni kun kyang rnyed/ lam las lam gol zhugs na yang // rig pa 'di ni rjes dran nas/ 
492b4(rgyud): myur du lam dong bza' ba dang // btung ba mchog kyang rnyed pa/ dar 'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// mi dge/ mang po gang yang rung // tshe rabs snga mar ci byas pa// de dag
492b5(rgyud): thams cad byang bar 'gyur// dran pa dang ni 'chang ba dang // 2dzin dang yi ger 'dri ba dang // tshig tu 'don tam klog pa dang // bzlas brjod byed dam gzhan ston na// de ni ring por
492b6(rgyud): mi thogs par// chos kun rtogs par khong du chud// de ltar chos kyi ro rnyed na// sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// yid kyi ci dang ci 'dod pa// dges pa thams cad 'grub par byed/ 
492b7(rgyud): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang // rgyal po dang ni me dang chu// glog dang de bzhin kun 'joms las// 'di ni nga las skyob par 'gyur// rig pa 'bum du bzlas na ni// g.yul 'gyed pa
492b8(rgyud): dang brtsod pa dang // gang yang gcan zan ma rungs pa// de dag thams cad 'bros par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ dngos grub mchog gi rig pa 'di// brjod na sgying lug mi
493a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar// byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed// bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir// gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad du// rig pa 'di la sbyor na
493a2(rgyud): ni/ 'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa// sgrim mi dgos par rig 'di las// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// nad pa rnams ni gso bya ba// da ni rab tu bshad par bya// sa dang rtsi ba bsres
493a3(rgyud): pa yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// tshen gyis phye ma sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya// mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin// bum pa gang ba bzhi yang bzhag
493a4(rgyud): de la me tog sil mas gtor// bdug pa pogau gis bdug par bya// sems can chen po gdul ba'i phyir// gtor ma yi ni las kyang bya// snga ma bzhin du me tog spos// cho ga
493a5(rgyud): bzhin du 'di la mchod// dar gyis bcings pa'i mda' phra zhi yang // dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/ de yi 'og tu nang pa yang // dri zhim spos kyi lus bslus te/ 
493a6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gos rnams bskon nas ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya// de ni shar phyogs kha bstan te// rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya// lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su// mkhas
493a7(rgyud): bas de la bsrung bar bya// de nas nad pa'i don gyi phyir// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// rig pa 'di ni brjod byas nas// de ni nad kun zhi bar 'gyur// de nas gtor ma'i bum pa la// lan bdun
493a8(rgyud): legs par sngags kyis gdab// de nas pashes kyang sngags gang ba ste// gtor ma me tog cho ga bzhin// de ltar lce phyogs ngos su ni// lan bdun kho nar gtor bar bya// nub phyogs su yang
493b1(rgyud): bdun nyid de/ byang pogs su yang de bzhin no// 'og dang steng du'ang lan bdun te// srung ba byas par 'gyur ba yin// bram ze dam pa de lta bur// byas na sdug bsngal kun las grol// skyob pa/ 
493b2(rgyud): shAkya seng ge yis// srung ba 'di ni yang dag bshang// 'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na// srung ba'i rig pa bzhan med do// de ni mi 'chi mi rgas te// nad kyis mi btab mi sdug min// sdug
493b3(rgyud): pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur// rig pa 'di ni bdag gis lus// shin tu bsgoms pa byas na ni// de la 'chi bdag tshogs kyis mchod// chos kyi rgyal po dam pa gshin rje yang // gus dang bcas
493b4(rgyud): pas de la mchod par 'gyur// skad cig nga yi sems da/ myal 'di byos la// lha yi grong khyer song zhes smra bar la// gyur// de nas gzhal med khang pa rnam mang pos// rdzu 'phrul
493b5(rgyud): chen po lha gnas bzang por 'gro/ de ltar der ni lha mi gnod sbyin dang // srin po rnams kyis de la rtag mchod 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // bde sogs bdag po dbang ba // 
493b6(rgyud): 'brog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // 'jig rten skyong brdzu 'phrul che// zla ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas// mchog tu mi babang gza' rnams dang // gang yang klu tshon thams cad dang // lha dang nga bzhin drang
493b7(rgyud): srong dang lha min mkha' lding dri za dang // mi 'am tse dang lto 'phye che// srung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed// gang gis rig pa stobs chen mo// rdzu 'phrul chen mo bris nas ni// shes rab can
493b8(rgyud): gyi lag la gdags// mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu phun sum tshogs par 'ong // 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen me rjeg s+ho// 
494a1(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shil dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
494a2(rgyud): phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shI ta ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ sil pa'i tshal chen po'i mdo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig
494a3(rgyud): rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang gis thog mar rig sngags rnams// 'dzam+bu'i gling du gsungs pa yi// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshalo// da ltar byang dang 'das pa dang / ma byon
494a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gang lags pa// thams cad la yang bdag phyag/ 'tshal// de dag kun la skyabasu mchi// 'khor lo sgo/ dab bla na med pa// mar mo mdzad la phyag 'tshalo// chos
494a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'ong mdzad pa// thams cad gnon la phyag 'tshalo// thams cad mkhyen pa grags ldan pa// pad+ma'i bla la phyag 'tshalo// spyan dang ldan pa skyob mdzad pa// rab 'thor
494a6(rgyud): gshegs la phyag 'tshalo// ded dpon bla na med pa bo// grags pa'i bla la phyag 'tshalo// nyi zla lta bur 'ong mdzad pa// bde mdzad de la phyag 'tshalo// chos kyi me long ston pa po// don gzig/ 
494a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// dul ba'i tshul khrims 'jigs med pa// rgyal zhes bya la phyag 'tsha lo// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// skar rgyal la yang phyag 'tsha lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa
494a8(rgyud): ldan pa// rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// 'od can gzi brjid ldan pa po// gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo// legs par mchod pa grags ldan pa// thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshalo// bdud
494b1(rgyud): dpung rab tu 'joms pa po// log dang sel la phyag 'tshalo// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa po// gser thub de la phyag 'tshalo// sems sa dun la thugs brtse ba// 'od srung de la phyag 'tsha lo// shA
494b2(rgyud): seng ge 'od mdzad pa/ gser mdog can la phyag 'tshalo// sor sna med ba thugs rje can// byams pa la yang phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la ni bdag skyabs mchi// ga
494b3(rgyud): ngag gis ni chos bstan pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i// chos la bdag ni phyag 'tshalo// gang la phul na don che ba'i// dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal/ 
494b4(rgyud): nyan thos shes rab mchog gyur pa// shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshalo// rdzu 'phrul can gyis mchog gyur pa// mo'u dgalagyi bu la phyag 'tshalo// chos kyi gtam la 'jigs med pa/ 
494b5(rgyud): ka t+ya'i bu la phyag 'tshalo// nyan thos sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur// 'od srung la yang phyag 'tshalo// skyob pa yi ni dbang phyur ba// ko'u din+ta la phyag 'tshalo// mang du thos pa rig sngags
494b6(rgyud): 'chang kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshalo// lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung // mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// phyogs bzhi'i khor khor yug gi/ rgyal chen rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi
494b7(rgyud): ni sde dpon mchog/ nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshalo// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal// de dag la ni phyag 'tshal nas// rig sngags 'di ni grub gyur cig/ gang gi don
494b8(rgyud): du bya ba yi// don de bdag la grub gyur cig/ sdang bar sems shing gnod byed pa'i// mi ma yin rnams gud du deng // gnod par 'dod pa glags lha rnams// ston pa'i bstan pa mnyan par gyis/ 
495a1(rgyud): byams pas sems shing phan 'dod pa'i// mi ma yin pa gang yin rnams// thams cad 'dus shing 'thun gyur nas// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis tshig/ 
495a2(rgyud): ston pas rje su yi rang ba// dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag la nyon// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba chen po ste// 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongasu khyab pa'o// gnod
495a3(rgyud): sprin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / na mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tsha
495a4(rgyud): rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang // 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'breg pa dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag
495a5(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gnod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas
495a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mi dga' ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / phan par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams la mi dga'
495a7(rgyud): ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / ban par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dong pa dang / grub pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / ming 'di zhes bya ba la mi dga' ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / 
495a8(rgyud): pan par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas dengs shig/ skrag par gyur cig/ kun
495b1(rgyud): tu dngang bar gyur cig/ 'di ni ma 'khod cig/ mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas sa re/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul
495b2(rgyud): bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / 
495b3(rgyud): gzi byin 'phrog pa dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhog gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa rnams dang / 
495b4(rgyud): glags mi lta ba dang / phan par 'dod pa dang / gnod par mi 'dod pa dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba dang / don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / phan par 'dod
495b5(rgyud): pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'od da pa dang / ming 'di zhes bya ba la dga' ba dang / don du 'gyur/ bar 'dod pa dang / ban par 'dod pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa
495b6(rgyud): dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas 'dir 'khod cig ma skrag cig/ ma dngang bar gyur cig/ mi 'jigs pa kho nar gyur cig/ ming
495b7(rgyud): 'di zhes bya ba'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bdag gis bstan cing bshad par bya'o// de la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen
495b8(rgyud): po bdag la srung ba ni 'di yin te/ s+yAd ya the dan/ kha Te kha Te/ khad+d+ha si/ ba la ka ba De/ rog b+ha drig Ne/ hi li hi li/ dum te/ grir+b+ha ti/ a dzar+thi/ kaTha ri/ ma sA ra kal+le/ sa man+ten/ tsa tu ra di shi/ 
496a1(rgyud): yo dza na sha ta At+ma rak+Sha/ a Ni ti kra ma Ni/ sar+b+ba be he ke b+h+ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha s+ya/ sid+d+han+t+ra man+t+ra padA/ dar du bi d+yA/ pat+sa No/ man duswAhwA/ 'di skad
496a2(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba spyi bung zhes byed pa na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
496a3(rgyud): dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po bzhi po lus ngan dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang / 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor
496a4(rgyud): dang bcas mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam phye du na lhags nas gros 'thun par dur khrid chen po bsil ba'i
496a5(rgyud): tshal du dong ste/ rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen po sa snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der/ song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
496a6(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbar te/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas
496a7(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas bstod pa/ 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// go'u ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ 
496a8(rgyud): de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad nas bstod pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpa' chen
496b1(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshalo// go'u tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
496b2(rgyud): 'das yul dang 'phrod lags sam// 'tshe ba dang ldan lags sam// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sku bde lags sam// bsnyun mi mnga' lags sam// nyam nga ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan
496b3(rgyud): 'das kyi sku la gnod pa mi mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / na mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi/ 
496b4(rgyud): dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlu dang lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smre byed dang / mi 'a ma ci dang / gyen du rgyu ba dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan/ 
496b5(rgyud): bgyid dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma lags
496b6(rgyud): pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / phan par mi 'dod pa dang / gnod par bgyid pa dag las/ gnod par bgyid par sems pa lta ma mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom
496b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal po chen po dag nga la ni thams cad yod te/ yul dang yang 'phrod/ 'tsho ba dang yang ldan/ lus kyang bde/ nad kyang med/ nyam
496b8(rgyud): nga ba yang med do// kye rgyal po chen po dag nga'i lus la ni gnod pa yang med do// kye rgyal po chen po dag ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge slong dang bram
497a1(rgyud): zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnod pa byed par sems
497a2(rgyud): pa yang dag par ma mthong ngo // kye rgyal po chen po dag de lta mod kyi/ khyed kyi 'khor rnams nga'i 'khor la gnod pa byed par sems so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po/ 
497a3(rgyud): chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba mchis to// de'i slad bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba
497a4(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du bdag cag pa com ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgon pa dang / bas/ 
497a5(rgyud): mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag na shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi
497a6(rgyud): dgas dang / srul po dang / sha za dang lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen du rgyu ba dang / rgyu ba dang 'dun dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'phrog
497a7(rgyud): dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang mi dang mi ma phags pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / phan
497a8(rgyud): par mi sems pa dang / gnod par bgyid pa dag mchis so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang ngan gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni srong dang tho rangs mi nyal bar
497b1(rgyud): sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lagaso// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin nam/ srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni
497b2(rgyud): nyung zad cig mchis par byas so// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni ches mang lags te/ de dag ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos srod dang tho
497b3(rgyud): rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags te/ de dag dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa ma dad pa rnams ngang bar bgyi ba dang / ngang pa rnam slar
497b4(rgyud): zhing dang bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs da dang / bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ma lus par shin tu mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi
497b5(rgyud): mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshalo// mi ma yin pa sdangasems can/ rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa/ de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya// rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon// mdo
497b6(rgyud): chen 'di ni thos nas kyang // mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed// gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang // nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba ba// phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung // de dag thams cad bzlog
497b7(rgyud): par bya// lha dang lha min rlung lha dang // lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi// gzhal med khang mdzes de dag gis// me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing // nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba// rin chen las byas
497b8(rgyud): shin tu snang // bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang // bar snang gdon rnams rnam par spangs// mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i// 'byung po grul bum srin po dang // yi dgas srul po de dag gis// rmad
498a1(rgyud): byung de dag mi mthong ste// gzi byin ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi// grong khyer du yang de mi 'gro/ 'byung po chen po 'du ba na// de yang de dag 'dur mi dbang // stan nam yang na
498a2(rgyud): chu yang rung / zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo // lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du// nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur// rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa// de yi kha nas khrag dron dag/ 
498a3(rgyud): myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur// de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas// bol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te// de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing // gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyeng
498a4(rgyud): gis bshad pa yi// mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa// 'dzi gus pa thams cad de la 'ong // mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ 8/ rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig/ gnod sbyin gang dag mi nyan
498a5(rgyud): ba/ 'byung po srin po gang yod pa// ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams// lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi// tshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas// gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya// 
498a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan// go cha sra zhing mtshon rnol// stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi
498a7(rgyud): bzang byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// de dag de na 'khod pa yi// nye 'khor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas// seng ge gzugs dang stag gi gzugs// mi sdug pa dag 'gro zhing rgyu// glang chen
498a8(rgyud): gzugs dang rta yi gzugs// kha cig mahe'i gzugs can la// dreng mo dang ni wa yi gzugs// lug dang spung ki bag rgod rnams// rna ba 'phyang dang rna po che// rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa// sgra cher gyi// 
498b1(rgyud): cing 'jigs byed pa// sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed// bong bu dang ni rnga mo khyi// cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod// rgyal po chen po stobs po che// de dag phan tshun 'dub na// lha yi shing rta
498b2(rgyud): bcas pa yis// na mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed// gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang // mi rnams la ni bde legs byed// s+yAd ya the dan/ bka tu mu le/ hA shi Na sha shi Na ba na mu ha le sa mu hA le/ 
498b3(rgyud): u du ha le/ sa ma hA le/ pra sha ma mI/ rAk+Sha sa/ a ma nu ShA/ bA re mi yak+Sha ni/ bA rA mi pra ta ma b+he the/ du ma nuSh+ma/ ma sap+ta ha d+ha mri rnan/ su tiSha ti/ rgyal po chen po rnam thes bu// mi la zhon bsder
498b4(rgyud): bcas pas 'di smras nas ni tshub ma langs// de bzhin ri yang / g.yos par gyur// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i// rin ma dan shing rta bcas pa na// lha dang mi yi sgra skad grags// rgyal
498b5(rgyud): po chen po mchi ba ni// dbang po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyur// srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs// de yi mdun na rgyu/ ga par bgyid// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis// 
498b6(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid// che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa// drag cing mthong na mi sdug la// spu yang ring zhing sen mo ring // lag na ral gri tho ba thogs// so ni zangs can 'jigs par
498b7(rgyud): bgyid/ sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra// drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba// yan lag ma tshang phyed tsame lus// mig ser lus kyang shin tu ser// dri ma can la lus skem pa// ska brdzes lcags kyi
498b8(rgyud): mchu can la// mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid// rna ba gzhu sna gsus po che// sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u gzugs// phag gi gzugs can lte bo che// mgo bo tsha la lag ring ba// rna
499a1(rgyud): 'phyang ba la nu ma 'chang // de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ g.yog 'khor dag gis yong su bskor// gnod sbyin bre ba drag stong rnams// de dag ma ni lim
499a2(rgyud): log can/ g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig du// bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchi// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// drag cing rgod la gtum po dang // 
499a3(rgyud): mgo bo tsha la skra ring ba// mi rnams dang ni ri dgas dang // bya rnams gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid// me 'bar za dang mang du za// mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang // sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang / cha
499a4(rgyud): bro bcang ba dang // mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang // lu das kyang sgur la gnyer ma gdong // mig la me 'bar rkang med pa nga // mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid pa ste// pe la ka che la rgod
499a5(rgyud): bag can// de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid// de 'dra'i gan da sbyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su ba skor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag ma ni rkun ma
499a6(rgyud): lags la g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// bdag cag gi ni gnas rnam ni// shing rta zhes/ 
499a7(rgyud): bgyi srin mo mchis// de la bu pho stobs ldan pa// stong phrag bcu yis grangs snyed mchis// de dag bdag gi g.yogs lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// 
499a8(rgyud): chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na// mgrin rings zhes bgyi srin mo mchis// srin mo shin tu gnag pa dang // srin me nag mo zhes bgyi dang // srin mo rab
499b1(rgyud): gnag rnams mchis te/ de dag go ru ta ma 'thun par blta// sa yi gnod sbyin bdag nyid che// de dgas steng gnas pa ste// g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni// yongs su bskor te 'dir/ 
499b2(rgyud): mchis lags// de dag kun dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni phyag 'tshal sla du mchis// go'u tum dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// bdag gi mdunan drug pa yi// mi
499b3(rgyud): dgas gnod sbyin srin po rnams// lus chen shugs kyang drag po ste// so yang cha la lto bo che// rna 'byang 'jigs pa chen po ste// slom rnal rab tu 'byung // yan lag drug paso brtan pa// gur gum
499b4(rgyud): mdog can the be 'dra// so yang rngub cing rno ba dang // mdung thus/ dgasal zhing 'jigs par bgyid// glang chen mge dang bu marna can// mgo bo stag dang seng ge 'dra// lcags kyis
499b5(rgyud): can lcags kyi sku// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyod pa// lag na lcags kyis gtun bu thegs// lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs// se rnon lag pa ring ba ste// 'jigs pa'i
499b6(rgyud): gzugs can lcags kyi mchu// mgo bo che la skra g.yengs pa// gnag cing mig ser sna zhem pa// bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar dang // mig gcig pa dang lto bo che// mchu 'byangs pa dang
499b7(rgyud): lag gcig pa// rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa// kha med kha gnyis drag po ste// mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid// lag na khar ba dbyug pa thogs// mdung rtse gsum pa skrag cing 'jig/ 
499b8(rgyud): skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste// gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa// skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid// sems kyang 'khrul par bgyid pa ste// spro bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid// de nas
500a1(rgyud): gzi byin 'brog par bgyid// de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste// stobs po che la bsten par dka'// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po// rgyal po chen po'i mdu/ 
500a2(rgyud): na rgyug/ de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi// g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams// de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// 
500a3(rgyud): chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// sa ga lngas rtsen zla ba dang // seng ge sde dang rab gnon dang // ma la sbyin brtson drag po dang // gang po dang ni nor 'dzin dang // tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog
500a4(rgyud): dang / sna tshogs sde dang gtor ma len// yid bzhin rab 'a dbyor bzhin bzang dang // 'dam bu can dang shin tu rgyal/ 8/ 'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa dang // dbang po rgyal ba khyu
500a5(rgyud): mchog dang // nor bu bzang sras rdzogs bzang dang // 'dam bus mchog 'dam bus dga'// khab kyi spu can ring ba bang dang // lag mchog skye dgu'i bdag po dang // 'dam bu'i
500a6(rgyud): rgyud dang mdung ring dang // rig pa stobs can nor bu dang // 'jog po nag po chen po dang // la ba can dang dre'u dang gnyis// klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu// yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che// nam
500a7(rgyud): lding ni shugs chen ldan// 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa// bya yi gzugs kyis mchi 'gyid cing // rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid // lha dang lha min dri za rnams// 'dzegs par bgyid
500a8(rgyud): dang dge ba'ang rung // ma dad pa dang ngang ba rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// 'brog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo
500b1(rgyud): 'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo// de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams// 'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rdul can// bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te// de dag phyag 'tshal srang mchis// go'u tam
500b2(rgyud): dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// ma ga d+ha na thams cad mthong // ka shin ni pad+ma 'chang // yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas// gyang yul na ni grags 'dzin
500b3(rgyud): gnas pa rgyal po'i khab na ku bir// ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste// ta ma lan 'byor pa gnas// mi ti lan kun tu rgyal// ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni// gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/ rdzu
500b4(rgyud): 'phrul chen po skal ba che// stobs chen de dag thams cad ni// yid dge dang pa'i sems dang ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyadas la skyabs mchis pas// de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang // 
500b5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis// yang dag rdzogs sa sa rgyas bstan la// mi rnams la ni snying brtse'i slang // gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dgas dang // sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog
500b6(rgyud): ba dang // mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi// srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu// thal sbyar 'dug tu smras pa ni// khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa// rnam grol zag pa
500b7(rgyud): mi mngar ba// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// khyod la lha dang grub pa dang // bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te// gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang // bzhi/ 
500b8(rgyud): stong dag kyang lhags nas ni// kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khor 'gyur lags// bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu// byang phyogs sbreng bar bgyod pa ste// 'jig rten
501a1(rgyud): mgon po'i nye 'khor du// gnod sbyin rgyu skar spro byed dang // brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci// skem byed dang ni rim drag dang // de bzhin rims nang zhag bzhi pa// de
501a2(rgyud): dag bdag gis bzlog pa ra bgyi// sud ya the dam/ u ha haM/ u ha he/ ma hA haM/ u ha ma hA haM/ sa la mu dzi/ i lI mi lI/ i lI mi lI/ ki lI mi le/ tsi ri Ti/ i b+hi u tu b+hi/ pi ti li ye/ ma Ta/ 
501a3(rgyud): ma ling ma nan+da ye swA hA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lung lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyeng bar gyur cig/ gnad sbyin dang / rgyu skar dang / spro byed dang / brjed byeng dang / mi'am ci dang / gyen/ 
501a4(rgyud): du rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin/ 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang na l+h+wa 'i rgyal po ner lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag bya/ 
501a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// nga yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' ste// kun mkhyen kun ga zigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// ches
501a6(rgyud): bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung // thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni// chos kyi rgyal po 'ong mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshalo// go'u tam dpa'
501a7(rgyud): bopo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// go'u te ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
501a8(rgyud): rnams// khor kher yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod 'gyur lags// bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung // shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid ba ste// 'jig rten mgon sa
501b1(rgyud): 'khor du/ srin po rnams dang sha ba dang // dI za dang ni rlung sa rnams// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bkri// srangs the ngan/ a ti ma To// khur Te/ bur Te/ ma ti bi ma ti/ um ti
501b2(rgyud): man// aT+Ta ma~M/ bcu mi/ mab+he/ ma dzaT/ bo sa d+ha/ rgyal po chen po yul la ler srung bregs steng bar gyur cig/ smon po dang / yi gas dang / dri ba dang / rlung pa dang / mi 'amatsha dang / 6
501b3(rgyud): 'brog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal be nar lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te// de la bdag phyag 'tshalo// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te// rdzogs pa'i sas/ 
501b4(rgyud): rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun ma khyen kun gzigs khyed la 'dud/ yang dag dpa'i khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin 'thun par lnga zhing mchos// de nas rgyal po 'phags skyes po// @
501b5(rgyud): sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni// 'jig rten mgon po skyabs ma/ dag// 'jig rten kun la phan pa mdzad// keru/ tam dpa' bo khyod la ni// chos bzhin 'thun par ltan
501b6(rgyud): mchis/ grol bum yi dgas srul po rnams// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams// khor khor drug yongs bskor nus// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags// bdag ni rgyal / 
501b7(rgyud): 'phags skyes bo// lho phyogs skyong bar bgying ba ste// 'jig rten mgon po 'i nye 'khor du// 'byung ba rgyab gzi byin 'phrog/ grul bum yi dgas srul po rnams// de dag bdag gis
501b8(rgyud): bzlog par bgyi// sung ma tha~M ngan/ oM le/ i le le/ kai lo ki le le/ ku bgu bas/ si ye si le la~M/ si li li li/ mi ma mo mi yi/ hi ti si li/ ma ti su ma ti/ su sum ti/ su su su su/ su sum tiH
502a1(rgyud): li Sha li Sha swA hA/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/ grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu ba
502a2(rgyud): dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang nas lha'i rgyal po// nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshalo// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag
502a3(rgyud): 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// de nas rgyal
502a4(rgyud): bo mig mi bzang // thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la// bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa// go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ 
502a5(rgyud): chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing mchis// 'jig rten da ga na nyi zla 'dra// rin chen snying po stobs po che// klu nga mkha' lding gsang ba pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi
502a6(rgyud): rnams// kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas// thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags// bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang // nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i1
502a7(rgyud): 'khor du// klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa// lha min dbang po stobs po che// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// srung ya the dan/ dge dge/ su ba ti ye ba Te/ a Ta/ ka man+te/ bi ma pa
502a8(rgyud): dam/ bi dad ma/ b+hi da nga ma ni/ a b+hi na me/ gats+tsha b+hU te/ na la pi ye/ ba ra dar tra tsi tsi le/ tsi li li li lo li li swA hA// rgyal po chen po mog mi bzang phyogs sbyong bar gyur cig/ klu deng / nam
502b1(rgyud): lding dang / gsang ba dang / lha ma yin dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig/ lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshalo// de yang
502b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin 'thun par lta zhing
502b3(rgyud): mchis// de nas rgyal po bzhi bla gos brag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lho nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing gros
502b4(rgyud): 'thun pa dang tshig 'thun pa dang skad 'thun par bcom ldan la dngas la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni rgyal po bzhi'i/ 
502b5(rgyud): srung ba ste// 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongasu khyab pa'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du ba zlog par bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi rnams la srung ba dang / 
502b6(rgyud): skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang ra/ bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnas par bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad
502b7(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal po chen po ngag rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bzung zin no// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po ngas yongs bzung zin no// kye rgyal po chen po dag gzhan yang
502b8(rgyud): ngas bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po la rjes su yi rang ba'i rig sngag spyi rgyal po chen po brjod kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar
503a1(rgyud): 'tshalo zhes rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas na bza' chos gos bye/ 
503a2(rgyud): nas 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas 'di bstan par bya'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar bya'o// thams cad la go bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
503a3(rgyud): 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags 'di bka' stsal to// s+yAd ya the na/ hi lI hi lI/ b+hi si ni bak+ke/ a ha ra ye Sha ti tam ti/ ti la bak+ke/ ba lI ta ke/ da ri ti na/ d+hi nang / pu rtsi phu
503a4(rgyud): bu n+ya/ gu gu D+ha/ hi tsa ka ti/ mA mA kI tI swA hA/ bcom ldan 'dangs kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di bka' stsal ba na ngas 'di kun tu g.yos/ 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'dar nas
503a5(rgyud): kye ma kyi hud/ kye ma sdug bsngal lo zhes sgra chen po byung ngo // srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces te/ 'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can kun la thugs brtse nas
503a6(rgyud): 'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi// rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad// de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po// sems can kun la thugs brtse bas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang // klu dang
503a7(rgyud): mkha' lding gsang ba ba// 'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin 'phrog/ grul bum yi dgas srul po dang // lha min bshed byed ro langs dang // brjod byed dang ni mi 'am ci// skem byed dang ni rims drag/ 
503a8(rgyud): dang / de bzhin bram ze srin po dang // smyo byed rims nang zhag gsum pa// de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams// skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te// phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang / 
503b1(rgyud): de dag la ni thugs brtse phyir// rig sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad// s+yAng ya the na/ hi ri ma kha/ ti ri kha ga ka Ta ma Ta/ sid+d+ha ma hA ta ri/ a Da ti ni/ da Da dag/ da ti li/ da ma/ 
503b2(rgyud): me d+yu d+hu ri/ da ra ri/ da ra mi ri/ ki li kA ye/ ka ta ba re Ne/ su su ma le swA hA// gsang sngags chen po rig sngags chen po 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi
503b3(rgyud): chos la yang dag par so sor rtogs shig/ khyed kun lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro ba re/ de nas rgyal
503b4(rgyud): po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po sngon ma thes pa 'di thos nas skrag cing dngang tau/ mi/ dga' la skyi bung zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
503b5(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gres 'thun pa dang tshig 'thun pa dang skad 'thun pa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sdang ba'i 'byung po zad bgyod pa// rig sngags
503b6(rgyud): 'di ni legs par gsungs// mi yi 'jig rten bde bgyi ba'o// rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal// de la rig sngags 'di lags te// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ 
503b7(rgyud): s+yAd ya the dan/ u hu ha la/ ku li dzi ba/ u b+hu ya/ ma su ra bi la/ ang dbang d+yu/ ad dA ba d+yA/ ang d+ya ba ti/ nad da bang d+ye/ ba di ma rung pa la swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung
503b8(rgyud): po thams cad bzlog pa 'di gzung bar gsol// s+yAd ya the dan/ i li i li/ mi li mi li/ ki l-i ki li/ ba na ra/ ni la ba ya/ b+hu b+hu b+hu ra/ thi ru pu pu pu ra/ ga sha lI rau kha da ya ma la/ khu
504a1(rgyud): li khu li ba ya swA hA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang / don thams cad grub pa
504a2(rgyud): lags so// de nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos/ rgyal po
504a3(rgyud): chen po bzhi'i srung ba sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing sngangs la mi dga' ste/ skye bung zhes byas nas sa la 'dzul kun tu 'dzul/ kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'dra
504a4(rgyud): kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go// de nas rgyal po bzhis phyogs bzhir me'i phung po tshan dbo sprul te/ de nas na mkha' la rgyug go// de nas bcom ldan
504a5(rgyud): 'das kyis na mkha' gser du sprul to// de nas 'jig rte/ na skyong ba rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lha dang dri zas pa skor cing mdun du bdar te/ steng gi bar snang la 'bags nas
504a6(rgyud): gnod sprin dang srin po nas/ gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'khor bzhi pa rnams srung ba dang / 
504a7(rgyud): sgrub po dang / sba ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'di brjod do// s+yAng ya the dan/ gi mi gi mi gi mi gi mi gi ni/ gi ni gi ni gi ni/ na khi min i
504a8(rgyud): neSha ni Sha ni Sha/ u ba a/ di shwa di shwa/ bi da sha/ sar+b+ba di shra a d+hi pa ti/ gi ra bi ra/ dza ni b+hu mi ba ti/ i li lA/ ki l-i lI/ ki li lI/ ki li ki li lI/ ki li ki li lI/ ki li ki li lI/ ki l-i ka \u0f7f
504b1(rgyud): lI/ ki lo li li li li li/ ki li li li li li li li li/ ad di/ nad di/ ku n+yang d+hi/ ma hA ku nad dI/ ku la di/ khu lo d+hi/ ma hA khu la d+hi/ hu lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu/ 
504b2(rgyud): lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu/ ha la ha la/ hi l-i hi li/ la ha ha lu/ hu le/ i ha/ hu le hu le/ u lang t+yai/ hi le/ u haM hi li/ hi la hi le/ hu lu hi/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu le/ 
504b3(rgyud): ha ha ha ha ha ha swA hA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs spong bar gyur cig/ lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshalo// de yang bcom ldan
504b4(rgyud): 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang da' bo ste// kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ shes rab chen/ 
504b5(rgyud): po khyod la 'dud// go'u ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la' dud// chos bzhin 'thun pa lta zhing mchis// gnod sbyin
504b6(rgyud): dang / srin pa dang dri za nas gnod par bgyi ba'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig/ gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du mdong na// de dag
504b7(rgyud): la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la// de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang // snying tshal brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te// de'i med la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag
504b8(rgyud): pa dang / mtha' med par 'gyur ro// 'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang / skya reng 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po
505a1(rgyud): 'di thos nas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du dengs shig/ gal te myur du gud du ma dong ni de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad
505a2(rgyud): drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la// de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang / snying tshol ba brgyar 'gos par 'gyur te/ de'i mong la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang / mtha' med par 'gyuraro// 
505a3(rgyud): gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba// nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa// de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i// mdo bshad ni thos nas btang bar gyis// sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang // 'bru
505a4(rgyud): po 'jigs byed srul po rnams// de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i// mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong // lha dang lha min rlung lha dang // dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla// 'byung
505a5(rgyud): bo dang ni sha za dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams// kun tu 'khrugs shing kun tu g.yos// skrag cing ku/ na tu rab tu 'gul// gdon sdang gnod pa byed pa rnams// 
505a6(rgyud): ltung zhing rab tu bam par gyur// sa gozhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos// sgra bo che dge sgrogs par byed// yi dgas dang ni grul bum rnams// sdang po'i gdon ni bzlog byed pa'i// mdo 'di dag
505a7(rgyud): ni thos gyur nas// 'jigs pa drag pos 'debs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa// de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas// legs par rje su mi
505a8(rgyud): rang // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi par snang las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan
505b1(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing / gros 'thun pa dang / tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyal po chen po
505b2(rgyud): bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lag so// btsun
505b3(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dengag gis kyang bsal ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ brjod par bgyi/ kun
505b4(rgyud): chub par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dal la bdag srung ba dang / bdag sba ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / 
505b5(rgyud): gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub bar bgyid pa de la ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod pa
505b6(rgyud): bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la sems lags/ de gang du mtshan gcig tsam/ gnas pa der yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas
505b7(rgyud): gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas/ 
505b8(rgyud): thebs pa de'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na/ de myur ba kho nar bde legs dang / nang ma mchis pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhing thar par 'gyur la/ mi ma lags pa rnams
506a1(rgyud): de la log pa mi bgyid cing myur du gung du mi che bar 'gyur lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di de ltar don che ba lags
506a2(rgyud): so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun
506a3(rgyud): chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas su 'chis nas ming smos par bgyid de / kye rgyal po chen po dag
506a4(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bste na mo che ge mo zhig bdag la srung ba dang / bdag sba bad dang / gzhan srung ba dang / gzhan snga ba'i phyir bsil ba'i
